31b8(rgyud): chagag la ba mo// thams cad du ni rigs dbyeg/ 'akrus pa yis ni bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom nas// pa'ir mo yinam bsgos bya/ 'ab las tsuni yang dag paskyed// de mid sa dang / 
32a1(rgyud): ga ma \u0f7f// der sems la sogs sgos byed pa// bkrus pa mas ni gas gsus du sa// dza sems dpas byin 'a mas pas// bapos tag tu bsgrub bdu// da sangs rgyasamam
32a2(rgyud): chos grub thams cad rabasgrub pa'o// sngags rnams kun gyi mnyes pa dang // dngos grub dam tshig don pa'o// denas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i/ 
32a3(rgyud): ka rdo zhes bya cing po dzim la byams par zhugs nas de lazhin gshags pa thams cad dag pa'i gas bya ba di la 'kho 'di ston par mad do// dam tshig dkyil la la du gsungam pa/ gang dathams
32a4(rgyud): dpa de// shang du rang gi phyag nga yis// sa bskyod pa na dgod par bya// lho ru da la cho ga las// rin chen 'byung ldan thabar bya// chog shes pas rub tu ni// 'od dpag med ni mnyam par bri// chog shes pas byang phyobra
32a5(rgyud): su// don po dgub pa mnyam pa // dbus su rtag tu bsdus pa yis// sangs rgyas slob dpon kun du gyi// rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rjeH// 'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam brgya pa// rnam kun sangs rgyas slob dpon gyis/ rab tu'adzan
32a6(rgyud): bas sgrub par bya// rgyag rna rnams ni thams cad du// ur+b+ba ba sngon po mtshungs pa'i 'od// rtse mo bcul cag chen po yi// rdo rje'i rnam par kun du rtsi// nuba'i dkyil mthor dbus gnas par// khyag rna thams cad kur d+ha/ 
32a7(rgyud): mkhris pas phyob rgya chen po ni// 'khor ma ba sgyur 'azhes bshad de// gleng bab kyil 'khor blarnams sa// bang+kad ni su // na cin pa ni ma sa na// de rnams dbus du ma par // 'dod pas te/ 
32a8(rgyud): mas thams cad me// lha gzhan de ni yang dag 'byung // sgo ru 'dud ci 'byung ba dang // 'dun pa ru ni mnyam par gre// deka ra ba dag po de bzhin dmar// ser po lnga nyid dpa nga // rtag tu bsam gtan gdanas
32b1(rgyud): // de la dgod par bya ba yin// tshon shes pas dang rang// 'jams byed bdag nyid can lag/ sa// gab rtag tu gas pa mchod//  na dun rab tu ma// slo ngams mdang tshungs mtshan// srang me dngan
32b2(rgyud): / tshog shes pa sa 'angs spang ba// dkyim 'bor de yi dbus sa/ khyad rgyal ba'i rims hU~M/ rdzub rgyad nong pa sa zadapa/ de de byin par nas mchog pa/ dI la rnam brgyas / 
32b3(rgyud): / ji ltar rig pa'i ma mig sa/ anade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i zhes papa'i dkyil lapor chen ma rdzogs
32b4(rgyud): s+ho// de nas bcom ldan 'das sgrub pa dang nye ba'i bsgrub pa ston par mdzad do// nya chang bza' ba'i gsang mchod sogs// mngon dgyes gyur nas gang du sems// sems can mi ldan gnas par byed// de la dang
32b5(rgyud): chen po yi// rnal 'byor brtsam par bya ba ste// de yi sangs rgyas sogs dngos grub// rla ba gcig gis de mthar phyir// ye shes 'khor los bskul ba yis// de tshe de ni 'grub par 'gyur// thog mar zla ba gsum
32b6(rgyud): dang po'i rnal 'byor ba rtsam par bya// phyag rdo rje'i rigs 'byung la// 'dir ni sngags chen bsgrub par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi rigs la sogs pa rnams kyis dngos grub kyi dam tshig ri
32b7(rgyud): sha dbyed sa gsungs pa/ rnam par sna gangang zhes gzugs sa// de du bdag nyid yang dag skyed// ra sngags pa zhes brjod na// mamam ga pa 'idzin par gyum// rnam par dang ma shes
32b8(rgyud): dag nyid yang dag bskyed// rang sngags kha ni zhes brjod na// ramabri'i rig pa yi ngan par 'gyur// tshong nyid rnam par snang mdang zhes// der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed// rang sngags pa 'aM zhes brjod pa/ 
33a1(rgyud): na papa krag ny-id na sa sna mang shis/  na na ma dag spya// nga sngags nus nas pan// gsum man na pa gyul/ ma pa snang ma nas nas
33a2(rgyud): ga pa dag /  sngags pa zhis rjodas/  rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa thus/  da rnamapa napa/ na pa pa bas/ mas kyi lAs
33a3(rgyud): zhes par mngon 'dzad 'gyu/ khang nyid rnam par sdang mdzad zhes// da ni bdag nyid yang dag pasnyed// rang sngags dA sha~M zhes brjod na// nags pa'i rigs pa 'dzin par 'gyur// phyag rgya che sogs mtshan nyid kyi'o// 
33a4(rgyud): gi gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// de nyid yid bzhin nor bu mchog/ rigs gzhan dbyebs rtogs par bya// 'di ni mchog bsku' thabs te// sgrub pa po yis bsgrub par bya/ skya 'dir ni grub par 'gyur/ rang sngags
33a5(rgyud): rim bu'i tshul gyis ni// nga nyid bdag po rang nyid du// thug tsam du yang dag paskyed// sangs rgyas kyis myang mthong mi 'gyur// tshig shes pa mi gzhi rnams kyi //  da skye bas bsgom par bya/ gzugs kyi
33a6(rgyud): dbus su rab bsgoms nas khur du chu 'gyur gzhan du mes// gzugs su sbyor ci'i mtshan nyid kyi gder ni bdag nyid yang dag sbed/ nga sngags uSh+ma 'aMla~M byas nas/  shes rig pa dzin pa gyur/ zlaba'i sus
33a7(rgyud): su rnam pasgrems nas// nam mi pa'i steng du yang dag cam// snying kar rdo rje yang dag bskyed// ye shes reg pa 'dzin par 'gyul/  sa 'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// rdo rje rin chen rnam bsgom bya/ 'i rmad dag pa'i ngas
33a8(rgyud): nyid dong/ di srid la ba'al 'grob ba kyi/ zla ba'i gzugs su yang dag paskyed/ de rje sgri lag par dgo/ dri spyan de bskes par bya/ sa bdus cad dang byug cug/ zla ba'i gzugs ni nam bsgoms na 'a
33b1(rgyud): ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od// sangs rgyas gzugs ni kun bskyed nas// sangs rgyas reg pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ rdo rdorje'i gzugs su nam bsgoms nas/ sangs rgyas lnga nu rnam bsgom byan 'od zer lnga yis kun bkan/ 
33b2(rgyud): sa rgyas sru nga mchungs par gyur/ 'i su nyi ma'i gzugs surnam bsgoms nas las kyi mying ga dang // du 'i sranas ni yang dag bcang // de rje sru nyes par gyur/ rtswaba'i 'i nam rnaM
33b3(rgyud): nas// bodz+ra hi zhes bsgom par bya// snying kar rtse mo lnga pa 'am// rdo rje'i sku dang mnyam par 'gyur// zla ba'i gzugs su rab bsgoms nas// rdo rje 'ang bas rnam 'argyan la// rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi gzugs// sems dpa'i
33b4(rgyud): gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur// zla ba'i gzugs su yang dgra bskyed// 'khor lo'abar rabs rnam brgyan pa// rang gi gzugs ni sangs kyis gzugs// sangs rgyas gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur// zla ba'i gzugs ni yang dag/ 
33b5(rgyud): skyed// pad+ma 'bar bas rnam pargyan pa// rang gi gzugs ni chos kyi gzugs// chos kyi gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur// zla ba'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// dkar po 'ab bas rnam brgyan pa// 'dod pa'i mchod par
33b6(rgyud): gzugs// 'dod mchod gakrugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur// dang por yi ge gcig pa sogs// rig pa'i rgyal ba stobs kyi tshe// rigs kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya yis// rang gi phyang rgya sems pasgoms pas// sku ga sung rmugs kyi/ 
33b7(rgyud): dze ru// mchog gi sra pa'i bdag can bya// da nyid da mi tshig dbus su ni// rdo rje'i gzugs ni bsgom pa'o// nyi ma'i gzugs ni rnam pabasgoms nas// mu dro ha nas bsgom pa ni// snying kar sngags yig byas nas ni// sted/ 
33b8(rgyud): chos med// lpags pas nyis dkyil 'khor can/ bsams nas dngus su gzugs bsgom bya// rdo rje'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed/ khamam gtan 'byung bas bskyed par 'gyur/ nye m+bu 'chog byas nas // 
34a1(rgyud): dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' chog las// de'i sa 'jig rten gsum sgrub 'gyur// dang por rang gnas ri gnas su// zla ba drug tu 'azlas byas nas// sgrub pa pa yis
34a2(rgyud): rtag tu sdug/ de rje sems dpa' lhag par gnas// de ltar gyu ma 'i bu'o// ma mo'am yang na su yin no// de lta rigs par bkug nas ni// gamang ba'i mthod pa yang dag 'acas/ rnam par dpon pa yid pa
34a3(rgyud): dang // rags dang dgon pa rnams su yang // de rub kug nas nyid longs spyod// 'dod yon lnga yi mchog rnams kyi// ye shes do za rab bskul bas// dam tshig mnyam par bya ba yin// rdo rje sems dpa' dang nyid kyang / 
34a4(rgyud): gshes pas dgug par bya// rang gi sAl rgyu de rnams gzugs// rang gi brjod pa de rnams sngags// de nyid phyag rgya bcings na la ni// rang gi sngags 'di bzlas par bya// mtshan mo phyed du ji ltar bya// nyi ma'i gung la
34a5(rgyud): de bzhin brjod// lcags kyu'i snying po de nyid kyis// de rnams rab tu bsgrub par bya// bskal pa bsreg pa ltar bsams nas/ rdo rje mtshungs pas// snying pos lcags kyu sbyar byas nas// bkug la
34a6(rgyud): dbang du bya ba yin// zla ba chen po gshin rjen shed// de bzhin nyid du ta ma zin dadu// de rnga dbyug dang bcom ldan 'das// 'jig tan gsum gyi bdag por 'arjod// khro'i chen po mi g.yo'o// khros nyer can yangag shig
34a7(rgyud): 'dres gas ni/ cas pa'i phyag rdong stobs kyis ni// de rngasems dpa'arang nyid kyang / khams gsum pa yang 'bangs par byed// bonya chen po dang sam mo// ba gtum la sogs do rje can// nam mkha' 'ams
34b1(rgyud): ku gang ba yi// dug ni skad cig las 'jams byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod da ma tshig thams cad rnam par smod par byed 'di zhes bya ra nya 'a na la snyoms par zhugs nAs/ dngag shi
34b2(rgyud): shin rje mthar byed ces bya ba 'ardo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so// na ma badz+ra dz+nyAnA la/ sa me ya satwA nAM/ ka ra kar/ ku ru ku ru/ mA ma kAr+ya \u0f7fny+dza bany+dza/ sarba ba s+thed dang ha sarba be rA ya kAM/ mud+hanA kad+h+ri gISh+Than+ta ka da ma hA \u0f7f
34b3(rgyud): bai ta/ rU bi Ne/ ba pa dza/ sarba duSh+TaM/ ma hA ga Na pa ti/ dzI bi tAn+ta ka ra ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ sarba gra taM/ mu le// Sha b+hu pra Sha Ta tsa raN+Da/ ru tra mA na ya/ biSh+Nu ma na ya/ bra h+ma d+hi sarba de bA mA na ya/ mA ba la
34b4(rgyud): 9/  sgye ts+tsha swA hrI/  dun ga ma rnam pa sno ma chen po da gas pa gyur
34b5(rgyud): nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo dang ma'im pa'o de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka'i
34b6(rgyud): bkang nag/ ched du brjod pas ched du brjod par mdzad do// e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyis me// rdo rje ma byed bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rjodade// sa yi gong nur 'gyur bar byed// de nas bcom ldan
34b7(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzan chen po ma nyid kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje sgyu mar brjod pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di ston par mdzad do// oM badz+ra mu ra bi kr-i tA na na hUM phaT/ de nas 'di
34b8(rgyud): gsungs tsar la// bcom ldan chos 'chang de nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs kun kun skrag pa'i// cad du brjod 'di ched rjod mdang // e ma ho sngags rnams thams cad kyi// nam kun de nyid ston pa'o// joms bye
35a1(rgyud): / rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad gzhag par gyur// danas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po nam mkha' khams thams cad kun du snang bar byed pa 'dorje nas
35a2(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sngags chen po 'di ston par byed do// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA bal he nang ha ba tsa bi d+h+waM sa ya uts+tshaSh+ma kro d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang de nyi
35a3(rgyud): nam ma pa'i khams thams cad kun du snang bar byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'i ma mche 'od cer gyis kun du bkong nas tshad du 'dzadra pas ched du rjod par mdzad so// e ma'i sngags rnams kun gyi
35a4(rgyud): // sngags kyi tshul gyi bdag nyid // sangs rgyas kun gyi sangs rgyas nyid// zla 'dug gis thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das slar mang nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gsal bar byed/ 
35a5(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so// na maHsa man ta badz+rA NAM a tsa la kAn he he mo ha ya mo ha ya/ ha sa ha sa/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ A bi Sha A bi Sha/ 
35a6(rgyud): pa hA ba la yan+ta tsa la d+hun d+hu na/ tin ti ma khAd khAd/ bi D+heM mA ra ya mA ra la/ duSh+TAn bak+Sha la bak+Sha ya/ sar+b+ba ka ra ka ra/ ka re ki ri/ ma hA gi mi badz+ra s+phA Ta ya srA dz+ra a r+b+hu hUM dzaM ba li ta ra d+hA na tA ka A~M tAM mAM tAM A~M hAM/ a tsal tsa
35a7(rgyud): Ta la swA Ta ya hU~M as man+ti kad+hA ku ma hA ba la/ sA ta yai dzA hr-i mAM shud+d+ha tu lo ka d+ha s+ya/ bdI na maHtsarba pra ti ha ta ba la b+hA dzA ya trA na a sa tan ma swA hA/ de nas mngag gsug mi khro 'di gsungs pa tsam la bcom ldan das
35a8(rgyud): gzug mi sna tshogs 'chang chen pa nyid thams cad yang dag par bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying 'o 'o dkyil 'khor du byed du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod par ma do// e mtho snga bla rnams byed kyi
35b1(rgyud): ny-id 'byung ba bstad gang mi byed dang bzhin te/ ye shes rtag gis bskyed par byed// denasu bcom ldan 'das smra yang de zhin gshegs pa thams cad kun du skrag par byed pa'adun byin gyis drung ba shes bya sa
35b2(rgyud): na pa snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje chen po brog nyer can zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so// na mo d+ha ga t+ye b+h+re ku N+ye aM b+h+r-i ke Te tA ra d+ha bid+yA m+b+hi badz+ra ma hA pa la hU~M phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam la 'dod chags chen
35b3(rgyud): po de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi chos kyis kun du snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos gnas pa ched du brjod pa'i ched du rjod par mdzad do// e ma ho sngags rnams
35b4(rgyud): kun gyi ni// chos kyi 'dod chags kur bsdus pa/ rdo rje ye shes lta bu ste/ sngags kyi dngos grub zhes brjod do/ de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang kun nas spob de byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
35b5(rgyud): zhugs nas rdo rje stobs po che zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungal 'o// e badz+ra gro d+ha ma hA ba la ha nad ha pa tsa bi d+hi sa la un+yah+ma kro d+ha hUM gu de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam la bcom ldan gsang pa chen po 'dzin pa de nyid de bzhin
35b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsungs pa gang yin pa ched du brjod pa 'di che nga rjod par mang ngo // e ma ho sngags rnams kun gyi ni// rdo rje'i dbye ba bla na med// de nyid dam
35b7(rgyud): cig ku du dag rdo rje yid bzhin nor bu bshad/ de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang de 'ozhin gshegs pa thams cad mi byed pa'ing matad kyi rdo byin gyis rlob shes bya ba'i ting nge dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ rdo rje bdu kyi
35b8(rgyud): pa sanas sa go/ sa sas / 9/ A /  nasang /  ma mas pas pa sgru pa sgrun pas ga 'i
36a1(rgyud): d+ha kas krika du pa ha shed mam/ d+he ban mas rgya n+ya ma nga jug shA t+te// b.rA pa/ bdag chan pa bi N+Da ya ga dza pa/ s+pho Ta la/ gnas pa / swa Ta / nA/ dza dwa / soT+Ta ya/ yak+Sha
36a2(rgyud): la/ bad+d+hA k+Sha / rjid mi l+r-iT la/ sarbakra ho rba yAM s+pho Ta ya~M/ sarba dzo ge slo gsan d+hag rjid mo sroT ya d+hU kA re ra TalaT ha tu/ da ta dang / btsa pa na/ bi kuna'i kus A bi sha A bi sha ma
36a3(rgyud): A pa ya ti swA hA/ de nas pa de gsungs pa tsam la bcom ldan 'das do rje 'dzin pa nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun du dgyes pa ched du brjod pa 'di byed du rjod par mdzad do// e ma ho sngags rnams kun gyi
36a4(rgyud): / ti gyu sa/ tsa tshag thams cad ma gyu/ de 'i byed du bsus pa'o/ nas bcom ldan nas rnam par dag pa 'di rje zhes bya'i ting dzin snyoms par zugs das dong gan chen po din
36a5(rgyud): so// oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga ba ti ma hA badz+ra gAn+ta ri tra yA nI rad+ha ni bat+ye na/ a kan+ta a kaT+Ta/ bal te gaM ma te shwa raM/ ga ru TaM/ br-its+tsha ku mA raM/ brah+ma NaM/ in+d+ra tsan+te/ A ti d+h+waM/ ya maM/ pa ru/ ku ba re/ d+hi ta rash+mi/ bi ru D+ha ka pi nU bA tAM/ shang+kuH/ 
36a6(rgyud): / She / kar+m+ma/ s+thU la kan+te/ mar+tha/ nama? ka rbam-it+tag sas ga sems / T+Taka yo sa la mi na ga tun me e m+b+ha pa duHk+ShaHma ma/ mahAk+Shat+ma m+bi thAka
36a7(rgyud): 'das la/ la tsAm+b+ha/ sa kA / b+ha rba k+Sha gau/ a k+She y-i/ b+ha ya g+h+raM/ ha bi kA/ biti/ sha/ bad+da sa?/ ya dz+dzaH/ zad+h+r-i/ ge brnyan 9t+te rmA su b+tan+da tsamra/ nA~M/ rorma/ bAr ng+gi/ nobad+ha/ ye tsAN+ye/ ma ma man nyin
36a8(rgyud): / bad pag/ thasams kyi sus sulus sa// rgyam tug rang /  la la phru la ga A 'i sa TIgs/ lhag pati/ ma dzu gyu sa bu lan yang bye/ ng+gA bas te/ 
36b1(rgyud): pata hrI babaswAH/ bad gsungs pa cam la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje rgyan pa tshul gyis bskor bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig man sgrogs par byud pa'adi tsha dzan
36b2(rgyud): sa di du rjod par mdzad do// e ma ho sngags rnams kun gyi ste// kun kazhi 'bang par byed pa bdag/ rdo rje rje can 'di rnas// sangs rgyas la sogs 'babs par bya // de nas bcom ldan 'das skar
36b3(rgyud): gi di rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rjes na ma zhes bya ba'i phrinya mo chen mo 'di gsungs so// e e h+ye hi badz+ran li/ badz+ra muShi/ ha nA ha na/ btsa ba \u0f7f/ rang+ka rAH/ am+ba A p+pa/ 
36b4(rgyud): A ke/ A gaN/ ha ya grIH/ pa ya ti sa twa/ denas 'di ga sungs pa tsam la 'i srid du dug chen pa de rnams thams cad durab tu skams pas tsam pa bzhin du nga // den sa rig ma de bzhin
36b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la rab tu brgyad nas tshad du brjod pa 'di ched du rjod par mdzad do// e ma ro sngags rnams kun gyi ni// dug rnams thams cad spel po bdag/ pha nya'i mchog gang
36b6(rgyud): gtan nas// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par spangs// de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang rdo rje gsum mo byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo
36b7(rgyud): rje gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di ga sungs so// oM na rdoni sa/ nas 'di gsungs pa tsam lnga bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang med chen
36b8(rgyud): 'di sams can thams cad kyi bde ba'i nar byas nye bar bkang nas ched du brjod pa pad cid du badzad pa mad // e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyi ni// bskyed pa yang dag 'byung ba
37a1(rgyud): bdag/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsru ba dor// bskal pa'i rgya mtsho bdag gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das slar lang rgyas kyi dbyings su spro bar byed pa zhes bya
37a2(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje ral ba gcig ma nus bya ba'i rig ma'i rgyal po mchog 'di gsungs so// nA mAHsarba ta thAg te b+h+yaHsarba'i drug NI ts+tsha
37a3(rgyud): wa tI/ yak+Shi NI ye/ mA pe Ti i Te laT jo sur brim tha ni A kar Tin rak+ta sa hi ta de'i me bi he Tha ya ni/ ri pi ti ri ka ri/ ta yI ri/ ka pA la ts+tsha tra/ pri ye ma hA gi dz+wa li~M/ ma hA ba la/ ma
37a4(rgyud): pa le/ sid+d+hi sarba aR+tha/ sA d+ha ya/ sarba satwa bIk+Sha pra sha ma ni swA hA/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das pad ma 'chang ba de nyid nam mkha'i khams thams cad rnam par
37a5(rgyud): spros nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cod pan du gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du rjod par mdzad do// e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyi ni// sngags kyi bdag nyid can 'byung
37a6(rgyud): rgyal ba kun gyi zhi gang ste// rnam par bsgoms pas mchod par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo thams cad kun du skrag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
37a7(rgyud): zhugs nas/ rdo rje chen po khro gnyer can 'di gsungs so// oM b+ha ya nA sha ni trA sa ya tA sA ya b+hA ku Ti tri Ti Shi ta Ti shwe tiShi Ti ni sa/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam la bcom ldan 'das zhi
37a8(rgyud): 'chang ba de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par mchod nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du rjod par mdzad do// e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyi ni// Ta gang sangs rgyas yang
37b1(rgyud): dag 'byung // chos kyi yum ni rab sgrub don// 'di ni bskyed par gsungs pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das sur yang ye shes 'du bar byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'ud
37b2(rgyud): nas/ rang gi rigs kyi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM A ra la// de nas bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi mchog rdo rje zhes bya'i'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rigs kyi yum
37b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang rang gi sku rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sngags 'di
37b4(rgyud): sungs so// m-i na ri shAn+ti~M ku re rdza Ta TuT g+hu Ti ni g+hu To na~M g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ b+ha ni ni hU~M phaT swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes bskyed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
37b5(rgyud): den la snyoms pa bzhugs nas rang gi sngags pa gsungs so// oM sA ti pASh+Ta ra bA sa na nA ma ku rba d+hA ri Ni swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
37b6(rgyud): pa thug sa das rig pa'i rgyal po 'dig sus mo// oM r+g+hadanam bcom ldam nas kyis rig pa'i rgyal po bka 'phrul pa/ oM suts+tshin su d+h+waM/ ben phre hUM/ bid+d+ha pa la thod+hU ba ma hUM/ An ma / 
37b7(rgyud): ga pa/ ba rnyang hU~M ba AH/ de nas com ldang 'dis chos rnam par sa pa zhes bya 'den la snyams pa grugs sa smin pa 'das sus s+ho// oM a mra dA n+ti pa la sbyiH/ dunas
37b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa 'jobs pa' rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyon mongs pa pa ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM kle shAs ni be dza ye swA hA/ de nas bcom
38a1(rgyud): dwesle Sha bahUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gci brjid kyi mchos ces bya ba'i ting dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas pab+h+ring dri dpung gi 'di ni sungs so// ma~M d+ham / 
38a2(rgyud): d+hakAr+d+ha ka/ dar dang / bidar bi dang / che tsheH/ d+hin+da b+h+r-iH/ hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das slar rnam pa'i rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi la snyoms pa zhugs nas/ 
38a3(rgyud): oM dza liSh+NI sha rA la dA la/  dzan+da/ de mad ma hU~M hUM hUM/ ha ta/ han hUM phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dkar po 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
38a4(rgyud): pa 'gugs nas/ gtsug tor gdugs dkar po 'di gsungs so// oM ma ya ma ma sbyinaHde nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams ma byung ba dzi zhes bya bting de 'dzid la snyoms par
38a5(rgyud): nas rig ma chen mo'i mchog 'di gsungs so// i pA rkye chu re 'u swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de lanin gshegs pa thams cad nges par sgrogs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa du sa
38a6(rgyud): nas/ khro bo galegs ma'i sngags chen po 'di gsungs so// oM ka ni d+hu ni hU~M phaT/ 'jig tan gsum 'gugs par byed pa'i sngags shin du ma rungs pa'i las te srid du gdon gzhan 'byung ba gang
38a7(rgyud): yadas de yang de 'on nyid kyin pa 'byor bsgoms pas/ las rnam pa gsum byed de// mi ga yogs bya'i tha'o ba// gshin rjen par byed gsum byung ba// kun nas sangs rgyas zhing rnams pa/ 
38b1(rgyud): sa gsus pa dngas yoms kyad/ na ma can dang// phrin na mapa bldan gang gyur// dzangs mas da ya nad kyang// tho dmas 'joms par byed// sta sa can du rtags / 
38b2(rgyud): thugs dag/ mi shes 'jig cing 'phrin byed pa// nam ma ngal 'ams dang brgyangs pa yang/ tsham med par 'joms pa byed// 'bum du bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// kun du son par byed pa yin/ 
38b3(rgyud): 'gugs par byed par the tshom med// khro gnyer tsi ka Ta rig pa// 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par byed// lha min chen po sogs spyod pas// g.yul du sbyor bar byed
38b4(rgyud): ba yin// khro bo gser ma'i mchog rtser skyes// sngags pas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas bya// khro ba'i sems kyis sbyar byas nas// des pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'jigs byed/ 
38b5(rgyud): pi sma der son bsam pa yis// pha rol dpung ni rings par byed// brgya byin gyi 'ang ba tshom med// gzi brji daphung po bzlas nas ni// 'bum phrag gsum du legs bskor na// brgya byin sde yang rengs par
38b6(rgyud): / 'ga' zhig min par 'joms par bstan// spel ma skal lan yang dag 'byung // 'bang ba'i ye shes dge 'byung bar// chog gi spyod pa bsgoms pa yis// rdo rje sde yang rengs par byed// / 
38b7(rgyud): da ye snying po mchog skyes gung// rigs dang rigs dbang rig par byed// dadang yang na 'di nyid du/ sbyor bar bsams nas bsamag tan gyis// ting 'dzin bsgoms pas ser po'am// ban du
38b8(rgyud): 'bo rings spyar bya// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis da skad ces gsungs so// sngags sems cad kyi rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u bco lnga pa/ rdzogs s+ho// de nas bcom ldan
39a1(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sngags thams cad kun las/ datus pa'i le'u gsungs so// zhi ba rgyas pa sogs las la// rang gzugs rnam par bsgom pa yis/ 
39a2(rgyud): rnags ka ye nas yang dag 'byung // cod pan ye shes tshas dbang phyug/ sangs rgyas gzugs su dmas bsgoms nas// rin chen sna tshogs mtshungs pa'i 'ad// rnal 'byir pas bcu
39a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya// khro bo rnams kyi ston pa 'di// rdo rje 'byung bsgom byed pa// de yis ngo bo rnam bsgoms pas// rigs dang rigs su 'di bstan no// 
39a4(rgyud): sa kyi dbang tu ga ma bsgoms nas// bdag lngapa legs mangs par// sgom pa 'i ga 'bang gis bsgres bya// slar yang rigs kyi bdag po sngags// 'di nyid bsgom par byeb ste/ 
39a5(rgyud): gtsug tor yang ni rnam pa sgom bya// 'di na sngags rnams thams cad kyi// dgyes dang mgu bar byed par bshad// dngos grub thams cad byed par 'dod// rdo rje ye shes sogs rdzogs byed/ 
39a6(rgyud): rig ma la sogs thams cad kyi'ang // rig pa'i rgyal po'i rnam 'joms byed// pho nya mos kyang thams cad kyi// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom pa// 'dod 'thung sngags rnams thams cad
39a7(rgyud): gtugs rnam pa sgrim pas so// 'din phyugs rnams thams // sngags kyi dam chag te// ngas rgyas na dupas// ded pa
39a8(rgyud): gsungs// sngags thams cad kun las btus pa'i le'u bcu drug pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sprod par byed pa'i las
39b1(rgyud): gsungs lo// skrod par la sogs bya ba la// sangs rgyas de nyid ye shes can// khro bo gsum po bsdus pa yi// rdo rje 'byung bas grags pa nyid// ma shin rjeg shed ni ye shes rigs// bsdus pa
39b2(rgyud): da la mcho rtser skyes// khro ba chen po nya mgrin ni// chos kyi ye shes rigs su bshad// stong phrag gam ni brgya yang rung // ther 'bus gcig tu bzlas nas ni// rang nyid sangs rgyas shes pa ya
39b3(rgyud): shes pas sbed par byed// thod pa gsum la kun bzhag nas// b+h+yo yi phyogs kyi du bzhid du// 'dod pa 'di ni yang dag brtsam// do dang shing gi sbyor ba yis// dngos po med pa'i yang dag
39b4(rgyud): brtsag// do dang phub ma yang dag ldan// bza' dang gsal byad rnam par spangs// khrag dang pabs su yang dag ldan// nim pa'i 'dab mas bza' bya'o// ha la'i 'da' mar la bri bya// sngags
39b5(rgyud): 'khrul 'khor smad par bya// tsher ma can gyis bris nas ni// nim pa'i 'dab mkhar bcug nas// sbyor ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya// 
39b6(rgyud): shes pasnga la na bdun du// mngon par bsngags te yang dga'artsam// dgra yi sgo'am yang na rmog// zong khyer dam ni kun 'byung bya'o// gnas 'di rnams su phung po'i/ kun nas smod por byed pa
39b7(rgyud): snying rtsod la mdor bsdus pas// bya ba cog pu'i stan la 'dug/ dri ma med pa'i gzugs byas nas// khro ga khro nga mchog 'byung ba// yon tan stong phrag kyang bskyed nas// rtag tu sangs
39b8(rgyud): nyis bdun nams ser byas// gal te 'ga' zhig mi 'gron// mgo 'a tshal pa 'dun du lags// mi byed rdo rje rang gis gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad smod pa
40a1(rgyud): le'u lnga bcu bdun pa rdzogs s+ho// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par snang ma nga chen po rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par byed pa'i las 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas
40a2(rgyud): slob dpon 'dab bzang nyid// rdo rje'i sbrul krung du gnas te// bya dga'i nye bar longs spyod kyis// gang de'i tsho zhing gnas par byed// brjod pa'i lhag ma bstan par bshad// 'gro ba dang ni
40a3(rgyud): nyid dang // de bzhin 'phel gtam du mi 'gyur// thon po min nyid slob ma yis// chos kyi dus su'ang sdig pa sogs// gnas phyagal te rmongs pa de// mnar mad gnas su 'tshed pa
40a4(rgyud): gyur// sngags tsam gal te tshangs pa la// lag pa gnyis kyis yang dgra brtsal// ji srid nam mkha' yang dga'abyung // mnar med gnas su 'chad par 'gyur// bud med gas
40a5(rgyud): min brjod bya min// gang zhig la la slob dpon ched// bde dang lus sems sdug bsngal ba// sbyor ba 'i srid 'tsho yi bar// gal te slob dpon rnams kyi bzha'// dga' ba'i sems kyi
40a6(rgyud): byas gyur na// de tshe bdag la sangs rgyas so// / 'grub 'phrul 'dir ni rtse tshom med// ri la'i srid 'tshal bar// khad yis kun du gnas par bya// dku ru brten pa'i lag pa sogs/ 
40a7(rgyud): kridi kyi la mi bya'o// das 'a 'bras su dan gcer bas//  ba dpon meng nas smos mi bya// de srid nam mkha' 'du pa 'gyung// man maud dmyal bar 'tsho ngal gyur// de bzhin na
40a8(rgyud): pa de lta ba de bzhin du bya'o zhes so// bza' ba la yang rang slob shes// sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgom bya// de yi ming gi yi ge gang // ji srid 'tsho bar brjod mi bya// sangs rgyas grangs
40b1(rgyud): 'dabs padas// dag pa 'dan byed par 'phags// gang ma cags na tan 'das// s+yAd na sa rnams yang das 'byung // na ba pan rtog mdapas// gzhan dugs te rmongs pa 'dag/ demi su dang
40b2(rgyud): // snyas pas nyan migasu bsnyen pa gas / da rnams// de ba ma su sa gyur//  na lam smon
40b3(rgyud): rnams// bdag nyid cig nag 'tshed cing 'tshod// de dag du 'bod du 'tshed 'gyur// slob dpon gang zhig tshal byed pa// de ni de la dbul bar bya// gzhan du dngos grub med pa nyid// ji srid slob ma'i ma brtag
40b4(rgyud): slob dpon gyi// dung ma 'den du bsgrub par bya// yang na sring mod byin nas// 'phrul yum 'dir ni the tshom med// slob dpon gang nig slob ma'i phyir// phyag 'tshal ba ni bsgrub par bya// bskal pajug
40b5(rgyud): cung de mya ba'o// sdug bsngal myong bar 'chad par shur// de ltar yon tan kyang lags kyi// sgrub drug gis ras gapa la bya// gal te gzhan du bdag rmongs na// mnar med lta bur 'tshed par 'gyur// 
40b6(rgyud): gang nyid slob dpon tshol byed pa// de nyid sosor bsgrub par bya// rdo rje ye shes rab bskul bas// dngos grub langs par der 'tho 'gyur// yon tan 'di rnams gang gis lags// bsod nams 'byung bas
40b7(rgyud): shes pa bya// slob dpon 'dis rgyud la sogs// de lta bu gas gas pa bya yin// delta dag nyid dgo 'acog/ chom myad nyid kyigs gnas// delas slob ston lagasas bya// b+hU smra lu kyang / 
40b8(rgyud): gzhan du min// sangs rgyas gnas la gnas pa yis/ yang de mgunas rdo sems mchog/ phur du 'grub byed gzhan du min// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid thob pa// de ma gu byed pa ma chog
41a1(rgyud): dmas 'jig tad gsum 'grub ste// sangs rgyas ye shes rang nyid kyang // dbazhin gshegs pa 'gasang ba rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par byed pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa rdzogs
41a2(rgyud): so// de nas pacom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod chen pos sngags thams cad kyi le'u gsungs so// skyed mos tshal dang rnam pa dad pan// chu klung rab tu 'bab pa dang // ri dang rnam par bzab
41a3(rgyud): smran pa'i gong bang gis bsgrub bya// zlab gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur// gal te min na de 'grung min// dben dang gagan pa'i yul rnams su// sems ni gang du bar byas byed// gas bldag
41a4(rgyud): 'a rabs byin brlabs pa// de la sangs rgyas nyid 'grub 'gyur// rgya mchod na mu k+sha // ribo chen po'i rtse rnams su// yan lag zad min sngags bzlas// nges par zla bas 'khyab par
41a5(rgyud): byed// sken drug dang yang dag zhan// tig tam shing gi sbyin pamig gis// bsnyed sa sonas de skad nas// gsang sngags sgrub pa na spyang bya// de la sdom pa gdung nas ni// nges pam bu
41a6(rgyud): kyi gzhan du min// gas grags chog kun pa' nas// sngags pas bsta pa 'grub pa bya// dpyir sngags pas khyad par gyi// sdom pas mar bsgrub par bya// gang shad lom pa yang
41a7(rgyud): dag rjod// de nyid gul zhugs can gyis bsrung // gzhan du nam mkha' ji srid par // mnar med dmyal bar kun du 'byung // de srid 'tsho ba tshab bzhin// slob dpon snyom pa srung ba la/ 
41a8(rgyud): dalas sangs rgyas nyid //  chag pa'adang sa su gan pa// mnyam na// ya sngags brnas nas// sbru pa'i 'ad ga nyid can gyis bsgrus// rna sa
41b1(rgyud): / gsum/  las 'bru 'gyus tsha med// rnam gas las kyang byung ba sngags// 'bum phrag drug tu bzlas nas kyang // darda sems dpa phyag byas ngas// zla ba nya yang 'gru 'gyur// sngag pa dang / 
41b2(rgyud): phyag rgya'i rang dbye bas// nges pa sangs rgyas kyang thob byed// phyag rgya'i dbyeb rab bkod pa// nges par lha rnams spyan drangs med// dag bdag gang nyid tshol byed pa// de nyid rtag tu 'bangs bya'o// 
41b3(rgyud): bakhas pas rab mchog sangs rgyas la// sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcing byas nas// de rnams sngags ni bzlas nas na// rtag tu nges par sbyin par bya// sngags pas rgyal po'i bu mo gang // gal te sangs
41b4(rgyud): rgyas bu mo'ang rung // bzung nas nye bar longs spyad bya// ji srid yid ni chem par 'gyur// dug dang skye tshe yang dag ldan// yungs kar ti la ma rabasres pa dang // rus pa rdob meng dag ldan// mati
41b5(rgyud): dbye bar bya// bshang dang gcib rab bcug nas// rtul zhugs can pa khyad par byeng // bur gsum mgrin pa'i mel bsreg/ nges par myur du 'grub par byed// lha sbyin zhes ni byas nas ni// gang
41b6(rgyud): kos 'di ni rab gsal byed// gal te 'dir ni sangs rgyas rung // gang de thal bar byed par 'gyur// mkhas pas mtshan mo byed la yang // nyi ma'i gung la sbyin pasreg bya// bskal pa gcig gi bang
41b7(rgyud): yang // sbyin byed gzhan du nam yang min// gal te sangs rgyas sam 'ga' zhig/ mongs pa'i sems kyis 'das na ni// mgo 'chal pa bdun du lagaso// byang chub sems ni rang gis gsungs/ 
41b8(rgyud): rings dang 'bos pa dang por grags// gnyis pa la zhes bya ba brjod// gsum pa lha yi mchog yin na// bzhi pa 'phags pa'i yul du yang // phyag na do ra grags pa yin// snying po kun gyi
42a1(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// bya ba myur du 'grub par byed// reg pa sna tshogs sogs dang gnas// skyed mos tshal dang dga' ston che// dkyil 'khor de la bya ba ni// bdug pa byin nas ya
42a2(rgyud): // / sangos rgyas sas yang / chog shes pa dun gyis// 'dzam sa la da sa rlom med/  shes pas bag gis gyu
42a3(rgyud): skra grol gtsug tor gyur nas ri// mi sdug mchog gaHgas 'i jigs par byed// dur khrod khyim du yang dag sbyor// rang gis de mis ming bri bya/ 
42a4(rgyud): klas nas ni// nges par sangs rgyas kyang 'dzin kyad// chog shes pas gsheng ba'i gos// khro ba'i sems kyis rab zhugs nas/ yang rkang pas mnan nas ni// sangs rgyas kyi nangs
42a5(rgyud): par 'joms// khyab 'jug lnga yin la sogs lha// rkang par byas nas brtsam par bya// chog shes pas nyin bdun gyis// khams gsum po yang 'joms par byed/ 
42a6(rgyud): ba snang ba dang chen po ljags thams cad 'chang bas de skad ces gsungs so// le'u bcu dgu pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nal bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos sgrub pa po rnams
42a7(rgyud): kyi smol pa'i le 'ug grangs so// sha da gci pa ba bya// sems can kun la ba skyes / kun mtshan sa yid smye// ma tugs
42a8(rgyud): da bya// 'ga' zhig dun pa ba bya// rdo rje 'dzin padun pa rgyal// kun mtshigs yid 'i phyug sa// 'dod chags para' bar bya'o'o// ban dang bdi'i thams cad sbyin/ zhin
42b1(rgyud): 'chang rgyal po// kun mtshogs yi dbang phyug sa/ zhe sdang bza' bar bya ba ni// rdo rje ye shes rab rtogs byed// de nyid rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// kun mtshogs yi dbang phyug go/ gti mug baba' bar bya ba ni/ 
42b2(rgyud): ye shes rnams cad tegs papo// de nyid ni ba 'dzin rgyal po// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzadag ni// bde sdug papa' bar bya ba ni// slob dpon ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar// de nyid ge pa 'dzin rgyal po// 
42b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gzhi// slob dpon ji srid 'tsho yi bar// chos dang chos min bza' bar bya// de nyid rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// kun mchog de nyid ston pa po// ji srid 'tsho bar 'ga' zhi
42b4(rgyud): / sems can khams ni bza' bar bya// de nyid rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// kun mchogs yi dbang phyug go// ji srad 'chi bar smad pa yi// bya ba thams cad mi bya'o// de nyid rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// kus
42b5(rgyud): 'tshogs yi dbang phyug go// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi chos nyid dang yi ge thos nas ngo mtshar thob nas
42b6(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol te// rags kyi bu 'di ni ngo mtshar te gang du thams cad la khyed pa'i ye shes kyi bdag pod dag gi ming yang shes par bya ba ma yin na/ gzhan lta ci smos zhes so// de nas bcom
42b7(rgyud): ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das rnam par snad mdzad chen po'i thugs kar gnas nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegapa
42b8(rgyud): thams cad kyi sngags yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i le'u bstan par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni g.yo bar byed
43a1(rgyud): nas bya ba bstan du gsal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas lngar yang bzhin gyi nor bu'i sngags kyi ting
43a2(rgyud): gyi le'u 'di gsungs so// byin brlabs la sogs sngags sogs kyis// de nyid sna tshogs rnam bsgom pa// cho ga shes pas de steng du// yi ge bzhin rnam bsgom pa// bdag nyid
43a3(rgyud): dbus su sen byas nas// rang gi gzugs su gzugs mtshan pa// rang sems byang chub yang dag 'byung // cho ga shes pas kun dgar bya// de las sangs rgyas nyid 'grub 'gyur// 
43a4(rgyud): 'di nyid rab sgrub byed// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// shel dang zla ba mtshungs pa'i 'od// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// bzhi lnga'i yi ge rnam bsgom nas// yi ge lnga nim
43a5(rgyud): bsgom bya// sngags pas lus kyi dbus son par// aM yig ser po dang mtshungs pa// 'od zer lngapa kun du 'khrugs// der son bdag nyid sngags pas skom// dbus su hU~M yags
43a6(rgyud): ngag sbyor// rang gzugs dag pa bsgom par bya// 'dzam bu dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// gzugs brnyan tshul gyis bskyed nas ni// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// yad du
43a7(rgyud): bsgom par gyis// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan de rnams su// 'od zer lnga ni rnam bsgom bya// rnam snang mdzad gzugs 'od zer gyis// nam mkha'i khams ni kur bkang bar// 
43a8(rgyud): nas chog shes pas der// bsdus nas de la ltung bar bya// zlab 'char rabs mtshan pa la// mnyam po dgazugs ni bskyed nas ni// gsal ba'i ral ba 'chab nes// cod pan lnga
43b1(rgyud): pa// sna tshogs 'od zer mnyam par 'ang// sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bskams nas// dkyil 'khor du bzhugs bsams nas ni// de yi sngags ni rnam bsgom bya// sangs rgyas
43b2(rgyud): gzugs ni de rnams su// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms pas// gtsug tor de yis bzlas pa bya// khri bo gang gzhan 'byung bas kyang // rigs rnams thams cad nyid kyi yang / 
43b3(rgyud): rdzogar 'gyur ba yin// rdo rje gsum kun du 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes
43b4(rgyud): des bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni gsungs so// tshig shes pas de nyams cad// oM yig dbus su rnam bsgom bya// 'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam brgyan pa'i// hUM yig mthar ni rnam bsgoms nas// 
43b5(rgyud): 'bul su rdo rje 'chang bsams nas// in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od// zhib ral pa'i cod pan 'chang // phyag na rdo rje rnam pasgo/ bya// rnam par snang mdzad rnam bsgoms nas// 'od zer sna chags
43b6(rgyud): mtshungs pa'i 'od// bsams nas de yi thugs kA ru// zla bar sngags kyi yi ge bsgom// bcom ldan 'dras rdo rje sems dpa' ting ngange 'dzin rdzogs s+ho// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo
43b7(rgyud): rje 'chang chen pos bcom ldan 'das spyar ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// de bzhin nyid du kun byas nas// dbus su haM yig bsgom pa ni// ngos su rang gi gzugs
43b8(rgyud): ltar byas// rdo rje dmar po rnam bsgom bya// dbus su chos 'tshad pa sams nas de// pad ma rAga'i dbang mi tshungami pa// phyag na pad ma 'dab brgyad pa// de yi dbus su ram bsgom pa/ 
44a1(rgyud): thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor na// bsams nas sngags na rnam bskam bya// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dang phrag gi ting mi / rdzogs so// gas
44a2(rgyud): bas gzugs byas nas// ngos su haM yig yang dag sbyar// dbus su rang gi nam po bskom// 'jam bu nad mtshungs pa'i 'ong// 'di mchod gzugs ni bskyed par bya// lag tu mdu
44a3(rgyud): gsum pa sgoms nas// de la snying kar dkyil 'khor dgod// chos kyi dbang phyug gzugs bsgoms nas// phyi nas bya ba yang dag brtsam// smon ma 'brang ba nas bya ba
44a4(rgyud): / yang nabartul zhugs can gyis ni// bsdu ba'i sangs rgyas gzugs bsgom bya// gtsug tor sngags dang lba ba dang // rig pa'i rgyal po rig bcas pas/ 
44a5(rgyud): las rnams thams cad pa yi sngags// go ma bzhin du de bzlas bya// dbus su bdag po bsgoms nas ni// ngas su lha rnams dgod par bya// snying po spyod ba de rnams su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
44a6(rgyud): bsgom par bya// sngags kyi yige mchod bsgoms nas// de yis rnam pa rnam bsnams pa// thams cad kyi ni lag par ni// rdo rje 'khor lo pad ma bsgom// mdud dang yid bzhin nor bu yang // 
44a7(rgyud): bskams nas myur du sgrub par byed// sngags pas rang sngags bzlas bya ste// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa yis/ ngos su zla pa yang dag sbyor// dbus su ser po rnam bsgom bya// bsdus te
44a8(rgyud): bu'i chul gyis ni// rang gi lus la dag par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad rab bskul bas// 'di de rings par byed pa'i mchog/ dus rnams kun du rnam bsgoms nas// nges par
44b1(rgyud): bskal par de gnas 'gyur// chog shes pas mi bskyod sogs// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la dgod bya// rigs kyi dbang phyug rnam bsgoms nas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dgod pa ni// zagam
44b2(rgyud): tha mar bsam gtan 'di// bzhi yi dbus su bsam par bya// de yi sangs rgyas nyid srab na// yun mi ring bar sangs rgyas 'gyur// de yi rang gi sngags kyi mchog/ phyag rgya shes nas sgrub pa
44b3(rgyud): na po rab bsgoms nas// nam mkha'i lam gyi dbus las ni// dbus su nyi ma dang mtshungs pa'i/ dkyil
44b4(rgyud): 'khor dag pa bsgom par bya// sngags pas dkyil 'khar las ngas su// zla ba'i kya 'khor bsgom par bya// bdag po'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// de yis mi g.yo bsgom par bya// rin chen
44b5(rgyud): bzhi byung stong nga ru// snang rtsa mar gyis rab tu dgang // sngags kyi yi ge rnam bsgoms nas// bsam pA di yis sbyin bsreg bya// dkyil 'khor lho la rdul gyis ni// dbus su nr-i ga ya ye
44b6(rgyud): 'gengs// 'bar ba 'gro ba dgribs pa ni// kun nas rnam par 'phro bar byed// de la gnas des lha yi gzug so// tshim pa'i dam tshig gsum 'byung bsdu// cho ga shes pas gtsug tor gyis
44b7(rgyud): gtsug tor rnams ni bsgom par bya// bdag po'i sngags ni yang dag bskyed// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya// kun nas ser mo bcu gnyis pa'i// ut+pal chen po 'dab brgyad
44b8(rgyud): pa// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// de nyid kyis ni bsgom par bshad// rtse mo lnga pa'i darje che// uta pal sngon pa mtshungs pa'i 'od// A li bcu drug yang dag ldan// rtag tu bskam
45a1(rgyud): bya 'grub 'du 'gyur// sngags pas sor mo nyi shu pa'i// me gsum ser po dang mtshungs pa// cho ga nyid kyis bsgom byas nal// 'grub 'gyur 'di na mtsham mad/ 
45a2(rgyud): pad ma las kyi rdo rje dang // yid bzhin no bu gsum pa can// 'du kha'i sngags ni yang dag bskyed// myur du sgrub byed gzhan du min// 'khor ma ba'i dbang rdo rje// bsams nas de
45a3(rgyud): rje'i cho ga lngas// snyim pa'i go 'bang gis bsgrub bya// gzhan du 'di ni 'grub ma 'gyur// rdo rje chen po mdung migs bcal// 'bar ba'i phreng ba mtshungs pa'i 'ang // kun gyi las can gas
45a4(rgyud): sngags kyi// rjod pa rnams kyis brjod byas nas// ral gri 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i sems// 'phro zhing 'thibs pa kun du 'khrug/ khru gang tsam du yang dag bskyed// khro bar byed pa'i khyad par bya// 
45a5(rgyud): pa nya mngag gzug sogs sngags rnams// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyar ba las// skem pas mchog tu mthong bar 'gyur// dbyug patho ba dgra swA dang / 
45a6(rgyud): zhags pa ban+ti sa bsgom pas// tsho gas bsgom pa byas nas ni// rdo rje 'chang rnams mnyes par byed// 'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi bsgom pa ste// rdo rje
45a7(rgyud): shes can gyis gsang // ye shes dngas grub can du brjod// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsungs so// gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod na// chog shes pas sbyin
45a8(rgyud): bsreg bya// de nyid gsang ba'i ting 'dzin gnas// rnam pa sna tshogs sbyin bsreg brtsam// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi sbyar ba la sa// rigs kyi las ni sgrub par byed// oM mag sngags kyi
45b1(rgyud): byab yis// sgom pas dngas gru nab par 'gyur// na ldan la kyil mamar num// rgyas pacams gyung mnas// dngas spyod la ni gragasamamatsha// nga byugs mi rnam par// ma ma
45b2(rgyud): dbus son par// bdud rtsi lta bur bsgom par bya// de nyid la ni lha yi gzugs// rang gi tshul gyis bsgom par bya// bdag nyid bdag pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul las byung // Sha ni rab tu
45b3(rgyud): gangangs byas nas// me stag 'thabs pasu 'khrugs pa yi// sngags pas la yi dbus son par// hUM yig de yis bsam par bya// bcom ldan 'das sbyin bsreg+sa rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so// 
45b4(rgyud): chog shes pasa'am smang // mar me zhi ba'i rigs la spyad// mar khu chen po'i bye brag las// ye shes rdo rje'i rigs su brjod// nil rdo rje slob dpon gyi// snying ka'i dbus son rnam bsgom bya// yid
45b5(rgyud): bzhin nor bu lag bsams nas// 'di ni dag pa'i tshul mchog go// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs brnyan che// pad ma'i yon tan 'byung ba la// gzugs ni 'dod chags rigs mchog gi/ 1
45b6(rgyud): 'dod mchod rdo rje can// las bzhi'i rab tu dbye ba las// sngags kyi yaM ge dgod byas nas// bcom ldan 'das gsang pa'i sbyin srag rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces gsungs so// gnyis su med pa mnyam
45b7(rgyud): pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags yid bzhin nor bu'i le'u ste nyi shu pa rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes
45b8(rgyud): dbazhen sa gags pa thams padakyisapas kyi 'gas kun las 'dus shes rgya ste mam tu dag lus so// sangs kyis sa canag/ 'ad ma tshig kyis go// 
46a1(rgyud): thams cad yang dag dmigs// de yi bsam gtan rang bskul bya// dam tshig ye shes sangs rgyas kun// rigs dmigs dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// gzugs
46a2(rgyud): ni sangs rgyas mtshungs pa'i 'od// oM mig ye shes dbye ba yis// 'dun rdo rje'i tshul bstan pa'o// dam pa'i tshid pan longs spyod pa// kha dag dkar po shin du mdzes// phyag 'an
46a3(rgyud): la spyan yangs pa// me stag 'thabs pas kun du 'khrugs// rnal 'byor mchod phyir thogs la sogs// brgyan cing dkyil 'khor la sogs pa// cod pan du ni rdo rje sems// mdzes pa
46a4(rgyud): gzugs ni rgyal ba'i gzhi// dbang po gnyis kyi rab sbyor bas// 'dir bsam gtan tshul mchog go// sA yi rdo rje'i sogs sbyor gyis// mngon shes lnga yi rab skur las// rkang gnyis
46a5(rgyud): mchog de nyid shes pas// thod bcan gyi gtso bor brjod// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'di ye shes// rigs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa thams
46a6(rgyud): na gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la skems par zhugs te/ rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// 
46a7(rgyud): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis na// dbus sa ka 'gas ni rab brtag bya// nag po shan turnam 'gyur khris// ma rungs na pa ni rnam par gdangos// me staga'i thib po 'bar ba ste/ 'jin
46a8(rgyud): pa ying ni 'jigs par byed// phyag bzhi pa ster ba 'bad pas// dbang po gnyis kyi sa rab sbyar laso// 'don rdo rje'i tshul btan pa'o// rdo rje thugs sogs yang dag grub// rab tu gnas
46b1(rgyud): pas de kA Sh+ya// 'dod chags ro rab bstsal bas// dngas grwa' thams cad bsgrub pa dbya// rnga rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin do// de nas bcom ldan 'das phragan rdo rje chos thams cad
46b2(rgyud): 'chang ba'i dmatshig byin gyis rlob pa nis bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// chos 'chang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// chos kyi dkyil 'khor spyod pa las// dbus su
46b3(rgyud): gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya// dmar po 'ad chags 'dzin pa 'bar// sna tshogs brgyan gyis brgyan pa yi// phyag bzhi pa la yid 'ong 'ang // dbang po gnyis kyi rab sbyor bas// de yi chags bsgom pa ni// 
46b4(rgyud): 'di ni 'dod chags rdul bstan pa'o// gsung gi rdo rje gtso dngos kug/ rdo rje chos rab sbyor sogs kyis// snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis sgrub// skem pa yang ni myur 'grub byed// chos 'chang ba'i dam
46b5(rgyud): cig gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dam tshig gi rdo rje'i rigs byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig
46b6(rgyud): mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis// gzugs ni dbus su dgod par bya// khyab bdag zhib ser po'i mda'// sman gsum brtul zhugs
46b7(rgyud): can gyis bsgom// kun du dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs// me stag tshogs ni kun du 'khrugs// phyag bzhi par ni chag las// bskam bya myur du 'grub par byed// rdo rje mthar zug nor dngos grub// ra
46b8(rgyud): duganas pas de bsgru byo// 'dod sngags rnasasemams nga gyi// kha pa'i ting 'i dmas so// sdug sung thugs kyi bsgom pa'o// de rjesems dpas sprul pa yin// de rje du shi mtsha
47a1(rgyud): ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no// ji srid gzugs ni kun kor ba/ de la lha nyid rab tu grags// slar yang 'di yi tshul gyis na// skyed par byed pa'i cha gar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das
47a2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsungs sa// rang ka sngags yig dbyibs sam// yang na rigs kyi rig pa yis// rigs kyi bdag pa'i sngags kyis sam// brtul zhugs can gyi
47a3(rgyud): rigs rgyal bas// thams cad las can sngags kyis deng // gtsug tor sngags kyis rnam bsgom bya// 'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i de nyid gsungs pa yin// @
47a4(rgyud): ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so// zhi ba'i las kyi rab dbye bas// rigs kyi sngags su rab tu grags// rgyas pa can la rigs kyi sngags// sgom pas nges par 'grub par
47a5(rgyud): dbang du bya ba'i tshig la// rig pa'i rgyal pos bsgom par bya// thams cad las can sngags kyis ni// mngon spyod rnam par skam par byed// spyod par byed pa'i cho ga la// gtsug tor
47a6(rgyud): rin pa bskum bya// sngags shes bson phung gung bsags// po nya'o nyam bsam bya// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so// 'od bar lnga yi tshul gyis ni// rtog
47a7(rgyud): pas de la bsgom par bya// gzhan du dngos grub med pa nyid// sgom pa rnams su shes par bya// rigs kyi las kyi rab dbyibs// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rnam bsgom pa'o// sngags kyi
47a8(rgyud): ge'i rab dbye bas// bsgom bya dngas grub thob par 'gyur// snying ka'i dbus son phra ma ni// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rnam bsgom pa// sngags kyi yi ge'i rab dbye bas// bsgom pas dngos grub
47b1(rgyud): khabapa stsu/ rnyeng // dngas sa rnams/ kyil la rnams kyi ldanas// ske gang 'a gyu yis// 'di ni pas ga d+hA rgyu mchag//  na pa dam ba sta
47b2(rgyud): lngas// bsam gtan thams cad du brtag bya// gzhan du dngos grub med pa nyid// sngags rnams kun du bzlas par bya// hUM yig oM yig dbye ba pas// swA hA hU~M yig gzhan gyi ga // 
47b3(rgyud): pa'i cho ga byas nas ni// bsnyen pa gang zhig dus bsgrub bya// rigs gsum la yang d+hi yig dang // e yig yi shes rigs mchog yin// stsogs kyi yi ge la sogs rnams// dpral bar / 
47b4(rgyud): ras rab snyamaH// bcom ldan 'das de gas da skad ces gzungs so// rkyen pazhi'i skyeng bam migs kyis// rdo rje can pa gachags// zla ba dang ni gnas pa y-i// 'din
47b5(rgyud): ngos gra tshul bstan pa'o// sgrub par rang gi lha yi gzugs// rdo rje can la bdud rtsi'i gzugs// nye bar mu' pa 'dus pa la// 'di ni dngos grub tshul mchog go/ bdag gi sgrub pa'i las can la/ 
47b6(rgyud): bdag pa'i gzugs dang yang dag ldan// bsnyed pa'i dus su rab bsgrub pa// gtsug tor gzugs dang yang dag lhun// me stag 'thibs pas 'khrugs pa 'i// rang sgral/ zug sa dang yang dag
47b7(rgyud): rdo rjes rab dubye ba yis// dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'o// grags par ldan pa'i dngos grub kun// 'di nyid kyis ni byang chub thob// de yi mchog tu bsgrub par bya// dngos grub chen po'i
47b8(rgyud): yon tan 'ahU~M// bcom ldan 'das kun du ba'ang ba ri rjeb chang chen pas de skad ces gsungs sa/ gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam ma rgyal tsho rtog pa'i rtsom mtshan por sngags
48a1(rgyud): cad kun las gtus pa zhes bya ba' ting nge 'dzin gyi le ru sngag shu ma gcig pa rdzogs sku// // da ras bcom ldan las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sa
48a2(rgyud): yang 'dus par gyur nas phyagan rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' nga bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa ni rdo rje'i bkod pas yang dag par ma de ngas/ gsung gi rdo rje chos kyi gsung gi lam
48a3(rgyud): nges par bskyed pa'i rdo rje tshul 'di snyan par mdzad do// gsang bdag pa dmigs pa med// ye shes yon tan kun g+hi grwa'i// kun nas ma shes 'dag med pa// gsang pa'i ye shes phyag 'tshal
48a4(rgyud): bstod// gsang ba'i de nyid don dang ldan// mchog gi spyod pa rgya mtsha che// kun nas 'dod pa nga dag 'byung // rdo rje ye shes phyag 'tshal bstod// gtso ba'i ye shes ji ltar gnas// rdo rje mi phyed
48a5(rgyud): gsum gnas pa// rigs kyi pha rol phyin pa thob// byang chub spyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// sams can kun skyes can gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab gzhug mdadu// rang bzhin dag pa
48a6(rgyud): dga'a'i mchog/ sems can skyob la phyag 'tshal bstod// chos sku thar pa chen po ste// yid bzhin nor tu mthong ba tshe// sems can kun dgyes byed pa // dag pa'i spyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ 
48a7(rgyud): de nas yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i'adi mchog gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' la
48a8(rgyud): nga ba'i chos kyi yon tan gyi khyad par so sar 'dod pa bya ba gang ci ltar lags/ de nas phyag na rdo rjed lanan gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
48b1(rgyud): te/ bcom ba par mnyam par shes// sangs rgyas chos su 'dod par bya// be tsom meng par 'du shes pa// chos rnams thams cad 'dod par bya// the tsom med par 'du shes pa// 'dus byas thams/ 
48b2(rgyud): 'do par bya// 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sprin gyi sa la rab tu gnas pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'ams cad kyi chos kyi sku dang / de bzhin gshegs thams
48b3(rgyud): nin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku rnams su rnam par rtog pa med cing the tshom med ba de bdag gi zhes chos thams cad kyang nam mkhar mthong bar
48b4(rgyud): gyur te/ rigs kyi bu mdor bsdus na/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje ye shes zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'angs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das
48b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skyes bu'imatshig la phyag btsas nas 'di skad ces gsas to// bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi spang pa sbed par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di don dam pa'i gse ba
48b6(rgyud): la dad par mi ltar 'gyur/ 'di lta ste/ yang com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
48b7(rgyud): su yang dag par byang chub nas mngar par rdzogs par 'ang rgya bar ji ltar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu mngon
48b8(rgyud): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje 'chang bas gsol pa/ ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan yang stong gsum gyi
49a1(rgyud): khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi cha shas su gyur pa'i gzhi'i sems can rnams mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
49a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad phyag na rdo rje'i tshul 'di blta bar bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams ya mtshan thob cing dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba thob nas/ de lta bu'i dbyangs 'di gsung
49a3(rgyud): so// e ma'o ye shes ye shes che// rdo rje chen po rab tu mthong // rmad du byung ba'i 'jig rten gyis// ye shes mi k+ka ni rnam spangs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshes
49a4(rgyud): 'thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge'i rir la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs mthag tu bcom
49a5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'od zer dbye la khrag ljig// brgya stong phyung nas shwar dang lho la sogs pa'i/ phyogs mngon par 'arjod du med pa'i yang mngon par brjod du med pa'i gang
49a6(rgyud): gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi dul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i sku gsum gyi ye shes kyis gang bar mdzad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams byon nas/ byang chub kyi sems
49a7(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// byang chub rang bzhin yang dag thob// byang chub sems dpas snying po byin// nam mkha'i khams la longs spyod pa'i// rdo rje byang chub rab tu gnas// mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
49a8(rgyud): la// smras pa dag ni yad ma yin// rdo rje'i rang bzhin le shes kyis// nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med ces so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag da rdo rjo dri de 'dzin lal bzhengs nas/ rdo rje chos la
49b1(rgyud): bar gyur to// sems dpa' chen po dam tshig gang yin pa de mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje skyes brjen po de li/ sku dang gsung dang zhugs
49b2(rgyud): kyi dbye'i rin po che snyom pa/ nges par rig nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang gzugs su zhugs par mdzad/ de ji lta ba bzhin du bcom ldan 'das/ de zhi
49b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag pos rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs nam mkha' lta bur skor bas yang dag par gnas par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yang/ 
49b4(rgyud): dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de rje zhes bya ba'i le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs sa// / 'phags pa gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen pa rdzogs s+ho// 
49b5(rgyud): mkhan chen bar ba 'ots+tsha ba'i phyag dpe'i/ gsob nas shog yang la rlung bsngar bstang ba las phyis nyid stong smon tha'i gtsug la la khang nas rgya dpe lhag ma rnams rnyed nas bsgyur bar rtsom pa na/ dpal
49b6(rgyud): dus kyi 'khor lo'i phyi nang gzhan gsum gyi tshul la mi'i rigs pa'i spobs pa thob pa'i bla ma yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po lags par sbyar ba'i skad kyis 'arda spyad pa'i tshul la blo gros
49b7(rgyud): shin du byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi mig tshas grags dpal bzang ba'i bkas bskul zhing sbyin bdag mdzad nas/ bu skyon gyis bskur ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong rin chen rgyal mtshan no// / rgyud min
49b8(rgyud): d+yad ltar bcos pa yi// chos min sun dbyung bya phyir dang // dam chos snang ba spel po'i phyir// ji ltar nus bzhin bsgyur ba lags// 'di don 'byed pa'i 'grel pa dang // rgyad dpe'i dpe spang ma snyed
50b1(rgyud): dU // ska gas du na sa dang // da nan pa rnams kyi// nAg lan snyoms par zhugs// gsang ba las kyang bas gsang pa// ga sa ldan pa 'di sa ste// nganas snyan pa
50b2(rgyud): dzI do// de bzhin grashegs pa kun gyi bdig/ gsadeb pa rnams ma lus pa'o// sku dang gsungs dang thugs du rje// byang chub sems kyi snying po ci// chos kun mnyam pa nyid dgongs
50b3(rgyud): pa'i// mnyam nyid gnyis su med pa'i gnas// spyod pa mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// de nyid dngal gnas pa yis// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag med
50b4(rgyud): la// gzigs shing mi byed rdo rje las// ma g.yos lAm me ltar der gnas// mi 'gyur gsang ba 'dus pa'o// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul can// 
50b5(rgyud): / sna tshogs 'khor rnams 'dus pa ste// rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs rnams las// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshe// kun du bzang pos gsor ba btab// rang gi stan las la
50b6(rgyud): me ni// bla gos phrag par gabar gyur pas// pus mo sel btsug sa nas ni// thul po sbyar te skyes btud nas// gsang ba nas ni lung la bya// ches gsang ba ni ji lta bu// gsang ba chen po
50b7(rgyud): ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung dug sol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// 'khor rnams kun la rjes brtse bas// rdo rje gsang bkun 'drag nyid// rdo rje'i gsung gis bka
50b8(rgyud): spel pa// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos kyi dbyings ni snang ba ma// rang bzhin 'dags la yongs su ga/ nam me 'i'i dbyings bzhin drim med// sku gsung bags kyi
51a1(rgyud): rdo rje yi// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i dngos bdag nyid// dkyil 'khor bsdus dang spros pa'i tshul// bskyed dang gnas dang sdud par mdzad// nyan thos rang tshul la sogs las// 
51a2(rgyud): gsang ba bya ba spyod pa ste// pha rol phyin pa'i mdo sde las// gsang ba rnal 'byor rgyud du grags// phyi na gas dpa' rim shes pas// gsang chen rnal 'byor bla med rgyud// thabs dang
51a3(rgyud): shes rab gnyis med pa// stong pa snying rje dbyer med phyir// bde chen byang chub sems mchog gsang // de nyid dpal ldan 'dus pa ste/ 
51a4(rgyud): skugasung thugs// gnyis ming mnyam pa ro gcig pas// phyag rgya chen po'i gnas 'dir// thun mong ma yin chal pa 6// dmatshig spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin// legs kyi legs sa
51a5(rgyud): sems dpa' che// kun du bzang po legs par nyon// rgyud rnams kun du ba bshad cing // khyad par dngos grub 'byung ba'i gnas// rim pa bla na byed pa'i chos// snying po khyod la bskrun pa
51a6(rgyud): / e ma'o sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// byang chub sems mchog bla de med// rang 'byung ye shes bde ba'i mchog/ 'dod chags can gyi skyes
51a7(rgyud): rnams// rab tu gdul ba'i don medang // gsung ba'i spyod pa mchog gi chos// gzhung nang rtogs par sla ba'i don// 'dus pa chen po rdo rje'i tshig/ rtogs dka' sangs rgyas
51a8(rgyud): dayul pas// sdom pag sang ba rgyas gang ba phyir// ni ming ye shes 'byung gnas gtor// lhan cig skyes pa'i nga ba nyid// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje 'chang bachen/ 
51b1(rgyud): por yul// thabs las ma lus sangs rgyas 'byung // 'di nyid gsang ba'i chos nyid can// sra srig sung ba ma skyes pa// sems can lngas dang snang ba khyab// gsung gri gsang bar 'ag
51b2(rgyud): pas// thams cad sgra dang dbyer mi phyed// thugs kyi gras ba skye ba med// phyag rgya chen po mam gyi mchog/ 'khor 'das chos dang ro gcig pas// sbas pa gsang ba mi shes rnams// 
51b3(rgyud): lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni// dri mas khebs pa'i rang bzhin gyis// 'gro ba lnga sogs dag tu 'khor// gsang ba'i yi ge'i don ma mthong // ka kha ga g+hang / tsa tshangadza dz+hanya/ Ta dza Da D+ha Na/ 
51b4(rgyud): ta thad d+ha na/ ba pa ba b+ha ma/ ya ra lA wa/ sha ShA sa ha/ ji srid ya ra la ha'i bar// ka khag mtha' na d+ha'i mtha'// da d+ha'i mtha' dang ma mthar bcas// de de rtsa ba'i yi ge gsum// thoka
51b5(rgyud): gsang gra e dang 'i// dus gsung rdo rje'i yi ge gnas// 'byung dang 'byung lngas glang slar bcas// 'dus pa 'di ni sbas pa'o// rnal 'byor rgyud tshul sna tshogs rnams// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor
51b6(rgyud): nges pa yis// du kA nyid du dbang bskur bas// thabs dang shes rab spyad pa yi// ye shes 'byung ba'i phung po yin// thabs dang thabs las byung ba yi// khyad par rim pa gang gis ni// mdod na
51b7(rgyud): bangon par bsdus pa yin// a A~M/ i A~M/ u A/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ aM ai/ oM oM/ aM AH// e ni skye ba med pa'i tshul// shes rab pa rol phyir sbyor ka/ dbyangs kyi yi \u0f7f
51b8(rgyud): ma bar// phreng nyid rnam mkha'i chos rnams kyis// pidabar gshegs pa'i gsung rab mchog/ snying po'i yan lag dag tu bshad// chu kha chen pos chos phung po// brgyad khri bzhi stong
52a1(rgyud): gsungs pa las// dpal ldang 'das pa'i snod yin te// de bas 'di ni rgyud kyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// yid tan pri las rdo rje sogs/ 
52a2(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa de// snying po kun pas 'di bsdus yid// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang bya gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'phya
52a3(rgyud): chen po'i gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa
52a4(rgyud): mas cad yang dag par 'dus te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
52a5(rgyud): bachog rnams kyis// de sra bar bgrod pa'i lam gyur bya// rdo rje'i gsung gis bka' stsal don// bas+t+rab bya sgrub byed don pa nang gsol ces gsol ba btab pas rdo rje 'dzin pa
52a6(rgyud): na pos ji lta bar mkhyen cing thugs su chud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad kyi sgrol 'jug pa ngo bo nyid med pa rdo rje des bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs nas de bzhin
52a7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rang bzhin dag cing bdag med pa'i// chos kyi dbyings na spos dang bral// sna tshogs sgyu ma'i cho phru
52a8(rgyud): / rang 'byung dag par 'char ba yin// rnal 'byor rnams la dngos grub kyi// 'bras bu nyams snang sna tshogs pa'o// khams gsum sems can thams cad la// las dang nyon
52b1(rgyud): ngas smug bsngal babyud// de bzhin gshegs pa thams padal// thams pa ma khyen pa'i shes kyi// gsang babasas rgyas mi bya ba// the ma sa drug pa'i stobs smra // de gnas/ 
52b2(rgyud): ga~Ms n+ya ga cigags bstas pa phyim// 'brel ba can du da pa bya//  pa sa ni pa/ sa dka'aba'o// d+hAgs sa zhing 'di smrab pa yi// dkyil la ba dzig
52b3(rgyud): khams// gsul ba chom myed du // dge b.rang myong nyid// mtshogs kyi nyid tsog pa las// kun du byu dag 'ig gas/ rang bzhin sangs rgyas rdo rdo'i sgra// slob pa'i sbyi ces
52b4(rgyud): kun du khyab// phyogs bcu 'od kyi phreng ba yi// snang bas rgyas pa 'phro zhing 'khrugs// gsal dang gsal min gnyim ldan pa'i// rin chen pad ma'i phreng ldan pas// phyogs rnams kun du dus gsum gyi// 
52b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul tshe// rigs lngar 'byung ba rnams dang ni// phyogs kyi dbye bas gnas pa la// lha rnabs thams cad 'byung ba ni// yang dag ting 'dzin dbye ba yis// zhe sdang gti mug
52b6(rgyud): 'dod chags dang // yid bzhin nor bu'i dam tshig s+ho// rigs lngar gyur pa 'di dag gis// 'dod dang tha pa rab bsgrub pas// dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs por 'gyur// dag dang mngag
52b7(rgyud): ldar pa rnams// 'di yo gas la gnas pa la// rigs dang phra ba'i cha bzhin pas// lus sems chos ni rab tu bya// lus nin pam 'a sa// sa mis ri s+thAma'i rnam par
52b8(rgyud): byung // ngag ni thag cha lta bu ste// dbyer med rdo rje lhan cig skyes// rten dang brten pa dbyer med pas// thams cad chos nyid sems la gnas// sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su
53a1(rgyud): btags// snod bcud snang ba'i yul rnams dang // brtan g.yo khams gsum rang rig pa// srid gsum ma lus chos nyid de'i// snang ba gzugs dang / 
53a2(rgyud): skal sogs// dri dang ro dang reg bya dang // thams cad chos nyid dbag chags 'byung // rgyu las 'bras bu bskyed pa'i phyir// gcig lnga du ma'i chos kun shar// du ma nyid du
53a3(rgyud): dmigs med de// thams cad spyod par ma skyes pa'o// de skad ces gsungs pa dang / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
53a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po kun du bzang po lnga sogs pa rnams rab tu dga' zhing yi rang ste/ bde ba dang yid bde ba bla na med pa thob nas lus ngag yid gsum sku gapung thugs rdo rje la rab tu granas
53a5(rgyud): par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o/ rang lus sgyu myur grub pa dag/ nam mkha' lta bur skye ba med// dbang po'i gzhu dang mtshungs pa nyid// stong pa nyi
53a6(rgyud): rdo rje'i sku// lus ni rang bzhin mi dmigs pas// dag pa chen po'i ye shes lus// ga ni brag ci'i sgra dang mtshungs// brjod pa'i dus na stong pa ste// pi wang sgra bzhin
53a7(rgyud): rten 'brel gyis// rang grag brjod pa tha snyad tsam// sems ni rang 'byung dag pa la// ye shes rjen po rang gnas nyid// rgyu rkyen tshogs pa bral ba las// snang btsam
53a8(rgyud): rnam pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos chos thams cad la zab pa'i tshul la dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
53b1(rgyud): ga thAg pa da ldan med pa'i don pag 'astsal pa/ ma skyes mI 'gagangal pa dag 'byu bya// byang chub sems ni dpa la lda rdo rje 'chang // skyabs dang shes rab ga nyis
53b2(rgyud): ston pa sla// sla phrul rgyal pod du ma nr-i 'di tid nge// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// mtshan ma med cing mi 'gyur 'ja' tshon ltar// gnyis med
53b3(rgyud): hU~M ba // shin ni mngon snyam / @d+hi/  / b+h+yAM// / 
53b4(rgyud): btur to/ b+ha dag gi/  haM/ ye mas kyiH/ marbas/  kIb+he k+Sha rin tu du ma / 'bar ma bsnams
53b5(rgyud): su sh+log/ dkyil la rdzogs rdul lhurnams sun// yab brem pade nyid du bzhugs// dpa' du na pa sa sa su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyam krapa
53b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skyeg ga pa'i snying rigs pags 'das pa rdzogasapa bskyed pa'i se su~M zhes pa'o/ drin snam bzhin
53b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi swA / gsung nga/ thugrus da gnyis su med pa'i ye shes smin par mdzad pa'i phyi gsang pa'i bdag pod rje 'dzin pa rji kyis tshus rnas
53b8(rgyud): pang mas napa par rtogs pa mi du med pa nis bye ba'i ti 'dzin ma rnams par thugs nas kha 'dres pa rnams la yang dag pa'i spang bskon pa'i ma pa phyi di gsungs
54a1(rgyud): so// chos rnams mi 'gyur nam ma tha' bzhin// dbang phyug nyen po lhag pa'i lha// rdorje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bla ma nyid du ston pa
54a2(rgyud): mangs// sngags kyi snod pasnod ma tshug gis// gsang ba'i tshul 'di spyad pan// gang spyod de yis ye shes 'thob// sul 'di shin tu 'ad dka' bo'o// mkha' dang mtshungs pa
54a3(rgyud): mnyam 'gyur bas// rnam par mi rtom ngo ga nyid// chos rnams rang bzhini dag pa las// yang dag snga ni rab tu 'byung // oM swa b+hA ba shud d+hAHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud oM
54a4(rgyud): gzhung drung sa rbad+ha ru yog shud d+hote/ oM shUn+ya d+hA dz+nyAn badz+ra sa b+hu gas ta ma ko h+ye/ dag pa'i sngags kyis smarna pas dang // sngags dang drung du sbyang ba nyid// rang bzhin dag/ 
54a5(rgyud): thams du // dko sa spyog rdulal gyi / rgyal can gyi gdus bya rnams/ den rten dgros kyi kyil la kyis// sbed sa 'dudus pam
54a6(rgyud): 'dul// tshed pag myed kyis 'od byed kyis// 'ad chags kyis ni bci pa rnams// pad ma rigs kyi dkyil lakhor gyis// sring pa can gyi gdug pa brtul// thogs med
54a7(rgyud): pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis// shin dugag dgas rnams la// las kyi rigs kyi dkyil ma byas// sems can ma dus las ca // sangs rgyas kyi
54b1(rgyud): yangs pas ni// rmongs dang ma rungs mche ba rnyan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ gti mug mun par tshud rnams btul// dkyil 'khor lnga li sbyor ba yis// de nyid rigs
54b2(rgyud): de lnga rub shad// shin du bsdus pa'i sbyor bas ni// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ye shes mchog/ khrin bcu gnyis tshad mnyam pa// ngos bzhi dag la mnyam pa yis// bcu gnyis sa ni mngon
54b3(rgyud): bcu gsum pa la gnos pa yin// gsung gi dkyil 'khor bla na med// khru ni nyi shu mnyam pa ste// ngos la yang lnga lngar brjod// rlung bcu sngags bcur gnas pa mi/ 
54b4(rgyud): gros ldan pas shes bya ste// de brjod pas ni mchog tu brjod// sku yi dkyil 'khor khru bcu drug/ ngos rang bzhi bzhir ldan pa las// bden pa bcu drug rtogs pa yis// ye shes slad
54b5(rgyud): ge de snyed do// mi bskyod rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // tshe dpag med pa'i snang ba dang // rdo rje rtag pa chen po ste// bsdus pa sku gsung thugs rdo rje// lus ngag yid ni rnam dag phyir// yang dag don du
54b6(rgyud): snang ba'o// gcig nasuM gsus dang rigs lnga ste// dgu dang bcu gsum nyi shu la// sum cu rtsa gcig par dag tu// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur// rigs lnga dag las 'byung ba
54b7(rgyud): / de re nyi shur dbye ba yis// phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid las// nyi shu rtsa lngar yang dag pas// dam pa'i rigs ni brgya ru 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs tshogs mdza' yas pas// 'dus pa chen
54b8(rgyud): der brjod byas// rnal 'byor ba rnams shes par gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs kyi ba snying po gas ba gsang ba 'dus pa dang la rnal 'byor chen po
55a1(rgyud): gnyis su med pa mnyam pa rnam par rgyal ba las gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bla na med par bsnan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// 
55a2(rgyud): thams cad chos ni ston pa la// gsang ba chen po rnam par rgyal// chud 'di yang dag ston par mdzad// rdo rje dam tshig gsum grub mchog/ sku gsum rdo rje can du 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sem
55a3(rgyud): can thams cad kyi// yid bzhin nor bu rgya mtshor gyur// phung po lnga rnams sangs rgyas sku// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid can// sra ba sa'i khams yin te// zhu ba chu'i khams su 'dod// 
55a4(rgyud): ba me'i khams yin te// rgyu ba rlung du rab tu bsgrags// mi shigs pa ni thig ler gsungs// bde ba nam mkha'i khams yin no// gzugs ni thogs par bcas pa ste// tshor ba rnam pa gsum
55a5(rgyud): du 'gyur// 'du shes dmigs par bcas pa ste// 'du byed lus ngag yid sbyor ba// rnam shes sgyu mas don sgrub byed// reg pa las ni sa yin te// lha mo spyan du shes par bya// dro ba me ru rab tu
55a6(rgyud): gags// gos dkar mor ni shes par bya// sdud par byed pa chu yin pas// mA ma kI yi ngo bor 'gyur// 'gro ba'i bya ba baspyod pa rlung // sgrol ma'i ngo bor brjod par bya// thig le snang byed pa de spyod
55a7(rgyud): ma// bde ba rdo rje reg byas// de nyid bde chen ye shes ni// skad cig tsam du nyams myong bas// phral du yid ches byed yin te// log rtog ma lus 'joms pa po// dngos dang dngos med log rtog
55a8(rgyud): dag/ bgag nas rnam par mi rtog pas// bskal pa stong phrag du mar yod // gnas nas ye shes sbyor bar byed// de yang cung zad goms byas pas// gong nas gong du khyad par 'gro// zhes
55b1(rgyud): gsungs pa dang // 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad la rang bzhin gyis byin gyis brlabs pas yang dag pa'i ye shes khyad par du gyur pa bla na med pa las mngon du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs
55b2(rgyud): pa rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// gang dang gang gis 'ching ba rnams// de nyid shes pas grol 'gyur to// 'di la nges par 'khor ba
55b3(rgyud): yi// rgya mtsho'i nang nas d+hi med 'thob// sems can rnams kyi ye shes kyis// rgyud ni ngas par grol 'gyur ba// khyad par las ni rtogs pas na// tshe 'dir sangs rgyas gnas su 'gro/ 
55b4(rgyud): gang du yang dag bla ma yi// drin gyi ye shes yan lag bdun// phra ba'i yon tan mngon du byed// 
55b5(rgyud): mi rtog ti 'dzin la gnas pas// dpa' bo rna'i 'byor dbang phyug tshogs// ringan bzhugs kyang gzigs 'gyur te// don kun sgrub par byed pa'o// dga' dang dga' bral dgag
55b6(rgyud): dbus// mtshan nyid dmyigs pa brtan par gyis// g+ha nam tha phyed rlang 'o// bskal par ye shes che la spyod// me rtog pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// sgrub parang dag lhun gyi grub/ bde ba chen
55b7(rgyud): mngan byas pas// stobs sogs yon tan rnams kyis brgyan// dbang po gnyis kyi sto ba yiste/ dngos pa thams cad brtag par bya// da las byung ba'i thibs bsnyen pas// 
55b8(rgyud): kyang lar 'byung bar 'gyur// rgyu yi yan lag bdun 'byung ba// bla mas brtan pa'i rton 'brel gyis// ye shes dbab pas sbas pa ma tshul// ye shes mthong ba lus dang ga/ rtags
56a1(rgyud): 'char sgrib pa rang bdag ste// byin gyis brlabs las 'char ba yin// bla ma slob ma'i khyad par dag/ ye shes dbang dang cung zad kyis// ye shes mthong ba'i/ 
56a2(rgyud): spyod yul yin// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mtshan dpa ni// blol gsal bA rang lus la// mtshan dang dpe byad ldan par bzhugs// kha sbyar oM baM rnam pa gnyis// thabs dang
56a3(rgyud): shes rab rtsa yi gnas// bde ba chen po thag le yis// 'du 'bral med pa'i ye shes can// snying rje chen po tshad med bdud rtsi'i rtsa// rgyun ma 'chad par bde ba'i byang sems 'bab// 
56a4(rgyud): rten las stobs ni gzhan don thogs pa med// de dag don du yang dag rang bzhin med// stong nyid rtogs pas dngos la chags mi 'gyur// 'di ni rgyu yi dus zhes bya ba ste// lam gyi dus
56a5(rgyud): nidabang gi ye shes te// mtshon ldan rigs ma yongs su dag pa la// sa phyogs gtsang zhing rab tu dben pa'am// rgyal nyid skyes gzhi zhi ba'i gnas rnams su// bshang gci chu
56a6(rgyud): la sogs pa byug pa'am// rgyal ba mchod phyir rtag par rab tu bya// na mo'i dbus par smigatsug mtha' yi bar// cho ga shes pas yang de rkang pa'i bar// lce brke pa gas bar rgyal
56a7(rgyud): ba'i sras// rigs lnga rnams ni rab tu dgod par bya// rab tu dge ba'i chos ni dri ma med// rnam par mi rtog ye shes mtshungs med pa// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba 'de yis ni// bde
56a8(rgyud): ma chogs dag pa di me'i byed// 'bras tshul yan lag bdun no rje mang brjod// dang byin brlab pa'i lamagyis gangam papa// mtshungs med 'dren pa pa med pa pa nyid// rus pa bam
56b1(rgyud): dang rdzogs pa mngon gyur pa'o// rdo rje gsum pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang // gnas ni gnas kyi rnam par bsgom par bya// sngags kyi mtshan gyis shin du mtshan sbas pa/ 
56b2(rgyud): cho ga ridra yIs bsgrub pa nyid du bya// grub pa'i 'bras bu nus pa brtan pa yis// tshe 'dir skad cig gcig gis rdzogs byang chub// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang
56b3(rgyud): thugs kyi snying po gisang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byir chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las phyag rgya chen pos pa pa'i don bstan pa'i le'u sde bzhi pa'o// 
56b4(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
56b5(rgyud): cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don gyi phyir yang dag par snang ba'i ye shes rnam par spro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 
56b6(rgyud): lta bu gsungs so// 'khor ba dag la mi gnas pa'i// ye shes rdo rje khyod nyon cig/ dngos po dngos min dang bral ba// dngos po gnyis ka spong ba ni// gnyis su med pa'i chos zhes bya// dag dang bdag
56b7(rgyud): spang byar med// gzugs dang stong pa'i bar du yang // dbus su mnyam par gnas pa yis// gtsang dang mi gtsang dbus su ni// ma 'dres pa de mnyam par sbyor// rten dang brten can dbus su ni// mnyam
56b8(rgyud): panyid kyis rgyal ba 'byung // lus ni mnyam par gnas pa dang // ngag dang sems kyang mnyam gyur pas// mnyam par lta ba mthong ba rnams// ye shes mnyam par rnam par rgyal ba zhes gsungs so// 
57a1(rgyud): ban du bzang ba sems dpa' ches// je ltar mnyam par lta ba dang // gnyis su med pa'i chos dag mi// bdag zhe ha ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ 
57a2(rgyud): // ye shes rang bzhin gnyis med chos// du ma ma yi gcig len te// gsang ba'i res pa blan med// da bo las kyi rdul 'byor gyis// lam mi rim par ba snong pa ste// cig jug pa
57a3(rgyud): rgya che// zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa nyid// bde ba chen por rtogs par bya// chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa ni// byang chu 'phyogs chos sum bcu bdun// tid 'dzin ngomanyam rdo rje yis// gas
57a4(rgyud): / chen gnyis med rgyal ba 'dir// gnas brtsa dang g.yo ba rlung // mi shogs thig le'i ngo bo nyid// rang lus rdo rje'i rang bzhin lnga// bde ba chen po'i ye shes kyis// sa lam rdzogs tshul lugs// 
57a5(rgyud): byung dang // lpags las bzlog bI ma min pas// rgyud du sbas pa rnams gsal ba// de nye nges par bstan pa no// che 'di nyi la mngon sangs rgyas// ces gsungs pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil
57a6(rgyud): 'khor de dag shin du rmad du byung ba'i tshul zab mo la ngo mtshar skyes te slar gsol pa/ ye shes thob pa'i lus can dag/ tshe 'di nyid du sangs rgyabasdu// 'di nyid rnal 'byor ji lta bu// mi gtsang
57a7(rgyud): lus la sna ji ltar 'gyur// rnam rtog dran pa'i bag chags kyis// dri mas bslad pas 'di ma mchis// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje 'chang gis der bstan pa// dri ma bag chags
57a8(rgyud): badz+ran gyi phyir// lam gnyis rang gigs kyi'i mos// di ra rtog pa ngan pa'i tshogs// dag pa dang ni phra ba'i tshas// rnam rtog pa gcags nyes pa yis// 'gro ba gsum po na mthongs/ 
57b1(rgyud): dang ldan pas legs bltas te// nal 'byor rgyud kyi snang ba bya// b+h+ra ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni// slob ma yongs su smin byas shing // ye shes rgyud la bsred pa yis// gcig tur lam gyi
57b2(rgyud): s+yAtI// 'di ni ya ga/ rdzogs sangs rgyas// goms padung po'i stobs kyis ni// yon tanA rdzun sna mag+hu ste//  sa ni 'aM/ sems rdo rje na dbe ma ltam// byon gyi 'dam pas mag
57b3(rgyud): // ji ltar 'dam pa'i lumi ngag las// ye shes lus ni rang dgar 'byung // bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rdul 'byor lam// rdzogs pas gnas lug sa mngon byas te// ye shes spyong pas rnam spangs pas// shin tu
57b4(rgyud): ji med dag par 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te// thabs kyi myu gu dag gis ni// ban d+ha ka ni rgyas pa bzhin// sbrang rtsi bdud rtsi'i gnas yin te// yon tan dri med de nyid kyi// me tog rgyas pa'i mu
57b5(rgyud): lo// rdo rje theg par sbas pa yi// ral 'byor mngon par sangs rgyas pa// khang na gnyis zung 'jug rtogs pa las// spos bral mtha' dang bral ba'i chos// sgom pa'i lam zhes sa rnams bstod// 
57b6(rgyud): ye shes 'cher tshul la// gom pa goms pa'i lam gyur pas// smra bzhi'o go 'phang mngon du byed// ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / sa'i snying po nga// 
57b7(rgyud): ka na rdo rje dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang / spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / kun du bzang po la sogs pa rnams bde dang yid bde
57b8(rgyud): drang 'drad pa na tho d+ha stan las langs te/ phyag dang bsgor bdus byas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ba'orang 'byang rgyal ba'i gzhi// rdo rje theg pa gsang ba las/ phyi ma'i dus na gang byung ba'i// rnal du'o/ 
58a1(rgyud): pa rnams de bzhin gshegs// shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa pa// snyigs malha ldan dus dag tu// rdo rje'i theg pa gang 'dzin pa// de dag sangs rgyas sras nyid 'gyur// rdo rje sku gsung thugs pa
58a2(rgyud): des gnas pas/ byang chub sems mchog rnams la rtag mchod bying // ces gsungs te/ mi tig gi char chen po mngon par pa banas bcom ldan 'das kyi sgrol mngon par gtor to//  hU~M ga to// de bzhin
58a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las phyag rgya chen po nges par 'byed pa zhe
58a4(rgyud): bya ba'i le'u spelnga ba'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur te// gsang ba 'dzi pa thams cad la// mchog ni sngon phyir yang dag bzhugs// e ma 'o gsang ba'i gnas
58a5(rgyud): mchog/ se ma'o snying po kun bsdus pa// e ma'o chos kyi gnas zhi ba// e ma'o rdo rje rnam par rgyal// ston ka'i nam mkha' sprin med pa// zla ba'i 'dri zer kun gsal ltar// gzung 'dzin spangs pa'i ye
58a6(rgyud): shes ni// bdag gzhan bcas pas snang ba'o// ston dus sprin med nam mkha' la// nyi ma gsal bar shar ba bzhin// thabs kyi ye shes gnyis pa ni// don dang sems bcas snang bar byed// sprin med
