58a7(rgyud): mkha' dang bran la bu// snang byed ye shes goms byed pas/ rang rig rgyal las grub pa yi// snga ma'i lus ni len par byed// de yang yid kyi lus ldan pa'i// rnal 'byor pa yis khams gsum du// bdag dang gzhan
58a8(rgyud): dodon byas nas// mthar na ring gnas ba bar 'gro// sgra ma'i lus tsal la brten la// del bar 'idzi dang rjes nig gis// dngos po thams cad bcom nas ni// de das dag pa'i nga du gnas// thogs pa med pa'i tshe
58b1(rgyud): sni/ snang bathamasas du byas nas//  na rigs dbyings kyis// snang ba'i lashes byab par 'dum// dag gzhan rtog pa / ma rtog bags ma ni// dag cad migs pa mas / 
58b2(rgyud): marnam nye pa shes khyab pa skyed/ nga ba med pa'i ting de ma// snang ba tsam yang 'dzin med par/ 5ng+tha dang yang dri don dam nga'i badzin pa mngon du byed pa cam/ 'dra con lus kyis 'ang med pa'i/ 'dod kyangs
58b3(rgyud): dan ma mkha' las// rabad med par ni rtso 'gyur te/ bdag dang gzhin rnams bde bar 'tshwa// rdo rje 'ad kyi lus bzod nas// bdag dang gzhan don slob 'gyur / dmigs pa thams cad kyang byed pas// baspyod med
58b4(rgyud): gnas su mde bar 'gyur/ rang 'o ye shes ldan pa'i sku// Shang 'dzin bzhin du mtha' mi dmigs// stong ba gsum la 'das pa'o// thugs med skying rje 'byung bar 'gyur/ drang pos ni mu la thim// chu yang mi mthim
58b5(rgyud): pUr te/ me ni rlung la thim gyur nas/ rlung yang rnam par shes la cim// nam shes bzung ba d+mo nyid mi 'o dgas pa bar yang 'jug par 'gyur/ dang po sgyu ma lta gul/ dang po smig skye de nyid kyang / 'od zer lda du ldan par
58b6(rgyud): oM gnyis pa thag bang gagasus par cis d+ha lan pa na ga/ zug lal sbyid danamam gas/ yin ma ma yo / rgong sas pa'i skyes pa gas ma
58b7(rgyud): rnas brgyan pa// bden gnyis sbyor bkrung 'jug smra// bde sa chen po ngas thob 'gyur// mkha' 'dri chos sku stong pa las// tog med ye shes mkha' 'dra ba// tshogs dang smon lam stobs dag gis// 'bad dang bral bar
58b8(rgyud): kyis sdug/ 'ongs spya rdzogs pa'i sgyu sa pa seM ya sul phru pa byed dul bras de sems ca / na sgrub pa sas//  gag su tha ga de bzhin du
59a1(rgyud): / sA/ mos pa'i dbang gis pa dad par/ sems can rnams ni 'dul bar 'gyur/ dun grub 'de ba chen po sa// ra lnga rig pas te brgyan pa'i// 'ag min gnas su dus rtag tu// mtshan dang
59a2(rgyud): kya 'bar bas bzhugs// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal po lar/ 'bad med bdag dang gzhan gyi dam/ ma'i yod tan rnams kyis brkyed// bad 'a tshal sad 'byung 'gyur/ rim pa thams cad kun rdzogs pal/ 
59a3(rgyud): pa nyid du gnas sems kyis// khams gsum pa rnams 'jig byed pa// thams cad nam mkha' bzhin du gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa
59a4(rgyud): dpal rnal 'byor chen po'i gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam ngar rgyal ba las ting nge 'dzin blan med pa mchog tu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// de nas rgyal por rje dzin/ byang chub sems kyi de rje
59a5(rgyud): // dbyer med bde ba ston pa bas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// mnyam nyid ye shes stong pa yis// bdag nyid gzugs ni srung bar bya// mnyam nyid yenas stong pa na/ bdag nyid dazugs ni srung bar bya// 
59a6(rgyud): ma nyid gnas pas thams cad du// ye shes rgyan gyis sgo rgya / jigs bkur las thar bar 'akur/ ga'ang ba'i mig bder gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gas chen ni/ sems can kun gyi
59a7(rgyud): gnas/  khed re shes snang bgo/  taT+Ta/ ko la/ kaN+Da kA wa b+ha/ ko pa / ku tre d+hi/ krol bya/ kol bkor lo la/ kol la shu/ kol hAhA/ gnas bcu sangs rgyas kun gyi g.yang ba ni// thabs dpas
59a8(rgyud): kyi par blag sung drug gi ltab sgrub pa byed rdul ldan ma/ 'bras su byang chub sems kyi dbang bsgyur bas/ stobs su rdzogs pa gang yin rnal 'byor che// snying ba 'dzin rgyud rnams kun du sas/ 
59b1(rgyud): po 'byema'i sems can rnams// ngos pa'i rnal 'byor 'jig 'byung ba'i// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad ma'i gdun dag pasam byar bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// gas
59b2(rgyud): lnga sogs dkyil 'khor tsam// khwa mang rje 'dzin pa dag/ rgyal ba la pas bsam par bya/ lus dang dag dang yid rnams la// ye shes chen po'i dngos grub gsal// 'khor lo 'di ltar bskams pa yis// shes raba'/ 
59b3(rgyud): dper 'bar ba mabu rwa// dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya// mched pa'i mtshon nyid yongs ldan par// stong pa nyid du mnyam gnas pas// gnyis su med pa rnam rgyal ba// lhag pa'i lha ni bskyed
59b4(rgyud): byaste// 'khar lo 'di na ba sgom par bya// mnyam par bzhag nas bsgom pa yis/ 'grub par 'di la tho tsam med// mnyam med sngags ni bzlas nas su// sgrub po bdag nyid can gyis bsgrug// zla ba gcig grangs
59b5(rgyud): sngags kyis ni// khams gsum 'grub par the tsom med// rnam shes las ni sngags 'byung ba// mtshan nyid drug ldan bzlas nas kyang // rdo rje sems dpa' phyag byas nas// bla ba nyal de 'grub 'gyur// de la brtul zhugs
59b6(rgyud): sma dang lded// sngags med bgrang phreng 'dzin pa med// gzung dang snang ba sna tshogs dag/ gitsig nas gcig tu ldog 'gyur te// ya yi dron gyis gang yang rung // dngos grub 'dod pas bya ba ni// ral sogs pa gsum po
59b7(rgyud): // rim pas 'gro don la 'jug bya// me dang drung dang dbang tshon dang // chu ste so so'i dkyil 'khor du// rju ni phyed byed dus su ni// las ni gnyis gnyis gnas par 'gyur// mchod la brtson pas mchod par
59b8(rgyud): kug/ 'dras la brtson pas rnam par dag mel sbyin pasreg brtson pa 'phyo// khasam gtar btsan pas thar pa thog/ sngag pas de ltar thenas ni khyim pa'i tshul bini smrang bar bya/ spyong pa'i tshul ri bu med pas// yang das me/ 
60a1(rgyud): 'a phreng bkur bslas po// rdo rje'i bzlas pa yi gas ma// bran med pa'i thabs mi chag las// rdorje sa yi bzlas pa yas/ 
60a2(rgyud): ga na //  la byu sa da sa / da mi sgra byas/  'i la
60a3(rgyud): ga y-i/ 9 ma rdza sangs gas/  r+dz+dza pa ma/  ga gsachos cag ga
60a4(rgyud): rdo rje bsgyur rdzas bcu dang // rdo rjechen gyis myos byed ldan/ rim par skar bskye bdun ga/ gang las rnyed pa sdebs mchog las// ril bu tsan ka yi tshad/ 
60a5(rgyud): thos pagru / sas kyis bya ma ma me 'duji rdza kyi shes pa gyur// bya pa mam 'brag lan dpa// mas
60b1(rgyud): gzigs 'gyur te// go bog can mangs ldan pa// 'dzas kyi chuba'od 'a dang bkAr// mi snang ba dang bdur gyis lam// rkang mgyogs mig sman sa 'og dang // ral gri ro langs
60b2(rgyud): gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor cher po gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las dngos grub mchog tu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// 
60b3(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes chos thams cad ni ba'i dam tshig gi mchog bla na med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs de cang mi gsung bar
60b4(rgyud): bags pa la de bzhi gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang ma de dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen 'byung gnas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs par/ 
60b5(rgyud): don mi za ba grub pa la sogs thams cad dang / debanin gshegs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa chen po rnams kyis gsol ba btab pani/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje nyid// ye shes snying po nam mkha'i
60b6(rgyud): gyings// tshas rnams kun gyi snang ba'o// bab pa pa ni mche ba'i// dkyil 'khor chen po bstan dragasol zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis le gas me snang ci'i tshul la
60b7(rgyud): dang 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ba ni rdo rjed dkyil 'khor ye shes las grub pa kun du snang bar byed pa batshungs pa med pa'i 'od kyis khyab pa bkod pa chad med pa'i srin las yon ta dag pas
61a1(rgyud): cad rab tu 'byung ba'i gnas rin po che sna tshogs 'dus pa las rang byung ba/ gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/ rta babs rim pa du mas mdzes pa/ rdul med cing rnam par dag pa
61a2(rgyud): ye shes las byung ba/ swa phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can/ pho brang nang du ni dri ma med pa'i ye shes kyi dkyir 'khor lo rdo rje'i kabs bteg pa/ rdo rje da po che'i gdung gis bcad pa/ 
61a3(rgyud): 'tshor nyi rba d+hU s+t+rai rab tu gnas pa// rnams kyi ma'i bar du ni dkyi lakhong dug da ba sung bar byed pa 'byung po ku ni 'dub dang / man kyi ma ma mo bsnying ba'i dkyil mtsha/ 
61a4(rgyud): rnams ngon me 'jig rten byung ba ba'i dkyilal ngas pa bar du na sangs rgyas stong mngon par byang chub po kyim ldan me pa tha // na wa tshogs ma dra ba dang ba byed pa
61a5(rgyud): rtsig pas 'khor yug tu kun du 'khor ba/ sgo bzhi glo 'bur du snang ba/ phyi nang med par gsal ba/ so so'i bye brag gi dkyil 'a khor ni rgyas shing yangs la rngam dang mang
61a6(rgyud): yabadag gis mdzes pa/ 'dod pa'i skam rnas gyis ni bkrigs pa'i mcha ba da ma ma snatshogs kyis bya ba par byed kun tu ning gar byed pas sa cad pa// ridags dang / chos kyi mkhor longs
61a7(rgyud): dang / bdun dag bsgreng bas mtshan pa/ byanganab kyi phyogs pa chos sumathu ma bduni yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid du yang brtson par ma // 'og mAn byed bca kyi lazung dag pa'i
61a8(rgyud): 'ashwar bden rung yo ma gyi dpa rgyam mam chen pa banam pa nyid gnyis su ma rnam pa rgyas 'i po grong byi gru'o// dedag gi ni myed bye brags/ 
61b1(rgyud): skyed phyogs gtsugator labar pos sgyung ba dang // ragatugs gnod mongs rgyal po ste// mang nigs dag pong // byang rgyas na na
61b2(rgyud): rgyad kyis / byang sa dzin rnam sa zas//  na pa rgya/  sa mangs su spyod//

61b4(rgyud): sa A nga// mad da yinas mas shesas nga sa / kyiphyogs nyis kyi ma la // sa nga lab ba rgyu mad//  phyogs la
62a1(rgyud): bde ba nazhes pa dam rA ga'i 'od// byang phyogs ngasgra sgrogs pa gser gyi mngog// nyis brgya ba'i bcu rtsa lngar yod pa pa// nyi nu ga ni rnam par mtshon phyir gnas// rib pas
62a2(rgyud): /  / rgyam che sa sa pa so// kyi ma 'dus pa kyi me na la sa / na da ldan pa mnyam sa// da ldanags pa sbyan
62a3(rgyud): gsal ba'i// rtsa ba'i lha tshogs rnams dang spros pa dag/ 'jig rten 'das pa'i sangs rgyas spyong bzhugs shing // 'jig rten mgon po lagar rdo rje dang // tshangs pa mi mjed bdag po la sogs
62a4(rgyud): te// rgyud 'di la ni smid par byed/ re bang // kyil lakhor chen po khrun brgyad cu bar// ngom ni na nyi bur mnyam par 'dzod// tsha ba'i dkyil 'khor lce tshogs sum cu gcig/ de dag re re la
62a5(rgyud): e byizhin rnam par 'gyur ba'i dkyil lakhor ro// thub pa'i dbang pos 'dir ni gsal bar bstaran// lagan rdo rje'i 'khor dang rdo rdo la// drag pa'i rnam pa khri byob rgyan
62a6(rgyud): pa'o// de gtsu khor rdo rje gnod skyed dade// rdo rje dra kho dro sgoms nyid // do rje rnon pa pa con rdza chera'o// rdo rje 'jigs byed tshogs kyis bskong // tshangs pa'i rgyal po'i mkhor
62a7(rgyud): skye snang ga rkye na// gnod sbyir rgyal po ngas smra bar// sngon pa mag gtsug na chen banas// ba sa rnaMs dpa' ba ljid rgyal khyod// srin
62b1(rgyud): rnab par rgyal// de bzhin gshegs pathams pad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gas rab gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa la'am pa nyid rngum par rgyal brnyen rnams dkyil 'khor chen pogs
62b2(rgyud): par spyod pa'i u d+ha / dernam ma ma ldan 'as da dza napa pa de ba na gigags pa /  tshogs pa dang / khams she ga ma nas nan gags
62b3(rgyud): pathams cad kyi banyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i ti rje dzi de la stobs par zhugs so// snyoms pa badrugs ma thag tu bcom ldan cangs
62b4(rgyud): 'dzin pa chen posad pazhi na gshegs pa'i ngashi gnas sa rnams pa me kyi gams rten gyis brlabs das de'i kyi bsdu drag nas stsal 'don par gyur to// de byer bdun partsibs kyi ges
62b5(rgyud): babs kyang ga pa na gshegs rnams la ya sa pa sa pa da pa'i mas rgyas pa ga par byas/  ngas du/ 'bras rje rnam gnas
62b6(rgyud): gyur to// de nas de banan gshegs pa thams cad mnyes pa'i rna mopo de dag pa bachen po'i kun du spyod pas yang dag par bcod pa byed par gyur pa ni la la ni sangs rgyas spyan sa de bad ga mo'o// la la
62b7(rgyud): / dub dang rab ma thams cad tu yang dag par mchod pa'i rgyun gyis mchod par byed// de das bcom ldan 'a sa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rje du chen po de nin gshegs pa la das
63a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la gnas pa 'di thams cad kyi sngags dang / bla med pa 'di nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thAklus rdo rje las phyungango // 
63a2(rgyud): swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra pi hrI swA hA/ lha po spyan la sogs pa bzhi'i sngags so// oM AHbadz+ra ra b+he hUM swA hA/ 
63a3(rgyud): !/ oM ShI s+yASh+Tanag sa tAM/ AH A b+h+yo kita thA yeb+hUHrmA/ auk+ShAH// au ma na / sa mer/ byu mau AH/ 
63a4(rgyud): khyen rnams A la dz+nyAn pa sa na/  Ta/ oM A ba / 8/ mi m+b+ha'i/ oM A ya
63a5(rgyud): 'di mas kyi nus pa ni// thegs pa med pa nyid yinate// phyinapa srung bar byed pa med// gsang bar rdzogs 'di rigs par byas gis gsungam so// oM shwa dz+nyAn badranA pa rmota ma garjo/ 
63b1(rgyud): thams cad chos ni ston pa po// mchog tu dga' ba bdug med ga/ rgyal bas sngon dus bstan pa ni// sems
63b2(rgyud): mos pa'i don du gang // bye ba spyod du nas byor bamo// rtog pa'i rnal 'byor gas ma sa?/ phyi na gas pa'i dbye ba yis// ngas ni ma bya kra sum du bshad// dman pa mchog dang bring rnams/ 
63b3(rgyud): tshab mes spyod gaH// tshig na pa tshul bstan pa//  kyi yimal tu bstod/ dad dren gshegs pa la 'i rdul po chos kyi ma na na nas byas ti'i mi
63b4(rgyud): na ma pa sa kyis gas pa ga ma// tham la ga da /  m+b+ha'aM na/  shes byu hU~M swAm+b+ha/ 
63b5(rgyud): ga sems ri kar yang gi yom gyur/ ma mi 'khor lo bcul gnas 'byur gang // rlung su 'od kyi snang ba khya cing // mi ni gzigs // bdun rig rgyas snang ba sgrub byed pa/ 
63b6(rgyud): pra lag da pa/ dza pa bye kyang tso/ shes pa gyus// seMnas kya byu ni ga stesanyim nam mtsha/ namer rnaM sa ma
64a1(rgyud): 'di nyid min// yid pa ni na nor smra/ pa byed// rab kyis smra ma'i yi shes ga/ yongs su rdzogs par
64a2(rgyud): gas la skyed// gzhan pam par ma thas// / nga ni ngas pasan/  / lcag sa kyi
64a3(rgyud): / chos dang chos min ldan papa gro// rang bras lus byung ye shes me// thams cad kun nus la ra ban/ oM 'byung ba mnyam pa'i nga // me zhes mang po po sgom sen
64b1(rgyud): pa gyur// rna 'byor des pa rdzogs ldan pag// rjes su dral 'byor ga ma ldad de// shin tu rnal 'byor gnyis ldan nying // rtsod ldan dus de rnal 'byor che// yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa dang // rdzas
64b2(rgyud): ga ngas na // 'ad ba ga pos nga kyi yis/  [।]//  ma m+b+ha myong ba yin// sa ni kau ng+gA ga
64b3(rgyud): // dpa 'i dzim pa'i gas// thasan /  g+hAm// mang nams s+ho snyoms du nas rgyu// 
64b4(rgyud): gang lagrus kyi sring pagasang bgisang pa 'dus pa dang snga 'byor ba cing da tir bu mang 'a mnam pa nyid rnam par byam pa'i rgyun pa ma mtshad pa ngagasang sngags mngodo par byung ba myu rgyas yod/ 
65a1(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i 'i e su so// des sos ldan la me de pa de da ga shegs pa rnams ma ldang sa kyu chub kyi sems ngas na men gas pa dgas
65a2(rgyud): med pa'i ngangalas rab tu kyis pa gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de 'di gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung da shes so de zhin gshegs pade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon pa
65a3(rgyud): ba byang chub pa'i tshu rdorje zhes byang 'i ting dzin la snyogs pa drags nas byang chub kyi sems 'dig dus so// dngos po ma gas skam pa yang // bskos par byab bsgob bya min// des zhe
65a4(rgyud): / dngos med pas// sgom pa dmigs pa med pa'o/ zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de ra na gshegs pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das deba'i
65a5(rgyud): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa rdo rje nas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par drags te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsus so// ngos po thams cad dang bra
65a6(rgyud): / phung po khams dang skye mched dang // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa// chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pas// rang sems gdong ras ma skyes pa// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhid do zhes
65a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang ma kyis gsu sa so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bden gshegs pa rdorje me bskyed pa de bani gshegs pa thabs cad kyi mi 'a pa rje
65a8(rgyud): byaba'i ting nge 'dzin pa slobs par bzhugs te bya chu'i gyi sems 'di gsus so// dngas po 'a de dag pa skyes pas// chom dang tsham nyid med pa ste// dmamapa lta bar bdag med pas/ khyeng
65b1(rgyud): di nyan dums na/ 9la mi da la gsus so// dedas pang da la seMn/ gags pa sus kyi
65b2(rgyud): de star pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rer chen dpal gyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa 'od zer rabang 'jo
65b3(rgyud): na rnams pa sa kyi sems disaso//  skyes pa'i tshu ma/ mau sapa med/ sa 'gu na / de sa
65b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ti dzin pa snyoms pal sus te byang chub kyi sems 'jigasas so// chos rnams bzhin po sa Ta//  da sa da pan ya / ngon togs
65b5(rgyud): byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o// des bcom ldan 'das de bzhi gshegs pa grub pa gdon mi babs gsungs so// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi btsun mo sman mas rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad mnyes pa
66a1(rgyud): zhes gsungs so// rdo rje btsun mo snyam kIs sangs rgyas khams cad rjes su mnyes par byed pashi da'i tshig rdo rje nang bya ba'i ting 'dzin pa snyoms par jugs te/ ro// ning snang medag
66a2(rgyud): / ni las sna zhin nan// sems kyi nga bani snyom pa ste// de si yang med pa shes gsus so// de tsun mo gos da/ dmosasas rgyas ngas ngas su chags pa byung
66a3(rgyud): rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dbyangs dang yi ge rnam dral te/ 
66a4(rgyud): rje btsun mo smras mas sangs rgyas thams cad sku gsung grags mi sla ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rloms pa ram zhugs te/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan dang shin te// de bzhin 'i skam bya'i ngas ga
66a5(rgyud): sto zhing snang med gnas cag ste// deb sdig dang bsod rnams dag/ ces gsungs so// de nas lha mo gzugs rdo dus cig mchog gis mchod pa bla med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la skems
66a6(rgyud): pa bdugs te/ dpa na chu da zla ba'i// bde min pa rdzun pa'ang ma yin pa// de bzhin dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'di// da ning gsal ba'i rang bzhin no// zhes gsungs so// lha mo sgo rdo rje rnam mkha'i 'ong/ 
66a7(rgyud): kyi sbyin rdo rjes tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting pe dzin la skams par zhugs te/ snying zhing snang med gnas gyur pa// ni lam snaNa'i rang bzhin te// sems kying po sgom pa ste// ji srid yang dag
66a8(rgyud): ba kun du ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te/ bde ba chen pos 'gro khyab pa// bde ba spangs
66b1(rgyud): rigs pa zang // bde ba'abar bas srid pa 'ching // bde bsus kyang bsgrog mi dus zhes gsungs so// lha mo rdo rje dam tshig chen pos mchod pa kun du rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par lug
66b2(rgyud): chos rnams bden pa ma yin zhing // brdzun pa'ang ma yin pa yi don// blang dang dor bar byar med pa// de nyid ye shes mchog tu bstan// zhes gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
66b3(rgyud): na po rgyal ze'i rdo rje spro ba'i sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bsam gtan med cing dngos po med// sngags med lha yang med pa nyid// rdo rje sa mos dpa' rang byung ba// byang chub
66b4(rgyud): tshul 'ad bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgo rdo rje'i 'idam tshig mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ma snyoms par rdugs te/ me shes lnga yi rab sbyor bas// bsod
66b5(rgyud): rims med cing sdig pa'ang med// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa nyid// dum nyid du ma da migs so// zhes gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzogs rdo dros po dang dngos po med / 
66b6(rgyud): dam tshig rdo rje nas bye ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sngags med bzlas pa 'di med pa ste// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhid kyis// 'gro ba gsum kun yod pa ste// rlom pa med cing mngon smras
66b7(rgyud): zed ces gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje na ma ma bi'i snying po ting nge 'dzi rdo rje dpe tshig la gzigs pa rdo rje nas bya ba'i ting nge lingan pa snyoms par zhugs te/ 
67a1(rgyud): thog sa rnas ga zhes bya nyi sadzin pa snyoms pa / skyeb migs pa med// mi byed ma ma 'i 'byung gsas te//  rgya
67a2(rgyud): na/ don da ga ba dan thal ga/ yang gdun gnas po med// 'o napas pa leshes// gas mye migs pa na zhes pasus so//  chub ma
67a3(rgyud): dpa' chen po dam tshig rdo rje rjes thams cad la 'jug pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rgyu dang 'bras bu dag pa'i chos// 'gro zhing ldog pa'i khyad par gyis// rtog pa yang dag mi da
67a4(rgyud): bus// blos me dgas pa med pa'o zhes gsungs so// byichub sems dpa' chen bcos kyi dbyings thams cad dang mnyam pa rjem pa dpa sdu par sa nos bya ba'i ting 'dzin la sgoms pa sa
67a5(rgyud): chos dbyings ye shes kyab ba'i sku// rtog pa med cing dri ma med// kun du 'brang zhing dus gsum du// phra zhing bdag med tshul mchog go rje zhes gsungs so// de nas khro bo gshin rje bshed
67a6(rgyud): rdo rje 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin// thams cad chos nyid dag pa las// mi rtog nam mal 'dri ba med// snang ba sna tshogs rang grol ba// sems kyi mtshan nyid rtag tu med/ ces gsungs
67a7(rgyud): gzhan gyi mi thug rdo rje yis// mngon par byang chub la zhugs te// snga mar snang ba'i tshul cul/ 
67b1(rgyud): gnas pa med de smon pa po// zhes gsungs so// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil bdes// byin gyis rlobs pa'i ye shes rgyal/ 'gro rnams byang chub sems
67b2(rgyud): / khams rnams stobs pagyur pa dag/ dag pa yo 'i shAng gnas te// ye shes brten pa de las bang / zhes gsungs so// khro bo'i rgyal po mi ga yo mgon// mo byengs kyi
67b3(rgyud): 'dzin la zhugs te// rtog pa rnams cad dag pa'i byings// chos rnams thams cad rkyen pa brted// rang 'byung shes tho ba byed pa// gnas pa med pa nyid du gyur nes gsacas so// thob

69a4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// rdo dza ni dag sla// dri med bdud rtsi 'tho byed cong // dkyil 'khor ma ma mchod byed ga//  la lnga mo phyag 'tshal lo// ya mAn krid sngags la sa skyes// sku yi gsung ga

75a2(rgyud): med khams ni lid kyis te// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbazhin gshegs pa lce'i dpal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byams pa chen po'i
75a3(rgyud): gdugs zhes bya ba'i ti nge nge 'dzin la snyams par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rnam pa kun du 'byung ba dag/ ye shes rig la rnam dbye bas// dman pa mchog dang bar ma ste// rigs ni
75a4(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings la gnas/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de banan gshegs pa gdul dka' ba pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying rje chen
75a5(rgyud): po'i gru ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// thams cad chos nyid gcig pa phyir// 'di ni theg mchog yangs pa'i lam// grub pa kun du spyod pa
75a6(rgyud): nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'i nas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal mtshan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dag ba chen po yang dag pi'i ting / 
75a7(rgyud): 'din la snyoms par zhugs byang chub kyi sems 'dag sungs so// e sri canan nyid yin te// longs spyod rdzogs su de chen dzod// sbrul sgrasna tshogs 'gradan byeng // byang chub tshul 'di
75a8(rgyud): bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sgra can ye shes kyi snying pos debazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi baitar snyoms tshad med pa rnam par rol po zhes bya ba'i ting
75b1(rgyud): Adu wA smyag zug tu ku /  sa/  / rnam smras/ rba ma ma
75b2(rgyud): sa 'dug+sagags migs sa na gas sa ma ma mas zugs sa rnam sa ma sa/ 
75b3(rgyud): ri ba gnyis gcig tu spyod pa nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'i zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i
75b4(rgyud): byas kyis de ni dgaganas pa sems da la shes kyi bang shod pa dzin la sems par thugs khyeng chub kyi sems 'di gsungs sa// snying po na tu bas pa ba na// ye shes smra pa 'phrul bas// 
75b5(rgyud): myung du bangon par 'tshad kyi lam// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o nas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshig bstan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dran pa yang dag par sprul pa/ 
75b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sems par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// byang chub sems kyi lo ga gsam// snod bsgru ba mi byed pas// bskul ba phrin las spyod pa yin// byang chub rdul
75b7(rgyud): 'di bstan pa'i zhes gsungs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor ni// de nyid shes pa'i gnas yin te// 'di ni sgrub pa'i do nad yid// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur spyod// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
75b8(rgyud): dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal zhes bya ba las de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun du
76a1(rgyud): // dedas ma ldan dus de ni gshegs pa byi ba la gyi sdes pazhi gshegs pa rnams kyi ga ma na sa zhes
76a2(rgyud): na skabs sa na dag rgyas so//  ya gas // gan la zhen tho ma //  rdzu na
76a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de sani gshegs pa da padzad mi 'khrug pas depa ni gshegs pa thams cad kyi dang khams rab tu snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i/  nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 
76a4(rgyud): bachu kyi sems 'digasungs so// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' da // rigs mo gro tshogs pacas// sngags panas na bsgral bshes// kye chu bcul 'ad bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas 'arjon/ 
76a5(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lhun chen 'bar ba'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyi phung po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 
76a6(rgyud): drime grol snying po du cu'i phung po da// bcings pa med cing rngam par 'bang mdag// tshul 'dathams cad chud pa 'bras bu 'byung // byang chub tshul 'dings par bstan pa'i nas gas sa so// de nas bcom ldan
76a7(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i snying po rab tu 'jams pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan bzang po yongs su rgyas par 'byed pa zhes bya zin ting nge 'dza la snyoms par rmugs te byang chub
76a8(rgyud): sems 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas rnams ni ye shes sku/ lakrags dge ba'i mtshan gyis smras// de nyid kun gyi rnam par spyong// byang nu rdul 'di bstan pa'o nam gsungs so// de nas bangs ldan
76b1(rgyud): sa de ni gshegs pa mangs ldan gyis pasasangs rgyas thams cad med byeng yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par rmugs khyang chub kyi sems rigasangs so// sdom pa thams dbyeng / 
76b2(rgyud): zin// 'di khas nga shes rab zhi // gnyis med de pazhon gshegs pa mo// byang chu tshul 'ad ba stan pa'i nas gsus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bsnams pas sangs rgyas
76b3(rgyud): / thams cad kyi 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sem+ba 'di gsang so srid gsum brtan dang g.yo ba yi// dngos po mi dmigs snang med pa// chos nyid mnyam pa nyid gyur phyir// 
76b4(rgyud): / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam du gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzid la snyoms par zhugs
76b5(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnams rten cing 'bral 'byung ba// de nyid ngo mnyam gcig pa'i bdag/ rgyu dang 'bras bur bskrun pa yin// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o ches gsungs so// 
76b6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de 'azhir gshegs pa khams cad kyi pad ma'i spyan rgyas pa shes bya ba'i sangs rgyas duma'i rjes su 'grob ston pa zhes bya ba nga nge 'dzin la skems par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'digs
76b7(rgyud): spyan lde nas spyod yum du// gnyis snang thams cad dub nos ni// rgya 'jug ye shes mi gnas pa// byang chub tshul 'di baspyad par// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
76b8(rgyud): stobs kyi sdes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dud kyi dpung ba tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba dzin nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// skye ba med cing gnas med pa// rab byung / 
77a1(rgyud): na ga sug/ nu sa rgyu das sulas// b+han tshul 'as gsas so// denam ma na sa da gagags ma sakyis
77a2(rgyud): 'ams dkyi 'bang ba'i snyid bkod pa nas bya ba'i ding nge dzin la rnams par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'digasangs so// sangs rgyas ye shes 'dape gyis// maung gi bang po dpa sa//  mi gyur/ 
77a3(rgyud): 'dzin la skams par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// khams gsum ma lus sangs rgyas ning // byer med la shes thos pa'i thugs/ 'gro ba'i mtshan ma dmigs su med// bya chung tshul 'di san
77a4(rgyud): pa'o// nas gsungs so// da nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi 'arje chen po dang ldan pas sangs rgyam thams cad kyang 'bar 'gro ba nas bya ba'i ting de dzi la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub rtse
77a5(rgyud): bzhi gshegs bcangs ba snang bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa kun nas sgor ting nga med rdul snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// don dam rnam par mi dmigs pa/ 
77a6(rgyud): yod medamatha' las 'das pa ste// gzigs byang med dag tu skyeng // byang chubacul 'di ba ska pa ma nas gsungs mi da macom 'dul sa dpa ni gshegs pa snang bame mad pas pa sa
77b1(rgyud): rgya pas rgya sa nas rnams pa ga sa rgyan pa thasems dgasus so//  nan ma gyung pas// me gan sas sa / dang pa legs pa la//  chu chus de sgyun
77b2(rgyud): nu ga smras so// dengs pas nas pazhid gshegs pa skyed pas sangs rgyas thams cad pazhi de 'bapa med kyis bya ga ngang sa snyams par gras kya dub kyimams 'di ga sums// 
77b3(rgyud): chags zhig pas rang lags po// sa le gnag pas rab ngas 'gyur// byang chu tshul 'di bstan po'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtan par
77b4(rgyud): gshegs pas 'gro ba'i blo rang chags pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi thams 'di gsungs so// rang 'byung ye shes nam mkha' ni// thaskad rnams las yongs grol ba// 'cha
77b5(rgyud): ba med cing nub pa med// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa don yod mthong bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi le shes rab tu rgyas pa'i nyi ma'i snying po'i zhes bya ba'i
77b6(rgyud): tang dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyis mas 'di gsungs so// dang dang ldan pa'i sgrib ni// shes rab snang bar ba bsku ba ni// mun pa la ni snang ba bzhin// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de na
77b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bde gshegs pa brtson 'grus sbyin pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyor rab brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge mdzinam snyoms par zhugs byung chub kyi sems 'di gsangs so// rnam tog da ma sras/ 
77b8(rgyud): deng bas la ba yi// kun nas kun du 'jug pa'i yid dag kyang // rgyun las bzlog na rang bzhin med par 'gro// des par gsang pa byang chum bstan pa'i zhes gsungam mo// de nas bcom ldan padapa de bzhi gnon
78a1(rgyud): s+ho 'grogapa sa pa'i mag na pa sa m+b+ha nA mas smras so// 
78a2(rgyud): med// khamam gtan pa dzi gnas med papa// banyam rjes me migs grob pa // bya chu tshul 'di baspyad pa'i nas go rgyams// dedas pa ma ldan das de bzhi gshegs pa da
78a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zab mo'i spyod lulal 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'khor ba'i gnas ni sgru ba ste// sgyu ma tsam du'ang mi gnas pa// ye shes
78a4(rgyud): bangon par 'byung bas na// ngo bo nyid kyi tshul bstan pa'o nas gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// dus gsum sangs rgyas gang 'das dang // ma byon dasgyur 'azhugs pad// phyogs bcu chos
78a5(rgyud): kyi dbyings bcas par// dpag med dug la'i rtogs tshogs ldan// skye bo shin tu gtum pa dang // chags dang mar sngas 'jus pa dang // rmongs dang ma rungs las brtson rnams// rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba'i lab lo
78a6(rgyud): las// sgos mang da dbyim la mtshan pas// rgyud mi 'chad par ded byed cing// stsochags pams kyis 'dul ma dadag/ de dngos srur bstan nas// ris 'thun lam du sbyin mdzad / thams cad byer med pa
78a7(rgyud): 'di nyid bsdus pa'i 'du mi ste// rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur ba dang // dgongs pa lung ston gsang ba'i rgyud// ye shes rdo rje bsdus pa ni// khyad par ston pa 'phags pa'i chos// bzhis
78a8(rgyud): 'ang zing ma yin sbyor pa yi// gas rab bla med rgyud 'dir ngas// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kyil 'khor bstan pa mchog gsang ba zhes bya ba shing nge mi dzad do// de 'i
78b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sru dang gsung ngas mas kyigs pa gas dang 'dus parna 'byor chen po gnyis su me dpa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba nas bya ba las sas rgyas thams cad kyigs pa bstan pa'i byed
78b2(rgyud): / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'chi med bdud rtsi rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa thamra cad kyi sku bdud rtsi 'bar ba rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
78b3(rgyud): rlugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'khor 'das chos rnams thams cad kun// rang gi sems las gzhan med de// snang zhing gsal bar gyur pa nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs
78b4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rdul mtshan gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngod pa rnam par spro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs
78b5(rgyud): / 'dir ni rang rig nyams myong ltar// galagi sems nyid ma yin ra// 'brel ba med phyir snang bad 'gyur// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal
78b6(rgyud): bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bked ba kun du spor ba nas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'digasungs so// chos nyid dang ni sems nyid dag/ geng tsug pas pa gyur gyung / 
78b7(rgyud): gcig dang du mar med dpags pas// byang ma tshul 'di bskon pa ma nas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi maldan pa mi pad pa'i/ 
78b8(rgyud): dzin pa skems par zhugs kyang rgyab kyis mas 'di gsungs so// song lal shi bas pas de// rangasams byang chub snying po na// gdo nas dag pa dzi nyid de// byang chu ba tshul 'a pe sa
79a1(rgyud): zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi 'dul bya sno tshogs kyi yul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzid la snyoms par
79a2(rgyud): zhugs te bang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// Thab dang rgya chen dbyed med pas// snang stong sa dang med par 'dres// sangs rgyas zhes ni de la gsungs// byang nu 'tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// 
79a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i kha lo sgyur bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dri
79a4(rgyud): bcas rang rig spos med phyir// rang 'byung ye shes de nyid de// rig pa'i phyir nagasal ba nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par
79a5(rgyud): gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi zab po'i spyod yul la 'jug pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rang rig min phyir mi rtog pa// rkyen skyes gzhan yang
79a6(rgyud): phyir// mi rtog rtog pa byed med pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pachu lha'i lhas dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
79a7(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sems nyid rnam par mi rtog pas// gsal la rtog med ye shes nyid// thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul can// byang chub tshul 'di bstan
79a8(rgyud): das gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan lag gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdud kyi ba dan rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs te byed
79b1(rgyud): 1sa mas so// sa sogs ga /  [।]/ A sa gos/ la sa na yon
79b2(rgyud): pa zhin gnags pa rgyas kyi ga sa rgyas ya kyi na par khris pa zhes bya / nga mnam thams pa ga sgrub pa sems segasas so/  pan // na
79b3(rgyud): gos dang mgos med par gas pa// byang chu ba tshul 'di bstan pa'i nas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par mthun pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byung
79b4(rgyud): zhes tha 'o/  'dzin pa snyoms par zugs kying ma kyi sems 'dig sungs so// yod me gnyis galas 'das pas// pa dun thos pam gru byed//  mgrul pa rol bzhin// byang chu batshul bas / 
79b5(rgyud): zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sa'i rgyal pos sangs mas thams cad kyi kun nas snang ba rtag gi 'ad ces bya ba re ting nge 'dzin la sgoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems dadi
79b6(rgyud): gsungs so// yod med sa dang mgru ste// gnyis tsam du yang med par byeng/ rnam par brjod ma da migs pa bral// byang du tshul 'di bstar pa'i nis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
79b7(rgyud): legs pa'i seng ges srid gsum thams cad lhung nger gnas pa zhes bya'i'i ting pa 'dzidu pa snyoms par grags te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// a ma ho sems nyid du med kyis// rnam phrul gzugs sas
79b8(rgyud): // na pa 'das ma chemam gams so//  sa pa yusas gags pa la na
80a1(rgyud): / bung snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'deg sungs so// dkyil 'khor rnam 'phrul sna tshogs pa// ngo mtshar ba'i rnam 'phrul dag/ rnam ma pa'i mthab klas
80a2(rgyud): khya bar 'gyur// bya rdul 'di bstan pa'i zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
80a3(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang nig sgrub pa gang bsgrub la// de sgrub pa la gnas med med// bsgrub par bya bsgrub ma yin// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'i zhes
80a4(rgyud): gAsus so// de nas yod ma sa de zhin gshegs pa kyuba'i gling sa sangs rgyas thams ca gyi na pa ma pa ma rgyam dzin bya du la sgoms par nugs na
80a5(rgyud): 'dig zungs so// gas mi chos kyi byi sa/ rdo rje la ba bstan// bla me dgan ru ga// byang cu brgyal 'di bstan par zhes gsungs so// de napa bcom ldan 'das dben kunas
80a6(rgyud): bgrags chen gyis pad pa'i sgying po kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin sa snyoms par zhugs te byang chur gyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'khong ba'i 'dam las skyes pa yi// rang sems pad ma
80a7(rgyud): pa rnyad padrin med// byang nubardul 'di bstan du'o zhes gsungs so// denas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug nanor byas sangs rgyas khams dkyi rdzu phru sgo'i
80a8(rgyud): zhes bya da me na sa snyoms par jugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di ga sangs so// kun nas ku dus sa rgyas kyi// ni ma'i snang bdi pa ste// mos dang rgyam grus sa de na/ 
80b1(rgyud): byang rgya tshul 'de da pa nas gsungs so// das pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhi gnags badrug gyu na nas byaba'i par rnying po gan sa med la dumar spyon pa nes byang 'o/  'dzings
80b2(rgyud): rnams pa tshugs nyi chub kyi sems 'dagasangasas// sa 'dikun gyi gan pa pa'is// byang chub sams la kun parten kyang // gnas pa me ma tsho 'ong med// byang chub rgyal 'di bstan pa'i ma
80b3(rgyud): sungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzad pa mtha' yas par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
80b4(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// nam mkha' kun du gnas med pa// de ba'in tog drul dri med sems// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yin te// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'i zhes gsungs so// 
80b5(rgyud): shes bzhin spor las dbang gis ni// mngal 'byung rim pa gang yin dang // ning dang zhing du so sor yang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni// 'dir ni yang dag brdul zhugs 'dzin// gzhon nu'i rol pa
80b6(rgyud): thams cad dang // deng zhin bzo gnas yang dag bstan// thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin las// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu spos// 'dir ni sngon chad ma byung med// sngon gnas par ni sbyar mi bya// 
80b7(rgyud): gshegs kun badzad pa ni// thams cad rdo rje'i dngos can la// dus gsum lam gyi mthar thug pas// thams cad 'di bzhi ni blta bar bya// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba sngags
80b8(rgyud): thugs kyi gsang ba gsang pa 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud gnyis su me dang mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las de'inan gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par ros pa ston pa'i se'u na ba lnga pa ma/ 
81a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal ba can de bzhin gshegs pamams cad kyi snying po kun du bskul ba nas bya ba'i ting ngen nas snyoms par rmugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung
81a2(rgyud): so// yang dag kun rdzob dag pa la// brtan gser bcas pa'i snang ban// rang bzhin med pa nyid du srung // byang chung tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
81a3(rgyud): gshegs pa shes rab rnam par brtsegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po yang dag par rdo rje nis byib ting nga'i dzid la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnams
81a4(rgyud): rnams tsha sems med te// sems nyid ltapa'i rnam pa das/ dkyu rdo sri dang / byang na 'phrul 'di snyen pan nas gasdus so// denapa sum ldan ma bzhi gnags
81a5(rgyud): gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes spyi mar sbyin pa'i rib bzhes pa ba ti nga nge 'dzin la skams par zhugs te byu chub kyi sems 'dig sungs sa// su chogs snyem ba las // sems
81a6(rgyud): dang ma dag pa'i// snang ba bag chags khyad par phyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rgya mtshos sangs rgyas thams
81b1(rgyud): / ma na shA sa rnams gas gyu rgyal mas da sas//  na sa nA// gsas sa skyugs/  la
81b2(rgyud): kyis rnyed// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs sa// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag skyes de zhinan rnaM
81b3(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin pa sgoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'dig sangs so// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes la// yod med mtha'o las 'das pa ste// mi rtog ye shes kun rdzo ba nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan
81b4(rgyud): pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo mtha' yas pa sangs rgyas kyi mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'byung ba'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub
81b5(rgyud): kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e mgonag kyi 'das pa'i ning // ma lus thus pa med pa rnams// thams cad byang chub sems kyi d+h+yanA~M// byang chub tshul 'a stan pa'i nas gsums// de nas pa maldan
81b6(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pas bkra shis dka' bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e maho steng gsum ma lus rgyal ba'i ning / 
81b7(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i sbrul rdzogs// thams cad pa spu'i tshogs las kyang // spros nas byang chub sems gsungs so zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen ldan sangs
81b8(rgyud): yongs su spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma do sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// gsang ba bde che ni byang chub
82a1(rgyud): sems// de bzhin gshegs pa tshul mchog ste// snying po'i tshul 'di bstan papo zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer slobs sangs rgyas/ 
82a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi 'od zer mtha' yas paston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen gyi tshul 'di gsungs so// e ma he sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // skye
82a3(rgyud): med las thams cad skyes// skyes tsam nyid na 'ang skye ba med// gsang ba'i tshul chen bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs brtan sangs rgyas thams
82a4(rgyud): cad kyi 'gro ba ma lus pa'i dbyings lo yang dag par dbang bskur ba'i tshul nas bya ba'i ting nge dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'a gsungs so// e maho sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // gnas
82a5(rgyud): pa med las gnas pa'i chos// gnas tsam nyid na gnas pa med// gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bkra shis 'byung bas sangs
82a6(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje nam mkha' drim med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e mdo rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsad // dmigs
82a7(rgyud): de las thams cad dmigs// dmigs tsam nyid na dmigs pa med// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i tog sangs
82a8(rgyud): sa thams cad kyi sred pa'i bu klung skams pa 'di rjenas bya ba'i/  nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// mchen ma da kyi chos// tsakro 'ong med las 'grod
82b1(rgyud): gro med// gas pa nas 'dabusan pa canas gsas so// de nas pam ldan las de bzhin gzugs pa pad ma'i phreng po de zhin gshegs pa rnamapa cad kyi ma 'a
82b2(rgyud): na gas so// de pa ma du ya min gagags pa da da kyi sa rgyal ba sbyin pa nogs parnams cad kyis nas gyings pa'i zhes bya ba /  dzin pa snyams par mag pa
82b3(rgyud): kyi sems 'digasasungs so// bcings pa med cing gro sa med// lhan cig skyes pa rnas grol pa// le gas brjod pa dang bral ba// byang chu tshul 'di bstan pa'i nas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das/ 
82b4(rgyud): na gshegs pa lag bzangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ba ba nan gyi nor bu rtse mo'i rgyal mtsham zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos kun brjod du med pa
82b5(rgyud): / gsang ba zab pa'i gnas nyi ga/ brjod tsam nyid na brjod du med// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la shes 'byang gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye
82b6(rgyud): shes 'khor los bsgyur ba zhes bya pa'i nying du 'dzin la sems par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'dig phung // dor dam rtog pa'i yul men phyir// chos sA ye shes ngo bo nyid// rang rig ye shes sgyu ma'i dngos// 
82b7(rgyud): chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o rnam gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das yon tan bde smos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rnga sgra kun du sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par rdzogs te byang
83a1(rgyud): nub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rgyal po dpung bcas yan lag ldan// pho zhol ba bzlog pa bzhin// ye shes rgyal po spobs chen ldar// dri med tshul 'di bstan pa
83a2(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'dasangs pas byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi// phyogs bcur sgrogs pa nas papa'i ting dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'dugs
83a3(rgyud): / theg pa sna tshogs drang ba'i phyir// lam 'di rim par bstan pa yin// gsang ba'i theg pa gcig pa nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
83a4(rgyud): gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi ngung 'byung ba rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsangs so// e ma he rmed du byung ba'i chos// 
83a5(rgyud): gsang chen theg pa mchog gcig pu// ma lus dus gsum rgyal ba'i lam// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rje'i sman// gzigs pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas yang
83a6(rgyud): ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas dang / spyod yul dang / zab pa dang / rkyeche ba'i di dzin nyid chos nyid nam mkha' yongs su drug pa'i rang bzhin dang / ting nge 'dzin pa
83a7(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa la dgongs nas cang ma gsung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sa mos dpar sems dpa' chen po kun tu babang po spyan las langs te/ brags brag pa gcig tu gzar nas thal tshe
83a8(rgyud): spar te phyogs gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khri phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la smras pa/ gang du dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa'i chos
83b1(rgyud): thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos yin te/  gyi bde 'a bar 'ablang ba gang yin pa ni rang bzhin med pa'o// rten 'brel las smras pa'i chos thams cad nim skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa// dmigs sa
83b2(rgyud): med pa ste/ gnas pa med nga bzhin med pa stong pa nyid/ de sang ngom po dang ngam pa med pa gnyis ma skyer med pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid yo ru pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya nas smras hA
83b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyi sems kyi rtog pa yongs su chod nas legs so legs so zhes brjod nas cang me smra bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
83b4(rgyud): ng+ya ga da grags kyi gas pa gas das pa sa 'byod chen po gnyis sa med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam pa rgyal ba las thun mngam pani pa'igs parab tu bstan pa ma gyi 'dungs pa'o// de ras
83b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ka'i me tog de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshangs pa'i gnas pa ni yongs su dag pa dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs sa
83b6(rgyud): bang rla ba sems kyi rkun gyis// rang sams drim bkrubang bya// dag pa'i thugs ni ye shes re// byang rngu batshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das don legs sems pa
83b7(rgyud): dpon gshegs pa'i yang sbyi ba'i tshul dag pa'i gsang ba nas bya ba 'i/ dang mdzin la snyoms par zhugs byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ba ma phyi dam dag pa'i gnas//  la zhugs so
83b8(rgyud): thun ma sul// snying po dgyes pa'i rtsa ba ste// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa 'i rnas gsungs so// de nas pacom ldan 'das chos kyi
84a1(rgyud): badzo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'degasungs so// gas da nga chos nyid dag pa nyid// phyag tu chen po 'tshul mchog gis// 'gro ba'i rlo
84a2(rgyud): mu sel ba// me shes rmyil 'di bstan pa nas gasmras so// de das bcom ldan dus rdzogrags pa ri di zhin gshegs pa lags zlog sa dzin ma
84a3(rgyud): par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// phyi dang nang du dngos po'i chos// du ma nyid du mi rtog te// thams cad brten pa'i tshul 'byung ba// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// 
84a4(rgyud): denas bcom ldan 'das spobs pa brtsegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par ral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzid la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rang bzhin
84a5(rgyud): ga pa'i tshogs 'byung ba// rnam par brtags par ngadabyung gang // sems gsum snang ba'i ngang dudag/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rgyal mtshan sa
84a6(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gsang ba rab tu 'dzin pa yis// rnal 'byor pa ni byang chub mchog
84a7(rgyud): spros bcas gos med tshul dag gis// gsang ba sod ngapa'i tshul bsnyen pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phan par bzhed pa rdo rjes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po khyab ba'i ye shes kun du
84a8(rgyud): 'phrul ba zhes bya ba'i ting pa 'dzid pa sgoms par zhugs dbyang chub kyi sems 'ad gsungs so// 'dir ni gang du rnam shes dang // ye shes gnyis su med pa ste// kudag ni rtog pa med pa dgas
84b1(rgyud): byang chub rten 'brel tshul bstan pa'i zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par rol par ldan pa'i snying pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzen la
84b2(rgyud): snyoms par nu gus te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// de srid nam mkha' stong pa med// rang sems stong nyid ram mkha' las// rtogs pa'i ye shes stong nyid de// kun ston tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ 
84b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das mun pa dang bral ba'i rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje'i dra bas yongs su 'brel ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi
84b4(rgyud): sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po med cing rang stong pa// bde chen byin dmigs med pa// ro gcig ye shes sgyu mar snang // nen med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
84b5(rgyud): chos kyi snying po dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin lo snyoms par zhugs te byang chub gyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang zag dang ni chos dag la/ 
84b6(rgyud): bdag med rtogs phyir sems dpa' che// sa la gnas dang rigs kyi dang // legs spyod rtul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsung sa// de nas bcom ldan 'das tshe sbyin dpal sangs rgyas thams cad sbyi na // 
84b7(rgyud): che'i gter gyi bum pa babang po'i brgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du chos don snying po ni// rgyu dang 'bras bur 'byung ba yi// zab mo gter
84b8(rgyud): 'dra rangs rnyed// gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i 'byung gnas rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyan du ma stor pa zhes bya ba'i ting / 
85a1(rgyud): de dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rdul 'byor dbang bug du ma yis// gas ba'i spyod pa'i tshul kun la// dang gzhan kyang bar dod 'byung / 
85a2(rgyud): bas// spyod pa'i rgyal mchog ldan pa ste// gsang pa'i tshul 'di ldan ldanas gsungs so// don sa bam ldan das smra d+hangs pas sa nga ba ma sa
85a3(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rab rab med pa'i tshul can gyis// drang srong skyob pa'i spyod gnas te// zla ba mngon par nges 'byung ba'i// 
85a4(rgyud): la 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das stobs kyis gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par 'byong ba thob po zhes bya ba'i ting nge'i dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub
85a5(rgyud): sems 'od gsungs so// thog ma med cing tha ma med// dbus su 'byung ba yang dag spangs// ye shes nye bar brgyan pa gang // byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom
85a6(rgyud): ldan 'das blo gnas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad kyi rnam par dam pa kun dra babang po ston pa nas byaba'i ting 'dzin pa snyoms par rtags te byang chub kyi sems 'digasangs so// de n+do tshogs 'dus
85a7(rgyud): la tan pa gyung ba gang/  ma gyu pa ma / dz+nyAn ma ban pa sngagasas sa// denas sa nas ga gas sangs ngas surnam
85a8(rgyud): na maung grul bzhe kyi na pa rnams pa zugs kyi ma gyimams su // sa rgyas ga rgya//  me mang gnan
85b1(rgyud): rab tu mi gnas pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das gan mngag sangasams thams cad kyi dbangaphrag slong ba zhes bya na rnam snyoms/ 
85b2(rgyud): thugs te byang chub kyise mas 'di gsungs so// shang dbang drung ni rje can// mi 'gyur shes me dang // pad ma thag de dathams can te// byang chub shul 'ang bstun pa'i zhes gsungs so// 
85b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu 'phags pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams da kyi tshul gcig pa'i gnas nas bla ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// de
85b4(rgyud): nagashegs pa kun gyi gnas// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi yul gyur ba// chos kun bdag med mnyam pa nyid// rngub ma'i rdul 'di bskur ba'i zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal seng ge
85b5(rgyud): sbas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzad pa brjid du med pa'i yang brjod du meng pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chung kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du bdag gnan tu
85b6(rgyud): byams pa chen po'i snang ba yis// mi phyed chos ni don grub tsA// sems kyi spyod tshul 'di bstan ra zhes gsungs so// de nas ricom ldan 'das rnam par grol ldan dpa la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du
85b7(rgyud): me tog rgyas pa cher spro ba'i rgyun nos bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// yang dag ye shes bzang po nyid// rdzu 'phrul 'byung ba'i blo yi nor// 'du
85b8(rgyud): snying po rang las rnyed// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// sangs rgyas ye shes lhun grub pas// 'di nyid tog med rab gas pa pa/ 
86a1(rgyud): sems kyi kun rtog ra bzhi pa'o zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med
86a2(rgyud): pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal po zhes bya ba las rab tu mi gnas pa'i ye shes bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kwa'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
86a3(rgyud): gdug bcan ma lus pa 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// shin tu rgyab pa dri ma med// sems kyi glang po bcid mi bya// nga grol gas pa
86a4(rgyud): ldas// rgyam po phrul 'di bska kyi nis gsungs so// denas po com ldan dam mas dbyug rnam pasas rgyas thams cad ci kyis pa skyed pa snang 'i phri nas
86a5(rgyud): dzin pa snyoms par rmugs khyu chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnams pasam kyis mi y-i s+ho// chos kyi phung po de snyed smras// ga pa'i ye shes gyur pa
86a6(rgyud): 'dig cig tu bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog gar po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byung chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed par dengos po zhes bye 'i
86a7(rgyud): yid pa sems pa da b+hU pasem ga sus so// thugs pa ya ya / u m+b+ha rgya ga /  skye ba sbyin/  rgyu
86a8(rgyud): 'debaster pa'i zhes gsungs so// de das bcom ldan 'das klu dag legs 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kyang po rim pazhis bya ting 'dzin ma snyoms par zugs te byung chu
86b1(rgyud): ses jig sus so// bde ga shegs ye shes gdang tud de// byang chub sems dpa' dmas kyis 'dzin// byung po dum lam la 'dzud// ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// 
86b2(rgyud): dwenas bcom ldan 'das shin tu grags pas sangs rgyam thams cad kyi sumachog rlabs po cher rtsa lnga zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la skams par zhugs te byu chub kyi sems 'disasu sa
86b3(rgyud): ra yang gsal ba nyid// gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// 
86b4(rgyud): gros kyi sa su rgyas thams cad kyis mngon pa bsgyur ba'i gus papa nas kyu 'i nga 'dzin pa rnams par zhugs te/ thun mo ma yin pa byang chub kyi sems 'du
86b5(rgyud): sungs so// de canan nyid kyis dbang bskur ba// thob pa'i khyad bar sems las byung // 'di ni dus gsum kun tu 'byung // byang chubabab pa'i tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// da nas
86b6(rgyud): ma ldan 'das phreng ldan yon tan dang la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan dpel ra po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 
86b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du ma gsale ba yi// yon tan rin chen tshogs sprob// byi dang nang du rnam phyebs me shes pad pa'i tshul brjod pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das klu'i lags ngas rgyas
86b8(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchod pa'i gnas kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'dir ni snang ba bla med pa// rgyun du dang sems chos kyi klong / 
87a1(rgyud): hA/  snron sngagasas so// de sa pos lda das sgyu rgyan pa nasas sa rgyam tham 'a bye zhin nyid kyinyis dag
87a2(rgyud): bya stsoms pa gas nga chub kyi mas 'dagasas so//  na nyid da rtag pa// gal bri sems ma gyu//  ma sbyi gas// sgrim pa med
87a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das legs par spangs pa'i blo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi so sor ba 'dres pa dri ma med ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi
87a4(rgyud): sems 'dri gsungs so// byab dang rjes nyid dang/ mi 'gyur dus na thams ca dadu // bton pa med pa dang 'brung garas// bla med tshul 'di bstan pa'i nas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
87a5(rgyud): la gnon rdo rjes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mkhyen pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// zab dang rgya che gnyis med
87a6(rgyud): // spyod rdul thabasal mkhas pa lcis// rnam par grol ba'i 'bras thob pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes la rol pa sangs rgyas thams cad
87a7(rgyud): chub bde ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gsang bar gcig rdo rje 'chang // gsang ba gsum ni sku gsung thugs// de nyid
87a8(rgyud): lngar ni rab bsgrags pa// dam pa'i tshul 'di bsten pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das mtha' yas pa'i spyan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba rnam par dben pa'i rdo rje zhes bya// 
87b1(rgyud): ting nge'adzin la skyobs par zhugs te khya chud kyi se pas 'di gsungs so// lus dang ngag dang med rnams ni// rdo gasrab du rnam dag pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung sngags// rdo rje'i tshul 'di bstan
87b2(rgyud): po zhes gsungs so// de nas po tsam ldan 'das bded par gsungs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po 'od kyi drab 'tsha ba zhes bya ba snying pe dzin la sgoms par thugs tes chub kyi sems
87b3(rgyud): gsungs so// sangs rgyas sku kun khyab pas// de nyid sku la rab snang ba// nad khams rdul phran snang 'dus pa// mi zad tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ zhes gsungs so// 
87b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes dag pa yongs su 'dzin po'i rdo rje nas bya ba'i ting nge'i dzi la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas gsung ni kun sgrog pa// de
87b5(rgyud): nas gsung du rab brjod pa// sna tshogs sgra ni gsung gyur pa// de ni gsung gcig tshul bas na pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i blo sangs rgyas
87b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi thugs gnas pa med pa'i ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi la snyoms par tshugs te byang chub sems 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas thugs ni bsam mi khyab// ye shes
87b7(rgyud): mthen ragacig pa'i thugs// dri med mnyam pa nyid gang yin// rtog med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das mthar las gzugs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po
87b8(rgyud): rjem chag tu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge rang na la rnams par zhugs byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// mnyam se gnas pas blang dor med// dus gsas pa dag thegs pa med
88a1(rgyud): skad cig ye shes bde ba'i dngos// chos nyid tshul 'di bstan po'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od mi zad pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phas kyi rgol bzlog pa dmadzad
88a2(rgyud): brdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa sgoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'ad gsungs so// dpa' ba seng ge'i lha stangs kyis// mu stegs bdud chags las rgyal ba'i// tshad med snying rjes bskul
88a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog gis chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
88a4(rgyud): 'dratshub kyi sems 'ad gsungs so// rdo rje 'bar pa'od 'phrob// ya shes zla ba la gnas pa// byang chub sems ni 'dzin pa yis// dri med rgyu rgyun tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas sangs
88a5(rgyud): rgyas tho tsom rnam par spangs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi me tog gi snyem zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gcig tu mchog gnas mi 'gyur ga/ tshig don dbye ba
88a6(rgyud): dam pa'i chos// bstan pa'i snying po bla med lam// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// dus gsum rgyal ba ma lus la// rab 'byam mchod pa'i spyan gyis ni// kun du khyab cang ston pa po// 
88a7(rgyud): 'di ni ye shes kun gyi gter// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi srug sung thugs kyigs dpags dpa 'dus pa rnal
88a8(rgyud): gnas par dag pa kun du'i zhes ston pa'i ladu ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i jig rten las 'das pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi shes
88b1(rgyud): be thAb snyes bya ba ti nge phen pa groms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// mtshan rnams rdzogs pa ye shes su// ngos po med cing snang ba'i ngos// rtog pa med pa mi gnas pa/ 
88b2(rgyud): tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// ngan sa bcom ldan 'das ngan yod rnam par mthong ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skye ba'atsho 'phru la ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi
88b3(rgyud): sems 'di gsungs so// rnam par grol ba zhi pa'i lam// 'acing med ye shes bkod ma'i chu// dam tshig gsang bsdom po las// gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan
88b4(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs pa mdzad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par byang chub pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rtog med
88b5(rgyud): 'bras bu dag pa'i dang // chos rnams stong nyid snying rjer gcig/ tha dad spangs pa lam gyi mchog/ zab pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog rgyal mtshan thams
88b6(rgyud): drabye rdu mngon par 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsus so// bla ma'i byin brlabs bdud rtsilas// bcu ba le zhes bcud kyis rgyas// tshe 'dir grub pa
88b7(rgyud): mchog ster ba// gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun brjod pa'i tshe 'phrul ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
88b8(rgyud): gas te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dam tshig 'di ni rmang po che// dus gsum 'byung ba rtag pa gang // thams cad bdag nyid bde bar gshegs// steng pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa
89a1(rgyud): ba ldan zhin zug 'i pa da ga gas pa'i sa sa rgyas mas kyi ma ma lum pa sa ster gyis 'dab pa nas bya dus mas pa
89a2(rgyud): sa / dun gas//  'i sa gsas so// ma / nas na gags pa
89a3(rgyud): kyi kun nas khri shes kyi spyi nus bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi ma snyoms par zhugs te byang nam kyi sems 'di ga spangs so// mas+ya dang las kyi 'grus na ni// kun nas dkris pa sna rdzogs pa/ 
89a4(rgyud): tshi chos zugs ma kyi nas gsam so//  sa ma lda sa gnags pa ma kyi phyogs sun
89b1(rgyud): ma du ts+tsha mu rdzun gas so// ma so pa /  ma ma/ snang ma par gyims so// d+hU hu la di rna
89b2(rgyud): ba zhes gsunas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen spyi posasod pa thams de dbugs 'byin par byed pa zhes bya ti 'dzin la snyoms pa zugs byang tshub kyi sems 'digasungs so// 
89b3(rgyud): mtshad ma'i dngos po rnams// srid gsum rang bzhin med mthong bas// ye shes 'od gsal mi phyed pa'i// gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu mthor gshegs kyis
89b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos nyid gcig pa'i lam zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// snang ba dang ni mun pa dag/ rtog pa'i chos nyid gzigs med phyir/ 
89b5(rgyud): tha dad snang ba nu kha'i dos// ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa 'o nas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das skar rgyal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chos kyi lam zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
89b6(rgyud): nugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'di ni sgrib pa med pa'i lam// sdug pa rab ni brngub can// byang chub sems kyi snying po nyid// dri med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas
89b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gtsug rings sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po mig 'phrul ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// thams cad ye shes snang
89b8(rgyud): nga'i ngos// sems can tog pa yul med phyer// gnyis snang ma lus bcom nas ni// gnyis med cum 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen grags pa sangs rgyas thams med/ 
90a1(rgyud): kyi ye shes dbyings su gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// snod brtad ma lus rin cher gzhi// lha mi'i snang ba ston pa che/ 
90a2(rgyud): grub 'gro ba'i don spyod pa'i// ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kang+gA'i sbeng pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi le shes 'bor myed par ston pa zhes bye da'i ting nge'ang
90a3(rgyud): chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// lus la 'pho ba'i ye shes gang // rnam par shes pa'i gzugs brtan nam// gcig pu mi dgyur dngos mod sems// 
90a4(rgyud): ba'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i 'od ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 
90a5(rgyud): dang po'i wa.a ni lA yi dngas// lus dben sdang ba rten 'brel te// sems nyid ye shes stong nyid de// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das skar mkhan sangs rgyas
90a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snang ba bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'di ni gud rtog ye gas che// bde ba chos kyi dbyings nyid las// zug rngu bral
90a7(rgyud): chub sems// rdo rje'i rdul 'di bstan por zhes gsum sa// de nas bcom ldan 'das sa dge dog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs mi ba da pa'i ye shes chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge nga na la snyoms
90a8(rgyud): par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du gnyis med mnyam pa'i dngos// 'bang ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// mi zad phun sum tshogs pa gan// dbyer med tshul 'ad bsan
90b1(rgyud): gasmras so// de nas com sun sa su ma khyen rgyam pos sang+yas rgyas thams cad bye na su mtshogs pa pa ma 'i shing ba zhes bya ting 'dzin pa snyoms pa n+d+ha/  grub kyi sems
90b2(rgyud): gas so// ba gnan byed me bye chub sems// bad chen gyisams parnyed// sa ma'i gnas na ma // byed med dus 'di stan pa zhes gsungs mo// de zhin gshegs rnams kyis/ 
90b3(rgyud): gsung thugs ni gcig snang ba// byang chub sems dpa' che rnams kyis// rjes su bsngags pa brjod pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus
90b4(rgyud): rdul 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa nye bar bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u sre ba ca dasu // // de nas yang bcom ldan
90b5(rgyud): 'das dal gyi snying po dengazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnam par ngos pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'ad gsungs so// gang du srog dang snying po med/ 
90b6(rgyud): gnas pa med cing kur 'byung ba// bar mdo yi rnam shes ltar// 'byung ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das srid mtha' gzigs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po
90b7(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dbang po yul la rnam spro ba// de nyid bzlog te sems gnas pa// lam du byed pa'i ngo bo nyid// gsang ba'i
90b8(rgyud): tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das glog gi 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsrung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sem
91a1(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// rgyal ba ye shes 'od kyis ni// rtog pa'i dri ma rnam sel ba// de nyid rnam grol bstan pa gang // gnyis med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan
91a2(rgyud): 'das gser gyi ri bos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od mchog ma lus pa rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'ang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dri med lhan grub
91a3(rgyud): ye shes rang 'byung ba// 'od gsal chos dbyings snying po bla na med// chos nyid chos can babyed med bde ba che// mnyam nyid gnas pa tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de
91a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pas seng ges byin pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge'i dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// mnyam
91a5(rgyud): da mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid// dag pa'i sa yi dbang phyug gang // rdzogs pa'i gtsug tor dam tshig ce// gsang pa'i tshul 'di bsten pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyis mi
91a6(rgyud): ba'i rgyal pas rgyas mtshan sangs rgyas thams cad kyabasam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sgoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rgyu
91a7(rgyud): na mi da / gas/ sugasum sangs rgyas skyes da po many+dza// rna 'byo dang sem nag nga gshes pa med// mad per mede'i 'di bstan pa'o//  shugs / 
91a8(rgyud): denas sangs rgyas mchog dga' grags pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mchog tu gsang pab zhes bya ba'i ting nge'i dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 
91b1(rgyud): ra zhin nyid/ chos nyid yongs sudrug pa ga// sa r+b+ba da kyis ga di chu tshul bldan pas nas gsangs so// de nas pa ma ldan das de ba ni gshegs pa rtson grus bskrun sa
91b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas ye shes la spyod pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'i dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'de gsungs so// sangs rgyas gsang ba gnyis po ni// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams rang la gnas/ 
91b3(rgyud): rang nyid tog med ye shes sku// 'di ni byang chub tshul bstan po'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'dab grags pa rdzogs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i snang ba nges par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting
91b4(rgyud): de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'od gsungs so// lus med dbang po'i phrug gnas shing // ring du 'gre zhing gcig bur rgyu// 'dul bar dkara' ba'i sems 'dul byed// 'di ni byang chub tshul
91b5(rgyud): bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das bsnyems pa dang bral bas 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// blo ldanas gsung 'gyur
91b6(rgyud): pa'i gzhi// yon tan 'byung gnas rin chen sems// bsam pa'i dgos 'dod skod byed la// khyad per tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das mchod 'os lhas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes
91b7(rgyud): su 'gro zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'od gsungs so// khyab bdag dpal ldan rdo rjer sku// 'di nyid lus ni dri ma me/ chos can ma grub rang sar dag/ byang chub tshul
91b8(rgyud): 'di bstan pa'i zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol mchen mo zhes bya bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par mi g.yo ba'i bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 
92a1(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems rig dus so// phung po la sogs ngos ya ga/ gang bag pa ga me stod pa shes// cho la dmigs pa ga bzlag// khya na zhul 'di bstan pa nas gsungs so// de nas
92a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhi gshegs pa 'jig rten 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ril por 'dzin pa
92a3(rgyud): bsdu ba dang // rjes su gzhig pa spro ba nyid// gnyis med bsam gtan la gnas pa// gcig pu byed pa'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das spos dri zhim pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
92a4(rgyud): chos nyid bde ba chen po'i tshum zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ye shes bde ba chen por dang // rtag tu bcugs pa'i ngo bo nyid// rang 'byung 'gyur med snying po
92a5(rgyud): / byang na tshu 'di bstan pa'o rlos ga mas so// denapa lacom ldan nas yin / na tshig 'dzin sa sa rgyas thams 'ad kyi dbus pa 'gyu rgya da yin pa rnams par du gas kya nas kyi
92a6(rgyud): de ma mo// ji ma nyi na// grong sa sa sde / sA 'ang ni ma da/  me ldan mi napa gsas so// den pa ma ldan nam myed pa dang
