92b2(rgyud): bsrer po na su gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen grags pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnyis med mnyam parang byung rje nas bya ba'i ting nge dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
92b3(rgyud): dgrasargyas so// gsang bar rang byeng gtan g.yo bcas/ khams cad rang nyid dkyil lakhong dang // bde chen bab pa'i tshul rdo rje// bya chu tshul 'di bstan pa 'i nas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das skyos
92b4(rgyud): bzhi bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi le gas sgron me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rtag tu dmigs par bcas pa yi// phyag rgya chen po dngos med de// dngos po dang
92b5(rgyud): nyid du dag/ rin chen tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi 'chang bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mig 'phrul ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
92b6(rgyud): ba kyi sems 'di gsangs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs par// stong nyid srong rje dbyer med pa// byang chub sems kyi dpor gcig/ de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems
92b7(rgyud): chi// kun du zang pos slar gsol pa// dri med mnyam pa ye shes sa// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid de// gnas dang ston par dbyung ba// che ba'i bdag nyid slar gnas pa// dpal mchog gas nga ba 'di
92b8(rgyud): nyid du// skal ldan rgyal ba bla na med ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dkrugs kyi gas ba gsang ba 'dus pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor radabyang du bstan pa'i/ 
93a1(rgyud): bdag nyid rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las la' nyi shu pa'o// deras phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs
93a2(rgyud): cas dpag med dang// rab 'byor dbang phrug byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs// rigs dang lha mor dargyas pa dpag med dang // glo ba'i rgyal po dubar bcas pa dag/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig tu 'dus
93a3(rgyud): byas nas// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gtso// byang chub sems kyi rdo rje'i bdag po la// tshogs pa 'dus pa brjod kyis mi lang ba'i// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyis dpag med ldan// mchod pa'i
93a4(rgyud): rim pa phyi nang gsang ba dang // de kho na nyid rnam pa mtha' yas pas// ye shes rgyal ba mi zad dam tshig gi/ rin chen sprin gyis yang dag par mchod de// mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas ni 'di skad gsol/ 
93a5(rgyud): btudus kAsum de bzhin gshegs pa'i chags// ma tha 'dus bkun phyogs ni// chog sa byamam par gnas pa le zhes che// gas sa snying po ldan cig skyes// brjod pa bra med thu sa
93a6(rgyud): 'dus po tshas// snyi po'i bras sem bu gang // thab sa dang bstan pa de 'i bya ma / tsham ldan dri ma dgas pa brgya dugs// de des sngor ldan btsun ga shegs// da
93a7(rgyud): de ni gshegs pa rnams// gnas 'di lus pa shin du legs// legs mi legs so sems dpa' che// kha ba cing rgya che mchog gi yul// 'on kyang 'dir ni bde gshegs kyang // the tsom 'a
93b1(rgyud): gdas pa dan//  la gan gyu sa// rgyu chupa pa sa tshogs/  tsun ga slos// de du mams da // mcho do ma spyod da/ 
93b2(rgyud): yong gnas la slad gyur pa// khab pa dun rgya sa// oM tsamathams cad ga tsad pa nga pa// dkyil lakhor sa mi bdag pa la// 'di skad ces ni zhum par 'gyur// gnas dang dus daphyag rgyang // 'dus pa khyad pa / 
93b3(rgyud): tshad med ye shes ning khams kyi// snang ba rab tu rgyas pa la// rgyu thabs khyad par gyur pa yi// gsang chen sku gsung thugs kyi gsang // de nyid 'dus
93b4(rgyud): ba 'di mchog tu// ston pa 'dro bar ma gyur pa// de srid du ni kun mkhyen gyis// lhan cig skyes pa'i 'dus pa las// lus ngag yid ni byin brlab cing // khyad par mchog dbang bskur mdzad de// 
93b5(rgyud): 'arim phye ba// bum pa dang ni gsang pa dang // shes rab yi shes de bzhin du// rab bskur pos smin byas nas// da mnan gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gsang 'byang chub sems rdo rje// rtogs dpa'am phyed dam
93b6(rgyud): ga gis// gad pyi dgongs te bgang pa dang // dgongs mi drang ba'i 'dir bur dang // des don je bzhin pa dang ni// ji bzhin ma lan rnam phye bas// ma ge 'don da spyi yi don// sbas pa gsum dang maH b+h+yag+sa
93b7(rgyud): gnyis// dang po gcig dang tshul gnyis ldan// dpag med rdo rje'i tshigag rgyu// des phyir rab tu ston pa nyid// 'jug bye de dag lus ngag yid// rim pa gnyis kyi bde ba dang // yid pa de rabatu myong
93b8(rgyud): gyid pa// thabs zab rgya che myur ba'i lam// yan lag dmo tshig ldan pa yi// thob byi thob byed khyad par ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// mkhyen pa'i ye shes bla med pa// mngon pa'i ye she/ 
94a1(rgyud): dzin pa stobs par zhugs// de nas gsang ba'i bdag popa de// 'odags sri dri med shings nyid la// me shes 'jug par mo mas// dbyer med gnas param byung ma jug/ de rje'i lum kyi rtsa gnas ni/ 
94a2(rgyud): stong phrag bdun rnal sogs pa// rtse yi bu gakhong stong dag/ thig le nu ba'i gzugs kyis na// byang chub rdo rje'i rnam par ni// chu ning yang dag gnas par gyur// de nyid chos sgra'i ngo bo nyid// bded stong
94a3(rgyud): byed med pa// snying rje tshad med rnam pa las// de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs de rje// rnam par dben don nyid du gnas// sgyu ma spyad pa
94a4(rgyud): mtshig dang // mngon par byang chub 'od gsal ba'i// stong nyid rdo rje rdzogs pa yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms nugs nas// rig pa thabs dang shes rab dag/ dbyer med bdab chen po'i sgo// skyes
94a5(rgyud): rnam par gyur pa dag/ gnas pa'i nga las ldang ba ste// phung po khams da skye mched dang // yul dang ngos po rnam dag pa'i// sku gsung thugs ni byin brlabs pa// ye shes chen po'i dang gnas s+ho// 
94a6(rgyud): rjesems dpa' rgyal po che// zhal gcig par byeg gnyis pa/ ston kar 'dam bri'i mdog 'drang // sprin dkar dag pa'i tshul can nyid// de ma thag tu snang bar mdzad// byin gyis brlabs pa'i rjes
94b1(rgyud): zhugs pa// maca kyi byud ya ba nga // rang byung sa zhes skrag pa ste// khams pa dang dag tsa rje 'dzod// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// sna tshogs rin chen gyis brgyan cing // min dra ng+ge
94b2(rgyud): 'bar ba dang // dang bu mgon po rnam par sprul// du dang kun du lta dkar po// rdo rje sems dpa 'de bzhin gshegs// dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyis// rnam pa gsas pa nyid du gcigs
94b3(rgyud): dzin// rnam par snang mdzad chen po nyid// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// 'dod chags kyis 'dul 'gro gzigs nas// 'dod chags gsang ba'i tshul zhes pa'o// 
94b4(rgyud): nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// bkod pa rab tu mi zad pa// de dag thams cad bsdus nas ni// nyid kyi sku la rnam par mdzad// de nas 'dus pa'i lha
94b5(rgyud): tshogs kyis// dbyer med gnas pa'i ngang las ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa gsang ba'i bdag/ yongs su mnyes pa'i don du ni// nyid kyi sku las spros pa yi// ba spu'i bu ga'i 'od zer gyis// rtse mo rnams las
94b6(rgyud): spros gyur pa// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas spyan dang mA ma kI/ gas dkar mo dang sgrol pa dang // gzugs dang sgra dang dro drang ro// reg byo rdo rjer gyur pa yis// sa dang chu dang me dang drung // tshad
94b7(rgyud): med pal dang snod pa mas// chags pa chen pos rjes chags so// ba pa ri po paston par mdzad// rnam par snang mdzad la shes // de nyid mi long sogs bdag nyid// gsung ba 'dzin pa
94b8(rgyud): rgya// rdo rje kyi spyod rgyam po nying // gsang pa 'dzin pa ma lum pa'i// su dang gang tu dang thugs kyi rgyam// snying po rdo rje sa shes so// de ni rdo rje btsun mo rnams// gcig tu gyur ba'i bka' dbyings na/ 
95a1(rgyud): da tshig che na nge mapa' byedas te// dog pa med cing rngub med pa'i// dkyil khong kwa ni dben brlabs pa// phyogs mtshams mnyam par ldan pa la/ 
95a2(rgyud): grub pa'i gnas brgyad longs bskor ba// zhing khams yongs su dag pa li// 'dzam gleng pad ma'i lte ba la// sna tshogs ma shags e dang pa// gsal ba de yi ngo bo nyid// sna tshogs gzugs kyi kun
95a3(rgyud): durgyas// sangs rgyas sbyin gyis kun du khyab// 'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'akrug/ gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de nas sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag
95a4(rgyud): gosang ba rab tu 'dzin pa po// dkyil la bar ci shurtsa ldu ga/ sub cu gsum par ldan pa yis// pho brang yangs pa'i gnal las der// de bzhin gshegs pa snod dang ni// gnyis dang byang chub sems

95a6(rgyud): dpal// tshe dpag med dang gdon ma po// dpa lnga ni rnam par snang mdzad sogs// de ba'in gshegs pa gru ba'i rgyag// de nyid sku gsung thugs ye shes// phrin las ldan par po zhugs pa'o// de na
95a7(rgyud): rang bzhan dag pa yi// chos kyi dbyings na gnas gyur pa// dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med pa'i// sems can khams kyi snod bcud dang // yul dang dbang po thams cad kun/ 
95a8(rgyud): brlabs shing // dbang bskur sngags dang phyag rgya dang // legs kyi sa ni dbang bsgyur bas// de dag tho pa'i khyad par ni// ma bring dang mchog rnams la// bde ba dang ni yid bde bas// gsongs
95b1(rgyud): shes spyod yul thob// de las stsal bapa'i sku byung ba// bcom ldan nyid zugs kanas// sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor dpag med pa// bya ba grangs mad kye nas ni// gdul bya gdul phyir dbang bskur zhing // spyi dang / 
95b2(rgyud): khyad par gyis 'dul 'gyur// de nas sangs rgyas tshogs dag gis// bskul bas ched du brjod pa gsungs// e ma ho sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // byang chub sems ni rang byung ba// de bzhi gshegs pa
95b3(rgyud): thams cad kyis// rab tu rtog med la gnas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// sku bzhi ye shes ro gcig pas// mdzad pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa// rab 'byamatsho 'phrul ston pa'o// dkyil
95b4(rgyud): 'khor kyi 'a khor po nges par sprul pas rgyung nges par bstan pa zhes bye ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// phyi rol yul snang rdzas su 'dod// g.yagang ne 'ug ci pa ldasas// bor du srung min gang btsam// sems pas tha dad par
95b5(rgyud): gnas pa// skad cig mi rtag par 'dod pas// yul sems tha dad bye brag smra// phyi rol yul dag phra ba rnams// 'dus nas rag pa 'byung ba ltar// yul dus rnam par nges pa las// rigs pa 'dra ba'i rnam par bzhag/ 
95b6(rgyud): yul dgag pu rtse ma ma dang // shes paskye ba'i rdzog ma ru// phrad bar 'dod pa grub pa'i 'thal// mdo sde pa yi dgongs pa sgra/ sa rnams thams cad rang gi sems// rnam par rig tsacam skad cig me// rang gas pa/ 
95b7(rgyud): naganas spros bral 'dod// rang rig skad cig gsal ba dang // mi gsal sna tshogs tog bral du// rnam med rnal 'byor skyed pa ste// dngos rnams stong pa snum bzhin// snang yang bdag las rang stong ba// 
95b8(rgyud): rtog pa rnar bzlog ste// mkha' dbyings dri med rtog rgyur 'chad// 'di lur srid pa zhi ba las// rnam gri ba stong nyid snying rjo dang // dbyer med byang chub sems kyi mchog/ khru 'jug rab tu bo
96a1(rgyud): / gnas pa//  la ldan 'dus 'di dgrab pa kun// bla ma rim pas 'di 'dus te// de bas 'dir ni chos kun gyi// snying po 'dus pa rtsa bar gsungs// gapang ba blan med pa 'don// 
96a2(rgyud): shes rnam gsum rim 'jug cing // smon me 'od gas la snang ba las// zung 'jug rdo rje mi byed pa// sga ye la bar po smral nas ni// dbyer med pag me rkang nge'i dzin// mchog na dri med dang snang las// gnyis med
96a3(rgyud): rang du rab zhugs pa'o// byang chub sems kyi dang nyid las// rtag tu 'dugasal bar gnas kyang // 'gro ba'i don la ma 'da' bas// dam tshig 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin// byang chub sems kyi pa ma tog/ bde ba
96a4(rgyud): can ni mi shags pa// rin chen 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin// bde ba chen po'i byang chub sems// 'gro ba kun la ster ba ni// ma chags pa yi ye shes kyis// 'dod chags 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin// rnam pa sna tshogs

96a8(rgyud): snang ba thim pas ting nge 'dzin// ye shes me long la bulas// srid gsum snang bar mdzad po ste// snang ma rdo rje ji mi// mi 'ad sku mi ti dzin// sdang ba gsum las 'das pa y-i/ 
96b1(rgyud): bar byang chub pa// rnam par dag pa rdo rje// 'od gsal pa yi ting nge 'dzin// srid zhi mnyam nyid mnyam pa'i sa// chos rnams gnyis med dogacig pas// rin po che ldang 'byung ba'i gnas// yon tan gter
96b2(rgyud): ku ting nge 'dzin// phyogs bcu dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// gang las 'dags la chos kyi ste// mngon par byang chub pa ya tshul// mi byed rdo rje ting pe 'dzin// bla med mngon par byang chub pa// gsang ba ldan
96b3(rgyud): mi zad dbyings kyi dang // snang stong tha dang med pa ste// ro gcig 'du 'bral med pa nyid// skyong dang snying
96b4(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin// chos rnams thams cad bdag med pas// kun du stong zhing ma bcos pa// lcar klub rdo rje'i dang gnas pa// phyag rgya chen po'i ting nge 'dzi na// rnam par mi tig ye shes kyi/

96b6(rgyud): sbe des gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag rab tu doga' ba sa khyab cing nga gyes pa chen po yongs su spyad par 'gyur ro// de nas gsang ba gsung

96b8(rgyud): pas cad yi ge ste// kun gyi rtsa ba a las byung // de las chos kyi phung por// brgyad khri bon stong dag tu sbeng // dbyangs dang gsel byed dag yin te// ngag ni rlung gi rtsa ba can// spring snang tsam da

97b1(rgyud): s+yA// ba~M kI rnam pa bdag par brjod// ma ni ma gos dkang po// ma yin pa pa sgom mang brjod// g+ha ni byang chub sems rdoH// trA~M ni zhes rab ros sbyin// me long le shes e nas brjod// karim

97b8(rgyud): las// de nyid kyis ni sbyar ba yis// de las gyur pa'i grangs rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor de snyed rnams su 'gyur// phyogs dang gdengs ka gdeng ba dang // ris byed rigs kyis phye ba gang // rtsa ba'i dkyil

98b6(rgyud): sma sbron// thugs kyi dngos grub rtog pa'i tshogs// ye shes bde chen bas ma mi khyag// ti nge 'dzin sems kyi spyod pa ni// stong nyid ye shes dngos grub po// de nyid byang chub sems rdo rje// bla ma nyid du bsdus
98b7(rgyud): / 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum// 'dzin pas dug tu 'gyur ba yin// dug nyid nye bar ni gyur na// dag pas dug med byas pa yin// bdud rtsi rim gyis bsten nani// bdud rtsi nyid du
99a1(rgyud): // nges 'gyur yin// de nyi dongango bo yongs shes pas// rkad 'di la ma du gyur ba yen// sngags bdun zabs dang shes rab ste// dbyer med de nin gshegs pa'i thugs// shes rab b+hag ra
99a2(rgyud): 'jar btags pas// dbyangs su brjod pa gsang ba'i tshul// A la ban gnyis don 'brel te// mngag la sogs 'gag par bsnar// ra d+hota la sogs pa dang // khyim ni bcug nyis rlung dag ste// dus
99a3(rgyud): / sbyo ba dang mtshungs pa san// lugs 'byung de nyid thugs bzlog par// de nyid yang dag rim pas bstan// ka li sum cu rtsa gzhi po// thabs kyi ye shes pa zhes brjod// me gtsang rdzas ni sum cu ba ni// 
99a4(rgyud): dga' bang sems rang bzhin te// khams ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i/ de ga dag pas ye shes che// dag pa'i dus ni dpe byad dag/ nyes 'gyur dag gis bstan pa ste// thabs dang shes rab brag gnyis bstan
99a5(rgyud): 'di dag ma tshan mchog su bcu gnyis// 6gnyis rab tu dbye ba yis// sems can kun gyi lus gnas pa// kA nas bya ba chu yin te// sla zhes bya bas yin no// 
99a6(rgyud): zhes bya ba me yin te// shA zhes bya ba rlung yin te// 'brang ba ni'i dbyed ma ning ste// ye shes dag pa chen po nyid// yang dag la ma gus pa phyogs tsam dang // mi gsal pa nyid rgyud las 'byung / 
99a7(rgyud): nyid chags gnyis rdzogs byed pa// bsod nams bla med 'bras bur 'gyur// bzhi de kho na gnas pa'i don// sems can kun gyi lus la gnas// de yed pas na 'gro kun kyang // me shes snying
99a8(rgyud): ro car gyur pas// chesan gshegs pa'i rgar ba yad// ma rang le shes dag pa nyid// gnyis med ye shes 'bar ba yi// A le snang ba thabs kyi cha// mched pa ga sems shes rab ma/ ma ning thos
99b1(rgyud): gnyis me pa'o// sbyor bdon gyi yi ge ba ni// sras pa'i tshul du bstan pa'o// chen stong pa chog ga dang // beg les brgyan pa bdes // dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpal ga// kun du bzang po sems dpa' ches// gsang/ 
99b2(rgyud): ba pa dang rgyache // lhag pa gas che rgyud kyid // byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnamal// khyad par sa shes bskyed // dpa ldan 'dus pa des gas la ba'i// bla med dge sa rgyung shadas/

99b4(rgyud): sang bar bya ba'i gzhi gang dang // gsang ba'i dam tshig nges pa dang // gsang ba bsgrub pa'i cho ga dang // 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor ji skad bstan// gas ched rnam pa shad thabs dang rwa// de nyid dang 'brel brjod byug // 
99b5(rgyud): da byed zhun mong bstan pa lde rtul// lam la 'jug pa'i dbye ba dang // gsang ba grub po'i 'bras bu dang // gsang ba lhag pa'i lam dang ni// gsang ba mchog gi spyod pa dang // gsang chen rnam par bsdu pa'i den/ 
99b6(rgyud): khye rkyen gyis ldog pa dang // dgag sgrub gsong can 'bang ba tshus// legs da ma pa'i nam dbye ba'i// gsang ba 'di dag gnas shes bya// de nyid 'a ga pa'i tshul shes nas// grub pa sgrub pa'i tshu
99b7(rgyud): skye da // gsang ba rnam par dag pa ye nas kyi ting nge 'dzin ba skrun pa zhes bya'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// dngapa mgon po bcom ldan 'das// dpal mchog gsang ba 'dzin pa yis// 'dus po'i 'khor
99b8(rgyud): 'gyul pa// gas ba pa'i rgyun dang// rkye 'digs pa gyi// dmapa sen pa ma lta// shesams bya pe la// gnyis pa rgyun// / khres ste zhes bya pa rgya
100a1(rgyud): / gsum pa rab tu gsal ba yi// 'gro ba'i snang ba ye shes smon// bani ba me zhes 'od 'grog// he ma'i sring po ltar bcur ba'o// lngab zla de'i dkyil 'khor ltur// 'dzag dang sbyin cing sdud pas sbyor/ 
100a2(rgyud): drugs sgyu ma'i gzugs brnyan ltang// chos rnams rang bzhin shes pa'o// bdun pa ltang na phyogs las ni// rgyal 'gyur seng ge'i rgyal po bzhin// ri bo mchog ltar ti 'dzin rgyal// ji srid na mi myod// 
100a3(rgyud): bim g.yo bar 'gyur bas// bdag gi dngos por rab tu ba ga/ thabs ldan byang chub sems mchog gas// de na mdzad 'khor los skur ba'i stobs// legs thob phyir mi ldog pa'i lam// sems dpa
100a4(rgyud): rin po tha ma nyid// ji sri sbyin ni gyitshogs s+ho// 'dog sngabs ni padad pa/ ma byis dgu 'byung gyu /  she ni ldog par 'gyur// de bzhin rang btsun thams ca // swA gas
100a5(rgyud): mchad dngos// ma lus yul la zhugs nas ni// de nyid tu ni rang thim 'gyur// snang ba gsum po dge pa'i lam// rin chen sprin gyis 'gro don du// bsam pa'i tshul gyis char pa 'bebs// 'do chags rnam
100a6(rgyud): dag pa'i dngos// de nyid byang chub sems dpa' yul// 'di ltar zhe sdang rnam par dag/ de nyid byang chub sems dpa'i gnas// gang du gti mug dag pa'i dang // de ni byang chub sems dpa' yi// snang ba dag
100a7(rgyud): yul gyur pa// thams cad 'od gsal dang gnas pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad mngon 'dus pa'i// 'od zer snang ba bsam gtan mes// dri ma ma lus spangs gyur pas// mngon par byang chub dag pa'o// 
100a8(rgyud): pa drim med// byang sa ci ma ma pa 'o// ma tham yi kyi sa byed//  pa can gis del la/ no su tshogs snang po la n-i// mos sus sa gyus/ la
100b1(rgyud): sa byed med pa// pade chen pa bcu gnyis la// rnams pa lta khung bdag med pa// rab sngas gnas dang med pa'o// chu 'jug chen po dag pa gru// thams cad ma khyen pa rtog ma pa'i// skrag ma ga rka / 
100b2(rgyud): / mar gyur pa ni cu gsus pa// btsun mo jug padas nas// rab nga 'gyur pa med pa u// 'bugs lam yin pag tsun pags/ nga gragasargya rnam pa'i / rnam pa'i laldan 'a ny-id / 
100b3(rgyud): / lam gyi khyad par bstan pa'o// mthong lam yan lag bdun ldan pa// sku gsuM togs phyir yan lag brjod/ tshogs lam dang po dag pa ni// dran par nye bar gnag pa gang // sbyin byed dbang gis gzhi bzung bas/ 
100b4(rgyud): bram dab lus ni wA ru ste// gsang dbang tshor ba bde ba nyid// gsum pa chos ni ye shes dran// bzhi pa sems ni 'od gsal du// dran pa nye bar gzhag phying brjod// tsho gas lam nga pa nyid la ni// ting
100b5(rgyud): ma skyes bskyed pa dang // skyes pa brtan phyir pogs dbyung dang // yang dag spong ba bzhi po dag/ de ni dgoms par byed pa la// dgag dang bslab pa'i phyogs gyur pa// spangs thob rim par ldan par brjod// tshags
100b6(rgyud): mtshan gyi grung / g+hu grus rkang pa ni pa la/  mnanas yi// nam kI ma rdza// snying ka'i gnas sa mes ldan// me rung pa dam mnan pa // gos de/  ma ya r+m+mA
100b7(rgyud): sa sa na ni ma sa sgyu /  gas sa kyikyi / kyi shinapa ma
100b8(rgyud): rgyas se mam lasags /  ma ma na na / ma na sa/ da ma sa
101a1(rgyud): / ste// lus dang dus dang yul dang ni// rlung gi gnad tu shes par bya// dang po'i ye shes bla na med// pad ma ltar gsal rab 'bar ba// sa ni yog mar mngon par bde// rgya la ma yan lag bdun ldan
101a2(rgyud): pa// 'jug gnas rgyal ma rang bzhin bcas// dbang gis 'jug dang nga byin pa d+hab// gyen dgasang ba mchog tu gyur// 'bru gsum ma ma yar bcas// 'bras bu snying po phyag rgyatsho// rang bzhin med po ga
101a3(rgyud): re dbyings// 'od gsal mngon par byang chub pa// tshad med snying rje bsdu dngos kyis// nges par rab gang mi dmigs pa'o// sems can sna tshogs 'dul don du// sangs rgyas rnams ni yang dang yang / 
101a4(rgyud): sems bskyed gyur pas lam sbyangs te// mdzad pa du ma'i cho 'phrul rnams// rgyun mi 'chad phyir sems bskyed pa'o// dri med sems ni rnam kun du// rang rig ye shes thog med pas// 'gag pa med
101a5(rgyud): cing skye med kyang // sems can don du 'khor zhing lding // byang chub sems ni mi zad pa// de phyir phrin las rgyun mi 'chad// rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pas// kun mkhyen ye shes nam mkha'i dbyings// 
101a6(rgyud): / gdul 'i khams dang 'thun par 'jug/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgyu 'phral kar// de ni sprul pa'i sku zhes brjod// rgyal ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sgra// yon tan du mas rab brgyan cing // mtshan
101a7(rgyud): dang dpe byad 'bar ba dang // ye shes skus ni gzhan don gyir// snang ba'i 'od 'byed dag pa'i dan// rtag tu bde ba can du ba rlugs// bde ba chen po dbyer med cing // thabs dang shes rab mi phyed pa'i// rnam
101a8(rgyud): 'byor dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das// kha sbyar skyer ba gsang ba che// rdo rje pad ma mnyam sbyor ba// me tog dang ni de yi dro// dbyer med rten dang brten par gnas// mchog tu dag pa bdag med pa// 
101b1(rgyud): gas pa ldan 'aM// 'dzun // khya pa yan gangs pa ni// sngags gcas rgya smras pa do// ra tus rnams myigs chen chog/ thas pa tshig ga
101b2(rgyud): khyen pas bshad pa yin// sbyor ba'i lam las yan lag bcu// rlung gi gnas su 'dzud par bya// dra ba'i rgyu lnga dang po la// sgrubs lnga de yi khyad par te// yan lag rlung gi gnas pa yin// snga ma'i garim la
101b3(rgyud): stsol nas// khyad par gong du 'phel po stan// dad pa la sogs chos rnams yin// 'bras bu dus su sangs rgyas kyi// gsang ba ye shes stobs bcur ni// gnas dang gnas min mkhyen pa sogs// khyad par thob
101b4(rgyud): ba bstan pa'o// mthar phyin lam ni rnam gnyis te// slob pa'i zung 'jug dang po yin// rang rang reg tu bcas pa yi// zad med pa'i bde ba'i lam// rang bzhin dag pa gzugs kyi sgra// glo bur drim rnam bsal ga/ 
101b5(rgyud): mnyam rjes khyad par gang gyur pa// rtog pa sbyang ba sems mngon kyar// dri kyi tsha nyid med pa// de nyid chos rnams chos nyid de// de ni yang dag mi srub// de rtogs sangs rgyas mi mnos brjod// dus gsum rgyam
101b6(rgyud): 'i ye shes ldam// sangs rgyas snying po byang chub sems// stong nyid mang ga'ang ro yi// log par lta ba'i tshigs sngag ma dang // de las snang ba med par dbyings// sku gsum yongs su 'byung dang / 
101b7(rgyud): nga 'drug gnyis pa ste// dpyir med rig mo'i skyes bur bcas// rgyas btab drug ldan pade ba che// lhan cig skyes pa'i rol par 'char// ngo bo nyid kyis dge pa ste// sems nying 'odags mi snying po nyid/ 
101b8(rgyud): sa spang ma med pa las// lus sbyangs ye shes ro gcig pa// rdul bral cing grol med pa nyid// tinga'i dzin mnyam nyid zadang med// byang chub mchog ces bstan pa yin// 'od gas la de nyid dus kun du/ 
102a1(rgyud): / chos ga ni sam gtan dag/ ma dbyed pa'o/  'dzin pas// brgyam dang ga nyid nga sgoms pa ga te// thams cad tuni 'gyur ba med// rang gyis 'grog cing gis steg
102a2(rgyud): tshon rkyen dang phrad pa banim// myu gu rten 'bre la tshogs las 'byung // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyis dang lam rnam par ngas pas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'di ni gsang ba thams cad kyi/ 
102a3(rgyud): ye shes gnas kyi ston pa po// shrI gnyis med ye shes mchog grub pa// bde legs kun gyi gzhir gyur pa'i// dpal ldan rnam par thar pa'i sgo// shes rab snying rje dbyer med pa'o// gsang ba'i snying po dran
102a4(rgyud): med// mthar thub chos rnams rab 'jug pa// sgyu ma'i rol pa bsam mi khyab// byang chub sems las kun du 'byung // bde ba mchog las mchog grub pa// 'khor 'das spong thob med pa nyid// srid ni
102a5(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid rtog pa// byang chub sems kyi spyad yul can// rgyal ba rnams kyis bstan pa'i lam// bede don spros med pa ru 'dur// thams gsum rlung las sprul pa ni// rnam par shes pa yul la
102a6(rgyud): jug/ de las bdag dang gzhan du rtog/ rten bcas rang srong g.yo ba yin// 'dir ni rlung sems 'dres pa las// snang ngog sum gyi rang bzhin 'char// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi bdag dang gzhan// 
102a7(rgyud): pa'i gnas// kun rdzob snang ba sna tshogs pa// ngo ma nyid kyi rang stos// gnas gsum tshus ni rgyud gzhan las/ 
102a8(rgyud): dag mil mngon byang chug/ sgyum khrus yul las gon no// dang 'dzin nges par bad bsnyen par// rdus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gas chen rgyal pa chung
102b1(rgyud): sa kyi myed rnams shing// lugs pa ma dugs 'das pas/ yam tan rdzogs shing kun dbang stsa// mchog+sa ldan rgyam po mdzes gang bab pa// kha ba dang rgya tshe gnyis su med/ 
102b2(rgyud): gzhan gnyis sod can pa yis/ rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi dgongs pa ni// yang dag nyid du rnam bgad pa// lha mo rnams dang skyes bu'o// gnang ba'i rgyud 'di gnyim med brjod// de bzhin gshegs pa
102b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las gnyis su med pa smon pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang
102b4(rgyud): rin gyi kunas nges par bstan pa mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes gtan la phab pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// // bzhag pa gnyis pa rnam par nges pa gsal ba zhes bya ba ste
102b5(rgyud): gas ba'i dang lnga mchog chen po ye shes kyi khon nyid rab tu brjod pamo// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sku gsum mchog tu brtag pa nyid// mi 'gyur rdo rje gsum kyi dang // gtan ni mchog
102b6(rgyud): bzang tshoche// snying po byang chub pa med pas// gsang ba dam pa bka' stsal to// gsong ba chen cid gyim ma'i du// rnam pa gas 'dzin dag pa'i sgra// bsdus pa'i pho brang chu che bas// mi bskyod
102b7(rgyud): sems pa 'dag/ gcig tu gtso bor gyur pa'o// khyab par sna mdzad dkon mchog dpal// yod dpag med dang gdon miH// rigs kyi dbyab la dzad// spyan dbu sa ma kI mchog dang// kyis dkar/ 
102b8(rgyud): mo dang sgrol byedas// mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa yi// gzugs sgra dri ro lha mo bani// bar byams gnas pa pA bzhir dgod// byams chos mi snang ba dang // phyag na rdo rje
103a1(rgyud): / snying po// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'jam pa'i dbyangs// sgrib sel kun du bzang po ste// sems dpa' ba rgyad ni lha khyams la// pho rgyal bani dang ldan pas na// nyi shu rtsa ldanang du dgod// 
103a2(rgyud): khyams dgal khro rgyal d+ha// de ltar sus tsuM rtsa gcig gis// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bsdus pa yin// phyag na rdo rje'i dbang bsnang ba// tshangs pachos kyi 'khor mo ste// sum dru ga sum par gnas pa
103a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba mnyam pa nyid ye shes ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nyid du mngon par brjod pa'o// danas de bzhin gshegs pa maM'i zla ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
103a4(rgyud): gsung dang sngags rdo rje mi dmigs pa'i ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// tshes rnam du mar snang ba'i ngos// snron zhing 'bris
103a5(rgyud): ldan pa bzhin// pra ba'i dbye ba shes par bya// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu gzigs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i spyod tshulag
103a6(rgyud): duston pa da rdzanas pa'i ting 'dzin la sgoms pa mtshugs te byang chub kyi sems 'deg sangs so// gnas med genas pa'i mkha la than// mi ga rang byung po dgas lag/ don dam dmigs mi
103a7(rgyud): b+ha nu tshul 'di bstan chogs gsungs sa// de nas kyis ldan das da pazhin gshegs pa mi shes 'ab sa tu btsun pa zhes byabs sa rgyas thams da kyigs bdug par sa
103a8(rgyud): rje zhes bya 'i ny-i ma mdzin pa snyoms par chugs te byang chub kyi sems 'dig sungs so// gang bya chos rnam sa do ma med cing // nga ba nyid dag mi shes smra// bden pa 'dis ni khyab par byes/ 
103b1(rgyud): dung tshul 'dis sman ngas nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor du 'od kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ye shes gcig pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sgoms pa zhugs te byas
103b2(rgyud): gyims di gangs na// 'gyod pa sgyug tha mongs pacas/  ldan pa nying// de zhin gshegs pa'i lashes mchog byang cu tshul 'ad paston pa lan sa gsus so// denas na
103b3(rgyud): gshegs pa ri rab brtsegs pa'i rje mo rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho ltar mi phyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dpag med ye shes rgyal
103b4(rgyud): mtshan tog/ yid bzhin nor bu'i snying po las// rang bzhin bde chen gnas mchog 'grub// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ran chen lha'i lha sangs rgyas thams
103b5(rgyud): cad kyi gzi brjid mtha' yas pa'i 'od 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyems par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rgyal ba ma lus kun gyi gsang // ye shes rol pa bad ba che/ 
103b6(rgyud): dang spangs pa'i tinge 'dzin// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don gnas gzigs pa dag pa'i dbyings kun nas sprin gyi snang ba rdo rje nas bya ba'i tinge 'dzin la
103b7(rgyud): snyoms par thugs kyang chu'i kyi sems 'di gsungs so// blan med pa'i byang chub sems// cad cid 'de ba char 'babs pa// dang 'byung mi ge sa rgyal bsod// bya kyi batshum 'di basbyin pa'o zhes gsum
103b8(rgyud): so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pa rdzogs pa dpal rgyal po bden pa gnyis su me dang 'do bo kun du 'byung ba rdo rje nas bya ba'i nying nge dzin la snyoms par zhugs tebyung nam gyi sems 'jigs
104a1(rgyud): // so// 'di ni rgyal ba ma lus pa'i// ye zhes smra sa skyon med pa// bsam pa d+mo li Al las snang // byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsus so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya
104a2(rgyud): me pa 'i lda rjes sa rgyas sus ma kyi myu po yang dgi pa byu dardza nas byu ting na pasgrims pa sa/  b+h+ya ts+tsha sems 'dag grangs so// kun sna mi shes
104a3(rgyud): tshul 'dridi bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rtag pa thams cad dang bral ba rdo
104a4(rgyud): byings sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ning lams rin po che'i sprin kun du ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems nyidi gsungs so// dri ma med pa dag pa'i zhig
104a5(rgyud): pad mo rgyas pa snang ba'i dbyings// rin chen 'od 'phro mi zad dang // byang chu tshul 'di bstan par zhes gsungs so// de nas de byinan gshegs pa sra ba'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas thams cad kyi la
104a6(rgyud): na yi nga sa rgyas rnams dun ma kyi ba byung ba drin su byu ny-i nas rnams par zugs pa kyi sems 'di ga sungs so//
