104a8(rgyud): bame tog spyan yangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sanga' dbang dam pa rnam par 'phrul ba dri sa med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs
104b1(rgyud): U'i drab la sangs rgyas thams cad ste byangs kun du sgrog pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gzung rin rtog pa'i dab la rlabs kun
104b2(rgyud): dbu ma ga cig tu thim gyur pas// ye shes rgyas po'i snying po dbye// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// don so de 'din gshegs pa dri ma med pa chos kyi 'od zer 'byung ba rdo rje sangs rgyas thams
104b3(rgyud): snying po'i ye shes 'byung ba dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// kun du seng ge'i rtsal gyis ni// zil gyis gnon po rdo rje zhes// yongs su
104b4(rgyud): bsdu ba'i ti rje 'dzen// Sh+yo mu tshu 'de bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhi na gshegs pa 'od gsal pa'i yon tan 'byung ba rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgyes pa'i yon tan du ma ston pa migs/ 
104b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// kun nas snang ba med pa'i ngag// rnyog pa mi ba skyod par mi 'gyur ba// mnya ma gad le shes ldang ba cugs// byang
104b6(rgyud): tu tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i zhal mnga' ba rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgyu ma'i rol pa sna tshogs su ston po rdo rje zhes bya ba ri ting nge'i 'dzin ma
104b7(rgyud): thugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'byung ba rnams dang srog bcas dang // mi zad pa sdugs lus kun// desanin nyid las snang ba yin/ byang cu cu pa 'di bsams zhes gsu ma so/ 
105a1(rgyud): de nas des na na gshegs pa kun du 'o mi zadapa 'a ran chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'gro ba mig rnam par spyong ba de rje zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin pa snyoms pa zhugs te byang chub
105a2(rgyud): sems 'di gsungs so// gang du lus can thams cad la// gdul bya dus la bab gyur na// nas mkha' las kyang sgra blang nas// chos kyi 'byung gnas der ston mdzad ces gsungs so// de nas
105a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rin chan dkon pa'i tog dang 'byung du 'tshar ma shrIs ril po rdo rje nis bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems gsungs so// 'di ni rang byung ston pa 'o// 
105a4(rgyud): 'jug pa 'bad med par// thob bya byang chub sems dpa' rnams// rang rig rang las rnyed par 'gyur zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bla ma phan par grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgra
105a5(rgyud): kun tu ston cing 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dus gsum pa yi sangs rgyas rnams// dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i 'khor lo de
105a6(rgyud): gdu khye blo yi mi mthong bar byed// de nyid bsam pa'i tshul gyis 'byung zhes gsungs so// sangs rgyas byang chub rdo rje 'dzin// tshe 'dis 'grub gyi gzhan du min// lus ngag yod ni legs gnas
105a7(rgyud): /  par gyu pa mi rgyu gas sa// gas hU~Mg pa/ !pan po rnam par rnam// sa me gas / 'ad pa la ste spyod rgyun gyi hrA/ 
105a8(rgyud): brgya med byung // de ltar 'dod pa nyar bsten pa// zhen med la zhes langs spyod pa// bde bar bstan pos sangs rgyas mthob ces gsungs te// yang dag ci'i ring mi sri
105b1(rgyud): ga u ga klu gas byas man can pa gnyis mas tam tad rnam pa rgyam pa rdzas na ca zan pa ga
105b2(rgyud): mngon par ston pa'i mdu zhigar gsum pa 'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mi za dpa'i ye shes rab lnga 'byed pa rdun sangs
105b3(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi nam mkha'i gnas mi 'gyur ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du dmigs pa kun dral ba'i// snying rje chen po'i 'od zer
105b4(rgyud): kyis// yul rnams sgyu mar spyod par bya// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de banan gshegs pa 'od zer dpag med gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad
105b5(rgyud): ye shes kyi snyin po gsong pa zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du stong nyid chos kyi sku// de nyid snying rje dbyer mi phyed// 'bras bu snying po byang chub sems// me
105b6(rgyud): mtshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gdugs khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi
105b7(rgyud): sems 'dig sangs so// 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi snying // maM shigs ye shes gcig bung ba zhugs// mgro 'ang med cing khyab par 'byung // byang chub tshul 'di bstan bya'o nas gsungs so// do na sa de bzhin
105b8(rgyud): gshegs pa ye shes stobs mchog seng ge'i spu can sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'gro ba kun la'ang bzhin gyis dbang bskur ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzir la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi ses
106a1(rgyud): ga ma la / rdzu ga kyis grus sa/  na na ga // ma
106a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sbyangs pa'i mangs pa'i smonan sangs rgyas thams da kyi grubam pa gsus chos kyi rgyam par dbang bsrung ba zhis bya ting nge 'a ngan la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyisams
106a3(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// khams gsum skye gyur lus can gyi// lus ngag sems ni mi dmigs par// byang chub snying por dbang bskur mdzad// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
106a4(rgyud): gshegs pa rgyal bar dka' ba'i blon no sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gro ba rnams la yang dag par rtogs pa'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs
106a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes dbang // rtag cing khyab pa'i tshul tu bskur// de nyid rnam dag dbang bskur mchog/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
106a6(rgyud): gshegs pa yon tan phung po mi zad pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi 'tsho bsten pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// klang
106a7(rgyud): / namyos 'dra'i spyod spangs nas// bar snang bya bzhen rjes chags med// thams cad dus su snyoms par byed// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tog
106a8(rgyud): zla ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod snyoms spyod pa dran par bya ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du grong khyer rgyub sogs// sna/ 
106b1(rgyud): chogs spyo/ ma ga dungs// dran pas ma yengs gzhan do myed// bya ga cu 'a ldan pa nas ga sums// denas da shi gshegs pas rkyen pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod las rnam par
106b2(rgyud): da pa 'dri la zhes kya ba'i ti 'dzin la snyoms par rmugs te byung chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du gro 'chag pa dang // nyal dang rnam kyi dus la sogs// byang chub sems kyi dngalas ni// ma yengs
106b3(rgyud): bzhin spyad par bya zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu stobs mtha' yas pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun tu spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang
106b4(rgyud): hUM kyi sems 'di gsungs so// tshul bzhin ma yin rnam spangs nas// bag med gnas las bzlog par bya// 'di ni ye shes bdud rtsi yin// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// 
106b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba rnam par dag pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa dag pa'i snang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang / 
106b6(rgyud): byargyas sems pa dganas shing // ldog pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// dkar po'i chos la ltung bar bya// byung chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don mas
106b7(rgyud): cad gzigs pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms byar zhugs te byeng chub kyi sems 'di gsangs so// gang du tu dang 'bras
106b8(rgyud): chudami ba pades 'byur phyir// shin tu dag tshe sdug bsngal 'gyur// de nyid gra brtags par dga' zhes gsungs so// de nas na tshan gshegs pas bu slobs mtha' mas rdo rje sangs rgya lams
107a1(rgyud): cad kyi kun du spyod pa snang shes bya shi nga 'dzin du snyoms pa jugs khung chum gyi sems da gsungs so// tshul bzhin ma yin rnam spangs nas// bag med gnas las brlog par// 
107a2(rgyud): bya// don ye shes ban tu yin// byang rgya na la 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsung sa so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpa' chen po de d+ha sangs rgyas thams cad kyangs pa'i ska ba yang
107a3(rgyud): dag pa dran po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dag pa'i 'bras bu bde ba ste// ma dag pa las srid par ltung // rnam par nges pas ye shes
107a4(rgyud): byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de das de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nges pa'i lam rnam par dag pa rdorje zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
107a5(rgyud): bags sgrubachus kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas rnams kyings pabyung sa ma// don tha~Mng pa'i rgyal mtshan te/ nga sems dag pa tshul khrims mchog/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs/ 
107a6(rgyud): / nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rab rgyas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams mi dadra pa'i gter 'byung zhes bya'i ting 'dzin la snyom pa pa banugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// blan med
107a7(rgyud): na ni/ zhan med la shes rgyam tsho/  khyom spyod pa cas babyu/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'i// zhes gsungs so// de na ma ponan gshegs pa yon tan
107a8(rgyud): 'bar ba'i 'ad sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'gro bskyab pad yang rngonas bya ba ta 'dzin pa sgoms par thugs te byang chum kyi sems bdi gsungs so// byang rgyab legs sa sa
107b1(rgyud): bdag med phung po la sogs spong // gong nyid ska ma'i snying rjer gnas// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snying po thugs yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gnas pa
107b2(rgyud): med pa'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i nyid nge 'dzin lo snyams par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas thugs ni chos kyi dbyings// 'gyur ba med cing kun tog bral// mi g.yo mtshan ma
107b3(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs skyes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gro ba'i gdung ba sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
107b4(rgyud): par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// mi skyes nyon mongs nad kyi gzer// dasal dam pa'i bdud rtsi bstan// bla med thugs rjes sman gyis gso// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes
107b5(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha chen po nor 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rol pa 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 
107b6(rgyud): 'brags pa rnams kyis sbyangs pa'i lam// nang las byung gi phyilas min// de nyid 'bras bu mchog las skyes// byang chub tshul 'di bstan po'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de ba ni nan shegs pa srid
107b7(rgyud): nyis stongs sa rgyas mim pa dmigs sngags kyi tshul byid kyis rlobs pa ji zhes byab badzin mi rnams par gas te rgyab kyi sems dag sa so// 'di mi byud pa kyi
107b8(rgyud): / dag med pade ba gshegs pa mas//  ts+tsha byen gyib// rgya ru ma di stan chen po gsum so// rgan ma med lags dgapalas// chen mi rdzogs / 
108a1(rgyud): bas sdug bsngal brgyud ma las// mthar phyin sngags kyi byin pa rlabyas pa'i// mkhas pa dag ni ye shes spyod// ji ltar chu'i tshig pa ni// rgya mtshor bab na lan dz+nyA dgyur// ran/ 
108a2(rgyud): dz+nyAn pa'i mtsho zhugs pas// de nyid snying yang bcu mi 'gyur// dag pa sa drig med byas nas ni// ye shes bdun kyi long sa spyod pa'o// dang bdu ci 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting dzino// 
108a3(rgyud): bzhin gnags pa thams cad kyi sa dang gsung dang thugs kyigs papa gas pa 'dus la nal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa sanyin bskyed nus par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas kun gyi lags du/ 
108a4(rgyud): rtse bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dpag med stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin
108a5(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// bdag po de nyid kun 'dus pa// rig pa'i rgyal pos byin gyis rlog// byang chub
108a6(rgyud): tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu srid pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi blan med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'byung ba'i ting nge
108a7(rgyud): 'ong nas mas pa A/  bya chus kyi sems 'dig 'dus so// rgyal bzhin gyi dgongs pa rnams// mi ma rig pa'i la b+h+ya sa ni// snying mo gcig pa gas pa bya/ byung
108a8(rgyud): chu batshul 'di bstan pa'o/ zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom pa med pa sangs rgyal thams cad kyi bsgra'i dbyangs kyis 'gro ba bskul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge'i dzin ma snyoms
108b1(rgyud): par zhugs te ba kyi sems 'di gardzangs so// gang sbyi khams spyod pa dang // gang bya tho ba 'dul bdag/ nam m+b+ha pa'i byi sa kyis kun du brdung // byung chub tshul di bstan
108b2(rgyud): gsum // des shin she la myu mas man sa nga sas /  di mas
108b3(rgyud): chos rnams rang 'byung stong nyid sku// gdul bya mos pa'i snang ba la// sangs rgyas rnams kyis kun du bsgrags// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de ba
108b4(rgyud): gshegs pa bde gnas dbang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdib pa'i gnas mi byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnams
108b5(rgyud): zag med 'od gsal ba// skye ba med cing shin tu phra// mtshan nyid dngos pos spyong ba'i chos// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// danas de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can
108b6(rgyud): nyid kyis rang spyod pas// mi phyed ye shes gnas po po// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad
108b7(rgyud): sa kyib dang badzin po rnams pa sa byang kyi sems pa gsum sa// kun dum smin pa byed do// drin pa grol phyir ba pa ste/ tshogs spyod pa kyang
109a1(rgyud): gsang batshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pab chen tshul ba kun du rtog pa pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzinas snyoms par zhugs
109a2(rgyud): kyi sems 'di gsum so// dngos po mi tig skad cag ma// de nyid ma pa'i rnas can phyir// 'dzin pa med pa'i gnas gas bya// sna chub cul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de ni mi
109a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mtha' yas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba la snyoms
109a4(rgyud): ba zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ngo bo nyid kyi dag pa'i dngos// dbu ma ye shes rtog bral bas// mtha' las 'das pa chung 'jug/ gsang ba gnyis med tshul basman po'o
109a5(rgyud): gsus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don gyi blo gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
109a6(rgyud): 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnams thams cad skye ba med// chos gang 'gag par 'gyur ba med// rnam par rtog pa rab zhig/ de nyid byang chub
109a7(rgyud): rdol ba sman pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bla med sman pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rtog pa'i drag gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
109a8(rgyud): drus kyimams 'dig tshum so// them ma pa med pa ba // dag pa 'di mig med la// mal las dris mda' // stong pa kying chu chub zi ga ma mas
109b1(rgyud): so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i gdus dka' ba spangs pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes 'brug sna'i dbyangs rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
109b2(rgyud): zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// snying po rdo rje stong nyid dang // dbyer med lhan cig skyes pa'i bdag/ rtog pa med cing dmig sang med pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'i nus gsungs// 
109b3(rgyud): de nas de 'azhin gshegs pa dag pa'i stobs rim nad med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi seng ge'i sgra sgrags pa'o rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
109b4(rgyud): gsungs so// gang dund rnams bya ba'i gni// las dang nyon mongs nog las spyad// de nyid gnas las dag par bya// thams cad ye shes spyod pas snang zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
109b5(rgyud): gshegs pa legs par snang ba'i dpal sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi ljon zhing dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 
109b6(rgyud): sdom pa mchog/ gas pa dang rgya 'i gyings// sang thang med pa tshul pa nyid// gzhugs byung chu tshul bstan papo nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gzugs pa rmugs pas byin sangs nas
109b7(rgyud): thams cad kyis sa gyi snyi yo na du la ston pa zhes bya radu la sdums pa dug sa byud gyisems dgasus so//  chen po ltag // gcigs la mi sa
109b8(rgyud): nyid kya bangs sprul pa// sna brus byang rdul bstan pa nas gsungs so// de pa de bzhin gagags pa me tog sbyin pangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsas gtan ngan pa nga 'byung tshon mi rgya
110a1(rgyud): ta tshe minas snyos pa la sngags chun kyi sems 'din rgyas so// byu rnams dpa pasas ga du// rnalas mi shes khams 'dus pa// rten du na pa
110a2(rgyud): da pa dag pas snang ba dag/ rang lus dag pas rnam shes dag/ ye shes spyod pas rnam par spyad// 
110a3(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul zla ba'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du mi
110a4(rgyud): lam dag par ni// rdo rje glo yis rnam par snad// de nyid ye shes rgyal ba yis// bdun las rnam par rgyal bar bya zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje phal chen sbyin sangs rgyas
110a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi gsang ba pad mo rnam par rol po yi 'od bar 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// zhib khams kun gyi snong ba riganas/ 
110a6(rgyud): rin chen 'od kyis rnam par spras// sgyu ma tsam du ston pa nyid// snying po ye shes gzhir gyur pa'i zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i blo gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ning
110a7(rgyud): malum pa sa kod me rjenas rgya ma ti dzinas rnams par jugs kyi rgya num gyimamam 'a ga sus so// rgyas rgya tsha ldan tshig sa las// dus gas ma kun du dag bayi/ 
110b1(rgyud): ma pa ye shes snod kyig// cho rnams sems kyi snang las byung zhes gsum po// de nas rgya mthorda 'dzin// gsang ba'i bra sa phyag bcom ldan gyis// ma zhes smod par bsrung
110b2(rgyud): spyo // pirtsA gan ma // mtshan nyid me sadon ma da de mig pa medade// brjod pa spangs pa stong che// mchi
110b3(rgyud): // kun chu na sa/ na r+m+mak+ShA /  /  shA ldan nas// rnam
110b4(rgyud): ljong sangs rgyas shes ni// snang ba me long 'khrin brjod/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// ye shes rang 'i ga gzhan dgapa// thad med
110b5(rgyud): ba bgru cu pas// de nyid mnyam nyid ye gas brjod// gdod nas dag cing skye ba med// rang bzhin gyis ni 'odagasal pa// phan tshun khyab pa'i ye shes la// so sor rtog pa
110b6(rgyud): yongs shes 'o// thams cad las brel des m+b+ha/ chogs rje 'dzin// shin du rnam dag ye shes byarjod// mchog gyur rgyal ba'i na blang gnas ni/ 
110b7(rgyud): rnams ngo bo nyid med pas// rab tu mi gnas ye shes gzhi// dam tshig shin du 'da' dka' ba'o// rang byung dri ma med pa ni// rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs// dngos dang dngos medar ba
111a1(rgyud): kyis// gnyis kyi bag chags 'ching ba nyid// mi rtogs yi rang bzhin gyis// bsam mi khyab pa nyid kyis gcod// rtog pa'i dri ma'i dra ba yis// rin chen sems ni
111a2(rgyud): mad byas// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyid// drim thal phye sangs rgyas brjod// ces byang chub sems dpa' sems da' chen po sa'i snying po la sogs pa rnams kyis gsang chen gyi gnas
111a3(rgyud): yongs su brjod pa la rab tu dga' ba'i don ched du brjod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa
111a4(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par rol pa bsten pa'i le'u ste ster lnga po'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad stong pa
111a5(rgyud): mi 'gyur che// ye shes dam pa ston pa pos// kun du gsang ba bkar stsal to// dam chos snying po bcud las byung // sangs rgyas mchod pa bla med pa// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
111a6(rgyud): 'phrul// shes rab thabs ni tshul thob byed// ji ltar gdul bya'i chos rnams dang // 'dod yon kun la sangs rgyas rnams// thams cad longs spyod tshul gcig pas// longs spyod
111a7(rgyud): rdzogs sku zhes bshad do// mtshan rnams kun dang yang dag ldan// sna tshogs sgra ste mtshan nyid med// sangs rgyas rnams kyis sprul pas na// sprul po'i spu nas 'dir bad yin// phyag rgya
111a8(rgyud): chen po rab bsgrub phyir// shes nas rnal 'byor dbang phyug sgom// kun tog thams cad rnam spangs pas// rgyal ba chos sku rtse shes nyid// bla ma'i byin brlabs skad cig gis// ye shes mi zad
111b1(rgyud): da// 'di nyid pa 'grub par 'gyur// me byed rdo rje bang phyugaseng// gnyis med mnyam par ro gcig pas// rdo rjengs ched du gyu ru// grub pa pade che nong ngo nyid// tho ba med thob pas gcig cang / 
111b2(rgyud): grol// spangs thob med pa mnyam nyid che// de nas de zhin gshegs pa spos kyi glang po'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi re shes kyi gnas 'a ba rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'bapa rdo rje ye shes smon pa
111b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'di ni chos rnams thams cad kyi// snying po ye shes pade chen po// byang chub rten cing 'brel 'byung ba'i// gsang
111b4(rgyud): 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa stobs mi zad pa srid med kyi busangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dbyangs kun du bsgral po rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa sgoms pa'i zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
111b5(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// bdag me dngos po med pa ru// ma skyes rag pa med pa'i nga// spros pa kun las rnam grol pa'i// ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro bskyob dbul po nges pa sangs rgyas thams
111b6(rgyud): kyi glang po'i rtsal theg pa med pa rdo rje sangs rgya thams cad kyi dbyung gnas rdo rje nas dra 'i ting nge dzin pa snyoms pa zugs te byang chub kyi sems 'dig 'angs 'o// rnga sems dpa' drang zhid de/ rang sems zla ba kun du spang / 
111b7(rgyud): bon gnas te sku yi cha// gsang ba'i tshul 'ad bstan po'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa ye shes mtshungs pa med pa'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zab pa'i mdzod rdo rje dbyings zhes bya ba'i ting
111b8(rgyud): 'dzad pa sdoms pa bzhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas kun kyang rdza 'thugs// rab tu mi gnas brjod med pa// byang chub sems su gcig pas na thams cad dbyer med dag par brjod
112a1(rgyud): des gzungs so// de nas de na gshegs blasangs rgyas thams su rgya nod kyi la zhes pa te don pa snyos pa shugs nub kyi sems sdigasus so/ 
112a2(rgyud): ngom po kun gyi bdag nyid dgag// stong gsum 'jig rten shi lam/ byin gnyis med ye shes che// gas pa 'a ba'i tshul bstan pa'i nis gdus so//  nas de bani na gshegs pa thams pa
112a3(rgyud): tog gi 'ad bar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying pa kun nas 'byung ba rjorje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub N+DI sems ni gsungs so// 'gro ba skyob pa'i na du ni// sna tshogs
112a4(rgyud): thugs can tshe 'phrul gyis// gdul bya ye shes lam la bkod// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi mchod pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
112a5(rgyud): ye shes mkha' lding rol pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bya ba chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang da byams pa'i 'od kyis ni// 'gro ba kun la khyab par bya/ des ni dpag med pag na den du
112a6(rgyud): mtshungs med ye shes gnas thob pa'o nas gsungs so// denas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po spras pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdud thams cad rnam par 'jig por mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
112a7(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// byasas pas bdud dpung 'joms mdzad cing // snying rjes g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur// byang chub sems kyis phyir mi ldog/ ye shes
112a8(rgyud): / tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba ye shes ngo rje'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang du
112b1(rgyud): tsuN+DI sems 'di gsungs so// ri chen 'bar ba gog gi'od// dri med kun la be nga babs// tham la lus ni rgyal bar bskrur// de nyid rdul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// denas dngazhin gshe/ 
112b2(rgyud): pa ye shes don grung sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa rigs sna tshogs su ston pa rdorje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du lnga mo bye ba dang / 
112b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig tshogs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs brgya dang // bde gshegs stong sogs tshul 'dir bstan zhes gsungs so// 
112b4(rgyud): tsigs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nas sbyi sa spyan rdzos pa ston pa de zhes bya 'i d+hA'i 'an la snyoms par thags te byu chub tu sems 'di gsungs so// gang pa s+yA 'i bras
112b5(rgyud): chos// ngo bo nyid dag rang byung ba// bdag med ye shes gnas med pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdul dka' 'dul ba sangs rgyas bams
112b6(rgyud): cad kyi gnas pa spyod pa rjezhis ba'i ting 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te bya chu kyi sems 'di gsungs so// mchog tus la mang jug par// bcug sum ye shes rdo rje dzin// bdi 'i
112b7(rgyud): 'byung gnas bla na med// gsong ba rdul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad mo'i 'od zer rnam par rol pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas mi zad pa 'byung ba rdo/ 
112b8(rgyud): rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du mnyam nyid ye shes dang // 'gro ba'i bla ma chos don gyis// tshad me dbugs rngas yongs su bsku/ 
113a1(rgyud): de nyid kyi rtog gsang ba mo zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom grags pa'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun nas chos kyi sgra 'byung ba /  zhes
113a2(rgyud): byaba'i ting tshan la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du spyad cing spro ba dang // mtshan bcas dmigs pa med 'dru// ye shes rgyal la phyag rgyas btag// di ni
113a3(rgyud): / ga ba'i don ston pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes grogs rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba nges par rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang
113a4(rgyud): kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams// yongs su gang btil 'gru zhin// sems can smin cing grol byed pas// ye shes mngon par bsdus pa yin zhes gsungs
113a5(rgyud): / de nas de 'azhin gshegs pa ye shes nyon mongs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dro ba'i sprin bkod pa'i rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par thugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du ma
113a6(rgyud): dang dngos med pas// me pa ng+ge ma shes byad ba ce// sna tshogs 'du 'bral med pa'i rig/  shes phyab rgya chen po bstan nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin ga shegs pa 'das bu'i 'od sangs rgyas rdzams cad kyi
113a7(rgyud): dzin pa bya pa na mi rnams par smra sa dgasas so// rnam yithams cas sgru / na gyi ni mo migs // 
113a8(rgyud): das tho mo pa do// ga ni med gul 'di bstan pa des gsungs so// de sa de bzhin gshegs pa spos payang nga rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi srung ba'i 'od kun nas rgyas pas ltu
113b1(rgyud): zhes bya ting sa na ma rnams par thugs te byu chu kyi sems 'dig smras so// yangan nyid ni mtshan gzhi med//  sos nyam rgyang sgrupas// bye ma
113b2(rgyud): pa rgyal po che// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor rangs pa rdo rjes ngas rgyas thams cad kyi gshegs pa dang byon pa rjes su 'gro ba snyen pa
113b3(rgyud): zhes kya'i ting ma sems par chugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungams// migaso 'gyur ba med pa'as// de dzin nyid du bstan pa yil// 'dug cing 'byung ba gsang che// rnyi ba yi
113b4(rgyud): bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ba grags dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos grub gnas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi
113b5(rgyud): semapa 'di gsungs so// dngos grub snying po bdud rtsi'i bcud// grub pa'i bla ma'i gdams pa las// thob 'gyur de bas gzhan du min// gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// 
113b6(rgyud): nidu gshegs pa thams cad kyi// mdzad pa'i sna tshogs gsung don du// phyogs bcu'i ning khams ma lus par// lcing ga song ci'i 'dul dka gis// theg pa mchog tu yongs grags pa/ 
113b7(rgyud): do theg pa'i lam gyur 'di// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ma lus pa'i// thugs kyi snying po gsang ba yin// sku dang gsung gi rdo rje 'dir// snying po kun du 'dus pa'i phyir/ 
113b8(rgyud): 'di bstan par med// ma 'angs pa nar 'byung bar dgal/ debs gas pazhin rnyed /  sa// sangs rgyas rnams ni 'jig rten du// 'byung gyur ma ma byin pa'o// gas kyi'i mo gi nam dag s+ho// 
114a1(rgyud): 'phel 'grib spangs pas gnas pa yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i gnas// gsang chen rang 'byung mnyam pa nyid// dpal mchog 'di ni bsdus pa'i tshul// ye shes chen
114a2(rgyud): pa'i tshul bstan pa 'o nas de bzhin gshegs pa rje sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' sems papa' chen po rnams lags pa 'jig rten du dbyung bar dka' bar gdams shing bstan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs
114a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba los sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer
114a4(rgyud): / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa srid mtha' gzigs sangs rgyas thams cad kyis srid pa'i chu klung skems pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi
114a5(rgyud): sems rnas pa// kham mas gas DU/ de bas sa du snyams// sgra da 'i gan sa gas sa so// sa da
114a6(rgyud): gags pa na chen thab sangs rgyas thams sa kyi phyin rgya gnas de rjegs bya te 'dzin ma snyoms par thugs te bya chub kyisems rigasangs so// 
114b1(rgyud): byas tub pas// mi phyed ye shes bdag nyid gyung// de nyid phyag rgya ni ldan pas// thams cad sdom par shes par bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal mtshan seng ge 'i
114b2(rgyud): rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyal mtshan bskong ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sems rgyud sna tshogs mos nyid gcig par gyur// 
114b3(rgyud): de nyid dngal dag pa'i rgyal mtshan mchog/ dbyer med byang chub sems kyi snang ba las// gsang ba bla med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gtan dgyes sangs rgyas
114b4(rgyud): mas cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje nam tog gi ri bo 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du rtog las rnam byung ba// de nyid 'joms par rdo ni
114b5(rgyud): sngo nyid 'di chen byang chub sems// de nyid ye shes tshul bstan pa'o nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi grub pa rdo rje gsang pa zhes bya ba'i ting
114b6(rgyud): ngan sa snyoms pa ug byang chub kyi rnas pa 'dig ngas sa// klu byam/  ni ga sa//  tshogs med pas//  mi dmigs
114b7(rgyud): bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rol pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po ye shes la rol pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byangachu
114b8(rgyud): kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sgyu ma'i dngos po snang med pa// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba don// gnas med bden gnyis dbyer med po// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pas nas gsungs so// 
115a1(rgyud): de nal de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rin po me mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bkod pa mi 'gyur ba dbyangs nas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sem
115a2(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsas kyings// thos pasam bsgom pas rtogs dka'// gsungab ye shes dag pa'i// dri me tshul 'di bstan pa 'o nas gsungs so// de nas
115a3(rgyud): de bzhi gshegs pa dgra bcom grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul gsang ba rdo rje dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 
115a4(rgyud): mang ga 'od gsal dri ma med// ma skyes rnams pa'i bdag nyid kyis// spyam dngos las rnam grol byed// de nyid tshul 'di bshad pa la nas gsungs so// de nas dbazhin gshegs pa pad ma'i
115a5(rgyud): / 'dus byas rtog las rnam grol ba// 'dus ma byas pa rdo rje ngang// de nyid dag pa'i tshul bstan pal nas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mdzod spu ldan pa rdo rjesangs rgyas
115a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med
115a7(rgyud): ga/ du gsum de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs// 'gu bral meng 'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas byas pa grags pa sangs rgyas
115b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi ngos sla gdul byal steng bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i tibange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'dir ni so so rong rig pa// ye shes rgyun chad med pa'i lam/ 
115b2(rgyud): smye / sa ga shos tshul ban gas gangs so// de sa 'dzin gshegs ma dzin sa sa rgyas thams cad byid pa mi dza mi rjenas rgya
115b3(rgyud): ngange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// nor bu'i snying po bsam 'phel bzhin// rtog med bsam pa rdzogs byed pa// rang byung chos kyi sgra ston pas// 
115b4(rgyud): mi gnas ye shes tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khyu mchog rdo rje'i rtsal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
115b5(rgyud): par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// srid dang zhi bar mi gnas pa// rdo rje gsum mchog dam pa'i dbyings// sku gsum lam gyi ye shes bcas// sa gsum dag pa'i
115b6(rgyud): dbang phyug thob ces gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bkod pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che sna tshogs pa'i mdangs bkod pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
115b7(rgyud): zhes bya ngon pa snyoms pa zhugs te byang chub kyisems 'dig ngas so// rjes su dran pa'i gnas ma // gas snyed nga ban+d+ha
115b8(rgyud): las// phyi nang gnas pas 'odogs la don rtogs pa// su nyid rang 'byung nas dag tshul bstan pa'i zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang chen seng go
116a1(rgyud): nga rgya bamam cad kyi tshad kyi macom pa'i slong dag snyoms par zugs te bya chun gyi sems 'di gsungs so// sna tshogs sda sa dum da da
116a2(rgyud): 'byung gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba rmad du byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin li snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'od gsungs so// ma btsal ma spangs dang
116a3(rgyud): kos ngag pa'i sku// rnyed par mi 'gyur rab 'byams bad pa che// bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam ni sbyin grub pa// byang chub sems chen gsang ba theg pa'i mchog ces gsungs so// 
116a4(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po grags sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba mtshan dbang bar po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung
116a5(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad rnams// sems can kun gyi lus la nges par bzhugs// dbri bsnan med par 'char bas gsal bar byed// de nyid spras
116a6(rgyud): pa'i don du tshul 'di bstan// zhes dasungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer bcu pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po gzhal yas khang nye bar brgyan po zhes bya ba'i ting
116a7(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor 'khor le'i gzhal yas khang // tshad med bgod pa ma rab smras pa// rgyan rnams kye thag
116b1(rgyud): las tshogs// snang ba de nyid tshul bstan pa'o nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma smod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po yang dag par ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
116b2(rgyud): pabartags / kyang tshum kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sgyu ma'i chos rnams mnga' lta byung // dag pa'i ye shes rang sog go// snying gi pad ma sang bar bya// de las ye shes blo rgyas pa'o zhes gsungs so// 
116b3(rgyud): denas de dag kun myigs pa// pheM shes ngom pa mchog sa// gas chen po shes lam 'drims// 'dod dang byu pa bsdu 'o// de zhin gshegs patham sa cad kyi s+yA dang
116b4(rgyud): nga dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsung ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis mu med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las gsang ba chen po'i ye shes kyi don gtan la phab pa'i le'u sten+d+he bdun pa'o// 
116b5(rgyud): de nas de na na gshegs pa glang po'i 'gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi blan med pa'i ye shes la dmigs padz+rarje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi semasa'i dag sungs so// 
116b6(rgyud): ye shes mchog tugasang ba ga // de nyid bsdus par gyur pa ste// rtog pa'i drab gcod mdzad yin// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'thang
116b7(rgyud): da la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dod ba kun nas rgyas pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du sangs rgyas 'od par snang
116b8(rgyud): bas khyab// de nyid 'dom gang 'od zer dba' rlabs gnyis// gnyis med gcag tu dag pas dbu ma nyid// dbyer med ye shes tshul 'di bstan par nis gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs/ 
117a1(rgyud): parin chen nub sungs kyis thams cad kyi byang chub kyi zhing mchog la dmigs pa do zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byung chub kyi sems 'dri gsungs so// 
117a2(rgyud): rkyen gan pa ldan ga // tid khyo chub sems pas mye// skyes pa sem sa bskyed/ na gyur pos/ rang byu rdul 'd-i stanapa/  gsungs so// de nas de 'ani gshegs
117a3(rgyud): bzhi ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nyan thopa chen po rnams kyis dpag par dko' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la skyems par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// zab pa shin rgya ni pa'i gnas/ 
117a4(rgyud): rdul med rtog pa med pa'i rnags// bsam gtan rdo rje tshad med pas// byang chu batshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rab gas la rgyal po sangs rgyas
117a5(rgyud): na thos ldan po rnams kyis brtag pa gas rdo nis bya ts+tsha t-i 'din la snyams pa ma kyimams dri gsungs so// gnas pa mad
117a6(rgyud): gnas rgyud pa// khyumachog chen po byeng chub sems// rangag zhanas byung myo dmigs pas// de rjid tshul 'di bes pa'i zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
117a7(rgyud): thub pa kha lo sbyang ba sangs rgyad thams cad kyi gnas rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis dmigs su med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
117a8(rgyud): gsungs so// 'khor ba'i rgyun 'di mya ngan 'das/ de nyid spang du med pas na// ye shes shes rab rab gnas pas// dag pa tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// 
117b1(rgyud): dedu sa de bzhin ga shegs pa dge zhi dasgragasangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye sheg phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi sa rtogs par ga' zhes 'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sem
117b2(rgyud): 'di ni ye shes chen po'i ngang // bla na med pa snying po'i sku// de bzhin nyid kyi tshul bstan pa'o zhes
117b3(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas dza banan gshegs pa gtsug na rin po na'i nod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting / 
117b4(rgyud): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// khams gsum snang ba sems yin phyir// sems de stong nyid rgyu med pas// gang du dri med gzhan
117b5(rgyud): don 'byung // 'di ni tshul tshan gsang ba yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gru pasnyems bral sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zag pa zad pa rnams
117b6(rgyud): migs su med pa derje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang sgrubag med byung ba med// khams nga
117b7(rgyud): da po yul med par// shin tu dri med nam mkha' bzhin// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// 
117b8(rgyud): de la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba rang rgyal ba thams cad kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// byang chub kyi sems 'di
118a1(rgyud): / gsungs so// gang da lus kyi kun tu spyod so// rdzu 'phrul snang ba bstan nas 'dul byed pa// rang byang bsam gtan thong ste ltos med pa// gsang ba 'dir gnas ye shes tshul
118a2(rgyud): bstun pa'o zhes gsungs so// de na pa de bzhin gshegs pa d+ma ba na la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gas pa tshangs pas dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
118a3(rgyud): thog ma med cing mtha' med pas// srid rtser tshi gnas dbang phyug che// dngos po med cing rtag pa che// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa 'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma
118a4(rgyud): dbar grags pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas brgya byin gyis dmigs su ma pa po zhes rgya cid dzin pa snyomams gas te kyis pa 'di gsungs so//  byas chug tog pa ste/ 
118a5(rgyud): ye shes rgyal ba kun gyi yul// gzugs sogs dus ni rtog tu med/ thams cad dag pa'i tshul bstan pa 'o nas gsungs so// de nas dpazhin gshegs pa ni pa'i gzi brjid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul lha drag po
118a6(rgyud): dkrigs su med pa de rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'ad gdungs so// nyon mongs cing bdag paso// sed len rkyen grol log pas na// dmigs med ye shes gsang ba nyid// 
118a7(rgyud): sa tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de na mde srin gshegs pa rdzu padaga' ba'i tog sangs rgyas thams cad
118a8(rgyud): mas gsas so/ ma la rgyas pa s+ho/ thams cad dag med yan pa bya/ sems can mas med ga par mi gnas pas/  nas chen po'i dul di bstan pa'i zhes gsungs so// 
118b1(rgyud): dro pa de ba ni gshegs pa sdug can lha'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes gsang ba l+h+wam yin rnams kyi dmigs su med pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang dus yogs / 
118b2(rgyud): skye da/ sa pa rnams su bstan pa yi// skyes grung bdud rtsi thob byedapas// gsangs tshul 'ang bstan pa'i nas gsungs so//  nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal na chod babang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyil shes gas pa rnams
118b3(rgyud): kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes sku// dug med gdug pa rnam bral bas// skyon med gtsang ba'i rang
118b4(rgyud): bzhin can// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa mngon par rol pa srin mo rnams kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje sangs
118b5(rgyud): rgyal thams cad kyi ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// bdag med mnyam pa nyid thob pas// grub pa med pa'i gnas la ni// 'chi med ye sgra tshul mchog gis/ 
118b6(rgyud): sa ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sbas pa ye shes nam mkha'i bu mo rnams kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
118b7(rgyud): ngange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyise mas 'di gsungs so// gang sum thar la spyod 'gro ba'i// 'gyur spyod shA ra shes can// ci na sa rnam brtags pas// gsang bcul 'di bstan pa'i rnas gsungs so// 
118b8(rgyud): da/ de zhin/ shegs 'ardo par gshegs pa 'angs rgyas mas sa dkyi la zhes gan sbyi rnams kyis rtogs pa dad 'a tsam sa cid kyi gnas pa de rje'i tong nge 'dzin ma snyoms par thug pa te bya nub gyimams 'di gsungs// 
119a1(rgyud): ri chen gter 'chang mdzod po che// nor gyi rgya 'am mtha' yas pas// de nyid sa dbang bde gshegs rgyal// gsang ba dam pa bka' stsal pa'o nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
119a2(rgyud): gshegs pa seng ge'i gnas pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sbas pa 'jig rten pa thams cad dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi skye dgu'i chos las dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
119a3(rgyud): pa bcugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung gsungs so// skyes bu chen po thams cad kyi// ye shes gnas ni mnyam med pas// rang gzhan mi phyed byang chulacha// sems dpa' tshul 'di bstan paco zhes gsung
119a4(rgyud): so// gang du 'grol gnas gyur pa'i// gsang chen 'dir ni gnas gyur na// gang la'ang dri mar mi 'gyur zhing // dgag par bya ba ci yang med// las rnams thams cad byas kyang ni// radabyung srur ni rnam par grol// 
119a5(rgyud): 'di gshegs pa thams cad kyi srung nga gsungadang thugs kyi gsang pa layang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen pa gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i dru las dag pa'i skyes bu bstan pa'i mi'u ste nyer brgyud
119a6(rgyud): / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu brtsor gshegs sangs rgyas thams cad kyil shes kyis chod rten 'byung ba jo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang
119a7(rgyud): sems 'di gsungs so// dri med la shes dag pa gnas// rin chen chusrung po gas la tha mi// da ni med srog 'byung ba ga ni// sa ma sgrib med tshul bstan mtshan ma gsungs so// de nas deponan gshegs pa
119a8(rgyud): dam par skye ba'i dbang po sangs rgyas tham card gyimi shes rdo rje mngon par byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin pa snyems pa thugs ta/ bya nub kyisams di gsum lo// mngon par byung ba la lags pa'i lam/ nyes pa
119b1(rgyud): spangs pa'i tshul mchog gis// rnam par mthor gshegs 'ag min te// zab pa brjod me tshul bstan par nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros bzang po mthong ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes
119b2(rgyud): 'i gnas shes byab dzin la snyoms pa zhugasate/  gyise mas 'di ga sus so// dngom po kun gyi yang mazhin mchog/ chos kun mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// kunas bye gu 'grothams cadapa
119b3(rgyud): med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' 'jig rten 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gnas pa gcig pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
119b4(rgyud): kya chub kyi sen 'di gsungs so// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po// mnyam nyid 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de
119b5(rgyud): ni gshegs pa'i nargyan gci brjid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun rtog pa med pardo rje zhes byanga'i ting 'dzin pa sgoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'de gsungs so// gcig dang du ma'i nga
119b6(rgyud): bzhin gnas// cher mi g.yo ba rang bzhin med// rtsol med 'byung ba dag pa yi// gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skal ldan shing rta chen po sangs rgyas
119b7(rgyud): ma' cad kyi dpe byad las 'das pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems ca gsungs so// bcom ldan so so rang reg pa// gtso pa de nga bral ye shes te/ 
119b8(rgyud): bdag po su 'grosu byab papa/ bya cu bcu 'di bstan pa tshanas gsungs 'o// den ma de 'anin gshegs pa kud tu rgyal ba bang posangs rgyamathams cad kyi ma pa me dge pa rjesangs rgyas s+ho// 
120a1(rgyud): cad kyi 'bya gnas shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// byed pa po dang 'phrog pa'ang med// 'di ni dpal ldan rang byung sems/ 
120a2(rgyud): dngos po gas pa dang migs la mdzad// ye shes snang ba'i rdul bstan pa nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag rab bkod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes chen po bla na med pa bde'i'i
120a3(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gnyis med gnyis las grol ba yi// ye shes rang las skye bar 'gyur// de nyid mngon sgra spyod byed pas// byang chub tshul 'di
120a4(rgyud): bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdags par mdzad pa'i ding la sangs rgyas thams cad snang ba yang dag pa rdo rje gnyis su med pa des bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa thugs te/ byung
120a5(rgyud): sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po med pa sgom pa min// dngos por yang dag bsgom du med// gang du ro mnyam mchog gi dngos// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs
120a6(rgyud): po smos kyi glang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi gnas pa kri zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rgya chun gyi sems 'digasum so// sems can kun gyi bsam pa di// 'jigs pa med pa'i dugs
120a7(rgyud): / khams kyis mi bya ba gnyis med gnas//  rbu du 'di bgan pa co zhes gsus so// dedapa bzhin gshegs pa rlo bas 'gro da la sangs rgyas thams ca gyil shes blogros mi med pa dzin pa
120a8(rgyud): ti 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bya chu gyi sems 'di gsungs so// shes rab ma bu la rnam par gnas// snying rjes sa dpa'i mad mi mni// bde ba chen po'i rnam par migs// bya dus chub na / 
120b1(rgyud): 'on pa gsum so// de nas da bzhin gshega' bar po rgyal mtshan rnam pa gral pa'i dpal dro zhes bya ti 'dzinam goms pa jugs te/ byang chu rgyamams 'di gzungs so// sems dang shes 'dzin// 
120b2(rgyud): ra la la sa gnas 'o// gos bdun gyi ba cing 'bral// byang su du 'de bstan pa'o nas gsungs 'o// den sa de bzhin gshegs pa rin can thos pa rangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes kyi rjes radaparnas
120b3(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gnyis med bde ba mchog tu ni// mkha' mnyam rtog pa las grol ba// gnyis med rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// byang chub tshul 'di
120b4(rgyud): bstan pa tsanas gsus mo// dedes de bzhin gshegs pa com bstan sangs rgyas thams cad kyibasas kyis sa khyab pa'i bya mdzo zhes byaba'i ti 'dzin pa sgom pa mi zhugs te/ byang chu gyi sems gsus/ 
120b5(rgyud): chos nyid bsas kyis mi khyab pa'i// rnal 'byor dbang phyug gnas pa'o// brtan g.yo dag pa'i tshul mchog gis// dbyer med tshul 'di dag pa lo nas gsungs so// 
120b6(rgyud): shul can sadas rgyas thams sad kyi bdud dpung thams cad pham pa pa 'dzad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin pa sgoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rtog pa ngan pas brtags pa yi// phyi ro du ni
120b7(rgyud): rdzal stod pas// thabs dang shes ra nas dag nyid// ye shes rdul da bstan pa'o nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi nor bu sangs nas thams cad kyi ye shes dra ba gcod pa rdo rjenas kya/ 
120b8(rgyud): sems pa sa / rgyas sems gsum pa// bde ca pa can // das so sa da ma sa// su rdzo bden pas su mgyur/ dus pa na dzu sa nas shes gsu/ 
121a1(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pazang pos byin pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor ba 'angam rdzabaskams par byed pa rdor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pa bcugs te/ byang chub kyi sems cad/ 
121a2(rgyud): gsum so// gang du gnyis mad dang gnas pa// rang bzhin brtag chags rang zhibs// snang gsum ye shes dag gyur pa'o// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa renas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla
121a3(rgyud): bla ma sangs rgyas srid pa'i tshang tshing 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// phyi re lang rgyal log bcom ste// ye shes gcig du bdag dag pas/ 
121a4(rgyud): da byung bsam pa rnam par dag/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mo gtogs 'joms pa'i riba~M rdo rjenas bya rgya'i ti kyi
121a5(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// kun tu rtog pa rab spangs nas// 'dod chags chags bral ye shes las// dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur te// gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ 
121a6(rgyud): sa gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ga'i zla ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung gnas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsum
121a7(rgyud): rang ciganas ni byang chub 'gyur// 'dir nyid tha dang rtog min zhing // gzugs dang rnamathar sgo thim pas// chos rkun thob phyir bstan pa tshe nas gsungs so// 'gro ba rnams kyi bde brtags dang bcas 'byung ba// gang yin
121a8(rgyud): sa lus pa gru bye// myur pa la shes da na// rtogs pa lta pa'i yin// drug rten pa'i rje su du pa na// de sams bdas pa na// tsam kun / 
121b1(rgyud): zhi drug mo'i 'gyur// thabs dang shas rab bdag nyid gnas pa yin// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dag pa'i sa dzad can po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bstan pa'adan ta// dbazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ska
121b2(rgyud): gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba mi 'gyur ba'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o// 
121b3(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshungs pa med pa'i dpal sangag rgya thams cad kyi snying po gas pa dri ma med pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dran pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ti
121b4(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chubagyis pas 'di gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa yi// sangs rgyas spro bcu'i 'byor pa yis// rtse mo gyur pa'i phyag khya mas// byang chu dul 'di bstan pa rtson sa gsungam so// 
121b5(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs par skyes pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes gsang ba chos rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i te pe 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang nub kyisams 'di gsungs so// ra byung ye shes ni ci
121b6(rgyud): // dag pa rnam dben mngon par ga// sun sum tshogs pa lam gyur gnas// byung chu dul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas dbazhin gshegs pa thub pa dpa med pa'i tshogs sangs rgyas thams cad kyigs pa'i/ 
121b7(rgyud): rjes phungan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pazhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du lha dang lha mo dang // byang chub sems dpa' dpag mad pa// ye shes las skyes mtshungs mdapa// byang du tshul
121b8(rgyud): gis gsus so// das zhi na gshegs pa grag pa par bshes patan pa brgyam thams kyi nas rjes sungan pa nas byang ba ting 'dzin pa thams pa 'jug te/ byang du kyi ma di gsus so// dun bcan nas
122a1(rgyud): sogs pas// bdod cing mchod pa'i shes gnas// rin chen 'khor mo brjod pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas bzhin gshegs pa dag chu chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rin po / 
122a2(rgyud): ngas ngan pa rjes bya ba'i ti badzin pa snyams par zugs te/ bya kyisems drug sa so// dadam min sa dzun// zla tshogs da pa don kyang pa// dpag mi tan
122a3(rgyud): dbyis// shAng nu bcul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// den pa da ban na gshegs pa ldan papa di 'arasangs rgyam thams cad ci sring brjes sungan pa shes byang 'i ti rin pa sgoms pa
122a4(rgyud): te/ byang chub kyi sems de gsungs so// gsu'adas skyes ma tog dang // du skyes pa ma gas la ba yang / bar ga'abye 'od khyab pas// dag pa ye shes dul bstan pa'o// nas gsungs so// de nas de 'don
122a5(rgyud): gshegs pa yon tan brtsegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad khyams kyi ma gr-i rjes su na pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te/ khyung mu gyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du rtog pa gcod pa dag/ rnas par
122a6(rgyud): sa sa pa/  rgya la mag/  byam pa sa bldan 'o// zhe gsus so//  gags pa ma pa brag lasas rgya ma na kyi phyogs
122b1(rgyud): nga na rgya nga 'dzin mas pa jugs te/ byang dub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// de gshegs byas pa rgya mtsho drig// gang ba mi zad mchod pa'i ga'i// de nyid kun tu gyu byed pas// gsang bdag pa'i
122b2(rgyud): zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi srung ji sa su ngan pa des bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par thugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du
122b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa yi// sku yi 'dul ba mtha' yas pa// sna tshogs zhing khams spyod mdzad pa// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhon gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba sbyin pa'i 'ong sangs
122b4(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyigasung rdo rje rjes su dran pa nas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'di ni brjod pa kun gyig ni// thabs dang shes rab sgra rnams las// shA sogs skad du chos ston pa// 
122b5(rgyud): de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glog 'byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje rjes su da pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te/ bya ba chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 
122b6(rgyud): dag par byed pa klus yin te// sgrib pa phyag byed khyod la du // thal sbyar 'dud pas g.yod lam// dran ldan nu 'di bstan pa'o// des gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bden par gsung ba sangs rgyus thams cad
122b7(rgyud): kyim tan dadangs su na pa zhes byang 'i ting mdzin pa sgoms par shugs te/ bya du khyimams 'di ga sum so// ni de sna dun byung ba'o// so da myu ma snatshogs pa/ thams ca bsas pa'i sgom ma min pas
122b8(rgyud): dgasang pa'i dul bstan pa'o// des gsungs so// de nas de ngab zhin gshegs pa ma byad gsung bsas rgyas thams cad kyi byin pas dordorjes sudrad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs paza tsa ma ti'i 'dzil smom sa pa grugs te// 
123a1(rgyud): sa gad pamasams rgyamam kyi ma 'am /  sa rloms pa zhugs
123a2(rgyud): snang ba la// ye shes ra byung 'gag pa med pa y-i// thugs rkyen po mi zad stobs pa 'byung // sangs rgyas kun gyi phrin las rdul bstan pa'o// nis gsungs so// den pa bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs kyi
123a3(rgyud): sa rgyas thams ca kyi 'arjes dran pa po zhes bya nyi dzin sa rnams pa zhugs te/ byang du kyimam la di ga sums// gang du gdug pa du byed pa/  na // rjes / 
123a4(rgyud): grob smras// ti rjo nu bstan pa'o// zhes gsungam 'o// den pa de ban gshegs pa rnam pa ma pa'i mangs rgya mtham byed kyisems can rjes srungs na 'i sa
123a5(rgyud): pa zhugs te/ byang chub kyi mas 'di gsungs so// gang du migs par 'jug med par/  chags khams gsum skye gnas pa// mig yong las snang med par// chos kyi sa gcig par tshul bstan pa'o// 
123a6(rgyud): zhes gsum so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa srings tha no su'i skyes sangs rgyas rnams cad kyis skyes pa rjes su dran pa nas bya ba'i ting 'dzin pa sgoms par zhugs te/ bya chub gyi thams 'di gsungs go/ 
123a7(rgyud): drus yid so// rgyu ny-id cin rgyam skye la// kyi du na te// nyi du di bzhin pa'o// gas gsum pa//  de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal pa byes pa las rgya mas
123b1(rgyud): dge sa rdo rjes su ngan pa zhes bya ba'i tong 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ngamatshar sna tshogs 'phrul pa yi// tham gnas dang sham srung sogs// mkhyen pas thabs la maklas par/ 
123b2(rgyud): // de nyid mi shes tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od par sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snang ba rjes su ngan pa zhes bya ba ting 'dzin sa snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi ses
123b3(rgyud): 'di gsus so// blo snang yul dang dbang po yis// dus 'dangos po snang ba la// ldog pa dang ni rjes su 'gro// de nyid gsang ba'i tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// lus gnas ca shas med par rtogs/ 
123b4(rgyud): de bzhin cha shas med// ma shas can dang chas dpa// shes na mi 'dir grol ze ches med// dngos pa thams cad mnyam pa ste// ster du 'jug pa dga' ba nyid// dpe dang gtan cig rnam par spras// rang bzhin
123b5(rgyud): ni 'dogs la drug/ gnyug sa 'dir ni srung pa steg spyod pa'i yul las 'das pa yin// khyod med zhib mtshon pa med// nges pa mams kyi byings la gnas// skal pa med cing rgya ba med/ 
123b6(rgyud): sa/ shing yon tan spangs// dngas bkun kyi rang bzhin can// ye shes kyi snang ba rgyas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyigs dpags pa sa
123b7(rgyud): rab 'byor chen po gnyis mu med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las 'go ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i yadu ste sum cu ba'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad sangs rgyas thams ca
123b8(rgyud): phyin pas pa pa rngarje zhes bya ba ting de 'dzin la sgoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyisems 'degasum so// gang du dngos pa rnam dag pas// shA 'ams sum tham pa nyid ca// du gsus 'a par
124a1(rgyud): bsdus pa yi// thams cad mkhyen pa tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i mchog sangs rgyas thams cad rdul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi
124a2(rgyud): tshul 'digs ba thob pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa rab zhugs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bzod pa'i pha ba tu phyin pa mi dad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
124a3(rgyud): sa kyi sems 'di dus so// lus pa yod kyilas rnams pa// bya chub sems dpa' gan don du// dpag sad ga/  ltu byed pa// ye shes pa de chen po nan zhes gsum so// den na
124a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thub pa nor bu'i zla ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brtson 'grus mi 'ad pa rdo / zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// phyir mi ldog par gzhan don du/ 
124a5(rgyud): chub sems kyi brtson pa yis// tshad med dbugs 'byin chen po nyid// byung chub cul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul 'od par sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gtan ma~M
124a6(rgyud): da pa rje zhes bya 'i tid dzin la snyoms par thugs te/ byang chub kyi ma mam 'od gsungs so// 'jig rten pasam gtan pa ni gnas shing // ye shes pasam gtanas chog spyod pas// byin rtsol med pa las ni// 
124a7(rgyud): bung chub sems kyi tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa bcul zhugs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo mi zad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyi/ 
124b1(rgyud): sa snyoms par zhugs te/ byu chub kyims 'dagasus s+ho//  rnams rang bzhin 'dogs sa ga/ srung po bya chub bcoms ma las// rbad rgyas thabs gcig pa ste// legs da tshul bstan pan/ 
124b2(rgyud): ga sa so// den sa zhid gshegs pa thongs su mamed pangs rgyas ma da sa na pa zhes bya ti seM dzinas ma pa kyi semapa 'dig dus pa/ 
124b3(rgyud): dge ba ni// rten 'brel sna tshogs spyod pa'i ngang // rkyen las 'byung ba blan med// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i tshogs 'chang ba sangs rgyas thams cad
124b4(rgyud): kyi jos sbyin pa rdo rje mi zad pa sangs rgya mams cad pa ting 'dzin ma snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'a gsungs so// dud tshigs rnams pasas ma rgyam ga// desrid ye shes chu la sa ni// zag me nigs
124b5(rgyud): mchog sung de// gnyis med tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten bla ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyis con tu sbyin pa rdo rje mi zad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting rje/ 
124b6(rgyud): ni ma snyam pa pa wa/ bya kyi ma dugasus // nag pas sa ma mdag / gtsud sa kya dmas kyi 'dul la na// rgyus ni gang ma 'jug pa/ 
124b7(rgyud): dpa' 'byung ba'i tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glang chen seng ge sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyis rol tu phyin pa rdo rje mi zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub
124b8(rgyud): ma 'dis su la 'o// gsag ba'i// ma gas ma par byung bgang //  gas med ma dag papa//  chu ju 'dis stan po'o// zhes sum so// de na ga shegs pa sa
125a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi snying po dbang phyug ging ji zhes bya ba'i tong 'dzin la snyoms par thugs te/ bya chu kyi sems 'di gsungs so// kunan rgyas pa'i gnas bstan pa// rnam par phrul pa'i ba shug
125a2(rgyud): gis// kun dus rgya gargyas brgyas pas// phying chub tu di stan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// denas de bzhin gshegs pa'i chen da pa mangs rgyas yun gyi stong 'i / mchog ces pa'i yin
125a3(rgyud): sa snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rnam par spyod pa sna tshogs la// bde bar gshegs pa mtshungs med spyod// 'di ni sngags kyi spyod mchog ste// de nyid gsang pa'i tshul thob pa'o// 
125a4(rgyud): zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgrag can bral ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal gyi be 'u btu rgyas par smon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyems par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsu so
125a5(rgyud): 'di ni dpal gyi stobs mchog ste// dri med du skyes yangs 'dzin pa// phra ba ges mchog thob pas// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas dbazhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho sangs rgyas
125a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdul med pa'i gnas rdzo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rnam pa kun du drim med// bskyod pa med cing 'dzin bral bas// chos nyid nga du ros
125a7(rgyud): pakhyang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mang 'a dbang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes 'brug sgra dbyangs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 
125a8(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnabs sun gyi snang ba ni// rtogs dka' bdag med mtshan ma med// byams pa'i rang bzhin gzhan phan brtson// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas
125b1(rgyud): da bzhin gshegs par dzug pa'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun du 'das dbyangs gal be dka phreM zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi se mas 'di gsungs so// tshangs par byas ldanan su
125b2(rgyud): sa// lan ga zus cu thog med du// 'gyun pa'i brjod pa las skyes pa'i na 'i ma sa da gis de zhi gshegs pa 'jig rted pa co sa rgyum thams cad kyi thugs rje rjes pa
125b3(rgyud): / snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// mnyam par ma bzhag stong pa yis// rtag tu mnyam pa'i tshul gnas nas// 'gyur med sna tshogs kya ba byed pa// byang chub tshur 'di bstan pa'o// 
125b4(rgyud): sum so// de ge shi shegs kya yod sa ma ma sa kyis 'i sems pa byed lpags pa ma mas pa thug /  sems sa so/ 
125b5(rgyud): na med pa/ mi sanyam 'i ni// bdag med sa gos srogs pa/ nyid du 'di ldan pa'o// des gargyas so// sa de bzhin gshegs rdzu zugs 'tshubs sa rgyas thams cad byar sa rdzog pa'i tshu
125b6(rgyud): po kyis rgo 'du stobs par smras te/  kyi sems dag sumaso// sngagadas byung pas byur pal// 'ad pa'i sna byung // de nyi sems can gas pa yod byar// byang chub cu 'di na /

126a1(rgyud): gsang 'dus pa nal byor chen po gnyis du med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las rnal 'byor chen po'i 'dul bdod mo dnga'i mchog bstan panga' skyesus dru gcig la// de na sa rgyam ba
126a2(rgyud): man ngag gis ni rlung bsdus te// de tshe bzlas pa brtan gyur 'as// de nyid ye shes mchog thob gyur// mig yo me tog/ phra ba'i sems// mi mngod
126a3(rgyud): la min dus zhugs// de nyid byod sachog ces bya// song nyid dang ma nyis skye ngas/ de nyid 'don bya rub 'o// tid gang la dra bde ni// sus shes sa bas yang gyur rjod num 'gas pa
126a4(rgyud): sri dgoms pas 'jug par bya// ragatu gsal pa'i gnas thob pas//  ge'i ye shes thob par 'gyur// de nyid ye shes pade chen po// mig po ri gzugs cad gcig pu nyid// snyi dbus mi shigs sems gcig padag
126a5(rgyud): snyed pa gas pa slong sa/  ma nga na mags pa// gnyis med la shes gagyoms// le gas bya nga gros// mams pas brtan pa bya// gas ma pa mi she ni// mabyung chos min
126a6(rgyud): / sa// rang mig gnas ni 'dir thob pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyim shes gsang ba chen po la dmigs pa nas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu dpal snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

126b1(rgyud): da nas 'asus sa// sun ga / gas pa thuzla sa dpa lasangs rgyas rnams cad kyig pa ba rgyal brjongs ma rgyas mams cad tha mnyes pa na pa nga 'dzin pa sgoms par dun
126b2(rgyud): kye mu kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'dod pa'i longs stong snga tshogs pa// na che bdud da te 'dun gyis// brgya shing mchod pas bdede thog/ de nyid tshum 'di bstan pa'o nas gsungs so// de nas de zhin gshes
126b3(rgyud): mthu dposangs rgyas thams cad kyi byung gnas rdzo zhes bye ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bya chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// lus kyang sems pa mi 'das te// sems ca dag la mi gnas

126b8(rgyud): khyod zhes kya nga da pa sgoms par thugs te pa rngu kyisems 'dag ngas so// ni 'ams kun pa bya byu 'o// lus can dun ma rnam par nga // tad smra sa

127a3(rgyud): gshegs pa skar rgyal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje ngo bo nyid ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par shugs te bya chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du 'khor los skur ba yi// chos kyi 'khor lo
127a4(rgyud): sgru sbyin// kro ye shes dpa basbya ba'o// de ny-id du 'di bstan pa'ogs gsus so// de sa shin ga shegs pa 'od pa chen po sangs rgya sems cad bye pazhi nyid sgyur ba zhes

127a8(rgyud): bya nub kying rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba zhes byab ting 'dzin la snyoms par thugs te bya rub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dun kyi tshong nga las 'das phyir// chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po 'im// khams gsum
127b1(rgyud): kun sa khyab par bya// de nyid gas ma bstan pa 'anas gsungs sa// de nas de bzhin gshegs par sangs rgya thams cad kyi 'jig rten snang bar byed pa re re shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang
127b2(rgyud): chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'odod gsal shin tu rnam dag pa// dngos po ma spangs ye shes che// chos dbyings klong na bde bar gnas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshes
127b3(rgyud): pathur pa dpal gyi 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje'i gdugs kyi khyab par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// skye bas bsdus pa'i sems can rnams// 
127b4(rgyud): kun nas kun tu khyab par byed// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdud 'dul bar mdzad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bdud ma
127b5(rgyud): lus pa 'joms pa rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// log ltam lus mun pa'i gzhi// sangs rgyas ye shes sgron me yis// skad cig gcig la sel mdzad pa'i

127b7(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// yan lag bzhi ldan mtshon cha mchog/ de nyid bsung ba blan med// pha rol rgol ba bzlog pa po zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i phyag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi la po

128b6(rgyud): dgasung ga byugs kyi bdag po can pa bya chub kyi sems rjo la mchod pa'i sbyin dums mchod ci bya nang tshas das 'di skad ces gsol to// de 'o tsa gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gsang ba bsdus pa den sa

128b8(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag pos dang zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par mkhyen cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshigs 'dus pa chen po de dag gi sems kyi kun du rtog pa yang thugs kyis

129a2(rgyud): don da srung bar gyur pa mchod pa gsal ba las dbang pos dngos por dmigs pa zol pa dang dza pa'o// gal nyis pa ny-id dam pa'i rabazhin du gyur na de stan dang dgasams nyid yin pas rnam pas

129b7(rgyud): thugs ye shes// rdo rje gsum du gsang ba nyid// gsang ba bsam gyis mi khya pa// 'gro kun de gshegs rang bzhin can// lus ni snga rtogs mi bzad pas// sku yi gsang ba bsam mi khyab// du ma'i gzugs
129b8(rgyud): smon par byed// 'gros ces la ma dang 'a ldad pas// ngag ge brjod pa 'tshal mas pa// gsung gigasang ba bsam sa kyang// smre byangs so so skad du sgrogs// sems cad sangs rgyas snying po cad/ 
130a1(rgyud): nadan rtog dpag med pas// thugs kyigasang ba bsam mi byug// sems can su gsung dbyer med pas// lus ngag yid gsum mi phyed pa// rdo rje gsum du rtag gnas pas/ 
130a2(rgyud): kyi rgyal ba'i ye shes smra// dbyer med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// gsang ba bsam kyis mi khyab pa brjod du med pa rdo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshe// kun tu bzang pos

130b1(rgyud): sha// khyed cho ma dus su da// migs gnas pa rnas pa yis// u zhes rabadug dri nyi// dran do tshogs bzlas par bang// dag sa ga tu nyi// nab nir ba gnas pa// mishes kun gyis bya sa

130b7(rgyud): nye 'bru gcig ste// de ba spyod brgyad brgya'o//  ni rnam pa du nyis // de sha mag song ste/ sbyi sdom pa nyin ga ga gcig na/  na ba ni yis// pizag gnyis da // / rgya
130b8(rgyud): gyu yis// khyo dzu cu nyis y-i// phyag sa chu sa ni yo// dedas rgyas ri /  ni dzad //  la//  nyi mas/ 
131a1(rgyud): pa'ang dang mnyam nga la// dab dang drag pa'i las la shis// rlung gi ris pa de dag kyang // lugs 'byung dang ni lugs bkren pa// da bud du ni tu ba dang // mdang bur mu dang // rang thog tu ni rang rgyu dang / 
131a2(rgyud): yog na/ ma tha snar gyung / di dag tu byung nga/  gyu rgyab s+ho// de dag gas da pa// sani chu tshun dpa min// de zhin gagan
131a3(rgyud): gsal dang bi gsal rnam pa yis// de yi bye brag shes par bya// phrin las bzhi 'i bye brag gis// tra yi rlung ste ngos gzung ba// phyogs dang dbyibs dang bdog rnams dang // ri shung chub phyi nang gis// lha mo bzhi

131a5(rgyud): dgi rnam pa ni// 'byung ba drag po'i rang bzhin yin// 'jug pa dbang dang rgyas pa ste// gnas pa shin tu zhi ba yin// thams cad rlung gis byed pas na// sdig pa me dge ngan song ltung // nga'i dus dog sgo gnyis nas srub//

137a1(rgyud): byung ba// da nyid rtag pa'i drab las// kun byung dag par 'dus byed pas// byang chu chub 'dabs pa'o nas gsungs so// gsang ba'i rgyal po bcom ldan gyis// de nyid byang chub sems//

137a7(rgyud): phul lo spong badzo zhes bya ba'i ting 'joms snyoms par zhugs te bya chub kyi sems da gsungs so// thabs dang pasam pa gang gung zhis// lus 'di spyod pas srur bas na// sems ni ting 'dzin gyis te// byang
137a8(rgyud): chu 'chu ni bstan pa'i zhes gsung lo// dengs de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor me togs sa rgyas sems da kyi 'i kyi ma rnam dri rjes bya 'i ting dzin pa khrims pa zugs kyang chub kyis
137b1(rgyud): 'dag sus so// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab pa yi// khasam gyis ma kyab ri shes su// rang gtad mas ca dad med// byang chubacu 'di bstan pa tshogs gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi blo gas sangs
137b2(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi bkod pa'i chu 'dzin pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// bde gshegs gdung ni rgyas pa gang // thugs rje dag pa'i stobs yin te/ 
137b3(rgyud): / gsos sa gyis ni// byang chub le shes pasnyen pa'i zhes gsus so// des de zhin gshegs pa drung gi shugs lta gshegs pasangs rgyas thams kyi smi pa'i rgyam po byung ba zhes byaba'i ting
137b4(rgyud): dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'gro 'a kun gyi 'khor ba yi// nad sel thabs mchog byams pa'i dpal// brtse sems tshad med srung ba'o// zab pa'i tshur 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// 
137b5(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs pas ma grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ts+li dril sel bar byed pa do zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rang bzhin rtog pa'i// 
137b6(rgyud): dri sa rnams// gzung 'dzin chos kyis bsdus pa'i dngos// dbu pa'i dang du rang dag pas// byang chub tshur 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yeng shes
137b7(rgyud): chu ba'i drabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi chos kyi lam// tshul gcig theg pa gcig nyid// byang chub chen po bla na mad// kyang nub
137b8(rgyud): chub mas ribastan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i tshogs chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzhas med kyi gnas ston 'ardo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te bya ru / 
138a1(rgyud): sems 'di gsungs so// thams cad pa bzhin spong pa'i dbyings// gshemed na bral dus pa byas/ brjod med dpa mang ring ba nyid// byang chub cul 'di bstan pa'o nas gsungs so// de nas
138a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'grib pa med par bsrung ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul na mo che'i zom nas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos dang chos nyid zeng
138a3(rgyud): pa ste// pha rol phyin pa mnyam pa nyid// snang ba med cing rnam pa med// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don gyi blo gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi blo gros snang ba
138a4(rgyud): bkod pa do zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin sa snyoms par zhugs te kyang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'jig rten mun pa sel mdzad cing // sa gsum gsal bar byed pa yi// rlon ni 'od kyis 'cha rabapo// 
138a5(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs med sangs rgyas thams cad kyis pheg rdob pa'i sgra snyar lta bur ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//

138a7(rgyud): lig ston pa rdo rje sangs rgyang thams cad kyi gnas snyan pa do rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa shugs byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis ni// las kyi rim pa tham

138b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i nal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer kun dam snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms pa zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas kyi ba khrag zhig gis// kun du dang

141a1(rgyud): pa zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas kun cigag 'ams gang // snang ma dang rgyal po 'od kyi smras// rten mdzad ye shes snang ba nyid// byang chub tsung 'di bstan pa'o zhes

143a2(rgyud): nams rmi lam gzugs sna gyur// lag cags snang ba la sa 'apar// many+dzu phyir smyen pa // de nyid dri 'di bstan pa 'ogs gsungs so// donam da 'dzin gshegs pa snang ba'i me tog sangs
143a3(rgyud): rgya khams cad kyis mu zlu bu'i ting nge'i la snyoms par zhugs te bya chub kyi sems 'drig sungs so// gcig gis du ma ma khyab pa yi// ngo bo rang stong thag le gcig/ nen med phyag rgya 'byung ba yi/ 
143a4(rgyud): / da du 'tshul 'di ba su pa / sa gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs 'tshogs can 'ad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ci'i gro khye su bur lar ro// zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms pa thugs te byung chub

150a1(rgyud): pa pad pa'i snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ming dang gzugs rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//

150a3(rgyud): thams cad kyis skye mched drug rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// longs spyod gtsang ba'i bsgrubs pa dang // lus dang yan lag dngos po
150a4(rgyud): byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnyog pa med pa'i don sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rnam par shes pa'i chos rnam par dag pa rdo rjen
150a5(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// de bzhin nyid kyi spyod yul ne// bsod nams tshogs ni sbrum ste// ye shes tshogs ni nam mkha' ltar// byang chub tshul 'di bstan
150a6(rgyud): pa'o nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul sde can sangs rgyas thams cad kyis reg 'a rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'ad gsungs so//

150a8(rgyud): rjod yangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshor ba rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sgyu ma lta bu'i sbyor ba yis// 'gro ba kun la snyoms pa gang // brgya
150b1(rgyud): gas byud par bstan pas// rdul byang chub stang pa yin gas gsungasas// de nas da bzhin gshegs pa ma la mnga' bsangs rgyas thams cad kyi srid pa rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal gyi
150b2(rgyud): khya bar dri nas bya'i ting 'dzin pa sgoms pa zhugs te byang chub kyi mas 'ad gsungasaso// rgyal brgya matsam lus pa'o// yo shes spyod pa ma dag pa// nig 'ams 'gyur ba dang snang ba// khyeng chung chub di/ 
150b3(rgyud): bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med dpa la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi len pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin pa snyoms pa shugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//

150b5(rgyud): dga'as sa rgyasathams cad bye dpas pang zhes bya ba ting 'dzin pa sgoms pa bzugs tabang chub kyi sems 'ad gsungs so// phyogs brgyarnam pa thams ca da// gang shegs padabar gshegs pa
