150b7(rgyud): nge 'dzin la snyoms par rags te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du ma byon 'byung ba dang // 'das dang da ltar bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas khams rgyud gcig pa'i ngang // byang chub tshul 'di bstan
150b8(rgyud): logs gsungs po// de nas bzhin gshegs pa khab snang bsangs rgyas thams cid byin she rnam par dag pa di rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'de gsungs sa/ 
151a1(rgyud): chos kun rtog pa zhe ba yi// rab pa dang ni bya che'i bdag/ mdod rgyu dang rtog pa las// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin des gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skyed pa
151a2(rgyud): mtshungs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rte 'brel dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sems can smin par byed pa dang // sangs rgyas zhing skyong phrin
151a3(rgyud): de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'i zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa
151a4(rgyud): thams cad da byang chub sems dpa' dedag thams cad pa 'di skad ces gsungs so// khasam gtan gnas su bad pa'i stan pa ni// gnas nas dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// dmigs tes chog
151a5(rgyud): mchod pa'i sprin 'khregs pa// dang por spro tshogs blo ldan gyis bya zhing // dge ba rnams ni 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir// sdig pa thams cad bshags pa la sogs bya// gang zhig thog med srid pa'i chu klung du//

156b4(rgyud): gas te byang chub kyi sems 'di gdungs so// 'khor 'das gzung 'dzidi snod bcud rnams// thams cad bdag med ngab nyid// stong pa nyid du 'i gnas pa'i// byang dru tshul 'di stan pa'o zhes gsungs so// 
156b5(rgyud): / blod min par yang bsgom pa mim// de nyid kyang chub dem pa'i gni// byang chub sems shes 'ad yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi srung nga gsung shugs kyi gsang dpags papa
156b6(rgyud): ral 'byor cher po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rab tu mi gnas pa'i don bstan pa'i me'u steng ni bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas rgyal ba ji rje 'dzin// 
156b7(rgyud): kyil ngas / mas byam bu rgya tshangs// a yung sa paston par ya nga// de zhi ga shegs pa dgra tsam pa sa dag par rdzogs sa rgyas nam
156b8(rgyud): pa pa mas pa \u0f7f ma shesas so// mams kyi pa las// rnam pa tsu pan ci//  rgya mas
157a1(rgyud): sa pan myebyed pa chenas gsus so// dang sa sa shegs pa drang bsnyen pa'ab sasangs rgyas thams cad kyirnas pa pa rnam par dag pa rjenas bya ba shi nga 'anganam snyams par zugs/ 
157a2(rgyud): mchu gyi ma 'dagasas so//  su //  kyis bskye yos ga/ nyan sa bur byed pa'i/  'di // de ma yin shegs pa
157a3(rgyud): drang posangs rgya thams cad kyi srog rnam par dag parjod zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par shugs rgya chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rnam dag na pa'i tshom nyid de// btags pa'i gnas las rnga ma grol ba/ 
157a4(rgyud): ye shes rgyal bkun khyab pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems can dam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
157a5(rgyud): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// mngal las skyed slong nga dang // rngus te skyes dang dred gsher las// skye ba'i sems can ma dmigs pas// sems can spyod pa mi dmigs so// 
157a6(rgyud): zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi med pa'i ye shes sangs rgyal thams cad kyi sgrib po rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'deg sungs so// 
157a7(rgyud): sogs khams gsum pa'o// sems can rnam shes rapa nyid las// nga 'phrul log shes kyis ba nges pa// dgrol byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mngon pa
157a8(rgyud): sa pa spangs kyasam kyi skye na pa sa pa sa sa ma gas la rnams pa /  cang 'akyis ma dig sus sa// gas
157b1(rgyud): drugs // rdzams ga pa/  ya lags shAng //  tshul dpa nas gsasas// dam gshegs pa lan ma gnas pas sa rgyamathams ca kyi ga
157b2(rgyud): rdu 'di bstan pa yi na sa gsungs so// denas de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor shes rab mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shad bu rnam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nge 'dzi la snyoms par shugs te byang chub
157b3(rgyud): kyisems 'dreg sungs po// kham sa byung dag pa'i sa gnas pas// sa rnams bzod pa go'ayangs mchog/ rtsegacig gyung ring grol bas// byang chub dul 'di bstan pa'i nas gsungs sa// de nas de zin da gshegs
157b4(rgyud): pagazibarji chem mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shide las skyes rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas rdo'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyis mas 'di gsungs so// rgyal brgya mtsho'i skug sung thugs// dag pa'i/ 
157b5(rgyud): sheshe bdag med pa// gti med mnyam pa nas rgyal bas// khyong nub tshul 'de bstan pa' nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa khyen pa sangs rgya thams cad kyi byed pa po rnam par dag pa rdo rje nas byu ba'i/ 
157b6(rgyud): titi nge 'dzin la rnams pa krugs / te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungasas// thos pas mi bskam pa'i yul yin ning // gsang pa'i shes rabar ma gras ni// log la phung po gcod par byed// ye shes tshul 'di bstan bcoM nas
157b7(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'ajam dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byed pa po rnam par dag brda rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'jig su
158a1(rgyud): so// skyed khrag bla me gnas// yang dag ye shes rnam bral ba pa// ga med dul nan pa las// byang nub tshul ba bstan pa 'o nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chags meng sa
158a2(rgyud): ngas rgya khams cad kyi tshor ba po rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs / byang chub kyis sas 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod mu ma ni// dbazhin nyid la legs gnas pas// snga tshogs can
158a3(rgyud): spyod mi dmigs te// de nyid ye shes chen por bstan zhes gsungs so// da nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bos byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa pa rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 
158a4(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ji ltar 'dod parang grol du// sbru la mdung lta bur bcings las 'da'// de nyid ye shes tshul bstan pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
158a5(rgyud): tsu bo me shes mthong ba ba rnam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa dashugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// stobs ldan skyes bu mchog gis ni// gang du rgyal gyi rten
158a6(rgyud): 'thong bas// shugs kyis 'gro ba mda' bzhin no// ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'i nas dasungs so// de nas dpazhin gshegs pa mthun la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spang ba po rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas thams ca
158a7(rgyud): gnas kyi ting 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du spong bsar zhugs shing // rang bzhin dag pa'i ngas nyid// yongs du shes na nam grol gyis// de nyid tshul 'di bstan

158b1(rgyud): pa' pa'i gnas las lhag pa'i spobs// sang gsum cas byed pal ldan pas// ye shes car bab paskon pa pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan par nas gsungs so// denas dbazhin gshegs pa dang su
158b2(rgyud): chang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phrin las sna tshogs ston pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gsang ba'i ye shes bsam me khyab// nam mkha' gzugs pu yangs
158b3(rgyud): zhugs pa// 'dus pa bla med gyes par rol// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal sku'i ting nge 'dzin rdo rje rigs pa la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sem pa 'di/ 
158b4(rgyud): gsungs so// bco ldan 'jig rten mgon pa ye// gtsug tor chad med gzhal med pa// nam ma'i ba gnas kyi spyod yul te// de nyid gsang ba ba sbyin pa gas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'daba'ang po sangs rgyas
158b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// yan lag drug cu'i dbyangs kyis ni// yid 'phrog dpag med rdo rje'i gsung // sems can sna tshogs der ston pa// 
158b6(rgyud): bsam kyis mi bya baspyod yul lo nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pas byin pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kyi gsang ba gnas rdo rjerje gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs bye/ 
158b7(rgyud): chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sems kyi gsang ba dag pa ste// sems kyi las ni yongs dag pas// sems can khams dang 'thud par 'jug/ bsam gyis mi khyab bstan pa'o nas gsungs so// de da
158b8(rgyud): gas pa 'dre pos// thub pa don gyi ye shes can// su ba zhi ma shes rab rdzogs pa'i// de bzhin nyid 'di gsung bar mdzad// gang dugasang ba las kyang ches gsang na'i gas sa chen pa 'di 'dzina'i
159a1(rgyud): 'byor gyi bang phyag du ma 'byung ba rnams ni ye shes dgyes pa chen pos khyab cing gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob la// des chos thams cad yongs su
159a2(rgyud): lags sa gas pa byed do//  ldan nga/ laHswA/ gajug /  sun da/ na /  gas su mas
159a3(rgyud): kyang yang dag par chos 'di la bsrung ba'i phyir de 'dzin pa dag la mchod cing rten par byed do// 'di ni kun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'byung gnas so// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi 'byung gnas so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnam
159a4(rgyud): kyi 'byung gnas so// dgra bcom pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas so// 'phags par nga rgyal ba la gnas pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas so// byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyir mi
159a5(rgyud): ldog pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin par rig par bya'o// rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po thams cad kyi 'byung gnas bla na med par rig par bya'o// dpel rdo rje 'dzin pa
159a6(rgyud): chen po dkyil 'kho sems cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa yang 'di las byung bar rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ni gsang ba chen po ye shes kun tu 'byung ba'i gni gcig par gnas pa nyid do// de bzhin
159a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las gsang ba yongs su mi zad pa'i 'byung gnas su bstan pa

159b1(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs te thog par byung ba dang / bar du ltar gyid kyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la gnas pa 'don dpa/ tha mar phyi ma'i dus na nges par 'byung ba'i gsang chen nges par 'a'o ba'i tshul gyi rnam grangs du mang yis pa
159b2(rgyud): par bya yis/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i gnas dang dus dang chos kyi gas pa 'dzin pa du ma 'byung ba nges par zung cig/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshe
159b3(rgyud): pa'i gsungs rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon 'byung ba/ de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu srog gcod brtson par 'gyur// bskal pa drug 'dzin zhes bya ba// sangs rgyas zla ba mi 'khrugs pas// thams
159b4(rgyud): lnga can bya // srog na da pal ba mams pa ma// dam chos dgongs sha pa la// slab dpo chos kyi lakhor yodang// dge slong dag pog tum nas pa// de bzhin rnas smad pas// nag po cigar
159b5(rgyud): rlung ma nyi shu'i tshogs bcas pas// thams cad dmyal ba'i srungs mar skyes// de ltar rdo rje can gzigs te// sangs rgyas gar ma khan gar mdzadra pas// mi bstod rdo rje can gyis ni// ne snang rigs can 'dul ba
159b6(rgyud): mdzad// srog chags gas da bar kyis shes pa/ khams gsum sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du// 'khor ba'i rnam rtog pas dan ni// de ni mi bskyod zhing du skye// rdo n+dan gyi sdom las// zhe sdang rigs nyid ma tshig mi
159b7(rgyud): 'das pa'i dus du spyod byung ba'i// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa sa// de zhin gshegs pa'i gsung ste// gro ba'i tshul ni seMn zung la// de ci sems can thams 'de ni// rnam par shes pa gti mug pa

160a1(rgyud): gzhan tano brog 'od par 'gyur// de dag ldam po'i dgongs pa la//  ba 'od le dgeg pa yi// dge slong bzod pa can zhes pas// de bzhin sgra ru ngam spyad pas// drag po mun pa car zhes
160a2(rgyud): chu ma \u0f7f du chags bcas pas// khams cad du kro' gnas su skyes// lta ro can ga rigs te// sangs rgyas gar ma ban gar mang pas// sangs rgyas ji 'dzin gyis ni// gti mug rigs
160a3(rgyud): bar mdzad// khyod kyis ma byin long zhes pa// chos rnams rmi lam lta bu las// 'phags pa'i nor rnams blangs nas ni// stug po bkod pa'i ning du skye// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sdom pa las// gti mug rig
160a4(rgyud): dam cig yin// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa'i gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rabal// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de ci sems can thams cad ni// shin tu gsem la bre pa
160a5(rgyud): tshangs spyod la 'jug par 'gyur// bskal pa bcud ldan zhes bya la// pad mo 'od 'phro mi bzad zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni// thams cad 'dod chags spyod gyur la// log par shing tu g.yem par spyong
160a6(rgyud): 'dod chags kyi nimar rdzob ces// de ltar dgongs te gsungs pa la// slob dpon pad mo dpa' zhes pas// dge slong rgyal ba mchog ces la// rjes su bstan dang gdams pa las// skye ba de'i 'og tu ni// drag byed mtha
160a7(rgyud): gnas pa ni// rlung ma nyi shu'i tshogs bcas pa// thams cad yi dgas gnas su skyes// de ltar rdo rje can gzigs te// sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzad pas// chos 'dzin pa yi gsung rdo rjes// 'dod chags mi
160a8(rgyud): can 'dul bar mdzas// gzhan kyi bud med yod ces pa// song rnams mig 'phrul mardungs pa la// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo rnams// ye shes bde bar rtsol par bya// shes rab bud med spyad na ni// bde ba cang
160b1(rgyud): rnam spyos pa las// 'di shes rtson yis// 'das pa'i sas 'o sla gshe/ bdag nyid rje brtag pa sa// da'adi gshegs pa'i gsung 'bas// bcwama'i chuman rungag/ 
160b2(rgyud): / zhes ma /  das / nas pa ched pa sa// nig shegs ma stan pa// zin pa pa shes sa
160b3(rgyud): rdzun tshig gis grol zhes// rgyal bas dgongs te bstan pa la// rlob dpon rta mchog ces bya bas// dge bsnyen drab zhes byal// gsung rab doran rjes bstan pa las// shin tu 'khrul pas gnas par 'gyur// ji lazhin s+tha
160b4(rgyud): myed papa// drab byed 'khrul pa can shes pa// rung nyi shu tshig sa dang bcas// thams ca da pang sbyar bdud sa// gzhan 'grus dab byed gnas su skyes// de ltang rje nag legs te// sangs rgyas gams bdag ma bas
160b5(rgyud): / don meg pa'i phri las kyis// phrag dog rigs can 'dul bar mdzad// khyod kyis brdzur du smros shes pa// chos dmas dri ba'i grong khyer las// thams dang rdud pa spu ba'i tshig/ sbrum lta bur bsgrag pa mas kyang // kun rdzob s+ho
160b6(rgyud): re gnas bstan pa// 'brugs can gyi zhing du 'gro// las kyi rigs kyi sdom pa las// phrag dag rdo rje'i dam tshig bstan// 'das pa'i dus nga sngoran byung ba'i// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs rapa la

161a1(rgyud): da gas pas// dge slong bya ba can nas la// bka mi dgongs pa bstan pa las// gsang ba'i 'dod pa rnam zhus pas// zag byed 'jungs pa can zhes pa// rlung ma nyi shu'i tshogs bcam pa/ 
161a2(rgyud): mas cad ma ldan po gnas/ yul la gnas par skyes// de lta do/  dag zigs te// sas rgyas na khadag yang dbapa// yo ta can don thobs// rgyal rigs pa 'dul bar mangs/ 
161a3(rgyud): byab chos ni 'ded masong bas// 'khrul pa'i spyod pa pa log pa ste// rdul ba'i chos rnams smras pa yis// ye shes po 'gyur zhes pa la// ngom por 'dzid pa skrag byed pa'o// yang dag kun rdzobatshom nyid kyis/ 
161a4(rgyud): rang bzhin med par bstan pa yis// de dag spyod pa don ldan pa// rdul dang bral ba'i shing du 'gro// rin chen rigs kyi sdom pa yin// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
161a5(rgyud): gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i rdul ni sngon byung ba// de tshesems can thams cad de// dug lngar rtog pa rgyas par 'gyur// bskal brgyan bzangs zhes byal// bde gshegs dpal ldan gyi med pa// ye shes bzang po'i bstan
161a6(rgyud): ba la// thams cad nyon mongs la spyod pa// dug lnga'i rtog pa rags par gyur// nyoran mongs ma spangs 'tshang rgya zhes// rgyal bas dgongs te gsungs pa la// slob dpon kun tu bzang po yis// dge slong grol ba'i rgyal
161a7(rgyud): mtshan shes// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ma rabal// log par gyud pa'i rnam smin gyis// sgra sgrogs bla can zhes bya ba// rlung ma ti nu'i chogs dang bcam// mi logasas su srin por skyes// mang ga pu
161a8(rgyud): po skur// de ltar rdo rje can gzigs te// sangs rgyas gang mkhar gar mdzad pas// gsang cir rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// dug lnga'i rang zhin gyis bsdus brtul// nyon mongs ma spangs las 'gyur zhes// chags
161b1(rgyud): sdang rang bzhin shes nas kyang // duka gsum ye shes gyur pa ni// gsang ba rdo rje theg pa'i lam// rdo rje sems dpa' zhing du ste// bla na med pa'i sdom pa las// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig yin// dug lnga rtog pa gdul ba na/ 
161b2(rgyud): ne sdang cam pa khyab 'jug dang // gti mug can sa tshangs pa dang // 'dod chags dbang phyug chen po dang // phrag dog dga' rab dbang phyug dang // nga rgyal can nebargya byin gyis// rigs dang 'thun pa'i char bsgyur nas// sems
161b3(rgyud): can log pa'i lam du bcud// rang gi spyod yul mi 'da'i phyir// de la bar chad sna tshogs pas// bdud kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par sprul// de ltar rdo rje can gzigs te// sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzad pas// lha rnams
161b4(rgyud): gdul bar ba nas ni// gsang ba'i ye shes smon par byed// de ltar gdul bye gang dang gang gi don du dgongs te gsungs pa rnam par ngas pathun mong ma yid pa'i gsang pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin btu gsang banges pa'o// 
161b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ gnas phun sum tshogs pa ni gsang ba mchog tu mi 'gyur ba rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga zhes bya ba dzam bu'i gling grug pum chos kyi 'byung
161b6(rgyud): gnas so// 'di na mi mjed 'jig rten gyi 'ang khams kyi snying por gyur pa'o// dus phun sum tshogs pa ste/ dus rnams kyi snyigs sa la bab pa thog sa dang bus dang tham rnam par dag pa ste/ gsang ba bsam kyis me khyen
161b7(rgyud): pa'i tshul lo// 'chang pa po ni ston pa ste/ 'di dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa rigs thams cad kyi bdag po nyid phun sum tshogs pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin rnam pa thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pas 'jug pa mnyam
161b8(rgyud): nyid rab tu mi gnas pa'i ngo bor gyur pa nyid do// de dag kyang chos nyid dang gnyis su med pa nam mkha'i khams kyis khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul rab tu mi zad pa'i don la rab tu dgongs padag go// de nas
162a1(rgyud): gan rnab thathams cad mkhyen pa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bshad par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal le shes sems dpa' ni rgyal po bas gtsang mar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi
162a2(rgyud): dang gug byangs ni lham can ma spu 'phrul nas bya bar gyur to// skam dpal gyi lu su chud man grags 'dzin ma gyur te// ji rjesems dpa' ni skrag can 'dzin to// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa kun tu gcod pa ni shA
162a3(rgyud): bur gyur pa'o// kun tu babang zin gnas brtan kun dga' bor gyu to// kun tu bzang po rnam par rol pa'i sku canini mau dgal kyi bu gyur pa'o// lha dbang po ba rgya byin ni gnas brten la ston // tshangs
162a4(rgyud): napo ni byang chub sems dpa' snang ba'i 'od du gyur pa'o// dpal rnam par snang mdzad chen po ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba shAkya thub pa nyid du gyur to// de ltar mdo dang thun mong du spong
162a5(rgyud): gsungs so// 'dir ni gsang bathun mong ma yin pa'i don du ma sor phye nas gsal bar bshad par bya'o// 'di lta sted ltar phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dkyil 'khor gsangs
162a6(rgyud): 'don du bstan te/ gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rngon phyag na rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin pa can gyi kun dga' bor bru ha// kun tu bzang can mod dgal kyi bu'o// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ni kun shes kau bya gyur
162a7(rgyud): rna gros mi bad pa ni shA 'i bu'o// spyan a gzigs dbang phyug ni 'ad srung ngo // sa'i spang pa nas 'gags pa'o// byams pa ni nye ba'i gtsa // na' mkha'i snying po ni gnas brtan cen parab byor gyu te/ 
162a8(rgyud): zugs rdo rje ma ni skye dgu'i bdag mo'o// nardo rje ma ni dbyangs ldan ma'o// dri rdo rje ma ni rigs ldan pa'o// ro rdo rje ni dga' mo dang dga' stobs ma'o// reg bya rdo rje nis 'tsho mar gyur to// sangs rgyas spyan ma ni sa'i skam
162b1(rgyud): so// dA la bI da bod mchog mar gyur te// gos dkar man pad ma grags mchog ma'o// sgrol man sna tshogs 'od 'chang mar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa ni sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa sman mi 'drim med/ 
162b2(rgyud): d+hi 'a du gyur to// rnam par snang byed de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas stobs ma chags ga zugs rjes 'od kyi snang ba mi zad par gyur to// 'odod pag tu med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i 'od 'bri mi zad ba gyur to// 
162b3(rgyud): gdad mi 'grub pa ni bzhin gshegs pa spu'i rgyal pa gas bya bar gyur to// rin chen thung brdzun ni de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mtshon dang la na can pod phro ba zhes bya bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das dang la rnga rje sems dpa' ni
162b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa da la ye shes kun tu yang po zhes bya ba chu he/ de ni gzhan yin par mi blta snyed lta nga nyid yin no// gzhan yang rabatu bshad par bya ste/ khrina'i rgyal po bcu rnams pa 'dis ste/ dpal gshin mtha
162b5(rgyud): dede bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas su gyur/ bgegs mthar byed ni de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya bar gyur/ dpal rtam grin ni rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya bar gyur/ shes rab mthar byed ni
162b6(rgyud): rgyas mya ngan med pa'i di la zhes bya bar gyur/ khro mo chen mo ban pad modam pa'i dpal zhes byab gyur/ chum da pa'i rnam pan sangs rgyas nyim ni dkyil 'khor snang ba'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur/ dbyug sdod pa dir/ 
162b7(rgyud): di gshegs pa gdugs dam par gyur/ khro ba stobs po chen de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur/ khro bo gnod mdzes rgyal po ni sangs rgyas pad mod ma pa'i dpal zhe
162b8(rgyud): sra thogatsug to ma kho pos spa bani de bzhi na gshegs pa dga' bdam pa'i dbal zhes bya ba gyur to// bskal pa babang po'i sangs rgyas stong 'jig rten du mngon par blang la de ste ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa
163a1(rgyud): rnams kyi thugasung thugs kyi phyag rgya dang gas pa 'dzid pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ci snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rda chos dang / 
163a2(rgyud): ba sems pa'i sems dpa tshan ba snga pa sa/  thug sa kyi she migs dzi gas da kyi sa pa da /  ga shegs pa
163a3(rgyud): brgyad dang bcas pa las mngon par byang chub pa 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ngo ma nyid tu gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs
163a4(rgyud): bdag nyid du gcig pa'i sku'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs pa ta la'i shing gi drung du'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'in chen ga drug to can ni mya ngan med pa' shing gi du ru'o// de bzhin ga she kra mar meche ni 'i
163a5(rgyud): bzhi drung du'o// de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel ni b+ha ta pa'i shing gi drung ngu'o// de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub ri ka ra tsa pa'i shing gi drung ru'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bsrung ni bar gti pa'i shing gi drung ngul/ 
163a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ni par ti ba'i shing gi drung du'o// de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa ni rAg kes ra'i shing gi drung ru'o// de ltar de 'din gshegs pa rnams kyis dus gsum du 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad
163a7(rgyud): da kyil 'khor du phyogs brgyad byin pa khams na 'azhugs shing yangs su snang bar mdzad de/ gdu rje thug pa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis yongs su gzigs shing byin gyis rlob
163a8(rgyud): par ston pa yi ni sa gsungs so// de nas yang bzhi da gshegs pathams cad kyigs pa'i bdag po mede dzin ga shegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' phrul pa/ 'di de ni gshes
163b1(rgyud): sa gyung ba'i gnas nga tra ting nge 'dzis cang du chud par byas shig/ de lang gang na/ gdung bzhin gshegs pa rnams ting nge 'dzin gang nga byon pa ma 'jug par mdzad pa dang ga nas gshegs pa dang / gang du gnas
163b2(rgyud): da kyis rnam pa gsul pa'i mngang ba shes par gyis shig/  ma bstan pas// sas rgyas 'jig tad kyang bdag/ mngon par byang chub gnas nyi pas// kyang da jug par gnas pa dang/ 
163b3(rgyud): las mdzad pa du mar ston// dga' ldan gnas nas 'pho tshul dang // lhums su 'jug dang sru bltams dang // gzhon nu rol dang khab gnas dang // skyed mos tshal byon gnas gzigs te// mngon par 'byung dang gshegs mdzad
163b4(rgyud): gyu ma dpa shes // byang chu bsnyi po gshegs pa dang // dud bcim mngod pa kyang chub// ma khyil pa ma da//  sa ca bya pa/ yon sasun ming bam bas / 
163b5(rgyud): rab tu dge 'a mtshan ma med// 'amar the tshos sel ba yi// byang chub sems kyi spyod yul dang // rnam par nges pa phra bar bstan// sangs rgyas ma lus 'di dag nyid// ni bar 'jug pa ston pa dag/ bran med pa'i spyod yul lo// sku
163b6(rgyud): gsung thugs nyid rdo rje yis// sems kyi rol mo las byung ba/ spu 'phrul chen po ston pa yis// mdzad pa phyinang gsang ba ste// dga' ldan 'o brang ras lus kyi// bde chen skye bor gnas pa nyid// dam pa'i tshigs byed gzhon
163b7(rgyud): gnas// jirje sngags kyi de nyid las// ting 'dzin mnyam par gyur ba ni// ji ltar skar ma dang 'pho bltar/ byang chub sems kyi grang pon// mche ba drug lda byas// snying rjes chags pa'i sems kyis ni// rtsa yi bzang
163b8(rgyud): bsrung du// byang chub sems ni zhugs par gyur// dang gnas snrums su 'jugs nyid// rirje 'dzin pa bdag nyid lu// thabs dang shes rab nus thob pas// galas sa nas ni khrung gyur ba// bltas pa'i yang da pa des
164a1(rgyud): 'dzan// 'da' rus pa 'asam ba las// nal chags nyi shu bachud pa// padam lags bzad pa dag/ rnam par bya dus san so// mu sems 'dra gagang gyur pa// labs kyang / 
164a2(rgyud): 'das bskyed pa ni// bram rimathanas 'a nga srong gis// sung bstan brjod pa de min no// de ltang mnyam par bzhag pa las// rjes thol yul la spyod tu sa// spros bcas spros med rnam dbyebs// 'dod pa 'tshan
164a3(rgyud): tan rnam lnga la// gzhon nu bol pa'i spyod pa yis// lus kyi gnas sogs kun tu rol// dbyangs dang gsal byed gyur pa yi// rtsa yi 'khor lo'i yi ge rnams// pho mo ma ning dbye ba yis// yi ge'i gnas las mkhas
164a4(rgyud): pa yin// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le dag/ 'bo tshul grangs dang dbye baspu yi// rgyu rdul spobasdu gang gyur pa// rtsis kyi gnas la mkhas pa'o// sa chu se rlung nus pa yi// glang po brgyal dang 'gegs pa dang // pags pa
164a5(rgyud): rim pa bdun gyur la// shing sogs rim par gnas gyur pa// rlung gi gzhul me mda' yis// 'phang ba chu rgyun 'bab pa yin// dang por shes rab las thob pa// byang sems dmar po gsang gnas su// dbang
164a6(rgyud): byas bcud gos ba gnas shing // 'byung bzhi'i rlung rnams btsun pa'o// srin mtshams kyi nim dud pa der// thag le phra ba brtan pa ni// steng du ni blag pas zin pa// skrag can 'dzin du brjod pa yin// lte ba sprul pa
164a7(rgyud): 'khar mo yi// phyogs bzhir skyed tshal gzigs pa ni// zag bcas rtsa rlung thig le yis// srid pa bskyed pa gang yin pa'o// zag med pa da batha pa 'dod pas// de'i tshul 'jug pa ni// rlung gi rta dang bcas
164a8(rgyud): pa yis// dbu ma'i mthongs las byung nas ni// byang chub sems kyi mchod rten dag/ 'khor ba'i drab bcad nas ni// chu bo 'dus pa'i 'gram nyid du// ye shes mngon du byed 'dod pas// bcan thabs su ni
164b1(rgyud): shogapa nga // lus dag gsungs pa byams// brag dang // su spang // nyamangs gnas ma// sngagacig 'a gnas /  ngagasas na rlon pas/ 'a mal du thugs/ 
164b2(rgyud): ba yin// gang ba byang chub shing drung du// rdo rje skyib krung gyur pa yis// rtags dang yon tan 'thob byed cing // snang ba gsum ni thim pa'i tshe// zlab nyi ma mun pa yi// rtog pa'i dra ba gang yin pa// bdud 'atul ba ni srod kyi
164b3(rgyud): drug/ rnam tog ye shes kyim gyur pa// nye bar thob pa'i skad cigs// skad cig khyad par lnga pa la// thongs skye shAr ba'i dus// nam mkha' sprin med lta bu yi// nyams kyi shes pa 'od gsam pa// khyad par mad
164b4(rgyud): par byang chub pa'i// yang dag sangs rgyas thob pa yin// 'khor lo bzhi ni bdud bcom pas// bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod pa yin// mgrin pa zag bcas rlung 'gags pas// klu 'i gnas su rmugs pa ste/ 
164b5(rgyud): tshangs pa spyi bo nas 'pho zhing // sa rlung thig le dang bcas pas// gser gyi 'khor lo ldan pa yin// thams cad dbang du gyur pa ni// khams gsum po ni ma lus dang // 'dro drug sems can thams cad kyis// tshangs
164b6(rgyud): pa lha dang bcas pa dang // srin sde brgyad ma lus pas// chos kyi 'khor po bskul ba yin// sprul rgyu'i tshal ni mdzod du ste// tshong dpor gnyis ni rtsa gnyis te// lamagyur stobs dang ldan pa'o// lnga sde bzang po
164b7(rgyud): zhes bya ba// dug lnga bskyed pa'i rtsa dang rlung // bden bzhi chos kyi 'khor lo ni// sprul pa'i gnas su gsungs pa ste// bA ra na sa zhes bya yi// thog mar chags pa'i gnas yin no// 
164b8(rgyud): stegs gdul ba'i don du ste// dpa' zhing kun brjod du 'phrul dang / byi gyis rlob pa'i cha 'phrul gyis// log par ltung 'joms par mdzad// mtshan ma med pa'i chos gsungs pa// snying ga'i gnas su bstan pa // 
165a1(rgyud): rgyal po'i khab dang bya rgod spungs// gnas kyi khyad par theg pa che// khyad par 'khor rnams bstan pa la// zab cing rgya che bstan pa yin// spyi bo mgrin pa smin mtshams dang // gsang ba la sog/ 
165a2(rgyud): thams cad du// don dpa ngo'i nyid kyi chos// thams cad de bzhin nyid don gsungs// gnas gzhan rnams su thub pa yis// chos rnams thams cad gsungs pa yin// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yis// 
165a3(rgyud): mdzad pa sna tshogs gang bstan nas// srog col de bzhin nyid khyim zhing // thams cad mngon du gyur pa yi// sna bzhi ngo bo nyid skur thim// bde chen dang byung dri med pa'i// dag pa'i zhing khams rab mi gnas/ 
165a4(rgyud): tog med mi shes nam mkha' bzhin// gang du mi mje 'jig rten gyi// 'dod khams dbang phyug gnas 'dir ni// de bzhin gshegs pa sngo shang ba// dpag med bskal pa 'das pa'i dus// thu pa chen po mar ma
165a5(rgyud): mdzad// nga ni bram zer gyur ba yis// bems bskyed bus che bsnyen pan// mngon par lung bsnyen thob par 'gyur// de nyid 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i tshe'ang // gsang ba'i gnas 'di ma gsungs shing // de yi gong mos snya
165a6(rgyud): 'das tshe// sang ba rgyas thu chen mchog nyid dang // rin chen gag tor can dang ni// rnam par ni rigs la sogs pas kyang // gsang chen 'di ni ma gsung shing // log par dang sel gser thu ba dang / rgyal
165a7(rgyud): bsrung bdag gis kyang // gsang ba 'di dgam gsungs te// de nyid ston pa'i nan du // gas chen gnas kyi don 'di dag/ dadus sems canathams cad la// gang du mngon par spyod pa dang // thun med bslab pa'i
165a8(rgyud): rdutshul bstan cing // 'di nyid gsungs par ma gyur to// gang du ma 'ongs dus na yang // byams pa la sogs rgyal ba yi// bskal bzang sangs rgyas du mas kyang // 'di dag lha mi'i mngon sum du// gsang ba ston
165b1(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro// dak+ta phyogs bdu na // gdug sems na // snyigs par gyur ba'i dus rgyan na do spong pa sa// dus la bab par shes pa bya// 'di ni ra gyur/ 
165b2(rgyud): yang // gle 'di nyid las gzhan du min// gang yang dog min nipa 'ams ni// ye shes snang brgyas pa'i phyir// rdo rje 'chang chen bcom ldan gyis// rgyun ma 'chad cing khyab pa dang // rtag cing 'gyur med mchog gis me/ 
165b3(rgyud): gang yang 'das dang ma byon dang // da ltar 'byung 'am lus pa// gsang chen mchog 'dis ma bgrod par// byang chub thob par mi 'gyur te// 'di ni mthar thug gnas yin pas// de las gzhan/ 
165b4(rgyud): ba'i spyod kya ni// 'di ci gnas pa'i dzinapas// skad cag gis ni sangs rgyas 'thob// de nyid dkyil 'khor ma mamatho'i rim// phyogs 'tshams brgyad du snang ba yi// d+ham tho gnas brgyad sprul pal/ 
165b5(rgyud): / phyinang gnas kyi dbye ba yis// phyogs sbyong ba dang zhing skyong la// mdzad pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang // grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya ste// snying po ye shes phyag rgya dang // phrin las rol pa'i phyag rgya'o// 'jig rten pa rnams
165b6(rgyud): 'dul ba'i phyir// dpal rje 'dzi pa chen pos ye shes can tu rgyas pas phyag rgyas rtags mtshan pas bstan shes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// mdzad pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas gad ba byed// nib don du phyogs myong ra/ 
165b7(rgyud): yi rtags ni 'khor dang bcas// yum dang rin chen rgyan gyis smras// thub pa'i rtags kyi rgyas gang 'phyir// ning spyong brgyad du rba can tshul// ljon pa'i shing pa brten ras gnas// zhi ba'i tshul gyis rgyas gdab phyir/ 
165b8(rgyud): nan pa'i dong na // thamasas sug rgyas byas ga bye/ 2 'dzis pa rnam yangs//  ku to/ gas pa dang/ co pa khring ma the // ba chu dzi mangs
166a1(rgyud): sgyo ba sa shes phyag rgyams// rgyas gad nga phyir ni gnas yas gyi// phyogs mtshams brgyan du bkod pa yin// ngol pa'i phyag rgya spyod pa'i phyir// du srod brgyad du gnas pa ste// lha dbang bcas dang // 
166a2(rgyud): layod// klung mnod ldan tshogs rnams dang // 'byung ba'i tshogs dang drang srong dang // sha ba rnams dang mi/ 'dzin tshogs// sde can brgyad kyis bskor ba yin// ning spyod drag po'i las byed kyir// phyagan mi sdug zod
166a3(rgyud): pa bsnams// shin tu 'jigs pa gtum pa'i gzugs// shing brgyad nang nas lus phyed nyon// lus kyi phyag rgya sbas pa yin// de yang sa so'i yum dag ni// shing gi rtsa bar gnas pa ste// zhal bas stabs pa'i tshul du/ 
166a4(rgyud): gnas// glang po ma ga su srin dang // ta mchog phyogs gcig gnas pa yin// dang ro langs ri dgas dang // lha mchog pani mtshams su gnas// steng phyogs tshangs pa dang bzhon// rog phyogasas bdag du sA pa/ 
166a5(rgyud): lha dang lha mor mtshungs pa ste// 'di dag rang bzhin gyis gnas yin// chags pa dang khro ba'i skus 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas
166a6(rgyud): ma po po 'dzin// de nyid kun tu spru la mdzad pas// rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs sbas nas// ni bai ri sgras ni mi 'dul ba'i// sems can gadrug pa gdul ba'i phyir// ma reg ye shes byang chub sems// 
166a7(rgyud): wA'i sdu gastan pas// khri ma nis ni rnam par 'arjod// gdu rdzas su 'dzan 'i// rnam par bsgran/ bas na// ska ma na pa de bzhin gshegs// chom nyid mnyam par 'byung ba'o//  gags papa/ 
166a8(rgyud): no// sems can don du bapas ston mdzad// sh+tsa thub pa bcom ldan 'das// bdag nyid chen po'i byin brlabs las// rnga bo che dang gnar dang // chos kyi dang las grags pa dang // sna tshogs po ma'i sku
166b1(rgyud): la ni// gang ni ga dam sa byu ga/ 'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang // byang chubs mas dpa' tshogs kyis kyang // chos kyi 'gro ba ga len dang // dus de btud pa'i chos bstan pa// de snyed pa de gshegs rgyal
166b2(rgyud): byi ba byis par bya// ston pa yin thaMd kyi mthor te// miganas pa po sa dus kyi// do byed ston pa 'byung ba ni// bu med paka mi dgongs padag/ yang dag ngas par batho nas khyab/ da
166b3(rgyud): pa'i chos sgra mis// 'gro ba smin par byed pa ni// de sa pa nyid de bstan pas// bstan bcos shin tu rnam par 'gyur nis gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku nga gsung da thugs kyi gas pags/ 
166b4(rgyud): 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas gsang ba chen po thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o// 
166b5(rgyud): song ma yin pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi brtag pa bzhi pa las rdo rje dpal mchog chen thogs papa'i don gyi rgyal po'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo/ skye bo 'o cher po// 'dod dang thar pa rdo rje 'dzin// me sa
166b6(rgyud): gsang ba bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dngadathugs rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs
166b7(rgyud): pal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig gis gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i ye shes kyi nor bu chen po du ma'i tshogs kyis yang dag
166b8(rgyud): / mchod par byas nas kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mdu du bdar zhing 'dug ste/ gsang chen gyi don la phyogs gcig tu zhugs te yongs su spyod par gyur to// de la 'di rigs
167a1(rgyud): can gyi// su gsum tha med phyag rgya che// dus gsum rgyal 'am lus pa'i// chos rnams 'dus pa'i mchag par te// 'din byed par dus dunang ba// dmachag sa chog tu ga ga can
167a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 
167a3(rgyud): dpal ldan sangs rgyas spus khyab pa// sku mi rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas pa// ji snyed su yi rnam pa yanga'// gsangar tshul 'di bstan pa 'o nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po don grubs
167a4(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gnas// gsung gcig gnas las
167a5(rgyud): med kyi// mos pa byams so sor thos// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sde sangs rgyas thams cad byebasam gtan pa ting nge 'dzin mkhyen pa'i
167a6(rgyud): stobs rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la soms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dge la// ye shes sna tshogs ting 'dzin las// mi 'gyur nam
167a7(rgyud): 'deng bzhugs pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i lha sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mkhyen pa'i
167a8(rgyud): stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du// sems kyi rgyun ni mi 'gag phyir/ 
167b1(rgyud): pa'i/ byang chu 'tshul 'di 'astan can nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gud nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
167b2(rgyud): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te nyung chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// bye ba phrag ni brgya yi bar// thub pa'i nab 'ams bdag ca ni// kun tu bzang po'i spyod las byung // byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes
167b3(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs
167b4(rgyud): gang du rgyu dang 'bras bu yi// snang ba mi 'gag stong pa nyid// de nyid rang bzhin gyis dag brjod// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgya chen snying po sangs rgyas
167b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi thams cad du son pa'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dper na nam mkha'i khams 'di ni// thams cad rjes
167b6(rgyud): su song gyur kyang // sems dpa' mi ldan de bzhin te// byang chub rtul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi gnas ma lus
167b7(rgyud): par babyed pa'i stobs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bang chub kyi sems
167b8(rgyud): ngachung tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ba
168a1(rgyud): 'dzin pa snyams par zhugs te byang dub gyi sems 'ad gsungs so// 'did ni rgyal ba'i sgra nyid kyang // spos pa nga bzhin dad pa'o// rjes 'gro rtog pa med pa nyid// spros
168a2(rgyud): dus pastan patsunas gsus so// nam zhi gsheg sa/ do pams rgyam thams kyi na pa dmas kyan me chub seM ting ga pe rnams pa shugs
168a3(rgyud): kyi sems 'di gsungs so// yongs su dag pa'i snang ba gung // mnyam pa nyid kyi dang las re// spang blang dbrib snan med par grol// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o nazhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
168a4(rgyud): gshegs pa ston pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyam thams da gyi stobs bcu yongs su dag pa ny-i 'dzin pa smos papar thugs tergya chub gyis pas 'dig su lo// chos skus shes rgya pha rol pa/ 
168a5(rgyud): nam mkhar dag pa gang // gzugs sku'i rtog pa mkha' la gnas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brtsegs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
168a6(rgyud): sha'i slad nge zhes bya ba'i ting mdzin pa sgoms phyir zhugs rje byung chub kyisems 'di gsungs so// thogs pa med rdo rjeg/ phalam snar ni phrin las dag/ slob pa bzangs kyis de yul du gyur/ 
168a7(rgyud): snang med rnal 'byor ba yi gnas zhes gsungs so// de nas dben gshegs pa lha mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgra'i/  rdo rje rjes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te byung chub kyise mas

168b1(rgyud): nadag shegs pa par bdag pa pang sasas thams ca rgya sa sma nga rdzanas rgyab ting nga yangs pa rnams par zhugs byang chub byas pas 'di gsungs pa// thams cadas rgyan par bags pas/ 
168b2(rgyud): med ded pa gnyis dag pa// rnam par 'byed pa'i ngo bo nyid// byang chub cupa 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol brnyes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub par
168b3(rgyud): spyad rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzi la snyoms par bugs te byang chub kyi sem pa 'odi gsungs so// rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ba// chos kyi gter dang ldan pa las// rjes su dran pa'i spyan gyis ni// dus gsum
168b4(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug gi gser sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi spyad rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzid pa snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'dra
168b5(rgyud): gsungs so// dus gsum mnyam nyid dam dag pas// dus kyi 'du shes 'jug med pa// skad cig ye shes spyod yul ni// snang ba med pa'i tshul bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshes/ 
168b6(rgyud): bsgrag can sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sum rnam par dag pa rdo rje ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems de gsungs so// gang du gzigs pa'i yul med pas// rno snang btags
168b7(rgyud): la ma grub// de snang gdul bya'i don spyod pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub dka' sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i lam bskur/ 
168b8(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ye shes gzhal du med pa nyid// mi gnas rnam par mi gnas pas// nam mkha' ste bur mi rtog pa// 
169a1(rgyud): du ba stan pa'o nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grub gas pasangs rgyas thams cad kyim 'ad pa rdo rjenas byab tid de 'dzin la snyoms bya thugs
169a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od par sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi gnas pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ye shes zag pa med pa'i dbyings// rang
169a3(rgyud): ngabasam gyis me khyab pa// nam pa kha khams lta rten med pas// dmigs med ye shes tshul bstan pa'i nas gsungs so// de nas gas nga 'a 'dzin pa la// mtshang pa'i gnas kyi don 'di gsungs/

169b7(rgyud): // so shes sul su yang dag bzhugs// ba cu'i rdul 'di bstar pa 'o nas gsungs so// de na sa dbazhin gshegs pa tsas gyi gdugs cad med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ma rje'i rton pa

173b2(rgyud): ti nge 'dzin la sgoms pa zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'dags sa so// bdud dang nag po'i phyogs tshur la// skrag par byed pas cher gcad pa'i// tshe phrul bcu drug bstan pa dang // de nyid byang chub tshul btsun
173b3(rgyud): des gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don la gnas pa'i blo nga'ab sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos so so yang dag par rig pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//

179b5(rgyud): na shes pa ma // phyi sa das pa dag pal// yas// pags 'o// rgya chu tshul stsas nasas drangs so// de pa da ga
180a1(rgyud): thub pa krung bahrIN+Da lA b+h+yo sangs rgyas thams cad kyis nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcom pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems pad gsungs sa/ 
180a2(rgyud): nyon mongs nas tog / gle zung ba// ny-id myi rigs pag chags dpa// rtsa baphral ba sa des patsa me pa'o// byang chu tshul ni bstan pa ngogs gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma
180a3(rgyud): stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phung po'i bdud bcol ba'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sgyu ma lta bu'i rnam pa las// rmi lam tshul
180a4(rgyud): ltar ma 'gags pa// gang du dag pa 'ad med pa kyang nu'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsangs po// den pa de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sbyin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'chi bdag gi bdud bcom pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom
180a5(rgyud): ngar zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rnam par dag pa ye shes sku// 'gro 'ong med cing dbri bsnan med// gang du 'du 'bral med pa'i dor// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ 
180a6(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phan par bzhed pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdud bcom zhing legs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub
180a7(rgyud): kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dpal dang grags dang ye shes dang // dbang phyag dang ni gzugs bzang gis// brtson pagrus phun sa mtshogs pa ste// drag po 'dis ni ldan par gsungs zhes
180a8(rgyud): gsung / de sa de bzhin gshegs pa la ges ldan pa gsas dag pa'i dbyengs rdo rje sangs rgyas sems cad kyi tsha nga bdun la snyems par dkrugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du
180b1(rgyud): kya ma dang na// mal nyam nyidams cag/ bya grub pa dang // rdzaza dad pags pa/ 
180b2(rgyud): la po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gshegs pa dang pyod pa rjes su rtogs pa dang medas rgyas nga 'dzinam snyoms pa zhugs te byang chub kyisems dag
180b3(rgyud): shags shing gang du byon// gang du gnas pa rdo rje dang // zag med dpal ldan de bzhin nyid// byang chub rdul 'di bstan pa'o nas gsungs so// de nas de ban gshegs pa 'od zer kyang bsangs rgyas
180b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi dkar po rnam par dag pa'i sa rnam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du so sor skye bo yi// tha mal mos pas lam
180b5(rgyud): 'jug pa// dge ba'i di na mthang nyan thos lam// byang chub tshul 'di bskrun pa ma zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gsheg pang rnam par mjoms pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting pe'i dzi rigs kyi
180b6(rgyud): sa rnam par dag pa rdo rje la stoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rnam par dkar 'don ldan pas// bdag med pazad pa mnyam pa nyid// chos gang lhag par da par// byang tshul
180b7(rgyud): bstan pa canas gsangs // de nas de bzhi gshegs pa ba na'i snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brgyad pa'i sa rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge je ma snyoms par gags te byang chub kyi lams 'das
180b8(rgyud): // kadu cas kyang na da/ ga ma'i 'bras du ma sa gyur pa// na nyid 'phags pa 'igs pasad she/ blamang chu mad stan pabanas gsungs po// ded pa dang de gshegs pa matag tu tum pa
181a1(rgyud): yangs rgyas thams cad kyis mam ba'i marnam par byed pa dngan du pang dgas dug maso// ga da/ 
181a2(rgyud): skem pa med pa gsapapa// dad pa gnab spyo 'i na pa nas ga ga na
181a3(rgyud): pades rnam par dag pa do nga sangs tshul thams cad kyi ngang 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung sa mo// nga nyid da par byas pa yi// dug med gnas ni za gdas pa// bral ba
181a4(rgyud): lanyal lazhi// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'dod chags dang bral ba'is rnam par dag par rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la
181a5(rgyud): kyi sems 'dag 'angs so// ga du chags med pa shes mtshal// rags bdag pa spangs pa'i dod// dman pa las ni phyir 'ong bas// byang chub rdul 'di bstan pa'i zhes
181a6(rgyud): / bya ba byas pa bstan pa 'dod// byed 'byas pa nga ba tu// tug ma las thas byung chub // de nyid tshul di dun pon sa nasus sa// de zhi gshegs pa na chen
181a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas khams cad theb pang sde rnam par das pa rdo rje ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs byang chub kyi sems 'dig sul so// nyams pa med pa'i tshul khrims las// rnam 'aco/ 
181b1(rgyud): bsas phyeg// dri med dgrab tsamadon thob pa// byang chub rtul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu zla ba can sangs rgyal thams cad kyis 'phags pa nyan thos kyis dag pa
181b2(rgyud): rdordza dzin la snyams par zhugs kyang ma kyi papa gsung gi// bdag me da du ldan ma med pa// skyed bya brag mtshungs med pas// 'bras bu grol bzab pa nyid// byang chubarnam di ba ldan
181b3(rgyud): ba'o zhes gsungs sa// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skag can sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rang sangs rgyas pa'i gnas rnam par dag rda rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems la
181b4(rgyud): gangs so// srid rgya rgyam bsrug/ du ma nang du rdzu 'phrul ba sa// rten pa dam sa spyad par bcas// rang rgyal gnyis pa'i tshul du badz+ra kyil gsungam so// de nam de bzhin gshegasapa
181b5(rgyud): kyi rim sa rgyas thabs cadakyi ma shes ji lta ba mkhyen pa dam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge dzi nam snyams par zhugs te byang chub 'i sems 'di gsungs so// thogs ma khyab par srung can/ 
181b6(rgyud): pa dris dus gas // ma khyen pa'i phyogs thal dag pa ste// byang chub cu pa 'di bstan pa zhes gzungs pa// denas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jis rten sangs rgyam thams cad kyim shes ska
181b7(rgyud): shes sa gzhin na gagags papa ma sa da kyimi gi rnam pa mas mkhyen pa rdo ti ded pa snyo mam pa
182a1(rgyud): byang chub kyisems 'ad gsungams// kun du tug pas ma btags pa// dran pas med sa myed bzug// ra tu ma gnas pa ma rang // dmigs pa med pa
182a2(rgyud): can// gang du dmigs med skye ba med// rten 'bral dag par dbyung ba/ spun grub dang las ma g.yos pa'i// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ 
182a3(rgyud): rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs// sna tshogs mchod cing bstod byas na// ye shes mchog gi gnyen gyis gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa rigs brgya yis// re res brgya phrag
182a4(rgyud): yi bar// de ltar stong phrag brgya dag gis// 'bum du bzlas pa yin par brjod// bdag nyid mi bskyed par byas te// rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ba// sangs rgyas lnga dang yum bzhi dang // se
182a5(rgyud): dpa' drug dang lha mo lnga// khro za'i rgyal po lngas bsdus te// nyi shu ba yi bdag nyid kyis// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje 'bar ba rab bsgoms te// de la spo dang bsdu byas/ 
182a6(rgyud): pa'i// bzlas pa stong phrag te shubs// zhe sdang rdo rje'i bsam gtan bsdus// de slar gzer ma nor bu dang // pad ma ral gri bar du yang // re re re grags kyi don bsgoms pa// gsal rdzo
182a7(rgyud): ba yis// gti mug nga rgyar 'dod chags dang // phrag dog dag pa'i dkyil 'kho ro las// rigs ni bzhi po kun la yang // stong phrag
182a8(rgyud): kluklag shes ga// the zag bcu ni zlas byis pas// bstan pa par sgrub pa sa// bras pagasang sngags rdul bstan pa'o// da ma na ga shegs pa'ams cad kyi su da gas
182b1(rgyud): klas kyogasang 'gas pa 'dus pa ma 'byar tshon ma gnyis su med pa mnyams nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud la sags can thun mong ma mam pa'i rab tu byed pa bstan pa'i ma'u ste lnga pa 'o// de na mang
182b2(rgyud): 'din gshegs pa ni ba'i stoba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rje dzin po cherab tu snang bar byed pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i ting pe tshul snyoms par zhugs te byang chub rje sems 'di gsungs so// rgyal
182b3(rgyud): rtag ta tshas rnamatsha pa 'do no// nga ga mi gnas rnamapa' bzhin/  chub chul de bstan pa'i nas gsungs so// de nas dang nin ga shegs pa ye shes sangs rgyas rnams cad kyi rje
182b4(rgyud): pa'i shing yongs su spyod pa rdo rje'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du mngon par sangs rgyas kyang / 
182b5(rgyud): byang chub 'dul 'di bstan pa 'i nas gsungasas// de na pa de ni na gshegs par dbang po'i rgyal po sangs rgya mams cad kyi rgyan mi 'chad par ye shes 'byung bar rje ting nge 'dzin la rnams pa zhugs te
182b6(rgyud): sems 'di ga sungs so// ye shes mngon par mi gnas pas// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i chos kyi dbyings// rjes 'dro ma tshungs pa tha ma med// byang chu tshul 'di bstan pa 'onas gsungs so// de na pa
182b7(rgyud): gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba sangs rgyas thams cad mi g.yo ba rdo rjer 'cha pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gzungs so// rnam par dag pa thar pa'i rdul// rgyud 'ang
182b8(rgyud): na mdapa ga// kun du 'thugs pas/ bya du tshul da dang can pa 'i rum po// den pad zhi sheg pa pa la namam mi mam ma ma
183a1(rgyud): bral ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ngo bo nyid ni gnas med pa// sgyu mar snang ba kun rdzob du// srad
183a2(rgyud): zhi mnyam pa nyid bstan ngas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dbang ba nub pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zhi bar mi gan pa pa'i rdo rje nas
183a3(rgyud): kha'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// shes rab kyi ni rang bzhin shes// ye shes kyi ni shes bya mkhyen// gnyis med shes rab ye shes dag/ 'dres pa
183a4(rgyud): rtogs par bya ba nyid ces gsungs so// de na pa de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan pa sangs rgyas tham pa cad kyi bdag med pa'i gnas rjes su rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'a
183a5(rgyud): nga chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rang sems stong nyid dag pa ni// mthar thug don dam ma yin te// chos spu rang bzhin 'dagasal pa// byang chub rdul 'di bstan pa'i shes gsu
183a6(rgyud): nas de bzhin gsheg pa ngos pazangs sangs rgyas rnams cad kyi tshas thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ldog nges pa rdo rje'i ting nge ledzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 
183a7(rgyud): chos srud da dam la me gnas// ci yang ma yin don dmal// byed pa spangs pas 'bras bu'ang med// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'i zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs
183a8(rgyud): da ci gnas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyitshas thamam na nyid dus rab sa dzin la skams par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'dag sungs so//  na na
183b1(rgyud): /  // d+hA can pa ga sungasas// dunas na 'arjod pangs nas
183b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi yongs su thom pardo rje'i ti 'dzin lo snyoms pa bzhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'das pa'i sems ni rang grol ba/ 
183b3(rgyud): mtshan nyid can// byang chu tshul da sbyin chenas ga sa // dan pa zhin gagags pa mkhyen ldan med sangs rnas thams da kyis rnam par rnam pa kyi ting nga
183b4(rgyud): chu kye sems 'di gsungs so// ji ltar nam mkha' rnam dag bzhin// theg pa 'di ni mkha' 'dra ste// spong ba med pa'i nyer shib// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gas
183b5(rgyud): so// de nas de bzhin gshegs par rod pag med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun rdzob dad pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'ad gsungs so// grub pa med pa'i snang ba
183b6(rgyud): rten 'grel tsam du'ad gang skyes pa// chos rnams dbang po'i gzhu mtshungs par// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa 'onas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pazhin tu thugs 'atsugs pa
183b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bkod pa'i rnam par thar pa la la gru ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyams pa ma zhugs te rgyab kyi sems 'dig sung sa s+ho// rgyal 'bru med byang chub pa'o// 'di mas ni
184a1(rgyud): ra pa can pa dzin pa snyoms par zhugs tes pas 'dag zang bas// rgya bang rgyun ma tshangs dang // man pa 'din dang ngan pa spangs// na
184a2(rgyud): ba sa gyu la// 'byung ba sa daster rten 'phrul bsta zhes/ sasas// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bye sa ste yan lagasang ba rgyas thams cad mi rnam par ngas pa ma
184a3(rgyud): rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la skyobs par zhugs te byang chub kyi se mal 'di gsungs so// rgyu las skyes shing rkyen gyis bskyed// gzhi la gnas shing 'bras bur grub// srid ni mtshungs phyir ba
184a4(rgyud): pa yin// byang chub de nyid bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khyad par du 'phags pa thub pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par 'byung ba rdo rje'i ti
184a5(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// brtags na 'a zhing don byed rus// 'thun par snang la rkyen las bskyed// kun dza chos kun mtshan nyid de/ 
184a6(rgyud): tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu mdzes par gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam pa las bral ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzid la snyoms par
184a7(rgyud): zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// yul dang dbang po bdag po'i rkyen// de ma thag pa'i mtshungs med pa// rang bzhin byung ba'i skad cig la// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa
184a8(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs bzhi pa'i don sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang gang po dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 
184b1(rgyud): 'bral ma chos kyis// ma nad 'byung ba mangs skad rdzogs// rang dmacan nyid bdang ni// dbyar med tshul 'ang bstan pa' zhes gsungs so// de nas dbazhin gshegs bzhi pa'i don sangs/ 
184b2(rgyud): rgyus thams cad kyi grub pa rdo rje'i tshul gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ming dang des chog ngo bo gang // mtshan nyid dbye ba'i don gyis na// 
184b3(rgyud): sa las rgyal bar byu// nad de grel di bstan palani pagasargyas so// denas nan gshenas sbyin me sa sa rgyas khams da kyis pangs pa pa med pa
184b4(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du bskal pa bye bar yang // spong ba zhugs shing spad pa las// byang chub ring por 'gyur ba med// mnyam pa nyid kyi
184b5(rgyud): rang grol 'gyur zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo byangs dge ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyin tsam lon dun rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub
184b6(rgyud): sems 'di gsungs so// skye ba med pas chos kyis// 'ga' pa med pas 'angs spyad rdugs// gnas pa med pas skyes pa'i sgra// sbyi med rnal 'di ba stan shin
184b7(rgyud): gnas pa/  das ngas ma da yin dag gag ma b+hU
185a1(rgyud): lnga bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i mdzod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dus kyis grom ba rnam par dag pa rdo rje ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa
185a2(rgyud): zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs sa// dus gsum dus med snyan pa po// tshad med la shes sngabs chen po// srid ni ye gnas pa bar gshegs// byang chub rgyal 'di bstan pa'o zhes
185a3(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dus mi dmigs par grol ba rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
185a4(rgyud): gsungs so// bskal bgrangs dang grangs med ldan 'das pa ye shes skad cig ma// bsam gyis mi khyab don 'char 'gyur// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs
185a5(rgyud): spobs pa'i tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 
185a6(rgyud): tshig gcig gis// grol ba ye shes zab pa ni// da lang chos rnams des mthong ba// byang chub chul 'di bstan pa ma na sa gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa lam bang
185a7(rgyud): po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnyis ka'i tha las grol ba rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// nyan mongs shes bya'i phyogs
185a8(rgyud): // las las grol ba 'phags pa'i chos// de nyid nges 'ablan med// byang chub rgya la 'di bstan pa 'onas gsungs sa// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs bzang po grol ba sangs rgyas pas
185b1(rgyud): gnas de 'in snang bar rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la skabs pa bzhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sangs rgya mtshas dang dge 'dun te// gsum langs par skabs mngon// dag pa la shes
185b2(rgyud): spyod pa yi// byang chub rgya la 'di bstan pa la nis gsungs sa// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa steng sa dang bral ba rdo rje sangs rgyas tham ba cad kyi sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyomos par
185b3(rgyud): zhugs 'byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas la ni skyabs sang ba// ma 'ongs pa na sangs rgyas kyi// lta ba'i mi ngoms sku mthong zhing // de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs
185b4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brjed pa med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rjes su dran pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzirnam snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'dag sngang
185b5(rgyud): so// dam pa'i chol mi skyabs 'gro ba// ma 'ongs pa na rgyal ba ma// dam pa'i chos sgra thos nas ni// byang chub tshul 'di thob byed pa'o zhes gsungs so// de ni 'de bzhin gshegs pa srongs par
185b6(rgyud): spyad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'phags pa'i cho ga tre su dran pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun skyabs song gang // 
185b7(rgyud): 'ongs pa na nyan thos dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang // lhan cig spyod pa ston par 'gyur zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo'i mchog thub pa sangs rgyas thams
185b8(rgyud): kye bstan pa gcig tu snyan pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin ma snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rgyal pa'i nged chen nam gsum po// dbang phyug tshogs pa la mthar thug dus/ 
186a1(rgyud): gcig pa nyid du thugs la bzhugs// de nyid byang chub tshul bstan pa tshe zhes gsungasas// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa zla ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chas
186a2(rgyud): rngas su 'thun pa'i phyogs la zhugs 'jam par dag paM rdorje'i teng de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// skugasum rang las lhan cig skyes// de nyi
186a3(rgyud): lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas// ye shes spyod pa gnas 'di nyid// ston pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o res gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba sangs rgyas thams
186a4(rgyud): rjes su 'thun pa'i spyod pa'i chos rnam por dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dang // bcu gnyis ngas
186a5(rgyud): 'byung gnas smra tshul slob pa'i chos// de nyid phun sum tshogs par gsungs zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snyengs pa med pa sangs rgyas thams cad
186a6(rgyud): des su 'jun pa'i chol la spyod pa rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems// tha med
186a7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po ni// don dam bstan pa'i mchog brnyes pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa chen po sangs rgyas tham
186a8(rgyud): cad kyi 'thun pa bzhugs pa rdo rje rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzir la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di sa spangs so// rang nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dang
186b1(rgyud): rig pa rnams// rang las 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa la nas gsungs sa// de nal de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi drang por zhugs
186b2(rgyud): pa'i spyod pa'i yan lag ram par dag pa rdo rje 'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'azhidig spangs so// bsam gtan yan lag sras gnas shing // rnam par 'dog par mi g.yog/ 
186b3(rgyud): 'di chen mnyam nyid gnas pa'i tshul// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs pas zhugs pa rnam par
186b4(rgyud): pakyi sems 'dag dungs po// dam pa la dul la 'jug pa na// mgon po 'dag nyid chen po'i dang // tshangs pa'i gnal gyi dmigs las
186b5(rgyud): grol// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab chen po'i gzhon pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi legs par zhugs pa rdo rje'i tingangange 'dzin la snyoms
186b6(rgyud): chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// tshul ched thabs ldan dri ma med// yam lag 'byung 'tshal dag pa// sa sor ma yin mkha' dbyings klong // byang chub rdum 'di bstan par nas
186b7(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mtshungs med sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag pa'i lam la zhugs pa rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi
186b8(rgyud): rlom sems med pa dzi nyid // gcig pa bshes pa'i rgyun las ni// byang chu ba tshul de bsnyen pa tshanas gsungs so/ 
187a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po rdo rje ma khregs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam yan lag brgyad rnam par dag par rje'i ting nge 'dzin ma snyoms par zhugs te byang chub
187a2(rgyud): sems 'di gsungs so// yan lal 'didag ldan pas na// nges par 'jug pa mi ldog pa// sems dpa' chen po dge 'a man// khas bde nyid bstan pa tshogs gsangs so// de nas
187a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa byang chub blo grol sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshad med pa rdo rje'i gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// byams dang skye
187a4(rgyud): btang snyoms bdag med mnyam pa'i dngos// tshad med chu bo'i rlabs las ni// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ljon shed
187a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skyob pa mtshungs pa med pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sA la chen po'i shing ltar na// 'dab byas rgyal
187a6(rgyud): brgyan mi 'chad// re re dod du'ang du mar bzhugs// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rgyan du chol spyod skal ba can// ye shes dam pa
187a7(rgyud): gnas thob pas// yan lag bcu pa bstan pa yin// phyag 'tshal bskor ba yi ger 'dri// sbyin dang mchod pa kha ton dang // nyan dang 'chad pa de bsam zhing // ting 'dzin ldan pas spyad par
187a8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang pa 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal la rgyud pas sde snod kyi tshul yongs
187b1(rgyud): dag par byed pa'i laru k+ta lnga bcu gnyis par// de nas bcom ldan 'das dngazhin gshegs pa gdangs snyan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khrul pa med cing 'dren pa med pa rda
187b2(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par nags te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// kun tu thun mongs yul men rnyeng // khyad par k+Sha rU pa thub pa yi// phrin mas dag pa tshad med pa'i// byang chub sems 'di
187b3(rgyud): bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de na pa de bzhin gshegs pa bam nams stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi caco med pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyems par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs
187b4(rgyud): sa// rags pa dang ni phra ba yi// kun nas spang bdag pa yis// dkrugs pas 'khrug pa mi mnga' ba// byang chub tshul 'de bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu dang
187b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsnyel ba med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sems can don la dus kun du// bskyed dang dbri ba med par ni// rgyun
187b6(rgyud): da med pas 'jug par dag/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa dgyes pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mnyam par ma bzhag pa med
187b7(rgyud): ji'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// mnyam par ma bzhag spyod pa na'ang // rtag tu dri med gnas pas na// btang snyoms tsam du'ang mi gnas
187b8(rgyud): dus rgyal 'di bsnyen pachan sa gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthumabs 'angs rgya masems cad kyi ma nga du namigs pa mi mang rab dza ting ma med ma sgom pa
188a1(rgyud): nag chub kyi mas 'dun sus so// ma sbyangs ma gnas sanyam nyi dang // blang do med pa'i ye sa na// sangs namachos nyid dag pas na// byang chu
188a2(rgyud): tshul 'di dag pa'o zhes gsungs so// den pa de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong skar ma la dgyes pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi so sor ma btags pa'i btang snyoms med pa rdo rje'i ting
188a3(rgyud): / 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// yongs su sbyang dang brtags pa dang // gsal dang dbye ba 'byung ba las// khyad par btang snyoms med pa ste// byang chub
188a4(rgyud): 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi sgron me sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dun pa nyams pa med pa sangs rgyas kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
188a5(rgyud): dul rnams phyogs bcur rgyal ba yis// spro ba byang chub snying 'a'adin// sangs rgyas gdung las gzhan mi rtog/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa
188a6(rgyud): zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sran mdzes mnga' ba'i zhal yangs rgyas thams cad kyi brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzid la snyoms par zhugs te byang
188a7(rgyud): kyisems 'di gsungs so// sems can gcig gi dan du yang // bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed du// rdul phran grangs 'das rtsom pa che// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// den
188a8(rgyud): ldan langs rgyas thams cad kyi dran pa nyams pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin ma snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dpyad pa mi
188b1(rgyud): dmigs pa 'dres par// yangs su dag pa'i babyen pa can// snu ma la sngags rtag mang byad// byang chung tshul 'di bstan paronas gsungs so// da nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor ba ldan pa yangs rgyas/ 
188b2(rgyud): 'i sa su mal du da ma shAgs kya kyi mas ga /  du // gshegs mi mam
188b3(rgyud): de dag snyoms par 'jug pa yi// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin ga shegs pa yon tan babang po'i phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab nyams pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge
188b4(rgyud): ngan la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// mkhyen pa ga pa du ma las// 'phrog pa med pa dag po mi gnas// tha ma dam pa rang tshul thob pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa mo na pag
188b5(rgyud): so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpa la gsal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam pA grol la po rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ye shes stong nyid me chen gyis// 'khor
188b6(rgyud): 'dres ma lus pa// chos dbyings dang du sreg mdzad pa'i// na 'dul 'di bstan pa monas gsungs so// de na sa de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal mtsha sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus kyi las
188b7(rgyud): thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dus rnams kun du thogs med par// lhan cig skyes
188b8(rgyud): pa'i ye shes las// 'byung zhing 'jug dang gnas par mdzad// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'i zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me shes chol pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dag
189a1(rgyud): las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro na de ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzid la snyams par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// nong
189a2(rgyud): mas sa lam rnams //  sa ng+ge/  'du // rgyu rlung sa rdzun pa smos maso//  sa nan sa
189a3(rgyud): mkha'i da pal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro na de 'i b+h+rUM kyi rjes su 'brang ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzid pa snyoms par zhugs te byung
189a4(rgyud): gsungs so// mkhar byings chos nyid rnam dag dang // nam rtog 'gro 'ang mi gan la pas// rang 'azhin dgra pa'i mtshan nyid ni// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// 
189a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa mchod sbyinang ro sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'das pa'i dus la ma chags pa thogs pa'i ye shes mthong bas la gru pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
189a6(rgyud): bkyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du bstan g.yo bcas pa yi// dngos po de bzhin gshegs pa yi// phun sum tshogs pa thogs med pas// byang chub tshul 'di
189a7(rgyud): sa gsungs // denas zhi shegs pa shes rnam shi pa 'ang ngas sa rgyas thams cad kyi po dzes pa'i las chags 'i mgo sa nga ldan
189a8(rgyud): brda rje'i te nge 'dzin pa snyoms pa zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'dig sungs so// 'jog rted khams kyi rdul phran dang // sems can byed pa snga chags dang // dpal ldan se
189b1(rgyud): badzad pa dag/ byang chub tshul 'ang bstan pa'i nas gsungs so// de nas de bde gshegs pa 'di zer man tanan la da sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ltang ba 'dus la ma chags mthogs
189b2(rgyud): pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas 'jug pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rtog med me long gzugs lta bu// gsal ba 'dzin pa bral ba yi// rams
189b3(rgyud): / dadang cig car 'bad med par// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas bzhin gshegs pa drang srong dbang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yongs su ma 'dres pa'i chos bco brgyad rnam par
189b4(rgyud): kakha rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge ledzin pa snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'di dag ma las sangs rgyas kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag/ gsang ba 'dzin pa
189b5(rgyud): dpor gyur// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de na sa de bzhin gshegs pa khro dang ldan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khrug pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin ma snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi
189b6(rgyud): sems 'deg sungs so// naskad rnams lal 'das pa yi// bden par makrub sgyu ma chos// dag pa ngo ba nyid 'byung ba// bya ba chub tshul 'di bstan nga yin na gsungs so// gang du med dang spyod pa ye// byang
189b7(rgyud): chub mchod tu sems bskyed pa// de nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyaso// bar du bsod nams ye shes kyi// grangs med du ma'i kham bgrod de// gang du sa bcur gnas pa yis// skul bdum
189b8(rgyud): par byed/  dang mi la 'jig rten du// de ltar mngon par sangs rgyas nas// chos kyi 'bar porab tu bskor// sprul bsgyur rin 'brum kyis// snga tshags gzugs su snyan par byed// 
190a1(rgyud): / pa dang /  da rten 'ang sa dang /  /  da kyi zagapa//  sa da da / dan ma da ga
190a2(rgyud): srog dang srog sa yin par gro// gzugs dang sgra dang yi sa// rtswa lcug labrel shing la sogs pa// du la rnam par sbyin byed gyur// ye shes log yan stu pa na/ 
190a3(rgyud): po'i ting 'dzin gyis// rnam par snang mdzad byang chub mchog/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po che// dang por 'og min chos kyi dbyings// rang byung nam mkha' dge pa'i zhing // bsam gyis
190a4(rgyud): / khya spyod yul lo// de nyid mngon par byang chub pa// 'og min gnyis pa ye shes la// rnam par snang mdzad gangs chen mtsho// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyur to// gnyis pa 'od gsal
190a5(rgyud): / ldan gyis grub// 'og min zag pa med pa'i yul// bde chen rgyal ba gtsug ter gnas// byang chub mchog dang rab bcings pas// byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul can// sems dpa' chen
190a6(rgyud): gsum pa'o// yang dag lam ni lnga ldan pa// gsang ba 'dzin pa goms pa'i lam// rnal 'byor dbang phyug phyag rgya che// dbang gi rgyal po yon tan gter// skad cig gcig la goms byed cing /

190b1(rgyud): bskur gyur pa sa gsang ba'i rim// sbas pa'i tshul gyis 'chang rgyar 'gyur// de bzhan gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsangs 'du su rnal 'byor man pa gnyis su med pa

190b3(rgyud): pa spobs pa'i mchog 'dus pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par mi 'gyur ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// phun srang tshogs pa'i 'byung gnas

190b5(rgyud): kye chos thams cad la mngon pa rdzogs pa byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos can ma lus
190b6(rgyud): rgya mtsho kun// rang lag sku rur bzhag bzhin// rnam par tho 'tsham las rgal ba'i// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
190b7(rgyud): bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zag pa ma lus par mkhyen pa mi 'jigs pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs sde// ye shes
190b8(rgyud): stobs kyis ni// 'dzag tshogs sred pa bcom na lan// mi ldog byang chub che ba nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bsnyen pa'adis gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs
191a1(rgyud): shA sa rnams na rgya dunan rna kun du shA sa nga ma ma 'angon pa za nga tong

191a5(rgyud): me 'jigs pa bzhinam par dga'adi rje na la khyims pa zhugs te kying chub ste sems 'di ga sangs so// sbyin pas khrus chen rlab sa rkyen gnas// tha med mo

191a7(rgyud): gnyi sa ga tsob gyur sa na rdza'i ting nga mdza pa snyoms pa thugs tes tshub kyi sems de gsungs so// mtha' la rgya 'i byadag de// 'dabs mi ldan 'du dus
191b1(rgyud): med// de la zung 'jug don ldan pa'i// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tog dang ldan pa sangs rgyasathams cad kyi dgongs pa gcig tu

191b3(rgyud): myu gu bzhin// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skyes bu khyu mchod rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la

191b8(rgyud): srungs so// shes dang shes bya kun gyin// spyo sum blo la sdang ba las// nyed dang nyin medang ma tad// byang chub chul 'di bstan pa nogs gsungs mo// den sa de bzhi gag
192a1(rgyud): bzla brgyas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi zad pa rje ting 'dzin ma snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dga' mchos sgra skye med pa// dram
192a2(rgyud): bral ba de 'odo gsal// mtha' las grol ba'i ngam nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// dri nas da zhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi gnas
192a3(rgyud): pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rmed pa ba gcod pa yi// rab pa yin pa'i sems spangs to// mgon tho ma shes gcig par 'byur/ 
192a4(rgyud): byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang sgyur rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang

192a6(rgyud): so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi gsal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyan bkod pa snang ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs
192a7(rgyud): so// rgyun chad med pa'i byang chub sems// thams cad de las skyes pa'i dngos// phra mo rkyen byeng dag pa 'dod// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// 
192a8(rgyud): gshegs pa bsam gtan snyams pas 'angang rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la skams par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rang bzhin
192b1(rgyud): kyis ni rnam par dag/ khams rgyud yul dang dbang po dag/ rab tu dag par rdzogs pa ni// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrug
