223b5(rgyud): kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sems nyid dngos dang dngos med kyi// mchen pa'i chos las yongs grol ba// rnam par thar pa'i don bstan pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul
223b6(rgyud): rtogs sangs rgyas thams cad mi tog med zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sems dang de'i chos nyid dag/ nam dag snang ba sdud pa po/ babs de'i rkyen can zheg/ byang chub rdul 'di bstan
224a1(rgyud): pa di gsus pa/ na pa de na gshes pa skye du mas camamasas sa nas su mnas pa da dzin pa byams pa nas kyang chub thamapas 'dag pa na// 
224a2(rgyud): brtag par dka' ba rdo rje'i nyid nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sems ni dngos por ma mchis te// rtog pa mi ldan dbyings gnas pa// byang chub tshul 'di legs bstad pas/ 
224a3(rgyud): med stong pa nyid gnas pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma dgyes pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa med pa do rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs
224a4(rgyud): so// gang du sangs rgyal zhi ba dang // 'khor pa'i sdug bsngal rgya mchod la/ don dam pa la 'dzin med phyir// srang blad med par grol ba 'onas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pasgrag can bya ba sangs rgyas thams ca
224a5(rgyud): be rnam pa dzin pa rdo rje nyid dzin la sgoms par zhugs te kyang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sku tsam thos pa'i yul yin gyi// rtogs par byed pa skam yin/ me rtag dngos med las tshus phyis// byang chub tshul ni/ 
224a6(rgyud): bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mya ngan las 'da' ba
224a7(rgyud): rgyas spun su med cig sa gsu yin rgyam pa las// sprin pa sa bya tshus kyi chu badrus zhe na ga ma gi na shid/ sa pa rgyam pa sa
224b1(rgyud): cad kyi rtogs par dada' ba'i gnas rjo ba dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//  nr-in tan bangasan kyis ni// rnam par ga' shing rten pa la// 'akyi meng 'dud kyi snyeng mang dag/ sbyong ba nal 'di na
224b2(rgyud): zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag med zhi ba'i tshul rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dri med pad ma'i gdan bcun
224b3(rgyud): shing // mnyam pa seng ge'i khrir gnas las// g.yos med nam 'phrul du ma las// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa yin zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dgyes pa sangs rgyas thams cad
224b4(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos rnams gang la'ang mi gnas pa// bar snang rgyu ba'i bya bzhin du// rtag tu thugs rjes rjes 'gro zhing // khyang
224b5(rgyud): chub sems 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs
224b6(rgyud): so// rnam par dkar ning gtsang ba yi// zhen med gzhan don dge spyad pa// zla ba yar gyi ngo bzhin te// byang chub chu 'di bstan pa yin zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs spyan pas sangs rgyas thams
224b7(rgyud): kyim chog tuni po bye da 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyi byang chub kyi sems 'di gaspangs so// zhing khams bye ba phrag bsdu // mang tshul mtha' las sbyin pa'i// ye shes spyod pas dron mdzad pa// byang / 
224b8(rgyud): ba tshul 'di bstan pa yin zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shin tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
225a1(rgyud): gsungs so// drag cing gdug pa rngam pa yi// tshul ni dag pa bde ba'i lam// bla med de med du yin pa'o// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa yin zhes gsungs so// de nas de ngan
225a2(rgyud): gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gcig dang du ma las yongs su grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du tha snyad
225a3(rgyud): las 'das shing // rnam par mi phyed pa yi sems// mtshon du med las mtshon pa nyid// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa bzang ba
225a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgra las 'das pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// A li kA li las byung ba// de nyid brtags pa rkyer sbyor bas// 'byung
225a5(rgyud): gnas mtshon pa don ston pas// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrul pa med pa'i blos sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mthong du med pa rdo rje
225a6(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ma rig pa las rkyen stobs kyis// rlung gis blangs nas 'dzin byed par// glo bur dri ma zhes bya gang // stong pa de nyid tshul ba
225a7(rgyud): pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs chen pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa'i gnas thams cad las 'das pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyams par zhugs te byang chub kyi sem
225a8(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// de sa rnams ni rlung las byung // nam shes bdag 'dzin du pa gang // mtshungs par dag pa mchag gyur ba/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o las gsungs so// de nas de 'din gshegs pa sku
225b1(rgyud): byung // drim kun nas dru pa brten// byang chub tshu 'di bstan pachi nas gsungs sa// babs chen yang dag ldan pa 'i// napa 'byar 'jig rten don gru'apa// sems can kun gyi la dam pa'i// bya ba 'di ma
225b2(rgyud): med/ shes rab thabs dang ldan pa la// sdig par grags pa yod min zhes// rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa la// rdo rje can ni nyid kyis gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsungs dang thugs kyigs
225b3(rgyud): gsangs sus pan la rgya chenapa tas phyin pa mnyam pa nyid nam par byam palas mangs kyim lam khyed la mtshan na na nyid nga bldan nyis s+ho/ 
225b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tog ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi 'gyur ba rdo rje ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'dig sungs so// shin tu na ma pa/ 'dag byed pa// mthas
225b5(rgyud): byed dkyang sems// gnas pa'i ngag byang chub sems// de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gdunapas// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ga'i brjid rnam par grags pas sangs rgyal thams tsho de bzhin nyid do sa
225b6(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ye shes de bzhin nyid la ni// mi rtog tu mi gnas pa// rgyus stong lam dang 'bras dag pa'i// byang chub de nyid tshul bstan pa'ozhes
225b7(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i dbang phyag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mgon po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba rda rdza ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug sa te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 
226a1(rgyud): kun dus na shing dag pa 'i// du ma 'ang ba dag pa'i gnas// ye shes bsrung ba med pa pa tshul// byang chub sems 'ad bstan pa na nas gzungs so// de nas da zhin gshegs pa rna
226a2(rgyud): dbang phyug sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal ldan pa 'du shes yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rnam par sdud pa'i drung dag gis// 'bral
226a3(rgyud): bag chags rtog pa gang // spung ma lta bur sdud pa'i phyir// dag pa de nyid tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gti mug rab zad rdo rjes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dus
226a4(rgyud): pa'i chos nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems pad gsungs so// kun mkhyen dbang po mchog 'byung ba// dngos pa ni chos las 'das pa yi// dri ma kun nas spangs padag
226a5(rgyud): gsang ba de nyid tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i ye shes can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chu
226a6(rgyud): sems 'di gsungs so// 'dren pa'i rgyal po bla na med// thabs mkhas thugs rjes skyong ba po// tshad med bde ba'i 'byung gnas ni// de nyid ye shes bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
226a7(rgyud): pazla ba da'ang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsus po// gdung ba sel ba'i sman gyi mchog/ gsang ba 'chi med ye
226a8(rgyud): rang gzhanas chog tu thob pa ni// byab cu'i chum 'ad bstan pa zhes gsungs so// de na pa de bzhin gshegs pa slobs pam pa lam tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brtag tu med par
226b1(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas ye shes spun grub pa// de bas mi rtog par bshad de// bsam pa'i byed pa yod min te// med pa'i sems su
226b2(rgyud): gyur ma yin zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs bstang ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul kun las 'das pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyams par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems ca
226b3(rgyud): gsungs so// chos rnam rtogs pa 'gag med pa// mi rtog snying po gsang ba'i rgyan// bde chen byang chub dbang po'i gnas// spyod yul bskyed pa tshul gnas pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs
226b4(rgyud): pa mchod pa gnas pas sangs nas 'a ba kyan das nas sto ba'i gnas rje cing yongan la rnams pa mjug pa chub kyi sems dgasas so//  dag gzhanamanyam nyid du/ 
226b5(rgyud): rtsal ldan 'jigs pa kur sgrol mdzad// bsil bas chad pa kun skyob pa// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan rgyal bas sangs rgyas thams
226b6(rgyud): cad kyi sems pa thams cad dang bral ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sems 'di kun gyi rtsa ba ste/ 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa la// sngon
226b7(rgyud): pa'i shing ltar mdang rgyas pas/ dmigs med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dge bar dgyes pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje'i ting
226b8(rgyud): 'dzin ma snyams par zhugs/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs sa// rnam tog 'drad las nam rgyal ba/ mchog tud rgyas pa ri chen mnyes// 'khor lo lta bu'i shugs 'chang ba// byang chub
227a1(rgyud): tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i zla bras kyis sangs rgyas thams cad bya chos thams cad latha dad med par rtonas
227a2(rgyud): pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa le/ chos la dbye ba rdul tsam med/ so sor btags pa zla sa
227a3(rgyud): lam/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar 'gro ba'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun tu rgyal ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la
227a4(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis// mang du byung ba'i spyod pad// bye ba dpag med ston badzad pas// byang chu
227a5(rgyud): la 'di bsnyen pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhal mdzes pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dus gsum kun du khyab par ston pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la
227a6(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems padi gsungs so// mdzad pa du ma'i spyod yul du// srang grags srid pe tog ge ba/ thams cad dril gnon de rje ches/ byang chub
227a7(rgyud): tshul 'dib// ni 'tsha zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yud pe la'o 'ad sangs kyis thams nad kyi kun du ston pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
227a8(rgyud): kyi sems 'di gsungs so// kun mkhyen sa ni 'jig rten du// su dum par pa'i ma tog bzhin// dum ma med pa kyin pa nyid// de bas dam tshos mchag tu'onas gas
227b1(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs padus gnas ma tog sangs rgyas thams cad byed pa dang bral ba rdo rje ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du dam pa'i chos gnas
227b2(rgyud): shing // kun tu dag bdag pas na// rnam par 'tshab du ma 'byung // byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o rnas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa slobs pa mtha' yas tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes
227b3(rgyud): 'brug sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// srid gsum gnas pa'i sems can la// dge ba ye shes tshul gnas kyang // thob med dam pa'i
227b4(rgyud): sgra sgrog byed// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par brtse ba seng ge'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
227b5(rgyud): te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chu klung 'bab chu rnams dang ni// rgya mtsho'i chu ni tha dad par// sna tshogs gcig par rgyun 'bab pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
227b6(rgyud): gshegs pa drang srong gsal bas sangs rgya sems cad kyi drang srang 'dul ba rdo rje ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par thugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// lha yi drang srong thams cad kyis// bstod cing grus
227b7(rgyud): par gyur pa gang // bden pa'i stobs las byung ba nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gzungs so// 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bskal ba gang gA'i klung gi byed ma snyed khrag khrig brjod kyis mi lang ba
227b8(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spyod yul la 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gsang ba chen po 'di pe dang las gnas shing kun du ston pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon par sgrub par byed pa ste/ 'das pa
228a1(rgyud): dang ma 'angs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i gnas nges par lung ston pa nyid da// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang pa 'dus pa ma
228a2(rgyud): chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las gsang bdag pa chen po'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u se drug cu gsum pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan brtson 'grus sangs/ 
228a3(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi dbyings 'byung ba'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'khor ba'i tshang tshing thibs po dag/ ma rig rkyen can rlung las bya
228a4(rgyud): 'jig rten dra ba gcad pa'i phyir// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ sa gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snying po thub pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zag pa med pa'i chos nyid du
228a5(rgyud): 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'dir ni kun du khyab pa yi// rlung las srud dang spo dang // sprin dang nyams par byed pa yi// tshul 'dis phra ba'i
228a6(rgyud): bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i bdag pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung gnas bde ba'i rdo rje'i tang ngange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sem
228a7(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// zag bcas rung las rtog pa ste// bag med ye shes chos nyid drung // gnyis su med pa'i dbyings gyur pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs sa/ 
228a8(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mthon pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun du ston pa de rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// nges 'byas
228b1(rgyud): pa'i las// yongs su smin pa'i lam rdzogs pa// kun du sbyar ba spangs pa yi// byang chub chul 'ang bstan pa yin nas gsungs sa// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyirnam
228b2(rgyud): par grol ba 'ardo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gang du bstan pa'i sgor 'dug pa// rjes 'brangs gzhung lugs gnyis gsungs pa// gang bag dang ni chos yin
228b3(rgyud): byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa yin zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skal ldan shing rta can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rab tu zhi ba rdo rje'i ting nge yadzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi
228b4(rgyud): sems 'di gsungs so// gang du 'ching dang grol med par// rlung ni rnam par 'jug ldog pas// byang chub mi rtog chos nyid de// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
228b5(rgyud): bsod nams blo gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yongs su rdzogs pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyems par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// lam bzang theg mchog bla med pa'i// yon tan
228b6(rgyud): 'phel byed pazang po yi// rgyal mtshan gsang ba chen po nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa yin zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin byed 'od 'phros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam
228b7(rgyud): par rtog pa las ring du 'gro ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 'gro ba'i bsam pa'i nor bu ni// ye shes reb rdzogs byed pa// phye nas 'byung
228b8(rgyud): med rang gnas phyir// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdul med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
229a1(rgyud): par zhugs /  byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs sa// yang dag snang nyid nam mkha' ste// shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs// bla yi byed pa dang bral ba// byang chu' tshul 'di bstan pang / 
229a2(rgyud): zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid daphung pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rlog pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 
229a3(rgyud): snang ba med cing kun brjod bral// gnyis med dag pa'i sbyor ba yis// sngags kyi de nyid rab gsal ba// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng
229a4(rgyud): ge'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsal ba chen po rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dag pa mkha' dang mtshungs pa nyid// rnam shes
229a5(rgyud): rlung dang 'dres pa yis// rang bzhin 'od gsal dag pa nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shin tu ga
229a6(rgyud): de rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dag dang mi dga'i spyod pa dag/ rlung las byang phyir 'di dag pas// dri la ma lus dag par byed// byang chub tshul 'du
229a7(rgyud): bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rab rtsal thub pa sangs rgyas thams cad gyi rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems nig sung la
229a8(rgyud): mthas med cig/ rkyen byung mas kyi rmu napas// ye shes du zhib ste// byang chu brdul na bsnyad pa' nas gsungs sa/ dan pa dbanan gshegasas pa kring pade rasangs rgyas
229b1(rgyud): cad kyi shin/ rgyal med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dadam par snang brgya las byung // de nyid dngos med can bral ba// gcig tu mtshan nyid med par
229b2(rgyud): byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbyangs rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpe med pa'i tshul rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
229b3(rgyud): te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// mi phyed rdo rje mtshon du med// ngo bo nyid dag 'phral byung ba'i// dri mas gos pa med pa nyid// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas
229b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor lo 'dzin pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yongs su dag pa'ang rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// kun du stong badrung nyid de/ 
229b5(rgyud): bya ba 'jug byed pa// thams cad rdo rje'i dngos po ru// brtag pa ye shes tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbyig gi mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi za
229b6(rgyud): rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// yang dag rab tu sgrub pa yi// snying po 'don du byung ban// 'phags lam gsang ba 'di nyid de/ 
229b7(rgyud): byang chub rdul 'di brgyan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de na med pazhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dga' bas sangs rgyas thams da phyag rgya dad pa rje nyi nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub
229b8(rgyud): skyes ng+ge gsus so//  pa pa// skyilas kyang pa rim par ltung // man pa man pas pa ba che// byang chub rgyal 'di sastan pa' zhes
230a1(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' las grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skyob pa tshad med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
230a2(rgyud): chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// las kyi sgrib pa rgyunachod pas// 'di ni bsam gtan mchog tu gsungs// lus can kun la byin rlob mdzad// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa
230a3(rgyud): zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sred par lhung ba nges par 'don pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chu
230a4(rgyud): sems 'di gsungs so// gang du blang dang dor med pa'i// byang chub skam sar 'jog mdzad pas// ngan mong spyod pa'i rgyal po nyid// de nyid byang chub tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// 
230a5(rgyud): gang du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du gsang ba 'di nye bar lta zhing sems pa dang / rtse gcig
230a6(rgyud): yid la byed pa dang / thos shing 'dzin par byed pa 'dza m+bu'i gling 'di'i nang du gnas pa'i gsang ba mtshungs pa med pa'i blo can de la kun nas kun du mkhyen cing gzigs par byed/ chos nyid
230a7(rgyud): tu'ajug pas nye bar spyod par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam
230a8(rgyud): rgyal ba'i rgyud las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa'i gcig par ston pa'i ji la du sa drug chubani pa mo// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shes rang gros sangs rgyas 'am
230b1(rgyud): kyi gnyis su med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'ad gsungasas// chos kun dngos po med pa yi// de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang // gzhan ma yin
230b2(rgyud): pa'i chos nyid de// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spos bzangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
230b3(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ngo bo nyid kyis yongs dag pas// sna ni nam mkha'i khams mtshungs pa// gzi brjid zil gyis mi non pa'i// byang chub sems las 'byung ba yin
230b4(rgyud): sa gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dbyings sangs rgyas thams cad kyi don gyi blo dang bral ba dadze ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 
230b5(rgyud): so sor rtogs pa bral ba yi// dmigs med bsgom du med pa yi// mthar thug lam las 'das pa po// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o nas gsung // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa lha sangs rgyas
230b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi mthong ba spyod pa rdo rje ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs / byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// yang dag du ni tog med pa'i// dus gsum dus med mtshan ma gral// grub pa rdo rje dbyings
230b7(rgyud): gyur pa// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun nas brjod du med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la sems par zhugs te/ 
230b8(rgyud): bying chub kyi sems 'di gsungs mi// snga tshogs dang selas byung ba yi/ mchin dang mchog mayin pa'i yul/ mnya ma nyid pa dang mad pa'i phyir/ khyang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin ne sa gsungasas/ 
231a1(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu gsal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par sgrub pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
231a2(rgyud): gsungs so// gangadu pa'i sa son pa// me cwa gsung la byung ba// mkhyen ma nga dam byed brag/ 'ang du rdul di bstan pa'i nas gsungs so// de nas
231a3(rgyud): gshegs pa nor bzangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi zad pa'i ye shes kyi nor bu 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// khyad par se
231a4(rgyud): rin chen blo// tshad med dge ba'i stobs 'byung ba// mi gnas byang chub rgya mtsho'i gnas// khyad par ye shes mchog bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgre
231a5(rgyud): maN+Dal po sangs rgyas mas cad kyi mchog ta ni bang/  'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems da gsungs so// byang du tig zal brjod 'das pa// 'byu ba'i ma
231a6(rgyud): dag pa'i dus// chud med rtog par bzhi ga/ byang chub tshu la 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin che nang ro'i dbyings sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snang ba dmigs
231a7(rgyud): rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// yul dang dus dang bsam pa dang // rnam par rig pa las 'das shing // rnam pa mA lus rub pa
231a8(rgyud): bdag/ byang chub sems 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skyed bang rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tog med rdo rje'i gnas kye ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
231b1(rgyud): zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'ang gsungs pa// chas dang chas nyid med pa pa// rnam par rtag dang martag med// rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun grol bas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes ga
231b2(rgyud): so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan sbed sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par byang chub pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dbang gi rgyal
231b3(rgyud): baidUr+ya// de nyid ri chen bas ma 'brel zhes// bsam pa'i don kun sgrub byed ma// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i mdzad pa sangs rgyas pa
231b4(rgyud): cad kyi dmigs med do rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dab med brjod 'das blo yul bral// lhan cig skyes pa'i bo nyid// gdod nas snying po rdzogs sa
231b5(rgyud): rgyas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i blo gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lhun grub rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi se
231b6(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// rang sems 'od gsal dag pa las// 'phrul byung rkyer grol chos nyid dang // rgyun chad med pa'i lam gyis rgyas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o nas gsungs so// de nas de
231b7(rgyud): gshegs pa rin chen grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bag chags gcod pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rnam pa kun du shes bya dang // 
231b8(rgyud): pa bu nyon mongs// mkha' yi sprin chags dengs pa ltar// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don mdzad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos
232a1(rgyud): cad la dmigs pa med pa' gcas rbadza'i ting nge 'dzin la sems par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'ang gsungs pa// kun gyis mthong med lta 'bral// rtsa ba'i rten med sto nya
232a2(rgyud): dbyings// don dam chos nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mdzad mtha' gzigs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
232a3(rgyud): kun nas bral bar rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sku ni ye shes lnga ldan pa// dag pa'i de bzhin nyid la brten// skad la zhen med rdzogs
232a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i me tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la sgom
232a5(rgyud): pab zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ma skyes skye med sbyor ba yis// chos kun mngon gyur byang chub che// rnam par mi tog de bzhin nyid// khyab pa nam mkha' ltar sangs rgyas zhes
232a6(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mdzod sprul ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam grol rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyis sems 'di gsungs so// 
232a7(rgyud): chos rnams sems su bsdu ba dang // sems kyang lus la bsdu ba dang // lus ni ye shes nyer sbyor ba'o// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs
232a8(rgyud): baspobs pa mtshungs med rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par 'phrul pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// mthong / 
232b1(rgyud): chos 'bras ldan gnan gyur dang // de las gzhan pa'i sgra tshul las// sgrub pa 'dren pad+ma mad gnas// ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'i des gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
232b2(rgyud): rnab bye dang ro sangs rgyas thams cad kyi seng ge rnam par bye ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rtag tu byang chub sems las ni// mi g.yo 'od
232b3(rgyud): gsal lhun gyis grub// tshad med ye shes mkha' khyab drug/ de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang 'byung gi gnas mtshungs pa med pa rdo rje'i ting
232b4(rgyud): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i mche bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing gi ldan rnam par phye ba'i ye
232b5(rgyud): shes rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sems can lus su dmigs med kyang // de dag skye ba yongs grub par// rang gi sgoni der byin brlab/ 
232b6(rgyud): byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes par gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par sgrub pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par
232b7(rgyud): zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sems can mes padu ma yi// tshul gzigs dag dang sgra dag kyang // phra dang rags dang langs dang dog/ rnam par dbye ba ston par mdzad
232b8(rgyud): ces gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams sgron me sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyogs kyi dra ba rnam par chang ma dang nge 'dzin la soms pa lazhugs te byang chub kyi sems
233a1(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// gang du las dang ye shes la// 'jug pa nam mkha' rang bzhin can// phyir mi ldog par gyur pas na// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs
233a2(rgyud): so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bkra shis ldan pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par 'jug pa mi zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
233a3(rgyud): gsungs so// chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa'i// bsam gyis mi khyab la gnas pas// bde gshegs spong pa gcig nyid la// 'jug pa ye shes tshul bstan pa'o zhes
233a4(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas de banin gshegs pa yul 'khor mya ngan med pas sa rdzal ma da rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
233a5(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// ting 'dzin gcig la mnyam bzhag pas// 'jig rten khams ni du ma ru// grangs med ting 'dzin la 'jug pa// zad mi shes par bstan pa yin zhes gsungs
233a6(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros sems pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rnam par snang ba med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
233a7(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// mtha' dang dbus mang dag pa yi// zhing dang sems can khams rnams dang // chos rnams mnyam nyid yang dag pas// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs
233a8(rgyud): den pa de bzhin gshegs pa blo dang ldan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par 'du bya ba dang bral ba ye shes rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
233b1(rgyud): gsungs so// gang du rgyas rnams 'byad med par// mnyam nyid spyod pas kun du yang // sangs rgyas ning re mnyam nyid de// bran las mnyam nyid tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
233b2(rgyud): gshegs pa chos kyi sgron ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rab tu phye ba'i don gyi mdzod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// nam mkha'i khams
233b3(rgyud): chags med pas// ma chags thog mtha' med par ni// skye 'chi med pa'i lus ston cing // ngag dang sems kyang de ltar gsungs zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa stan ldan
233b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rab tu gnas med chos rnams ni// rang bzhin med pa'i gan yin te// 
233b5(rgyud): chos rab shin tu zab pa ste// yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa yin zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gzigs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshad med mtshan nyid gcig pa'i
233b6(rgyud): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// rgyun chad med cing thogs med pa// sgrib pa med cing 'pho ba med// ldan dang mi ldan med pa nyid// 'dzin med tshul 'di bstan
233b7(rgyud): des gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shugs kyis dor ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon par rnam dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la sdoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// 
233b8(rgyud): zhi med tha dad med pa dang // dam chos rgya mtsho tshad med pas// rnam par spros pa yang med de// dag pa byang chub tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skabs chen
234a1(rgyud): / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba tshad med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// nyer ler med cing nye bar ma len med// 
234a2(rgyud): rjes 'brang med cing rjes su ldog pa'ang bral// thob pa mngon par chags pa bral ba gang // chos nyid de bzhin nyid 'di 'dres pas bstan nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
234a3(rgyud): shes rab me tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rab tu gsang ba dbyings rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gnas med rgyun gcod bral ba'i chos
234a4(rgyud): phyir mi ldog pas 'gyur med pa// sprul zhing grub dang rab dbyer med// gang du g.yo med tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa'i dbyangs sangs rgyas thams
234a5(rgyud): cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor tshad dang rgya yongs su chad pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugal te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// shin tu dang zhing dmigs med pa/ 
234a6(rgyud): 'bre med cing byen phrul// gal me ga nga gdag pa 'o// rnamam sa tshungs mtshungs pasta pa 'is gangangs so// den pa de bzhin gshegs pa den rgyun nga nga mangs rgyas
234a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi len pa med cing ngarab med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyis sems 'di gsungs so// sgra dbyangs ma zang brjod med pas// rdo rje'i tshig la mi gnas pa/ 
234a8(rgyud): yi ge med par rab shes pa// yan lag tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs bdon gsung ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshungs pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la
234b1(rgyud): snyoms pa bzhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'degasangs so// chos rnams ram dag ye shes gang // der don dam ma yin te// spyang dang rkang ngos bskyed pa'i phyir// don dam gnas mas thar pastan/ 
234b2(rgyud): zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs par gyes pa gsal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gang du bsgrub pa med pa'i rgyan rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
234b3(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// bsam mi khyab pa'i bdag nyid kyis// 'dul ba tshad mang dag pa las// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin zhes gsungs so// de/ 
234b4(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i zhal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// theg ma tha ma med
234b5(rgyud): ni ga// ngo bo nyid kyis mi rtog cing // sku gsum rdo rje'i spyod yul las// byang chub sems 'di bstar pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug phung sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
234b6(rgyud): sku'i gsang ba mi zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos dbyings zad med kun tog bral// du mar snang zhing mi 'gyur ba// yang dag ye shes spyod
234b7(rgyud): yul du// dmigs med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang bar mdzad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mi zad pa
234b8(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la skams par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// sgrib pa bkod pa tshad med pas// dbyangs sgra du ma brjod med pas// mi zang thog mtha' ra bzhig// gsung gi
235a1(rgyud): tshul bstan pa'o nas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sems pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
235a2(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// gsang ba 'dzin pa ma lus pa'o// dbang bskur mngon thob rdo rje can// mi phyed mi zad stobs gyur pa// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin na
235a3(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi blo gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par bskul ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub
235a4(rgyud): sems 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i don bskul ba// tshangs pa'i gnas kyis khyad par du// bskul 'ched med byang chub sems// de nyid yang dag bstan pa yin nas
235a5(rgyud): gsungs so// de ltar de la mtshungs med lha dang mis mchod pa// ye shes phung po rnam mang nye bar sgrub par mdzad// rgyal ba'i chos sgrub pha rol mtha' yas bzhugs mdzad pa// de la sngo
235a6(rgyud): byang chub spyod pa char mi 'gro// khyu mchog rnams kyis ye shes sa mchog 'di bob nas// phyogs bcu kun du skad cig gcig gis rgyas 'gengs pa// ye shes zhugs dang ldan zhing mdza
235a7(rgyud): shes mchog thob pas// rgya mtsho tshor phyin gru chen rang gis bskyod pa bzhin// ched du bskyod sems bral zhing ye shes phrin las gnas// zhing khams kun du gnas pa rnam par spyod par bye/ 
235a8(rgyud): khams rnams bani po bdag pa dang yangs pa dong// phrin ze rim par byab yang dge 'drug/ stong gsum sem pa btsun pa 'jug byed de// khamam pan 'gro ba 'a bras kun nas par byab
235b1(rgyud): / rgyud drug ran chen rnam par bya ba'i rdug phran rnams// rnam par bya ba tshad med 'jug byed pa// smon lam gyi gyis bde gshegs yang dag skul bar mdzad// rgyal ba rnams kyi
235b2(rgyud): mchog don dran mngon 'dod pa// ye shes yon tan dbang bskur sangs rgyas kun las 'thab// brgya stong phrag bcu'i ting 'dzin grangs med gang yod pa// spyod yul shes pa tshe 'di nyid pa
235b3(rgyud): thob gyur nas// de yi rjes la thams cad mkhyen par dbang bskur 'phog/ yul yangs ting 'dzin de dag thob pas g.yo ma mnga'// gang tshe de nyid sangs rgyas mngon par dbang bskur tshe// pad po rgya chen
235b4(rgyud): rin chen kun spras brgyan pa 'byung // de yi 'od zer khrig khrag mtha' las stong phrag can// phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rab ni byed// chos rab don du rgyal sras dbang bskur thob pa ma khyen/ 
235b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas mdzad pa rgya mtsho na mthar las// bdud rtsi dri med ye shes mngon dga' seb// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi spyod pa 'di yang dag par gsungs pa na 'jig rten
235b6(rgyud): khams rdo rje'i dpal rgyas kyi brgyan pa zhes bya ba dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba dag ni drung nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po
235b7(rgyud): zhes bya ba 'dug pa gyur pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnam par grol bas zla ba'i 'di skad ces smras so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang lha sa ts+tsha
235b8(rgyud): nga po 'di gdul bya la ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur grang // byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i te
236a1(rgyud): de 'dzin gyi sgodu ma dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ngango bo nyid ston pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing khams yongs su spang ba dang / sems can gyi brnamapa
236a2(rgyud): shing lus pa med pa smin cing grol bar bya ba'i phyir dang / tshad med pa rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir lus can ye shes ldan pa dag la kun du 'jug par byed do// de skad ces smra
236a3(rgyud): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis zab pa bla na med pa brjod du med pa'i gnas las rgya mtsho ltar dam par grol ba ston pa shin tu ngo mtshar te legs so legs so zhes
236a4(rgyud): bar brjod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po spyod pa tshad med pa dang ting nge 'dzin 'byam klas pa rab tu bsgrub pa'i dgongs pas chos kyi dbyings
236a5(rgyud): gnyis su med par kun du rol pa ston par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa ma
236a6(rgyud): nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rmad du gyur pa ston pa'i le'u ste drug cu lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
236a7(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad kyi zhing du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par gyur cing gsang ba chen po'i 'og min gyi gnas su 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi spros pa las 'das shing
236a8(rgyud): du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sangs rgyas stong mngon par sangs rgyas nas re re zhing la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / bla na med pa'i 'bum phrag dpag ma
236b1(rgyud): pas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te gnas pa la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang bcas pa re re zhing la yang byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i rgyal po
236b2(rgyud): drung na 'khod pa yongs su spang bar gyur to// de dag kyang byang chub kyi snying po gsang ba bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa yongs su snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/ sems
236b3(rgyud): can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sgra gsung thugs kyi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'jug par byed cing byin gyis rlobs par byed/ 
236b4(rgyud): la/ ye shes yang pa'i spyan gyis chos kyi dbyings mi zad pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas pa mdzad do// gsang ba 'di rab tu bstan pa na de'i tshe de'i dus na de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa
236b5(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing chen po bcu drug gi sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi snying po sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa du ma thob po// byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhing bye
236b6(rgyud): ba phrag brgyad kyi byang chub sems dpas gnas pas ni ye shes rgya mtsho mtshungs pa med pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin du ma mngon par thob po// rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po bye ba phrag
236b7(rgyud): brgyad cu grangs de snyed kyang gsang ba chen po rdo rje'i tshul gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ngang las skad cig re res mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa thob par gnas par gyur to// de nis byang chub sems
236b8(rgyud): dang 'thun du ba rang pas gsang banye bar bsdu pa'i dad bu gsal par/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi gzugs sku mtha' las pa// rgyal ba'i snying po ye shes sgra gcigaH// rnam por byud padzod/ 
237a1(rgyud): rol ba yi nas/  sa da sa na sangs rgyas// du sems nyid byang chub mchag thar pa/ 'dren pa chos kyi rgyal po tshul 'di yin nas
237a2(rgyud): smras pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'ang dag ma lus pa'i thugs ye rangs shing rab tu dga' bas rgyas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de rje 'dzin pa chen pos
237a3(rgyud): ni med pa'i yongs su 'dus pa'i 'khor byed kyil 'khor rnams la gzigs te bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba chen pa bstan pa'i dkyil la bar 'a khor pa 'di lnga ste/ thun mong du chu
237a4(rgyud): kong pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / khyad par yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / mchog tu gsang ba thabs kyi dkyil 'khar ro// yang de nyid las byung rgya cher ston pa dang // zab myong
237a5(rgyud): med tshul mchog ste// na gsung ba nyid ye shes kyi// dkyil layang chad med 'di ni bstan pa yin// de la de bzhin gshegs pa snying dag gi/ sku yi dkyil lakhor
237a6(rgyud): dang sdung pa dang // gsung gi dkyil 'khor gsang sngags 'bum phrag ste// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ye shes lhur bsdus pa'o// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rnam dbyugasapa pa yis/

237a8(rgyud): me dang spyod dang theg pa 'dini// de nyid bsdus pa gcig pa sdom pa'o//  da pa dang 'byung ba nye bar gyur pa las// lus dang yul dang dbang por spyad yul du// gsong kyi
237b1(rgyud): du mnyar sdud pa'i rdul// skye dang bye brag dkyil 'khor 'dir gsungs so// bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'khar du// rag byu rje'i dbus su mngon gnas nas// rdo rjem
237b2(rgyud): shar gyi gnas su dgod// rdo rje skyel krung gnyis med sbyor bas bzhugs// lhor ni dkon mchog dpal lo// nub tu 'od dpag med pa'o// byang du don yod grub pa'o// shar lha'i grwar ni
237b3(rgyud): mo spyan ma'o// lho nub tu ni mA ma kI'o// nub byang du ni gos dkar mo'o// byang shar du ni rdo rje sgrol ma'o// de ni nang gi pho brang la gnas pa'o// de'i phyi khyams kyi grwar bzhi la me'i phyogs su
237b4(rgyud): gzugs rdo rje ma'o// bden bral du ni sgra rdo rje'o// rlung gi phyogs su dri rdo rje'o// dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ne ro rdo rje'o// shar gyi snam bu la byams pa'i mgon po dang sa'i snying po'o// lho'i snam
237b5(rgyud): la phyag na rdo rje dang nam mkha'i snying po'o// nub kyi snam bu la 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'jam dbyangs rdo rje'o// byang gi snam bu li sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang kun du bzang po gnas pa'i
237b6(rgyud): shAd kyi sgron ni gshin rje mthar byed do// lhor slor ni shes rab ma thar byed do// nib slar ni pad+ma ma mthar byed do// byang sgor ni dgeg sa mthar byed do// shar lho mtshams kyi grwar ni mi g.yo ba'o//

238a1(rgyud): sngon 'ad pag da pa'i dkyil 'byor // rag byung rje dbus su mngon gnas nas// bcom ldan mi paskyed nub tu gnas pa ste// bden chen po shes bum mtsha gro legs pa
238a2(rgyud): shar du ni rnam par snang mdzad do// lhor ni dkon mchog dpal lo// nub tu 'od dpag med do// byang du don yod grub pa'o// shar lho'i grar ni lha mo spyan ma'o// lho nub tu ni nA ma ki'o// 
238a3(rgyud): dra ni kos dkar mo'o// byang shar du ni sgrol ma'o// de ni nang gi pho brang la gnas pa'o// de'i phyi khyams kyi gru bzhi la mi 'phyogs su gzugs rdo rje ma'o// bden bral dun ro// 
238a4(rgyud): dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ro rdo rje'o// shar gyi sngam bu la byams pa'i mgon po dang sa'i snying po'o// sgo'i snam bu la phyag na rdo rje dang nam mkha'i snying po'o//

238b2(rgyud): snod du mo spya ka/ lho nub tu mA ma kI/ nub byang du gas dkar mo// byung shar du nga ji sgrol ma'o// de nas nang gi pi brang la gnas pa'o// de'i phyi khyams kyi grwa bzhi la ma'i mtshams su gzugs

240b8(rgyud): cad kyis ni bltas nas kyang // snying po sngags kyi 'od zer lcags kyu yis// drangs nas bde bar gshegs rnams bsgom par bya// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin dri med pa'i// ting 'dzi

241a2(rgyud): yon ni// tsan dani bzang sogs me tog gis mdzes dbul// rang la ji lta bzhin du kun dbang bskur// cho ga 'di yis thams cad mchod par bya// pad ma'i nang gis bon 'od rnam
241a3(rgyud): kyis// gzugs la sogs pa thams cad drangs nas ni// yang dag byang chub yid kyi ngo bo nyid// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom par bya// shes rab pa spu re re las spros pa'i
241a4(rgyud): 'od rdzing rnam pa sna tshogs mya chen tshogs// ma lus nam mkha'i khams ni kun du khyab// de las blo dang ldan pas rapa s+ho// 'od kyi sgolas nges par 'byung ba yi// phan lag dri me
241a5(rgyud): gyis legs brgyan// me long pi wang gling bu rdza rnga dang // bzhad ma glu ma phreng ma gar ma dang // rdza rnga che dang me tog bdug spos dang // mar me dri chang rnal zas snod 'dzin dang // gos
241a6(rgyud): dang chos 'byung la sogs 'dzin pa yi// bcu drug rigam sa lo rnam skrag cing // rol pa'i lag pas kun du sbyar ba ni// 'od kyi snang bas sprul pa sna tshogs pa'i// mchod pa'i sprin gyi
241a7(rgyud): dra bas khyab pa dang // dngos rnams snum lta bur po sor na// yang dag rig cing 'jig rten lta ma khasdu pa// rtog pa ma lus kun las nges grol zhing // mchog tu 'de ba bskyed pa'i
241a8(rgyud): ra gyur pa// gzugs la sogs pa lha mo rnams dang ni// de bzhin phyi yi dri sogs thams cad kyis// rgyal ba'i dbang po rnams ni legs mchod cing // tha dad rnam por rtogal
241b1(rgyud): nges grol ba'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko ts+yai/ ska yi yul rnams ma lus pa rnams ni// drag chu sbrad mtshungs par nges btags la// rang yid lhag pa'i lha rugaH
241b2(rgyud): pal// chos rnams bstod pa'i sgra ni sgrogs par bsam// 'bra oM gyis byin parlabs rlung dang me// dkyil 'khor lo gnas rab 'bar bdud rtsi lnga// de nas yi ge gsum bzlas da
241b3(rgyud): med pa'i// thub pa'i dbang po'i nang du chud par bya// ye shes bdud rtsi'i ngo bor bsams nas ni// hUM dgod rdo rje'i lce ni bzang po dang // snying ka'i zla ba'i dbus su ma lus pa'i// rgyal ba'i 'khor
241b4(rgyud): lo des ni tshim par bya// dad dang brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa dang // de bzhin dran dang bsam gtan rnam dag pa// sgo bzang srung bar byed pa'i ngo bo nyid// shes rab rnam par ma lus yul du snang // 
241b5(rgyud): mtshan ma med pa'i dga' ba rnam dag pa// ma lus lha mo'i tshogs kyi ngo bo nyid// dbang po'i sgo dang bdag dang rnam tog dang // 'jug pa'i rnam shes rnam par dag pa yang // me long la sogs
241b6(rgyud): dri med ngo bor bsam// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang rang bzhin te// de nyid rnam dag rnal 'byor 'khor lo rig ce// de yi sems ni rnam par dag pa yin// gzugs la sogs pa mi shes
241b7(rgyud): rnam bral bas// dri me dpung po la sogs ngo bor grub// ser sna la sogs dag par gyur pas ni// pha rol phyin pa dkar po'i chos rang bzhin// bdag gzhan rnam tog med par snang ba ni// 
241b8(rgyud): 'chang ba med par gyur kyang go ril bzhin// zab pa dang ni rgya che ba yis ni// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can sems yin// dam pa'i don du dbye ba med pa dang // rnam 'byed med cing ci yang
242a1(rgyud): ba sdang ste// gang du gzhan du 'dzin pa'i rnam ldag pa// de bzhin dbyed la sags rtag bral yin// de ltar btags na rang steng dri med la// zla ba la gnas mtshan ma bsgom par bya/ 
242a2(rgyud): gsang sngags rim pa theg le'i gzugs su ni// rang yid kyis ni 'od zer dang bcas bsam// rang sems 'od zer dri med las 'das pa'o// sku gsung thugs kyi mchog gyur pa// smad pa
242a3(rgyud): de nyid du ni nges bzhugs shing // ye shes bdud rtsi 'bar bas bsam par bya// nang gi lus dang de bzhin thams cad kyang // de yis kun du mthar ni snang byas nas// ba spu re rol khe
242a4(rgyud): ras byung ba yi// 'od zer tshogs kyis kun du dag par bya// yang na mtshan ma phra mo bsam pa ni// 'od ldan sna rtser gnas pa thub pa yi// 'khor lo nang du chung byas snying rje yi// nang gi shes
242a5(rgyud): rab ma pa nyin mtshan bsam// mtshan ma brtan po mthong na spro ba yi// 'od zer de yi sprul pa'i thub dbang dang // rnam pa sna tshogs pa yi phyag mtshan bsnams// blo dang ldan pas yang dang la
242a6(rgyud): du spro// yang na bzlas pa rtse gcig sems nyid ni// dngos kun bdag nyid rang gi sems dbang po// rang gi sngags ni sna tshogs 'od ldan 'bar// de nyid blo dang ldan pas bsgom par
242a7(rgyud): zhes gsang ba nye bar bstan pa las rgyal po mchog mngon par 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bstan pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po byang chub sems dpa' sems
242a8(rgyud): dpa' chen po thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par rol pa 'byung ba'i rgyal po 'di bstan to// skyes bu la la bsod nams ldan gyur pas// gter gyi 'byung gnas chen po rnyed gyur pas/ 
242b1(rgyud): gnas can du bya sbyangs nas// de dag sus dang mthun pa can du byung // dag mkhas pasnams mam thapa nas// sems dang blo sangs rgya mtshor gyur byas shing // 
242b2(rgyud): ltar sngon pos chos rnams rtogs par byed// mi mthun tshul du mos pa tshol mi byed// de ltar rgyan gyur shin tu mthun par spyod// rnam par mi bsgom chos ni gang yang med// de dag
242b3(rgyud): chos rnams ji bzhin rgyan byed cing // chos kur khong du chud pas mdzes par byed// mkhas pa rnam dag rin chen rgyan gyur pas// rgyud 'di'i gnas la legs par brgyan mthong bas// 
242b4(rgyud): dga' ba'i sems yid dang bas spro ba bskyed// chos kyi yid la bdag nyid che ba brtson// rten cing 'brel 'byung chos la rab tu 'jug/ chos rnams mnyam pa nyid la de brtson te// dkyil 'khor
242b5(rgyud): rnam par bsgom la rnam par brtson// rgyal ba gcig pur gnas thob mi byed cing // chos rnams mi mnyam med par rab tu spyod// de ni bsam pa mthar thug rab brtan pas/ rgyal ba'i
242b6(rgyud): byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin// ri rab bzhin du mi g.yo brtan pa yis// de yi bsam pa byang chub mchog la brten// mnyam bzhag sems dang ldan pas de brtson te// bsam gtan
242b7(rgyud): ye shes yod kyis rab tu spyod// bskal pa stong du spyad pa spyod byed kyang // gsang ba 'di dang bral bar mi byed cing // de yi brtson 'grus 'jig par mi 'gyur ro// gsang chen theg pa 'di ni
242b8(rgyud): gang rnyed pa// mi de phyir mi ldog la gnas pa yin// srid pa lta ba ma lus gcod byed pa// skyes bu dpa' bo nyid ni 'byung bar 'gyur// 'di dag gsang ba yang dag don 'jug ste/ rgyal hU~M/ 
243a1(rgyud): dgongs pa mtha thug nges rtogs yin// chos nyid na ba'i mthar thug thob sgyur bas// de la mi dga'i yid byed gang yang med// dpe med ye shes ji skad gsungs pa
243a2(rgyud): ltar// de yis chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du byed// mi mnyam tshul du rtogs par mi byed cing // ye shes mnyam nyid yongs su rdzogs par bsgrub// dam tshig gnas la nges par
243a3(rgyud): brtson pa yis// mnyam pa med par sdom las rgyud bsdams te// gsang ba'i ting 'dzin mtha' yas sgo thob pas// de bzhin gshegs pa rtsa po'i rgyud dag tu// gsungs pa thub
243a4(rgyud): pa'i dgongs pa ma nor bar// don gsal khong du chud pa rgyal ba'i sras// tshe 'dir bla med mngon par byang chub 'thob// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsang ba bla na med pa'i rdul
243a5(rgyud): yongs su 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// spyod lam kun du mnyam pa'i yid kyis ni// srog dang rtsol ba shin tu ma bsdams pa// 
243a6(rgyud): / pogasal bar brjod par bya// sku la sogs pa bzhin du'ang bsdam pa ni// gcig car spro ba dag ni legs par bya// nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa'i sku sogs pa'i// 'od kyi sgo
243a7(rgyud): snang bas yang dag gang // de nas snga ma bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i// mchod pa'i sprin gyis kun du bkod pa spro// yongs su sbas pa'i rig ma mchog rnams ni// bde chen bcas bya
243a8(rgyud): gzhan gyi dbang mthong nas// rnam par sgeg pa'i grub dbang tshogs rnams ni// mthar ni rang gi lus pa gzhug par bya// rang gi snying pa de nyid nges rtogs pas// sems kyi
243b1(rgyud): sa rba~M sa // rigs tshogs kyis migs zlangs pas// rab basbrul bas yang dgam pa bya// sums ni pa srog // tshol brjod kyi lugs
243b2(rgyud): ku sau drangs nas ni// ji bzhin sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje sogs// bdud rtsings dbab ye shes nyams ma bya// de ltar lan rengal so byas nas ni// sngar bshad tshogs bstod pa nyid de/ 
243b3(rgyud): gisang sngags dam pa nyin mtshan bzla ba ni// sngags las kun du chags pa med par bya// ma chod cing bstod dang gshegs su gsol ba ni// sngags pas rab tu 'bad de rnam bya zhing // a la
243b4(rgyud): sogs la 'khor lo bsdus nas ni// sku la sogs pa brtag pa dag dbya// de ltar de nyid mthong zhing rnam grol bas// sems can khams rnams kun du dmigs nas ni// steng rjes 'gro
243b5(rgyud): ba kun la phan pa'i phyir// smon lam kun du bzang po nye bar gnas// ldang zhing dag pa'i sems pa rang lha yi// rnam pa'i nga rgyal yid la byas nas ni// kun du snang bar bya ba'i yul rnam/ 
243b6(rgyud): thams cad snga ma bzhin du yongs su bsam// 'di ni gsang ba'i spyad yul bya ba ste// las rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skud
243b7(rgyud): rlung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po// gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ral pa mngon par 'byung /

246a8(rgyud): gyis// brtan g.yo khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs// rigs rnams brgya yi bdag nyid 'gyur// de las ye shes lnga bdag nyid// rdo rje rin chen pad ma dang // sna tshogs rgyal balha yi
246b1(rgyud): phyag rgya bsdus pa nyid du gnas// sa gsung thugs kyi rdo rje lngas// snying po gsang chen gcig tu bsdus// chos ldan dag gi phung po can// bag chags bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa
246b2(rgyud): de dag rnam spyod byed pa// chos kyi sgo las gyur pa yi// khri phrag brgyad dang stong phrag bzhi// yi ge dpab ston pa nyid// ting 'dzin yan lag lnga ldan pa'i// mnyam nyid dag
246b3(rgyud): gas su brjod// ji ltar mkha' la nyi shar yang // dmus long gA ni mthong ba med// de bzhin lam gyi rtags rnams kyang // blo gros ldan pa de dag las// kun gyis mthong ba'i yul ma yin
246b4(rgyud): rab rib med na de mthong 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i lam rtags gang // de nyid dag pa'i spyad yul te// rang gzhan gnyis kas ma mthong yang // de ni med par mi 'gyur te// ning khams
246b5(rgyud): rnams su 'char// rdzu 'phral sbas pa'i tshul du gnas// khabs dang shes rab gnyis med monyam sbyor rnam rgyal thugs je spong ba ro mnyam srid dang zhi ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal rab tu migan
246b6(rgyud): de che// mkha' dang mtshungs pas 'gro 'ong rnam bral dus gsum las 'das dngas dang dang sa med phyogs cha mtha' dang dbus las rnam grol dag cing dri med rnam par dben// gsang ba ca
246b7(rgyud): memed dpal lda dus 'dir rtogs dka' zab cing rgya che de bzhin gshegs kun mtha' yas pas ni yang dag don// rgyal ba thams cad bla med gnas 'dir byang chub dam pa bdag dang gzha

247b3(rgyud): / oM sarba ta thA ga ta br-id d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsaSh+TAM/ oM badz+ra A b+hi Shig+h+nAM k+ShaHoM badz+ra dAr+m+ma a b+hi Shits+tsha hrIHoM badz+ra karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa khaM/ oM g+har+dz+dza/ g+hA ta yaM g+hA ta laM/ sarba duSh+TA na~M d+hahU~M phaT/ kI la ya k+She la~M

251b7(rgyud): dang 'a dang mtshan ma kun// rnam pa yongs su shes par bya// zhi ba 'am ni rgyas pa yi// sbyin bsreg nye bar dbul bar bya// thun mong dang ni khyad par gyi// phyag bya slob ma mdun gnas te// lha smras nyid du
251b8(rgyud): skyed pas// ganganas 'dug pa'i tshul gyis na// me tog phreng bdang ba byed/ la mi tog san 'grobs// madren gnas de la bang sbyar mya// byang dub rjes des rgyas so//  ma
252a1(rgyud): byin parlabs pa// bdag cag bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir// gsang ba'i snying po deng bdag gsol// lan gsum bar du gsol ba gdab// bla med dbang ni bskur mdzad de// rdo rje gsang chen dbang
252a2(rgyud): bskur ba// khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa// gnas las byung bas sbyin par bya// de nas gang du rje dpal mchog chen po 'dus pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por dbang yang dag par bsrung
252a3(rgyud): ra bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong bangan par 'byung ba de dag kyang ye shes kyi snang ba las yang dag par 'byung ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i sdong po dum las sna tshogs pa'i pad ma 'bar ba du mas rgyas pa
252a4(rgyud): phye ba la seng ge'i khri dang bcas pa gsang ba 'dzin pa pi dpa lha tshangs pa yang re re zhing du gnas pa las 'di lta ste/ rdo rje'i rigs nyis brgya phrag gcig dang / rin po che'i rigs nyis brgya phrag gcig
252a5(rgyud): dang / pad ma'i rigs nyes brgya phrag gcig dang / las kyi rigs nyis brgya phrag gcig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs nyis brgya phrag gcig ste/ 'di rnams de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i sku
252a6(rgyud): ba spu'i bug las byang 'od zer bye ba phrag du ma byung ste/ de re re las kyang sprul pa'i sku dpag tu med pa 'phros te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba chen pos khyab par byas shing mdzad pa mtha' sra
252a7(rgyud): pa'i rol pa mngon par 'byung bar mdzad do// thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i theg pa la 'dzud par mdzad de/ mchog tu skyabs su 'gro ba ston cing 'jig rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa dag la ni tshang
252a8(rgyud): ba dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do// nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa rnams la ni chos thams cad bden pa bzhi'i stonas
252b1(rgyud): dbang srur bar byed do// rang rgyal ba'i theg pa la mos pa rnams la ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bcu gnyis kyi sgonas dbang skur bar byed do// de dag gi lam dang lta ba dang spyod pa yang dag par
252b2(rgyud): bstan cing de dag gi tshul gyis 'dul bar byed do// gang du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la mos pa rnams la ni byang chub tu sems bskyed cing de nyid kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug le spyod de/ sbyin pa chen
252b3(rgyud): / po gtong ba'i sgonas dbang skur bar byed do// tshul khrims yongs su mi nyams pa'i sgo nas dbang skur bar byed do// bzod pa la gnas pa'i sgo nas dbang sgyur bar byed do// brtson 'grus rgyu na mi 'chang/ 
252b4(rgyud): pa'i sgo nas dbang skur bar byed do// bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sgo nas dbang skur bar byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas dbang
252b5(rgyud): / skur bar byed do// de dag kyang tshad med grangs med pa'i nam mkha'i khams la gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos ston cing dbang skar
252b6(rgyud): bar byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni tshad med pa bzhi'i sgo nas chos ston cing dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i tshul gyis chos thams cad bdon dam pa'i bdon
252b7(rgyud): ba rnam par dag pa'i tshul gyis dbang skur bar byed do// chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa rnam par dag pa'i tshul gyis dbang skur bar byed do// 'dir ni rin po che'i gzhal yas khang
252b8(rgyud): deng khams rnam par dag pa dang la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sgra mngon par 'byung ba'i sgo nas dbang sgyur bar byed do// bla na med pa'i sems dpa' chen po de pag tu med pa la ni thabs dang slebs dang ye shes da
253a1(rgyud): / sgron lam rnam par dag pa'i tshul gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i lam la sa bcu'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su dbang skur bar byed do// gang de sangs rgyas kyis
253a2(rgyud): 'dul zhing dus la ma bab pa de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang dpung chen po bzhi dang bcas pa thams cad la dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mngon par 'byung bas bstan cing dbang
253a3(rgyud): skur bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs de dag kyang bsdus pa'i tshul gyis nyi shu rtsa lnga po re re las yang lA lngar rigs brgya'i sgo nas dbang sgyur bar byed do// rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug men po
253a4(rgyud): rngams la ma sangs rgyas rigs lnga'i tshul gyis rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis nye bar brgyan pa'i snang bas rig ma dang lha mo'i tshogs du mas 'dod pa'i longs spyod mi zad pa yongs su dag pa la
253a5(rgyud): / dgyes pas yongasu spyod pas mdzad cing khro bo'i rgyal po du ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' so so'i rigs dang bcas pas rig pa dang brtul zhugs brtan par byed pa dang / chos kyi rgyal por dbang skur
253a6(rgyud): bla na med pa khyad par du bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs 'dus pa chen po bla na med pa la rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga'i nang du chud par gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo tshad med pa chos kyi pho brang
253a7(rgyud): / dam par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsang ba yongs su rdzogs pa sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las du mas bdag nyid du dbang bskur bar mdza
253a8(rgyud): dpal rdo rje 'chang chen pos phyag mtshan dang zhal la sogs pa'i rnam par snang bar gyur pa ni 'od zer dpag tu med pa bkye ba de dag tshur bsdus pas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor
253b1(rgyud): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag sas da myal sa ma rnam par snang bar byas nang na'ams pa dang bsu rnam pas srung ba dkyil 'khor du rigs kyil bang sa nas mkha' lags la par snang ba yod pa
253b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang ba dad pa med pa'i sbyor bas thams cad gnyis su med pa rlabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor bas 'di ba chen po'i de de'i sgyu ma'i skas 'akug pa'i nang khams yongs su sbyangs pa'i sku rnamis so mangs
253b3(rgyud): bo nas zhugs/ rba dbu ma brgyud de yum gyi padamar byon/ de nas gyen du gshegs te nam mkha'i khoms ma lus pa khengs pa'i lha tshogs rnams kyis dbang skur bar byed do// de yang bar snang gi phyogs mtshams
253b4(rgyud): khyab par byas te sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad la gsang ba chen po'i dbang skur bar byed do// sangs rgyas spyan ma'i rnam pa yis// sa yi khams rnams dbang bskur te// bo
253b5(rgyud): lus su byin gyis brlab sa// mA ma kI ye bdag nyid kyis// chu 'i khams la dbang bskur te// rdo rje dag byed byin gyis brlabs// la la gos dkar mo snang bas// drod kyi khams ni dbang bskur te// rdo rje 'od
253b6(rgyud): pung byin gyis brlabs// lha ma sgro la me bdag nyid kyis// g.yo ba dbugs la dbang bsku ste// rdo rje srod byed mar byin parlabs// lha mo gzugs kyi rnams// sna tshogs gzugs rnams dbang bsgyu sa
253b7(rgyud): stong gnyis su med par baphyur// lha mo sgra yi rdo rje mas// sna tshogs sgra yis dbang bskur bas// grag stong gnyis su med par gyur// dri yi je lha mo yis// sna tshogs dri yis dbang bskur bas// gsapa
253b8(rgyud): nga gnyis su med par gyur// lha mar ya rje yas// sna tshogs bcud yin dbang bskur bas// myong stor gnyis su med par gyur// lha mo rig bya rdo rje mas// 'khor 'das reg bya'i dbang bskur bas /  ltar
254a1(rgyud): cig skyes pa la shes las// bde stong gnyis su medapar 'gyur// mag garnam shes sa snying po// rna pa'i rna ba shas gsang 'arjod pa// sA la nam mkha'i snying po dang // sngon 'jig tudang
254a2(rgyud): phrag ste// lus la sgrib pa rnam par sel// yid la kun du bzang pos so// nyan mongs can yid byams pa ste// kun gzhi 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis ni// de ltar byer brlabs dbang bskur te// rnam shes
254a3(rgyud): ni dag phyir ro// dngos por 'dzin pa'i tog pa dag/ 'joms byed khro bo rgyal po bcus// tshigs tshogs dag par dbang bskur ro// de ltar phrin las tshul gyis ni// gsang ba bla na med par gyur// de na
254a4(rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos ni srid pa dang zhi ba mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa/ thog ma dang bA dang tha mar rgyun mi 'chad pa/ chos thams cad la 'du 'bral med cing tha dad par rtog
254a5(rgyud): med pa/ 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med cing rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rnam par dag pa/ dbyings dang ye shes zung du 'jug pa/ mnyam pa nyid med nas pa 'de ba chen po'i tshul du yang dag pa'i snying po
254a6(rgyud): gsang ba chen po'i dbang bskur bar gyur to// 'di ltar yang dag pa dbang bskur ba 'di bstan pa na so so'i skye bo bye ba khrag khri ga bum phrag bcus mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i dod la gnas pa
254a7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang+gA'i klung yi bye ma snyed bcus tshe de nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams 'og min de nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
254a8(rgyud): dkyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba rnams 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab par sku gsum gyi rol mo mngon par ston cing mi zang pa'i ngang las yang dag par rdzogs pa
254b1(rgyud): 'tshang rgya dang / 'ang mA slong bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du yang rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug du ma'i skar bstan nas thogs pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du mngon par spyod par mdzad do// de nas gas sa
254b2(rgyud): pa pos// gsang chen ye shes dbang bskur ba// mnyam nyid bde 'i chen pa yis// ye shes dri med dbang bskur ba'o// rdo rje dang ni the la bu dang // cod pan nyi shurtsa lnga yi sa// rig pa'i dbang ni ston par mdzod/ 
254b3(rgyud): bla ma nga rje 'dzin par gyur// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' che// dkyil 'khor kun gyi gcor gyur pa'i// mi bskyod rang byung byang chub sems// rdo rje rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'o// dpal ldan rnam par snang ma
254b4(rgyud): 'od// 'khor lo 'dus pa'i rgyal chen por// rdo rje rtag pa ye shes can// de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur ro// dpal ldan yid bzhin gter 'chang ba// dbang phyug chen po chags pa med// rin chen 'bru
254b5(rgyud): gnas nor bu 'dzin// rin chen rigs kyi dbang bskur ro// dpal ldan pad ma 'bar ba'i mdangs// rab 'bar rgyal ba'i spyan 'chang ba// 'od dpag med pa thub pa che// pad ma rigs kyi dbang bskur ro// 
254b6(rgyud): ldan sangs rgyas phrin las sku// ye shes rgyal po spyi 'phrul che// gdon mi za ba thogs pa med// las kyi rigs kyi dbang bskur ro// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi teSh+Tha badz+ra a b+hi Sheny+tsa sa ma ya shrI ye hUM/ 
254b7(rgyud): sa tra / gtas ti dzu bud sgras kyi'i rnas ma la~M shrI ye d+ha/ oM na ma sa pa thug ta ma d+hid+hiSh+Tha'adzu shAd+ha sa b+hI mA~M la gr-i ba mi/ yor la sirba tathAk+shaSh+Na sa d+hitiSh+Thabadz+ra pad ma a b+hi'i d+has
254b8(rgyud): hrIHaM na maHsa rbata thA ga ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha badz+ra karar+Na ab+hi/ sh+tsa sa ma ya kri ye khaM/ de yang chu'i dus su ni mi bskyod pa'i bum pa'i chus bkru bar byed do// rin chen gyin me tog phreng brda lhag g.yas par ro// 'das
255a1(rgyud): / yini rnam pa rdo rje dang bcas pa'o// las sbyin rol mo sna tshogs sbags pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni bak+Sha shes du ma'o// rin chen 'byung ldan gyis ni dbu brgyan ce ldang nyi
255a2(rgyud): do// mi bskyod pa ni bum chus char dbab pa'o// pad ma'i ni rdo rje bum pa'i steng du bcas pa'o// las kyis ni sgra sgrogs pa'o// brtag pa'i bkra shis brjod pa nyid do// snang ba mtha' yas kyini rnga
255a3(rgyud): 'bar ba gtad ba'o// rdo rje'i ni khrus char ro// rin po che'i ni me tog rab tu gtor ba'o// las kyi ni sgra brnyan gyi tshogs so// sangs rgyas kyi ni gsang sngags brjod pa'o// don yod grub pa ni dril
255a4(rgyud): / bu gtad pa'o// rdo rje'i ni khrus char ro// rin po ches ni me tog char ro// pad mas ni rdo rje dang bcas pa'i loms so// sangs rgyas kyis na tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa'o// rnam par snang mdzad
255a5(rgyud): sa ni gsang mtshan gdags pa'o// rin chen gyis ni me tog spyi bor ro// pad ma'i rdo rje mtho thog tu'o// las kyis ni dril bu mgo thog tu'o// rdo rje rdo rje dril bu bsnol bas mgo thog nag
255a6(rgyud): debu ma chus gtor ba nyid do// de ltar rigs kyi dbye bas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar du rab tu shes par bya ba nyid do// gsang sngags dang rigs sngags dang gzungs sngags kyi lha tshogs rnams kyi sku sna tshogs
255a7(rgyud): palta bas ni kun du sgra'i dbang ngo // gsang sngags dang migs sngags dang gzungs sngags du ma'i sngags brjod pa dang spridums ni kun du gsung gi dbang ngo // gsang sngags dang rig sngags dang gzungs
255a8(rgyud): sngags kyi snying po dang ting nge 'dzin du mas ni kun du thugs kyi dbang ngo // chos kyi rgyal ba mngon par thob par 'dod pas na rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang bskur bar bya'o// gsang ba'i dmachog sbyin pa
255b1(rgyud): spyod pa parnam par dod pa la ni 'dus zhugs kyi dbang bsku ba bya'o// sems can ldanas par gyu phyi/ 'jig rtem mas ni stong dgas// de ltar mas kyis 'dul gyur pa// chos kyi por
255b2(rgyud): skor// gzhan dag drug dang bla ma ni// dge slong rdo rje 'dzi na ba yis// chos gos ri dgas na bltar// mar me mdzad dpal phyag rgya bas// gsang ba chen po'i tshul bstan pas/ 'di lta rang yis lung bstan te// 
255b3(rgyud): thub ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtso// rkang gnyis gtso bor 'byung bar 'gyur// mi 'jigs phyag rgya sbyin mdzad de// dngos po mchog tu grub pa'i phyir// srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton// dbang mchog
255b4(rgyud): thob pa tsam gyis ni// slob ma yon tan bdag por gyur// khams gsum gyi ni rgyal srid me// rgyal ba'i bdag por bstan pa dang // der ni bdud las rnam rgyal zhing // grong byer mchog tu zhugs pa yis// 
255b5(rgyud): de 'dir sangs rgyas nyid thob par/ khyed rnams rje tshom med pa yin// de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rig ma rnam pa gzhug bya zhing // bla na med pa'i dram pas// bdud rtsi dgang pi blo blang bya// khabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i
255b6(rgyud): nga chub sems kyi rgyun// rang 'bab ye shes bcud kyi len// 'chi med ye shes dbang bskur ba// ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// byang chub sbas rnams dbang bskur ltar// de bzhin byang chub sem
255b7(rgyud): bzang pos// bu khyod dbang ni bskur bar bya// de nyid 'ongs spyod rtsal spangs te// gsung gi rdo rje rab bsgrub phyir// rtog med bde ba'i gnas las skyes// dri med gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o// de nas rig pa'i
255b8(rgyud): 'di// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis// glang po can dang ri dwags ma// dung can ma dang sna tshogs can// pad ma can ni rim shes pas// phyag rgya'i dbang ni thob byed yin// lal kyi phyag rgya ma shes rab ma ste/ lob du
256a1(rgyud): / gnyis ma'am/ brgyad gnyis ma'am/ bcu gnyis gnyis ma'i rim pa ste/ de yang gnas dang nye ba'i gnas pa sogs par skyes pa 'am/ sngon gyi smon lam rnam par dag pa'i stobs pa
256a2(rgyud): grub cing ye shes kyi rgyu mthun las byung ba'am/ dbus kyi yul du skyes pa/ dbang po tshang ba/ yan laganyid lag yongs su rdzogs shing mtshan dang ldan pa/ dbang bskur ba thob cing sngags dang rgyud
256a3(rgyud): / sbyor ba shes pa las a ba tu tI ston pa'am// ston pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor ma de las kun 'dar gyi sna rtse las bskyod pa'i bde ba las dga' ba dang / mchog dga' dang dga' bral dang / 
256a4(rgyud): skyes pa'i dga' ba las ye shes mngon sum du nyams su myong ba skyed cing / de las thob pa des snang grags brtan g.yo ma lus pa la rgyas btab pa'i ye shes ro gcig pa'i ngang du rtag tu ga
256a5(rgyud): par bya/ des ni gsang ba'i spyod pa la gnas na shin tu myur ba nyid du rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par byed do// chos kyi phyag rgya ni 'od kyi rig ma las byung ba rang snang ba'i lha mo las rtogs par 'gyur

256a7(rgyud): sang bzab dang rgya che ba'i// ye shes rab tu mi gnas pa// ne gnas lhag mthong rogacigs// bla med gsang chen dbang bskur ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sras bcas 'byung ba
256a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du// dpal mchog 'dir ni gang bstan pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i spyod yul du// rigs kyi dbye ba bsdus pa'i lam// bsam mi khyab pa'i khyad par gang // bya ba spyod pa'i tshul kun gyi// rgyud sde
256b1(rgyud): tshogs lha rnams kyi// dbang bskur rab tu thob pasan// gnyis su med pa'i rgyal zhes brjod// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung da krugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po
256b2(rgyud): gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgya la ba'i rgyud las dbang bskur ba chen po tshad med pa rdo rje la ga nu brdzud pa'o// de nas rgyal po rje dzin// gas bdag pa'i tshul gnas te// phrin las
