256b7(rgyud): dngos po phu su mtshogs bslab par byed do// de byor no gnas kyi sems paskyed pa dang lta su mi te/ 'di nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i dge bca rnams kyis lta ba ni du ma dgab
256b8(rgyud): gas pa'i byang chub kyi snying por bla na med par gnas pa kun du bzang po'i spyod pa ting nge dzin gyi sbom ma 'ayas pa la gnas pa/ dkyil gakhor du ma'i sgo nas sems can gyi bsam pa rdzogs par byaste/ gdus bya'i 'gro
257a1(rgyud): / tshogs ma lus pa rnams la spyod pa'i 'drang bye ba'i sgomang po tshad med pa bstan pas yang dag par mgu bar bya ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang / yang dag par dbugs dbyung ba dang / ga
257a2(rgyud): bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa thob par byed pas 'bras bu'i lam las mngon par dag 'a bas rgyas par byed 'o// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa// da rje sems dpa'ang por bzhugs// dkyil 'a khor na cin gyi
257a3(rgyud): ku rabs// yang dag ye shes mtshan nyid can// gnyis med mnyam pa nyid skyer bas// sna tshogs du ma las 'phro ba// 'jig rtem pa pas nem lus par// dpag med 'od zer tshogs pas ni// dab
257a4(rgyud): skur gyur pa'i lhag pa'i lha// 'gro ba kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// lus ngag yid la gnas nas ni// ye shes rdo rje'i rgyan las ni// skug pung thugs kyang rje yis// dbyer med ngo bo nyid gcig pa// bde ba
257a5(rgyud): na po'i ngang bzhugs pas// rdo rje btsun mo'i blag pas// mnyam par sbyar ba'i yan lag gas// bde dang bde chen lhan cig skyes// dpal mchog rang byung phyag rgya che// 'di las bcom ldan 'das pas
257a6(rgyud): da// sangs rgyas rol pa bsam mi khyab// yang dang / dbang ni skur byed pa// de nyid bla ma yin par brjod// 'di dbang skur ba'i rnal 'byol ba// slob dpon de las gces pa yi// srog ni gzhan du yod
257a7(rgyud): len// rdo rje byang chub sems nyid dang // tha dad med phyir bla ma ni// rgyun du mchod cing bsten byar gsungs// dngos po thams cad yongs su ni// bla ma la ni nges par dbul// 'dis ni dngos grub ma lus
257a8(rgyud): pa'o// 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs par bstan// dpal ldan dbus kyi gnas gyur ba// 'khor lo mchog gi 'khor lo nyid// bla ma mchog la dus rtag tu// spyi bos btud de phyag byar 'os// 'di ni smod pa
257b1(rgyud): bskrun pa la/ zab pa mi ni spyod pa dang // de bzhin tu che ba yi tshul// gnyis med padeb chen po yis// brtul zhugs tshul 'di bstan pa'o// lha mo nyi shu'i bdag nyid kyis// 'dod pa'i yon tan kun rom pa// 'dir ni
257b2(rgyud): rgyu cher gyur pa ste// stong che no rab tu 'joms ma dang // so sor 'brang dang rma bya che// tshal 'dzin mdang rjes 'dzin ma// tsun da dang ni ral gcig ma// nor rgyun ma dang rin chen sgron// 'od zer can can dang dug sel ma// 
257b3(rgyud): ri khrod lo ma can dang ni// gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma dang // mtha' yas sgo dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma// shes rab 'phel byed las sgrib sel// ye shes mi zad pa ma tog/ sangs rgyas chos kyi mdzod dang ni// ku ru ku l+le
257b4(rgyud): gdugs dkar mo// 'di dag gzungs kyi lha mor brjod// zab pa'i spyod tshul blan med// lha mau dgu dang lhan cig tu// gsang ba'i ye shes rol pa ni// mgon po kun du spyod pa'o// gnyis med ye shes bde ba rtse// lha mo sde/ 
257b5(rgyud): dang bcas pa ste// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dus pa ni// mnyam panan chen po spyod pa yin// 'di dag smos bcas spyod pa dang // spros med ye shes tshul gyur pa// shin tu sprom pa med pas ni// 'dod dang bsam 'a'adun
257b6(rgyud): pa dang // dus kyi khyad par rnam dbye bas// b+ha su ku dang kun du bzang // rig pa'i 'tshul zhugs spyod pa yis// nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs dag/ tshar bcad pa dang rjes 'dzin gyi// phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba yi// brtan/ 
257b7(rgyud): g.yod pa dang spad pa'i phyir// bag med 'chab rnam spangs pas// khams cad sa ma'i tshul spong ba// song nyid ye shes shes rabams// phyogs dang brlabs dang srung lding dang // bkal pa dang ni bstod pa 'i sa/ 
257b8(rgyud): ngas par spyad dang bde bar mob// de na la gsang ba'i tshul gnas ma// rdzogs par rlung gi rnal 'byor bslab// rnal 'byor rtag tu mnyam pa nag lag// 'dug pa'i drung ni bgrang bya zhid // ji srid 'bum gyi bar du ni// spya dang / 
258a1(rgyud): / bral bar rtag tu bzlas// sgrub pos sgra dang bral bar ni// 'bum 'azlas yongs su rdzogs pan// 'chi bdag 'joms par 'gyur ba ste// ye shes lnga pi bar dag tu// 'chi ba bslus pa po
258a2(rgyud): med// rtag tu nang ba sos rangs dus// stong phrag gcig tu chags med par// de nyid rdo rje bzlas byas pas// bar du gcod las bzlogs pas na// de phyir rlung gi rnal 'byor la// kun du mnyam pa nagags
258a3(rgyud): par bya// de nyid bum pa can bcings pas// bdud las rnam par rgyal ba 'thob// de nyid rig pas lus kun las// lus kyi khong stong rtsa sbubs dag/ rlung gis nges par dag byas pas// de nyid rngub pa dang ba
258a4(rgyud): bas// khyad par 'joms pa rlung gi las// dbu ma nyid du gnas pa ni// 'byung ba zag pa med pa dang // shin tu bde bskyed byed yin// rlung gis sems ni bskyod med par// rab zhi 'byung ba ldog bdag/ 
258a5(rgyud): gcig tu gnas par byed pa'i las// 'di ni rnal 'byor lam du gsungs// sgo lnga'i rlung ni bsru ba yang // dbang po nang du zlog pa las// phyir la nye bar dmigs mi 'gyur// 'di ni yid kyi rlung zan pa'o// g.yos
258a6(rgyud): / rnams la rengs byed pa// srog ni brtan pa'i tshul gyis su// 'gyur ba med par gyur pa gang // snang ba'i rlung ni brtan pa'o// brtan pa'i ya lag rlung gi lam// rab tu gtod pa'i sbyor ba yis// srog rtso
258a7(rgyud): 'bog par gyur pa na// g.yo med brtan pa nus pa thob// tshad dang grangs las 'das pa yi// mnyam med kun 'dar mar gnas pas// rtog pa ma lus nub pa'i tshe// nyon mongs bdud las rgyal ba nyid// tog
258a8(rgyud): ku las mon ma 'o/ de nyid le shes rgyal ba che// skyes bung gcig la gnas byas te// byang chub shing la rgyab rten nas// mnyam panag nye bar bcings pa la// bsdams grol kyad med krung sa dang / mams
258b1(rgyud): med pa// lung ba'i bdud las rgyam pa yin// rA na mtshar dang // dbu mar 'byung ba brtan pa las// dngas rnams su ma mthong ba yis// lha la bu ying dud las rgyal// rang rig ye shes kyis dgapa/ 
258b2(rgyud): nyon mongs dug gsum rlung dag la// tshar bcad pas ni 'jig rten lha'i// gzugs dag 'gas par byed pa yin// rjes bzung bas ni slar sdud pa// gcig tu byed pa 'di las 'grub// nang du zla ba'i rlung bzung nas/ 'khrul
258b3(rgyud): 'khor drag spyod gtum sa can// A li las byung dag pa las// zla bas 'pho bar mi nus so// gsang ba bzlos pa'i ting 'dzin las// chu ched lnga yi bar dag tu// nyi ma'i rlung la kA li yis/ ngam pa sa nyi ma po'i 'gyur/ 
258b4(rgyud): gzungs dang 'dzin pa rnam bral bar// rag pa sgra zhes bshad pa nyid// bra ba sems kyi rnam pa las// rnam rtog ri ba bcom pa'i phyir// phyi ro la bo 'joms pa dang // thal bar yang ni byed nus pa// bam pa phun sum
258b5(rgyud): tshogs pas so// dug gsum las ni rang bzhin rnams// log rtog dri ma ma lus pa// gzhom byed mi g.yor gnas byas nas// dpung chen rengs par ne tshom med// 'khor ba'i chos nyid spangs pa na// duganyid bdud
258b6(rgyud): sbyar ba dang // rang byung bdud rtsi sbyangs gyur pas// bkres skom med par 'gyur ba yin// bsam pa rnam par dag gyung la// dug sprul 'che bar mi 'gyur te// de las gzhan du bzlog pa yis// dug sbrul gzhan
258b7(rgyud): bar byed// srin du thos par gyur nas kyang // dru rnams la ni bka' bsgobs// log par smra pa'i zho la / dug sbrul chen pa sa ba par 'gyur// gal ta dang byur de dag la// teng 'dzin su ba'i skyeb yig/ 
258b8(rgyud): rnams skad cig gcig gis sel// le zhes rlung pas gyur sa gi/ 'bo med pa cad ngasas// sems can 'dug pa'i srog tshogs che// lcag sogs pa ni 'ching bar byed// gang dus pas dang shes rab las// nyas kyob
259a1(rgyud): / dam sa// da pa gag dam na// bskyem dang brgag par gyung ba mas// gang rnapa sogs su 'arnams// gang ni ga brlog ster bab par gyur// rtsagasum las ni nyung ba dang //  phra gnanams
259a2(rgyud): pa dang // gal te bzlog par gyur pa dag/ shin du chub sems par byed// sred ce la sogs 'jig rten pa'i// bsam gtan te 'dzid gnas byas la// de nyid stong par bcug na na// lha chen dag kyang 'dzin
259a3(rgyud): la/ gzhan du ma rdzag bzhin byed// de nyid du ni gsang chen gyi// phrin las phran tshigs bstan pa ste// rgyud kun du nem bstan cing // sras pa lkog tu byung ba yin// gzung 'dzin rtsa las rlung 'jug pas/ 
259a4(rgyud): srid pa skyed par mdzad// yang dag kun 'dar nyid gnas na// rnam grol zhib mchog thob 'gyur// lte ba'i gnas su srid ni dag/ sna tshogs 'dus par 'byung gnas te// rtsa bcings lha yi bu mi bdud/ 
259a5(rgyud): bye ba la sogs pa// phyi rol du ni 'dul bar mdzad// skyon dag yon tan gyur pas na// mtshon cha'i char la sogs pa yang // rin chen me tog dag tu 'ang // sdug bsngal bde bar shar ba'o// snying ka
259a6(rgyud): dag yongs gsol bar// mtshan ma'i tog pacus gyur pas// yid bcings pas ni phyi rol du// nyon mongs drims mi gos pa// spangs pa nam dag lam gnas pas// nyon mongs bdud ni bcom pa'i phyir/ 
259a7(rgyud): skyed du bzhugs pa las// rnam par bskyod pa mi mda' pa'o// mgrin par longs spyod yangs grub pas// rlung bcings pas ni drug la// longs spyod bkres chung mi mnga' ba// gnod pa sna tshogs zil
259a8(rgyud): gnon cing // yan lag drug bu'i dbyangs 'byung zhing // phung po'i 'dud las rgyal bas ni// mdang sa dang 'od zer lhag par 'byed// rlung 'bog bag med gnas thob pa'o// spyi bo gtsug tor blang gnas de
259b1(rgyud): theg pa 'gyur ba med btan pas// 'chi bdag bdud las rgyal ba ste// dge ba ye shes dri med lam// mthar phyin rnam par rol pa yi// gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa// bcings pa med cing grob med pa
259b2(rgyud): 'gyur ba med par bzhugs pa'o// te khri dang ni tshig stong dang // drug brgya bcas pas rlung dag ni// thams cad dbu mar tham pa ni// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa thob// steng dang 'og tu rgyu ba'i rlung // kha sbyor du ni gyur
259b3(rgyud): las// sbyor ba de la goms byed na// des ni 'od gas lag 'phang gnas// gang gi rnal 'byor spangs pa dang // rlung gi rnal 'byor spong byed pa// des ni bde ba mi 'thob cing // skyes burba shal de dag brlag/ du
259b4(rgyud): dun du ni g.yob yi// rlung pa rnam par goms pas ni// lus sems gnas rnams byin pa rlab pa phyir// kun du ston par nur pa'o// de las bde dang sdug bsngal dang // mtho ris ngan song gar 'jug pa// lus kyi sgom
259b5(rgyud): 'pho ba nyid// rang dbang du ni 'byung bar bskrun// snying ka'i rtsa la yan lag ni// brgyad po 'akra shis yan lag gyur// de nyid bu mo lus gnas pas// dpal be'u ba sogs mdzes par byed// mgrin pa'i gnas su skyes
259b6(rgyud): ki/ rtswa yi yan lag 'byung ba las// rdo rje rin chen pad ma dang / khas kyi rig sapa las byung ba yi// sems dpa' ba ni ba nir yang dka'abyung // don rnal 'byod dru du bstan// lte bar mngon par 'byung ba li// yi ldad ni
259b7(rgyud): 'ang rgyal pa// de rje rigs kyi panya'o// drug cu rtsa bzhir 'byung ba'o// skye ba'i gnas su skyes pa yi// tshul ni yang dag sum su tus// maba'i 'bras sa sa gnyis dag/ yul dang yul du 'byung ba yin// na
259b8(rgyud): ngaskang du// dungag/ bu'i sdang ba 'char// de las rnam par mngon gyur bas// gnod pa srang na skyon thal te// tshig pa dag la midug ste// bar snang bzhin du thogs pa med// nang du dbu mang rang byung cig/ skye sa rgya sa
260a1(rgyud): // ni// brtan pas lus la dbang pob byed// chu las bzhin bya ba la// nges pa nyid du mngon par 'byung // kun 'dar ma yi stong pa der// 'byung ba me yi rang bzhin pas// srin bu me khyer mthong gyur pa/ 
260a2(rgyud): bde nyid bstan pa las// bsregs kyang mi tshig grogs su 'cham// brgya ba bar gyur pa'i bde bar 'gyur// dbu ma'i khang pa'i mthongs su ne// mar me 'bar ba gang gis mthong // phyi dang rten 'brel 'dza bam/ 
260a3(rgyud): tshogs rlung gi stobs chen gyis// bskyod par mi nus phrin las te// gal te myur bar ye shes 'gro// gal te a ba d+hU tI'i nang // gzhal yas ye shes dag pa der// thams cad nam mkha' lta bu yi// stong pa nyid du
260a4(rgyud): charas pa// ye shes sprin med dam mkhar sbyar// chags med mkha' la lding bar 'gyur// bu gad kunas rgyuba'i rlung // rnab 'byor pas ni mnyam zin pas// byung ba spangs pas gnas pa nyid// de tse 'i che dri ru dang / 
260a5(rgyud): sngabs mi 'byung stobs su 'gyur// sku yi rdo rje'i rtags yin no// gang du lus kyi 'byung ba bzhi// pa rlung mgred par btar gyur pas// de nyid du ni sprul pa dang // stod las me 'bar 'od zer stong / dug pa'i las kyi
260a6(rgyud): ba pa yin// chu rlung snying kang bta ba las// byung ba cu ru rab 'a byed cing // kun du sdud par byed pa dang // deb sdang nas chu 'brug 'char/ rlung gi rlung ni ste ru// mnyam par zinan phyi rol du// du mar sprul par
260a7(rgyud): sa pa dang //  gang mgyogs nyid po byed// sa yi rlung nigs gnas su// chen pa de la bo kram/ men mo skyil krung sa byed cing // glang po lta bu'i nub par 'gyur// de nyid srog dang rtsol bas// rab kyis byed
260a8(rgyud): yin// snying gis mdud krol ba las// pad ma'i 'dib ltar rgyas par byed// sprin mtsham pa gnad kyi gro phyenas// mjed spunan du 'byung bar byed// 'dis ni 'gro ba'i lul kun la// 'dug pa rdzu phrul che spyod/ 
260b1(rgyud): to// 'phel bar byed pa'i rlung gis ni// yon tan byas pa'i gta bab pas// bum pa bzang ba grub pa'o// yon tan rdzom med pa'i drung // sna tshogs lha ma ngol pa can// bcu cu ba phrag ni bani dag tu// cu phragag nyis
260b2(rgyud): du shi ku kra// de las kun du spyod pa yis// gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa 'grub// 'dir ni bdud ci bcud benadu// nyams pa med pas dbang thob pas// mi snang bar ni byed pa 'o// de rje bcud lan mchog yin no// rtog pa'i
260b3(rgyud): tshogs ni bdedon du// mi tog mi shes rgyal po ru// bsgyur ba rlung gis byed pa can// gser 'gyur ci yi mchog tu 'gyur// gang du dngos po yongs bsgyur nas// bde ba chen por spyod pa 'am// mi ro lus las yongs rgyas
260b4(rgyud): brten// ye shes ro langs dngos grub yin// chos kun slob med rang gsal du// rgyu 'bras mtshan nyid don byed pas// sa 'og gter mthongs mo pa// dngas pa'i ting 'dzin dang las byung // ting 'dzin ye shes so
260b5(rgyud): tog la// rnam gcod pam dri'i dngos grub ste// gar 'dod dbang phyug grub pa'i rgyal// 'dir ni rlung sems sbyangs pas 'grub// dpag tshad bye ba'i pha rol du// skad cig gis phyir nyi zer do// dngos po du ma'i spang ba
260b6(rgyud): skalas sprul 'a cher ston pas// mchil lham dngos grub phra mo yin// rags pa mchog ni mkhar lo spyod// gang du rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas// mkha' lnga brten pa'i pho brang las// dag pa'i tshul gyur lus kyi
260b7(rgyud): ras spong dgas pa'i gzhal med la// byed par mkhar spyod zhes brjod do// 'jog ma min phug sto las// gang du brgyad pa rnyed nas ni// ri rab ni mngon 'dzegs nas// gnas bcun mong ma 'ang spyod de/ 
260b8(rgyud): na dadu rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi/ skyil krung rdo rjer sangs rgyas pa// snying po 'gyur 'gyur gnas yir// gnas gzhan langs spyod 'phags pa'i yul// ring ba zhes bya mi la lus// 'byung ba bzhis ni bsus
261a1(rgyud): / padag/ rin chen snga bzhi'i rang bzhin can// sum cu rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor ba'i// lha tshogs dag tugyur pa ste// de le nul phran lus las byung // de nyid rten dang brten par bcas// de snyed bcas pa yang
261a2(rgyud): dag 'byung // dur srod brgyad dang bcas par ni// 'khor yug 'jig rten sbal bdag/ nges par 'byung ba bstan pa yin// dbugs ka ne sa bya rig pa ni// dung khrod du ni mgon po rol// phyi nang spyod pa'i dbye ba yis// lus
261a3(rgyud): 'i rgyun ni 'bad pa'o// rtsa ni rgyas pa zhing skyong la// rlung bcu phyogs bcur gnas pa las// phyogs mtshams dbye bas phye ba yin// shing ni rdo rje can
261a4(rgyud): \u0f7f// drang ni spros pa med pa ste// byang chub 'od gsal zhes bya ba// rtsa ni bu ma nyid las stan// rten dang brten pa'i bcas pa dang // srid na mnyam par smod pa'o// 'gro ba kun la khyab pa yi// bla med bya
261a5(rgyud): sems kyi dbus// zhe sdang gi ni gnyen po ches// khyab 'dug 'dul bar mdzad pa'o// bdag nyid phung po khams dang ni// skye mched lha ru gsal ba las// 'dod chags rtog pa dang bral ba'i// dbang phyug chen
261a6(rgyud): po 'dul ba'o// tha ma la rtog pa dag nas ni// zhen med sA ru gnas pa yis// tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'dul byed pa// gti mug dag pa'i ngom nyid// rdo rje bal sogs pas// brgya byin la sogs phyogs skyong bcu// 
261a7(rgyud): nges par 'dul mdzad bsrung ba che// bka' mi 'khor lo bstan pa yin// tshad med bzhin goms pa yi// ye shes mthu yis skar mda' gtong // 'di yis dag rang 'a dbang phyug ni// phrag dog bcom pas
261a8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs// 'jig rten 'ji ga te las 'das pa// gsang ba 'dir ni mngon brjod pas// 'dir ni skyes bu gang 'dug pa// blo gros ldan pas chos 'byung ba'i// kun du zang po nges par de// gro ba'i/ 
261b1(rgyud): don du bstan pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bye skra dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gas dbang dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las las phran chags
261b2(rgyud): bstan pa dang spyod pa bstan pa 'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa dgu par// de nam dpal ldan do rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod// sangs rgyas kun bdag mchog mkhyen pas// gsang ba la
261b3(rgyud): shes bka' stsal to// dam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bsam pa yis// dkyil 'khor gyi ni ngo bar
261b4(rgyud): zhing // dpag tshad de la cha chen te// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yas// logs rel ni gnas pa ste// dpal ldan 'du mang 'dapal mchog las// rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor che// rnam par mkhas pas rtag par
261b5(rgyud): yang // rigs rnams rab tu dgod byab// sangs rgyas dang ni lha mo dang // byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ba// gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs dang // khro bo'i rgyal po bzhir bcas pa'i// so bo'i dbu mar
261b6(rgyud): pa'i// 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dgod par bya// re bo na dadu rigs kyi bdag/ gsang ba rigs kyi bdag po yis// rgyas gdab dkyil 'khor byad par bya// lha rams khyams la dgod pa de// khro bo drug dang bcas papa/ 
261b7(rgyud): dkyil 'ji zhes las bsdus pa'i// tshangs pa dang ni gsang 'dzin gyis/ dkyil 'khor yang dag 'byungs san// ma nartsa gsum brjod pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa stod dag ni// dbus du skye ba pa'i rtsa
261b8(rgyud): // rdo rje rin chen pad mi dang // rab gri 'bar bas khyab pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo no// phyogs 'azhis byab par gnas pa ste// shin tu rgya che'i rnam pa yis// da gci bye ba'i khyo
262a1(rgyud): gru bzhi shin tu gsal ba yi// mdzes pa rta babs dang ldan pa'i// yongs su rdzogs pa'i pho brang las// mchod rten rin chen sna bzha pa// 'od zer phreng bas rnam brgyan pa// gsal zhing rang ba na
262a2(rgyud): dri ma med// dam pa'i rigs ni brgyal sogs// gsang ba rab tu mchod pa'i phyir// shes rab can gyis gnas su bsam// 'dod pa'i yon tan tha rnams kyis// de la mchod pa rgya mtsho bu pa// de nyid
262a3(rgyud): kasang ba yi// rim pa sa rab tu phye ba yi// phyogs dang dus kyis gnas pa yi// lha mo drug brgya bdun du dang // rtsalnga lo na mchod pa nyid// nges par bsdus pas nyis 'gyur du// rin chen na 'tha' pa
262a4(rgyud): pas// byang chub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod// ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsum gyi// gnas de yin par rnam par bsam// bdag ni thugs kha'i sa bon las// mchod pa'i sprin rnams spros na pa ni// nye b.rag
262a5(rgyud): ba'i rim pa yis// mchod pa rnam pa lnga rnams kyis// rtag tu lus kyi lha rnams mchod// de nas de nyid 'dus pa yi// snying po bskul pa brjod par bya// gang yang phyogs bcu mjig rten gyi// khams kyis
262a6(rgyud): rgyal thams cad kun// so so mdzor gyid dkyil 'khor du// dpag med bye ba la gnas te// ye shes mngon par ston mdzad kyang // mi bad khams kyi ye shes las// 'dod yon sgyumar rol pa yis// yongs
262a7(rgyud): su ud pa spyod byed pa// de nyid rnam par me rtog pas// bskul ba med pas mi g.yor bzhugs// gang du gsang ba la spyod pa'i// rig 'dzin mngon par brtson gyur la// spyan ras kyis ni mi gtsigs te// ga
262a8(rgyud): ma pa kyi sol/ sa gas da // gsang bzhi ga shegs pa 'o// gis chen nud pa tshul gnas pa// yongs su rdzogs par gyu nas// da byang rgya zhes
262b1(rgyud): par bya// gang du mi mjed la sogs pa// bye ba phrag ni brgyar gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas chas 'dzin rgyal po ni// sbal ba'i skur na gyur pa yi// sku gsung thugs kyi dmatshig la// dmigs pa
262b2(rgyud): khami brjod pas// gsang sngags mchog gi snying po yi// snying po rab tu gsang ba gsungs// gzugs kyi khams nyid ma du bsdu// dod khams kyi ni A las te// gzugs med du du brjod par bya// ma
262b3(rgyud): gsum bdag nyid gcig pa'i dang // mchog gi khyad par gsang ba yi// snying po bskal pa nyid yin no// rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs pa yi// dkyil 'khor ga sang ba'i 'byung gnas nyid// sku gsung thugs ni
262b4(rgyud): / dadam tshig la ni dmigs par gsungs// spyod yul byung ba oM yin te// dmigs pa med pa AH yin no// mi shigs hUM du gyur pa'i phyir//  dang med pa'i sbyor ba'o// 'di ni longs spyod rdzogs sgra yi// 
262b5(rgyud): mchog tu basprul par gsungs// gsang ba rigs kun bdag po yi// ngo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po la// mi g.yo gnas med rtag pa las// gcig tu gyur byed dror dro ni// gsang bsku yi bu so// dri med
262b6(rgyud): skye med AH/ tog med srong nyid ye shes hUM// grwa gapung thugs kying dzi ni// mi phyed gcig gur lam 'di las// rgyun mi chad du bskul gyur na// zhag 'dun gyis ni nyer 'grub ste// dam pa'i rigs ni brgya dag/ 
262b7(rgyud): gis/ na ma ma me gnas 'o// legs yangs su dag pa'i gnas// sra ma ba ca bsngal/ nga shi kyis pa g-i/ ra shing ji 'dzin pa mas// ma 'dres dag pas skyed pal bya// 
262b8(rgyud): snang bar spor pa'o// de nyid rags ni lnga dag gi// rnal 'byor yongs su spyod pa las// bla med phyag rgya chen po'i gnas// gsung gi snying po bskul gyur pas// tshad med byang chub dang las bskul// 'di ni dmachog
263a1(rgyud): chen po yin// mchog tu gsang ba bdag med pas// ma gsum du ni khyab pa yis// bde ba lhan cig skyes par bskul// de nyid dbyer med sna ma lam// yi ge mchog gyur gcig pa las// rlung sems
263a2(rgyud): gnyis su med par de// thugs kyi snying po mchog tu bskul// gang du lhag pa'i lhar gyur cing // rdo rje 'dzin par gnas pa las// 'od zer lcags kyu ma 'dres pa// nyi shurtsa lus spros pa las// bsam gtan
263a3(rgyud): nga'adzin ger spyod pa// spyi bo gnas ni bskul bar mdzad// 'di nyid dri med dbyangs gyur pa// 'od zer kha dog lnga dag gis// gsung gi sgo nas bskul ba gang // ye shes sprin ni 'phro byed pa'o// 'dir ni rngam
263a4(rgyud): / 'byor dbang phyug gis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// khyad par thugs las bskur gyur pa// sa gsum du ni khyab byed yin// mi phyed rdo rje sems dpa' ni// dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur phyir// zla
263a5(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje 'bar ba yis// thams cad ro mnyam ngang du bskul// gang du rnal 'byor mchog 'dod pas// rdo rje dang ni b+ha ga dag/ thabs dang shes rab tshul dag tu// mnyam par sbyar ba'i dbang po yis// snyoms pa

268b2(rgyud): bak+ku shis byed pa'o// bre shab ni dge ba ster// bi sha pa ni 'dus pa la// kunA pa la 'tsho ba song // ma kar d+han+t+ra ba ne// mi phyed dbang po 'byung ba'o// ma skar ni dag par byed// bi rde ka ni rnam par rgyal// b+ha k+Shu
268b3(rgyud): la ni rten pa ste// swa bA zhes pa phra ba gang // ka ma ni zhes rgyan yin te// 'di dag lus ngag yed dag la// dkar phyogs bde ba 'phel byed yin// de las rnam par bzlog pa ni// nag phyogs ma rungs
268b4(rgyud): mngon brtson pa// b.rams gti mug rmongs par gnas// rnal 'byer pas ni 'dir shes pas// lus rnams thun gyis 'dir dag pas// bcu gnyis dag tu bstan pa yin// khyad par bsdus pa'i tshul
268b5(rgyud): shes pas// rgyud dang thabs dang khyad par gyi// bla med ye shes tshul 'di bstan// 'khor de'i rgya mtsho chen po las// de nyid rnam par 'khrul gyur pas// rten 'gro ba yan lag bcu gnyis mu// lugs
268b6(rgyud): su 'byung bas 'khor ba yin// chos nyid sna tshogs 'khor yor na/ lam du spyod par rim shes bya// log pas lha dang btul zhugs 'dzin// de pra dol bas thar pa med// dman pas mngon
268b7(rgyud): mthang spyod pa las// dkar ba'i phyogs gnas skyabs gsum las// mos pa po nyan das ni pa'i lam// ngal gso tsam las dam dag min// byed par byang chub sems dpa'i lam// rtsab sa bon byang
268b8(rgyud): chub sems// de las ring chen sngon shing gi/ pang sdong lo 'dab me tog rgyas// 'bras bu bde gshegs yid bzhin nor// dgos dod drim med pa'i gter// ten 'brel lugs bzlog chos 'byung / 
269a1(rgyud): bab dang rgya che'i snying po ni// grub mtha' du ma rtags pa'i gnas// de ni yang dag gnas mi 'thob// gsang brda rje theg pa las// rgyud sngang snying po 'dus pa don// drug
269a2(rgyud): lnga'i tog pa sbyangs gyur pas// dbang dang las kyi rim pa las// sku gsums la dbang phyug 'thob// phye nang spyod pa 'don gnas la// dam tshig gnas pa'i tshul bzhin stod// spyi dang byung bar/ 
269a3(rgyud): sku gsum dang // smra ba ni ye shes rdzogs pa'i gnas// mngon par byang chub lnga dang ni// drug pa dang pa'i mnan pa las// ye shes rgya mtsho sprin 'phro bas// rigs ni brgyad nga snying dgaH// spos dang / 
269a4(rgyud): da pa gsang chen gyi// gcig pa mi zad sems bskyed pa// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yang // dkyil 'khor snying po 'byung ba yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi
269a5(rgyud): / gagasang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las snying po mchog tu bskul ba dang yongs su dag par ston pa'i le'u ste 'dun cu pa'o// de bzhin gshegs
269a6(rgyud): pathams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchod pa gsang ba bla na med pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las rab tu phyung ngo // dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// bdag gi khu ba la sogs pas
269a7(rgyud): ka bzhin du kun mchod na// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// rig ma gzugs bzangs mdangs dang ldan// lo grang sa bcu drug lon pa la// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas gsum gyis/ dper/ 
269a8(rgyud): mchod pa rab tu brtsam// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo mchog/ spyan la sogs par bsgom par bya// yi ge hUM dang oM dag dang // AHdang phaT kyang rab tu bsgom// 'od zer sna lngas khyab pa yis// pad ma
269b1(rgyud): rtse gcig pa// 'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin du dgar// yid du 'ong ba bsgom par bya// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sar bas// sangs rgyas dngas grub thob par 'gyur// b+ha ga la ni met+pa gzhag/ sang pa/

269b3(rgyud): / tshul du bya// rab tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su// dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi legs byug pa// shes rab yum gyi b+ha ga yi// dkyil 'khor pad ma'i dbyibs gnas pa// ba dog dpar po e yi dbyibs// de la

269b6(rgyud): rige ma yongs su sbyangs pa gzhug/ bla ma la ni dgul bya zhing // gang du maN+Dal me tog dang // mchod pa ye shes sngon byas te// b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du// rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba 'dzin// me tog/ 
269b7(rgyud): / bcas pa'i lha ma la// mnyam par phyag bya gsol pa gnas// mgon po gsang ba 'dzin pa po// sems dpa' chen po bdag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes che// thams cad stong
269b8(rgyud): mtshan nyid nyalas myong gcig pa nyid// rdo rje gsang bas bdag la gsol// las dang skye ba las grol ba'i// tshe 'dir byang chub mchog thob la// khyod zhabs pad ma spangs nas ni// 
270a1(rgyud): gzhan du skyabs ma mchis// 'gro ba da pa ba grub chen po// de bas sro ma chog mnyes pa ma sa// de ltar gas la ba ga dab ma// dam pa des na pa gyur nas// dpal ldan tham yin ta
270a2(rgyud): mchos// snying rje slob ma la bskyed de// bzhin ni rab tu dang gyur nas// rang gi brtse bar rab dga' zhing // gsang brgyud las bde thob pa// bzang po'i dam tshig dkyil 'khor bstan// de nas slob dpor rgobs/ 
270a3(rgyud): zhugs nas// ka la sha'amadung chos su// byang chub sems ni rab byung ste// oM AHbadz+ra d+h+r-ig hUM/ bzang po'i phreng ba nye bar sbyin// de nas slob mde la ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis byin brlabs te// 
270a4(rgyud): rgyal ba'i phyag rgyar bcas pa yis// dam tshig gsang ba sbyinagur pa// da rje car ni phyed dus su// dbang bskur ba ni sbyin par bya// bkra shis sma ni bsgrags pa dang // rol mo'i sgra skad sna tshogs kyis// kyi
270a5(rgyud): 'khor 'khor lo'i rgyal po yis// khams gsum rdo rjes dbang bskur ba// slob ma bdud cing thal sbyar ba// 'dir ni rab tu bskur ba yis/ khyad par nang du nges dbang bskur// phreng ba chu dang rdzogs sangs
270a6(rgyud): sa// rdo rje spel bu ming dang ni// slob dpon dang / dang gnang ba sbyin// dbugs dbyung gzeng bstod lung bstan pas// dbang bskur rim pa 'di sbyin bya// de nas bdag byin brlab pa'i rim// bcud du byang 'i thabs
270a7(rgyud): bstan pa// kun rdzogs bden pa yang dag sbyin// byang chub sems kyi dkyil gakhor du// khyad par bde chen dbang bskur ba// rig ma dag par sbyangs pa dang // maN+Dal me tog bcas pa yis// de nas gsol pa/ 
270a8(rgyud): gad ba par bya// smram yang blams gsang ba brjod// sunam byen ye shes phung po cad// srid pa'i lakhor ma rnaMm myong gi// de ring bshad pa'i rin chen gyis// gam thos pad sal bag 'dzin gsol// khyod nabs 'dra
270b1(rgyud): yang dag de// gtso mo gzhan sa skyabs ma mchis// 'gru ba'i dpa' gro grub chen gyis// bdag la nges par dbang bskur cig/ de ltar lan gsum badzad nas na// b+h+ra ma lan bka' sum zhu// lha mo gzugs 'arang // 
270b2(rgyud): mdangs ldan pa// la grangs bcu gnyis lon nad pa// rigs kyi sbyor bas rab bsgoms te// bdag gi zhabs mchod par bya// nga rje srab dpan nag pa chos// de la lag pa der gtad de// gzungs ma shing
270b3(rgyud): / dga' 'di// brten byar sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtags// rdo rje pad pa rab sbyor ba'o// bde ba dam pa yang dag myong // bde ba dpag med dbyung ba'i gni// ye shes chen po 'dir rtogs bya// zhabs pa
270b4(rgyud): siny+tsa// 'di las gnan ba mchog med de/ 'gro ba gsum bdag dag par// dga' ba yang dgatogs par gyis// de bas dam yang 'did na// khyed kyis bral bar ma byed cig/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de// rin
270b5(rgyud): / btul shug zhan med// rmongs pa gang zhig 'di spong ba// de la mchog gi dngos grub med// de nas dri zhim me tog sbas// gcer bu chu skyes ston par mdzad// bshang gci la sogs za ba dang // khrag dang lu bde ni
270b6(rgyud): rtag par bud med mchog gus pas// b+hag pad mar 'o byed dang // de ltar sle bar byed dmachi// ji ltar bad bar smras shig bu// de ni nye par gzung byab// banang gci'i bdud rtsi bachar byab// bud med rtag sum
270b7(rgyud): mi byed// gas ba'i bad par byed pa// lha mo bdag ni cis me s+ho// de ni nya bar gsan pa yis// gsang ba'i tshig 'di brjod par 'gyur// e mdo bdag gi pad ma 'di// bde 'thams cad kyis ni gnas// ga ba zhi// 
270b8(rgyud): pa// sa ma dgasanas te// sangs rgyas ziyin pa pa sogs pa// pa mar bya bzhin gyis// di can rgyam bar ma da pa// 'did pa teg tu zugs// rdza / 
271a1(rgyud): ga ta a nu rA ka Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko&ho/ 'dod chags bra pa' lta'u yi// khams gsum na ni sdig med de// de bas 'dod la chags bral bar// khyod kyis rnam par ma byed cig/ bde chen da

271a4(rgyud): tad pas gnas pa ni// yongs su sdom pa rig pa 'dzin// rnal 'byor dbang phyug gar mkhan te// sdom pa bcom ldan pang dag 'dzin// 'dir ni rim pa 'di zhes bya// sha chen dam tshig mchog gis ni//

271a6(rgyud): rigs dag pas// rdo rje dgug pa'i dam tshig yin// / ba byed 'thung shing kun du bya// rin chen rigs la nges 'byung ba'i// khyi sha dag gi mtshig gis// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// mur

271b1(rgyud): dpa' zhi mi ldog pa// las kyi rigs kyis byin brlabs pa'i// glang ba'i ga yid ma cheg gis// mngon shes lnga gtsang 'gyung ro// mu phyag rgyar yi rnam pa las// ne sdang dang mthong rdung rin//

273b7(rgyud): las de 'ad 'gas byung // gti mug khya ba byed dus kun du// 'bral ba med par gnas pa yin// de nas me dang mnyam pa las// phrag don 'byung bar gyur ba yin// blangs pa las ning rgyal dang /

274a1(rgyud): ma rig pas na de dag las// rten 'bral bcu gnyis tshul du la khang // dag gsum las na rtsa gsum ste// chags sdang dbang gis po mor byung // de phyir sto
274a2(rgyud): las kyis ni// skye ba dang ni bache 'phor 'gyur// rab tu dngos pa rnam par shes// 'dagasal byang chu gnas 'di yin// cung zad tsam du dngos po las bde ba las ni 'dod par gyur// gsal
274a3(rgyud): bas gzugs khams kun du ste// mi rtog pas ni gzugs med du// nges par 'char 'chos nyid can// rten cing brel bar 'byung ba yid// khams ni stegs mar gyur pa las// kun du'ang ning

274a8(rgyud): me ni// bshang ba' lam nas khang bzangs su// mthong nas kun du 'jug par 'gyur// dus der/ 
274b1(rgyud): las// ra tu na la skad cag la// A la~M kA li zhugs mu te// mchog tu dga' ba yang du/ sog/ bu 'dang na
274b2(rgyud): khrag bcas pa'o// dbus su par de'i shes pa ni// 'dus pa thig pa'i gzugs su gnas// dang pa'i rnam panur nur po// de las mer mer po ru gyur// ltar ltar po dang go gor po// rlung rnams kyis ni
274b3(rgyud): bskul gyung bas// sha yi rnam pa mthang gyur du// lnga ba'i dus su rkang lag dag// yan lag lnga di da ster bas// bdun du gyur tshe mtshan ma dang // sra dang sen mo pa skye tshogs// mthong ba'i ma shes
274b4(rgyud): rdzogs gyur pa'o// brgyad pa'i dus su cher rtags shing // zla ba dgu ni lus kun rdzogs// bcu pa yul gyi rtsol ba byed/ 
274b5(rgyud): ni 'od dpag med// gdon mi zab go dgor po// rnam snang ma khrang gyur dag tu brjod// gnas skabs 'byung ba lnga ldan pas// chu dang rlan gyis sdud pa dang // drod dang me yis smin par byed// sa sa ni
274b6(rgyud): brtan dang bskyed pa las// rlung gis g.yo zhing 'phel bar byed// nam mkha' kun du ten gur pa'o// dri mu khrag ni 'dus pa yi// dri chu'i cha ni mi bskyod nugs// gzhi mnyam rnam par sdang mdzad de// 
274b7(rgyud): khrag ni 'dod chags med pa'i tshe// sha ni rin chen rgyal po nyid// phu ba gdon mi za pa re lus// zla ba mi long ye shes te// nyi ma mnyam pa nyid gyur ba// sa bon rnam pas sor rtog/ phyag mtshan las ni/ 
274b8(rgyud): nyid de// thams cad gcig gur nan tan 'arjod// lus kyis gong bu bsdus pa las// snying nyid chas dbyings ye shes 'arjod// mngon par byang chub lnga yis ni// bskyed dang gnas dang sdud par mang ngo // 
275a1(rgyud): de nyid ye shes yongs dag pa// sangs rgyas lnga yi byang chub sems// gsang ba mchog tu bstan pa yin// skye gnas dbus su rtsa gnyis ni// g.yas dang g.yon na de bzhin
275a2(rgyud): gnas// g.yon nas khu ba de bzhin te// g.yas na de bzhin khrug yin no// de dag gcig tu gyur pa ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang ba zhin no// las kyi sa bo dbang thob pas// rlung gis yang dag
275a3(rgyud): bsgyur nas ni// chos kyi 'byung gnas pad ma'i sdod// gdong ni nges par phyogs par gyur// dkug yas su ni brten nas su// tsog pur mngon par phyogs te gnas// dgugayon yang dag
275a4(rgyud): nas ni// shes rab g.yas su mngon par phyogs// sa bon lhung bas dus kyis ni// 
275a5(rgyud): thams cad du ni skyes bur byed// gAyas nas nges par rgyu ba ni// kun dbu mor 'byung ba yin// babs dang shes rab chalas ni// bzlog pa'i go des shes 'bya// gnyis /  'dabus
275a6(rgyud): bas na// mtshang dang ni rnam pa byung // 'di dag 'gyur b.ro shes pas// theb pa mtshan nyid btag par bya// 'di ltar gsang ba'i lus 'byung ba// bskyed dang gnas pa 'jig tshul du// 'dir
275a7(rgyud): byas par bstan pa'o// dmang ba nas ldan ma gan gsungs pa// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i tshigs/ khams cad gyes pa skye du hU~M /  thug
275a8(rgyud): pangan par byang chub ye shes pas// rigs kyis khyad par 'byung ba dod// 'gro ba sangs rgyas rnam pa can// nga ba nyid ges snying pa'i gnas// rdo rje 'dzid pas gang gsungs pa// gzugs
275b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byo byed// 'di ni rnam pa kums sbyin //  shes mi chag giganyen gyis gas so// de dag sgrib pa rnam se la sogs// kun gyim thos shing tshang tshu la// legs solas
275b2(rgyud): senas brjod cing // dam ma gyu cing ma dbyung ba'i// dgangs pa cang dmigasung bajugs// 'di dag rgyas kun rag tan ni gnyis med pa// phyogs bcu kun nas snang ba'i rgyal ba na pa cegs/ 
275b3(rgyud): dus ga sems na 'gas rnaMms la pang bsla / lam kya ma lus gnas las kyi byed ma chos na// de zhin gshegs pa thams cad rgyas+yA gsung da krugs kyi sa
275b4(rgyud): kas 'dus par gyu chen pa gnyis su med pa ma ma shing rnam par rgyal ba las sangs byasamams cad kyis sems can gyi khams bskyed pa dang bsru 'di ni bstan pa'i len ste bdud 'gyu
275b5(rgyud): nyis pa 'o// / de nas rgyal po rje 'dzin// gsang ba dpal ldan byang chub sems// srid ni mnyam par sdud mdzad pa// 'bar 'drag pas tshul 'di gsungs// dpal ldan yid 'byin no 'i
275b6(rgyud): gdang // spyod ba sbyin pa'i tshul bstan pa// gas 'a 'gro pa'i dgos 'ad skyong // nor ste ltam tha' 'dir basbyin pa'o// b+h+ya/ 'phags pa yid nin no bu'i mdag/ na la gsum phyag zugags
275b7(rgyud): kyi dka rini chen sna tshogs rgyan smras pa// sku mdog las byung rigs 'phro bas zhen nu rgyal mes dbu brgyan pa/ g.yas pa s+ho ji g.yon mar ga/ dang po gnyis kyis ne'ule li kha nas sgyug byed nor bu dzin// g.yas

276a7(rgyud): 'di nyid de ma thag srung nas// ye shes dam pa bka' stsal to// hrIH shin du dben ning rab tu nyams dga' bar// dpal ldan 'jig ta dbang phyug bsgom par bya// de nyid ram mkha'o

276b3(rgyud): maudangs// g.yas pa kurba ut+pal sngo dag yin// ri che sna tshogs can spras thugs rjecan// dang po gnyis kyis ye shes reg ma la// rdo rjes gol spro rabs 'khyud par mdzad// b.rams pad mang
276b4(rgyud): bu nor bu 'dzin// thams ral gre 'khor lo sdams pa'o// der gyis cod par sna chags kyis brgyan mdzes// dor thugs kar zu la gnas pa// rang srogs pon sdeHyig rnam par bsam// de yi rang
276b5(rgyud): ma las tshogs 'phros pas// 'dzub ma khris do ni phud chags pa la rtog pa'i rlog sa ma lus sa pa byed pa// nub pa dab 'i phyogs mtshams rang 'phros pas// sna tshogs nor bu 'gro ba'i don
276b6(rgyud): gang 'anas// skar 'dus rang la phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor ba le// 'khor po'i lha chags dam pasam par bya// rdo rje chen po'i snying pa yi// kha dog dkar po rnam par bsam// hUM/ yi kyis sprin gyis shing na
276b7(rgyud): 'bar// bla ba'a'ang zer byin tu bsil// gnas 'ani dag tu sbyor ba yi// de mthag tu 'byung bar byed// khan gsum legs par sgoms pas na// sprug pa dag tun ma bsams nas// nam mkha' gang ba'i
276b8(rgyud): dug kun yang // de sa thag tu med par byed// 'don dngas kyi drug ni bar byed pa'o// An 'bras dang rtsol meg 'brum bu dang // gang gan nang dubi ga pa rnams// phyag na rdo rje bka' bzhinas/ 
277a1(rgyud): khasam pa tsam gyis med pa gyung // padama' ba ba 'du brgyad pa// da yi dbus su dragabs panas// 'od sde dra ldani rdzogs par s+ho// dug bsdub ni 'das nag/ bskul baman na
277a2(rgyud): dkar ba yin// bsam gtan gnas ni gsang ba gang // ye shes dri med gas chen yid// de la 'dis ni de ba'i dug/ thams cad drang gA'i snying pa'o// gang dus 'dag/ klu las gyur// gnod pa
277a3(rgyud): ngan pa byung gyur pa// 'dis ni skad cig dag gis kyang // nges par ni bar byed pa yin// dpal ldanas she sgra ster bas// gdag pa'i 'tshe yini byed pa// bad sdong thod pa bdud kyi bcas/

277b1(rgyud): tu// 'do ye shes ma stong bas// spang ba'i dngos sul 'anas tha' byed// da rje ma byed gsum bsgoms pas// skragasung thugs kyis nga \u0f7f// dzad lcags kyu'i 'ad zer kyis/ lags
277b2(rgyud): sa thams cad 'gugs pa'i mchog/ nga rje las byung thams cad pa// rang sngags skas bu bskams nas ni// rab tu mdzes ma'i mtshag rnams kyis// snying khar dadza'abang bar sbyar/

277b4(rgyud): el yi 'khor lo ster byer bya// sngags kar bsrung pyir ye shes mchog/ rdo rjenan gyis bya ba ste/ 'di ni dang mkhas pa'i// byang chub srung ba'i ngan chen bya// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ye shes rdo rjes

277b8(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas pad+mo 'byung ba'i khrob chen po 'di nyid kyi mu dang gsung dang zugs rdo rje las rab tu byung ngo // yin pa sa ma n+ta k+Sha ma thAg d+d+ha hA
278a1(rgyud): hA/ oM shrI bang kro d+ha bad+mAn krita ha ya k+She ba hU~M trA~M hu lu tra lu hU~M phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// chos kyi rdo rje che mchog skyes// de nas 'jigs shing rgyal bar 'gyur// ye shes
278a2(rgyud): rgyal po rjes su dran// mnga' nga byi sa dug gis yongs gang ga/ rdo dza tra la ha la 'od// dro ba'i rgyal po bskul ba yis// dug rnams skad cig gis med byed// rdo rje mchog baspyod pa 'byung bar
278a3(rgyud): rjes gsungs so// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje bdud rtsi bcud gyur mchog/ 'bar ba'i 'od zer
278a4(rgyud): 'phro ba can// rdo rje sprin ni kun dul rnags// khros shing khrobacas gnas pa dang // mche ba rab tu rnob ni// nga sgra 'ad mtshig dbyung byed pa// bsgoms na khri bo mchog 'di mnyes// 'di ni khro bo thams
278a5(rgyud): dkyis// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig yan// bcom ldan 'das su rdo rje'i dam tshig pi 'od zer stug po'i mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas khro bo mi 'chi gsang ba 'di'in

278a8(rgyud): dang ni mgrin pa dang // snying 'a nas tshe rkang pa'i bar// rordo rje 'ur bus rab tu bsgom// dam tshig 'di las 'ad mi bya// 'di ni pu dbus rnam par 'phrul// khasam gtan rje pur bu yis// sangs rgyas dag kyang / 
278b1(rgyud): nges par 'bas// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po \u0f7f// phung bus btab na med par 'gyur// me ye rus pa'i bur buni// de rjes yi bur buste// gte mug gnas la gdab par bya// po dang dag pa'i gnas gyur

279b7(rgyud): pa'i lakhar lo ma lus mchod par bya// mchog 'di de dag kun du rab cad dul// bas la spyad ci snying ka'i zla ba 'i// 'tshar lo'i gtso ba rang gi gas sngags kyis// ku du dmigs te byang chub sems kyis te/ 
279b8(rgyud): mo nyid kyur 'od dang ldan par bsam// dngos pa de dag gsum gyis shAs bya ste/ khams cab mnyam pa nyid du ma dgapa// de nyid su yi do rje la sogs pa// lha rnams kun du tshim pa nyid du bya// khyi 'i sbyin sren /

292a1(rgyud): gsum pa// g.yas pa sa nges par 'dzin par mdzad// stegs mdzul nags pa bum pa ni// g.yon du nges par 'dzin pa'o// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgya// rdo rje skyil khrung
292a2(rgyud): bzhugs par bsam// sbal 'bar ba'i 'od 'grobs// gnod pa ma lus ni byed pas ma// 'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang // rlig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po kun// rab tu 'drar bar gyur nas ni// ye shes
292a3(rgyud): rgyal po rjes su dran// rig pa 'dzin pa'i lha mo mchog/ gser gyi rna cha g.yon pa rnams// sngags kyi rig pa 'di dang ni// dam tshig la sogs pas bkug bya// gang du phrin las ma lus pa// gsang
292a4(rgyud): bamachog tu bsgrub pa ni// 'gog pa'i rgyal po rje 'dir// yongs su rdzogs pa mangs mchog gis// ye shes de rje gsum las 'byung // kun nas de mthag tu gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun nas dbyangs
292a5(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms pa zhug panapa do ldan pa'i bsgom pa'i nga mtshig 'di nyid kyi sru nga gsung dang tshug pa rnalas // ni i ma hA 'i ng+ga d+ha rtsa'i rgyal lda ye d+hAn 'i shud nas d+han ba skyen
292a6(rgyud): kyi 'amang ma yi// dmam me rje sa sa// nas pa pa'i mi shes gyu// la sus rjid kyi tshig gis// do ma kyi nas chenan// khram dang nadang sems / 
292a7(rgyud): dru byed rdzalas// lag sa/  shes kyis dus// bdapa' 'a ma /  chen s+ho// klu'atshug pa nga ga/ gas rnams kyis
292a8(rgyud): pa ba'ang// dran rnams thams cad yang mjugs pa// rdo rjesems dpa' rgyam 'im// khamams la sag sa kyi mi ze dang/ nad rnam ma yin byed pa//  ba ye shes byamatshanan// de la log
292b1(rgyud): sa gyu// di ni kyi grug pa// gsang sa nye par bsdus pa// rdo rje mchog le shes me/ da ces bya ba te nge 'dzin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyagan rdo rji 'di gshesas pa dpa 'ja
292b2(rgyud): bzhin ga shegs pas rdo rje bsam gtan gyi dmatshig gis mchog 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang bugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // bI oM a badz+ra a kA gar+b+ha yar tA d+hi phaT swA hA/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od babang po// nam ma
292b3(rgyud): dbyings kyi dbus sugs pa// da rje bras sum sbyor ba yis// skyed pa dzini rnam par bas la// zhal gsum pa phyag drug la/ ba nad tad dgul// la ra mi uta pa la sdong bung dag// ral gri 'bar ba bsnams par
292b4(rgyud): bka ka// rgyar rnams thams cad yong sa rdzogs pa// drang zad ser po rje gying // ni 'thor rmugs pa rgyad can// de bsams rgyas pa'i las kun la// myur ba nyid du grub par byed// 'di ni sngag 'arnams rnams
292b5(rgyud): bad kyi// dam cheg shin du 'da' dkar ba rdo rjed par po'i rlabs kyi phreng 'azhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// sru gsungs thugs kyi rdo rje las// lus dang ngas dang sems bsgom pa// sbyor mu banyid kyis bya ba ste// 'di sa ni
292b6(rgyud): dngas su lta 'tho byung // dam tshig 'a byang chu gas// 'gro'i don du pa sa sa// dongag su bye me ga dgras can// de rje las kye phyag rgya badzad// dam chog stong ba bad ma// nad par blo 'ing
292b7(rgyud): sdud par mdzad// 'grol dngos grub rgyun byed pasas// chos kyi phyag rgya ye shes che// gsang yang mchi gzod pa ni// srog gi snying por gyur pa ye// ma 'or sngags las ra' grub pa// de nyid las ni 'bar mi byed/ 
292b8(rgyud): sa dung gsum sugasu ma 'i// mig la sngags kyi stong baba'i// ying bar 'gros byag rgya// degangs gam padag pa'i 'das// sru nga gsung ra gas pa 'o// dbye bad rdzi sakyig gnas
293a1(rgyud): / dbang ni 'i ma khyer mitshig pas// rang shi zang pa sa dang // dzad pa'i las dang ldan 'dang/ longs spyod ma la kA ma cheg ste// gas nga 'azung ba'i gnas dang ni// de nyid par
293a2(rgyud): sa cig ste// rnam pa dang ban bang pa// mtshan nyi sngar pas nga ga las// stong ba dang zhin bdug // dbye ming rgyu sa/ rigs su kyib kyang ba ga pa// rigasas skur
293a3(rgyud): thun med tshul// 'di dag gsum pa'i don bstan pa'o// longs spyod thob bya med nas tshul// 'di ni dam tshig dag par brjod// 'dis ni dam tshig tu mtsho yi// sngags kyi gas rab bsdus pa'o// sems ni
293a4(rgyud): rab tu dang bas rtse gcig rdo rje nyid da kyis// dmachis gsang ba mi zang rgya mtsho rab bsten na// de rings tshogs chung bde bas 'gro ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rab tA mnyam nyid rtag pa nyid du mngon du 'grub// 
293a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor thams cad bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhi gshegs// ma lus khams gsums rnams kur// dbang phyus de mi longs spyod cing // bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad
293a6(rgyud): de/ rgyal sras thams cad bdag nyid min// phung po 'di dag sangs rgyas te// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rkyen du gyur// gnyis med de bzhin nyid sbyar bas// de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchog/ ma lus
293a7(rgyud): bdas rgyas m+b+ha hA/  byu napa sems/ dkyil la snyed kun pa'i mnas// blan med can pa ma/ ma ma can paba'i las // kI d+ha rma byung
293a8(rgyud): sems bskyed smon dang 'jug pa nang // zab dang rgya che dbyer med pa// me ldos pa yi mngon gyur pas// 
293b1(rgyud): 'dag pa// dag padang ni 'das par// lags shes kyang 'bartse// khas pa 'thag cad chu thong 'a'o// de nas rgyam po rdo rje 'jed// bla med ye shes 'byung ba gnas// gsang bangag pa dkyil 'khor gyi/ 
293b2(rgyud): ye shes baba' bka' kyal mngab// tshogs kyi 'dza ba zim pa nas nyid dang // dpa' ba dang ni dpa' mod pa// ston mar gyur panyid dang yang // sna chogs sngon mo'i ngam shes pas// thabs dang shes rab pa
293b3(rgyud): ba yis// mchog tu gyur pa 'dir brjod yin// 'dir ni nam mkha' la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yi ge hUM la bskyed pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i lte ba'i cha la hUM gnas pa nyid de/ 'og tu yaM las
293b4(rgyud): bskyed pa'i rlung gi dkyil lakhor grwa'as rgyal mtshan sngo ldang gis mtshan pa'o// de'i steng du ri dmang po las byung ba'i ma'i dkyil lalar gru gsum pa'abar bdums mtshan pa rnam par bsam par bya ste/ dkyil
293b5(rgyud): 'khor ba'i lha rnams thams cad thun mong du bdud rtsi myang bar bya ste/ de dge las byung ba'i thod pa skya bo gsum gyi steng gi bar snang gi char a dkar ba las byung ba'i bad ma'i snod du blta ste/ de'i nang du 'god pa
293b6(rgyud): gur kum dang / sman dpa gabur dab pa ma pa/ sI ka s+ye/ pu'i shar ba ste/ bdud rtsi lnga'i rtsarag tu glang ro ched dang/ rta dang / bgrang dang / kyi ri sha dang sna tshogs pa'i shaste/ had+ya ga kun ste so sor thabs dang
293b7(rgyud): shes rab kyi 'dag nyid du sbyar ba ste/ d+hu n+du drA hrI laM steng dgi ca po// aM kA nA bI hUM rnams 'og gi chal ste/ yang dbyags dang mtshams kyi na'o// de dag kha dol mo mar yas la bar ma 'dres par blta ste/ 
293b8(rgyud): rdzalas kyang ba'i 'od ze rang bal tu med pa po de'i 'od phyir log pas de nyid kyi nang nga thim nas yi ge gsum mngon par bsngags te/ me'i dkyil 'khor de'i 'ong 'bar ba rnams kyis de ga ru bar gyur
294a1(rgyud): padang / ngag gan med pa pa dbu ma mdzu ba ni yongasasu myed pa'i dag nyid smos pa te/ 'i se du mi shes dgaldan pa'i ma
294a2(rgyud): dag po'abar ba dgod par bya'o// de'i da kyis de na gshegs pa'i tshogs rnams de'i nang du yangs su mas nas/ in hrI ces bya ba'i sngags las 'ad smra ba dang bcas pas mngon par brdza
294a3(rgyud): gnas pa'i ngo bo nyid du bzlas par bya ba dang / rang nyid kyi rig ma dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas rang gi snying gar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor logasal bar
294a4(rgyud): dmigs te/ smyung ba dang / spel ba dang / ye shes kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i bdud rtsi las blangs pa'i tshul du yi ge gsum lu ning 'dren pa'i 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin
294a5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gnas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi 'dir gyi rnam par byon te dag snga ma dang tshul gcig gyur par 'gyu'o// de nas yang bdag gzugs gnas 'ad bar dpag tu med pa 'bras
294a6(rgyud): sa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i rig ma lha mo khro bo'i tshigs du ma'i snang bar gyur pa bar snang rab tu gang ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang bdag dang bcas pa thams
294a7(rgyud): cad kyi ljags la hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje dkar po nas kyi 'bru tsam pa dri'i lte ba hU~M dang bcas pa las 'od zer gyi sbu gusi drangs nas bdud rtsi gsol bar bya'o// des bdag gi lus kyi lha dang dkyil 'khor ma
294a8(rgyud): 'dis ni ye shes bdud ci'i gnas// bla med khyad par 'byung ba nyid// bdud rtsi tshim byed mchog gyur pa/ 
294b1(rgyud): bar 'thud bya sa pas// stobs 'gyur rnal 'byung 'tshabar byed// gang dun dge bdag nyid dus// de ni gsang ba bstan pa'o// nang gis bdag nyid can dus 'gyur// de nas ye shes phrin las 'byung / 
294b2(rgyud): zhes gsungs padapa / byang sems byag dang rjes gas lag ldan das ni gi bdag sbyis gyi ngas shes ga ya gyi/ bam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gamang pa'i nga/ 
294b3(rgyud): po rang gi bdag nyid can gyi dus shes bya ba 'di ni gsang ba chen po shin du gsang ba/ shin du phra ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin te de nyid dam par mi rtag pa// chos nyid ye shes ces
294b4(rgyud): srabs// de nyid rtsa las t+ye ba can// khong stong med pa'i ngo ba nyid// sems can grol byed ye shes yin// gsang sngags rnal 'byor dngos grub ste// ni ba dang ni rgyal pa dang // dbang dang dgug pa mngar spyod
294b5(rgyud): la/ dra po po byed 'jobs pa'o// ye shes mngon par grub pa ste// bcom ldan de 'i ni pa gces// rang rig dbyings su de bzhin gshegs// me tog dang ni dri bzhin du// rten dang brten par dbyer mo
294b6(rgyud): ba/ dngos med ngo bo gcig pa'i bdag/ g.yo ba med par kun du gnas// de nyid 'gro snying rnam dag pa// ye shes pra ba'i tshul gnas pa// dmar dang nag dang ser po dang // dkar po dang nin mdor bsdus pa/ 
294b7(rgyud): dkyi'i dus dag// lum las grong bdag/ gnas pas gal par byed pani// nyi shu 'ani ma bzhin du// nyin dang mtshan nga mngon par byung // de las kyig dang rtsol 'dra// mngasapa
295a1(rgyud): dpa ga nyis med pas// cus cu gnas pa yin// miganas shems tog byung // dgen mi gi las rnams las// 'khor la dor bar sgrub pa yin// tog padag las su dag ste// ye shes
295a2(rgyud): kyis ni myangan 'das// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rab tu dgyes shing tshim par gyur to// 'di ni thabs kyi byang par
295a3(rgyud): la 'byung ba rda rje gsang ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu bstan pa 'di nyid do// bdag nyid sems dpa' gsum brtseg tu// gnas pa gsang ba 'di 'byung ba'o// ting 'dzin sems dpa'i cha las ni// 'od
295a4(rgyud): / zer dpag med phyung nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gsal ba las// 'gro ba kun la'ang thabs ldan pa'i// dri ma med pa'i rang bzhin gyi// ting nge 'dzin
295a5(rgyud): dngos pas byung gi/ 'de ba chen pa'i rang 'dzin gyi// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'gyur nas kyang // deni du ni thim byed pa'o// shin du phra mo gyur nas ni// tsan ka yi 'bru tsam gyi// thig le 'bar ba'i dbus
295a6(rgyud): nyid du// dkyil 'khor ltar bcas gyur pa dag/ rten dang brten par bcas pa las// byang ba'i 'ad zer dpag med pas// ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang // dam chim dag gis bskul ba na// de dag
295a7(rgyud): las bying 'ad kyis ni// nang du ma lus gang byas te// des ni kun du mtha' yas par// ba spo'i bu ga las byung ba'i// snang ba chen po dpag med pas// 'jig rten khams kun tu ba skur te// slar
295a8(rgyud): log nyid 'azhugs gyur// gnyis su med pa'i ma shes kyi// bdag nyid nye bar bsruba'o// de yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang bcas pathim pa mngon du gyur pa las rang gi rig ma'i chos
295b1(rgyud): pa ma rigs dgrar pa'i tha' 'bru'i sngaH byang chub kyi sems las bskyed par hUM las sbyar ba'i rdo rjerje lnga pa nas mam par lte ba la te ma'i gdan dang bcas pa la gnas pa'i dz+wa las 'phro ba'i rin tshwa/ 
295b2(rgyud): shin du sba bar gyur pa yungs 'bru'i tshad tsam du ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin kha dog lnga dong ldan pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba dang bcas pa ste/ de lta bu'i yungs 'bru rin po ched dag gi dbus na rten dang brten par bcas pa'i
295b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor lngas sor bas ma / de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lngas so'i dkyil 'khor bye brag tu gyur pa dgod par bya'o// denas spro ba dang bsdu ba la dbang thob par bya ba ste cig car ram/ rims kyis ya
295b4(rgyud): / ngang yang du bsam gtan la rnal 'byor du bya'o// de dag kyang rnam pa gsal na lha'i sku dang / sgra'i de kho na nyid yig 'brul gnas pa dang / thig khor ngo bo phyag mtshan du gsal ba 'od kyi gong bu dang bcas pa
295b5(rgyud): yin no// 'di nyid so sor rang rig pa'i rang bzhin 'de chen po 'dus pa'i cha las yongs su sprul pa nyid la spro ba dang bsdu bas gnas par bya'o// de las brtan pa nyid du gyur pa na smig rgyu dang du blta bu la
295b6(rgyud): sogs pa'i rtags rnams nges pa nyid du 'byung bar byed do// de nyid la bying ba dang rgod pa la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i sgo nas bsam gtan bya'o// so so rang gis rig gyur pa// ye shes lnga yi gzugs
295b7(rgyud): gyur pas// brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos kun gyi// ma lus khyab pa'i byin brlab cing // yul dang dbang po rnam sbyangs pas// 'jug dang 'byung dang gnas pa dang // bde ba chen par gyur pa'o// gsang ba ya
295b8(rgyud): shes 'grus pa las// yangs sugs pa patsun med pa// lhang da par gyur ma 'dres pas// skabacas thang sngags pa dang pa gi'i nigs pargyal ba yi// lharnams mnyas byed dang sa rgyas shes
296a1(rgyud): ba'o// gsang sngags snying po spu gsum gyi// skang pa mi ge'i rdul gnas pa// A li kA li phreng ba las// sngags rnams dbyangs dang gsal byed las// 'byung shing 'jug par byed
296a2(rgyud): 6/ pa yid// gnas pa ye shes las gyur pa// bad gshegs thugs las mnyam gnas pa// chu la gcig pa ni la 'gyur pa// 'di ni gsang pa'i mtshan nyid do// nas gsungs so// de nas yang brtsam
296a3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis 'dus pa'i 'khol pa bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di lta ste/ gsang sngags la byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi
296a4(rgyud): su spro ba dang / sdud pa dang / rab tubyung ba rdo rje'i gnas bying bste/ byang chub kyi sems de yang lus lnga mi gnas/ ngag la mi gnas/ sems la mi gnas so// chos gang khams gsum na mi gnas pa del
296a5(rgyud): ming de 'dzin mo shes 'byung ba rje'i gnas yin// chas kun sgyu ma ma las lta// gsang ba'i ye shes kun 'byung ba// mi rtags rnam par mi dmigs pas// zag pa med pa'i tshul 'byar 'gyur/ 
296a6(rgyud): delas ku tu dge 'a'i// rang bzhin dag pa'i 'odags la dbyings// spros med lalal la kun khyab par// deng byeng dri med tshul 'di bstan zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
296a7(rgyud): gsung dar thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byong chen pa gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'ayar rabatu gsang ba bdud ci dag par smon pa rgyal pa
296a8(rgyud): 'gre bdud cucu drugapa so// / de das de 'azhin gshegs pa'i chags 'dus pa chen pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rgyal ba de bdi gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal ras
296b1(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de 'dir gshegs pathams cad kyi sru dang gsung dang thugs na rje'i snying po blan med pa'i dngas grub de ka yang dag 'a yang // gang nA gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pathams
296b2(rgyud): cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de 'azhir gshegs pa thabs cad kyi dngos grub thams cad mkhyen pa dang / khams gsum ji snyed bdag rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud rdo
296b3(rgyud): rjel gnas so nas gsungs pa dang / de 'di gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de 'drin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs de rje'i dngos grub dang / khams
296b4(rgyud): gsum thams cad dang / thams cad ma khyen pa dang / rang gis dang / gsung dang / thugs da rje'i snying po gang du gnas/ de bdin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dag pa ye shes da rje'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ 
296b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang shugs kyi dngos grub thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa dang / khams gsum pa thams cad dang gi klu dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjegs pa'
296b6(rgyud): sems kyi rgyud snying po ye shes ni nam mkha' la gnas pa'o// dengs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ nam mkha' gang nad gnas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
296b7(rgyud): bdag po rdo rjes gsungs pa/ gang na'ang gnas pa ma yin no// de nas gzhan yang dngos grub thob pa'i gnas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ de la gsang ba chen po'i dngos grub
296b8(rgyud): thams cad pa' par bya ba'i phyir dngas grubatham pa gang te yang rung ba la 'tshal ning bsnyen por mi bya'o// deci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phes ste/ 'jig rten pa la sogs pa dag gdongs grub dang / mang sa gtsug pa
297a1(rgyud): don dugata pa'i dngos grub dang / bum pa bzang po'i dngos kyu 'dang/ sa 'og gi dngos grub dang / rgyal srid kyi dngos grub dang / klas pa'i chos su 'a dang / dbang du bya ba'i dngos grur
297a2(rgyud): dang / mngan spyod kyi dngos grub pa sogs pa rnams mang don du gnyer bar mi bya ste/ dri ci'i phyir den/ 'di ltar gsang ba chen po bla na med pa don du 'jig rten pa'i las kyi dngas grub phra mol 'dod pa bskyed
297a3(rgyud): bar mi bya'o// rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub 'ba' rig la sems rtsa gcig to gnas par 'gyur bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
297a4(rgyud): pos lus kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phywa dang // lus kyi spyad pa ma lus pa// de nyid thams cad yang dag par/ 
297a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du// sems can khams rnams thams cad la// de med phreng bas sbyar ba'i dngos// rtag par dus gsum kun du yang // sangs rgyas sku rin byeng pa'o// de nas de 'di gshegs pa
297a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pas gang gi/ dngos grub kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // brjod dang tshig gi lam rnams la// gral pa sgra rnams ma lus par/ 
297a7(rgyud): mas gsum rnga rje'i gnas pa ni// dri med ye shes dkyil 'khor du/ so so yang dag rig pa yi// tshig gi dngos grub bla na med// yid kyi sngags ni sdom pa po// dam tshig shin du'ada' dka'// 
297a8(rgyud): de nas dpazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pa ra rje 'dzin pas sems rdo rje dmachig dngos grub 'di da kyi/ spu dang ga sung dang thugs kyi rdo rje las phyung // yid kyi rtag pa ma lus pa/ 
297b1(rgyud): rdo rje'i rang 'dzin thams cad kun// bstan par snying pogs ma// rdo rje me shes dag pa'i// me phyed gsum ldar 'odogs pab// rdo rje byang chub mngon byung ba// thams cad stong nyid stong pa las// da sa
297b2(rgyud): bshad pa 'di yan no// kun du rdzasams dpa' ye// dru gsung thugs kyi dkyi la la'ang ga/ sngags slab pas ni bsam gtan bya// khasam gtan de rdzagasum sbyor bar// bcom ldan 'das kun du
297b3(rgyud): mdzes dga' kun du rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de dag thams cad/ 
297b4(rgyud): / ngomatshar du k+Sha ba dadu k+Shar nas/ me ma ro dza rdza e rdo rje// e mdo gsang 'cha bshad pa// gang du lus dang ngag sems med// de du gzugs ni rnam par bsgom// rdo rje chen po'i dbyings 'byung ba/ 
297b5(rgyud): nyid yang dag ston par mdzad// ces gsol to// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag byas nas// rdo rje gsum gyi mchog chen po// rdo rje gsum gyi mchog dbang bsgyur// ris pa
297b6(rgyud): skyes bu bsgom pa yi// dngos grub kun nas bshad pa mdzad// rigs kyi dkyil la khe ma lus pa// gsang bzab dang rgya che'i dbyangs// thabs dang shes rab 'kho la rig no// dngas grub 'das ni bsdus
297b7(rgyud): po yin// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor dpag tu med pa rnams kyi ched du brjod pa yang dag par bstan pa/ gang du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad
297b8(rgyud): kyi gsang ba ma lus pa snying po gcig tu yang dag par gsungs pa ste/ 'di ni bsod nams thams cad kyi 'byang gnas/ phun sum tshogs pa'i khyad par yid bzhin gyi nor bu/ chos bla na med pa
298a1(rgyud): gsang chen rdo rje'i theg pa/ phyir rgol ba thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mi 'phrog pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag par rdzogs par byed pa/ lam thams cad rgyal po
298a2(rgyud): las/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi grub pa med cing zil gyis mnon pa bdud kyi rigs ma lus pa'i gnas kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu 'jams par byed pa/ 
298a3(rgyud): kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba'i yul/ tha snyad thams cad pas rnam par 'das pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i mtshungs po me ci kun las golab don to// 
298a4(rgyud): gsang ba chen po'i tshul 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ spyod pa blan med pa 'di zos pa'o// lha dang mi dang lha min dbang po dang // tshangs brtsegs rnam grol 'bras bu rab tu thob// gtsang ma lha rnams bya ba rang// 
298a5(rgyud): dag ga/ dbang batshangs pa par snang mtha li kunas// bde bar gshegs pa shin tu chad par byas// byang chub sems dpa byebam pa lams pa// bar snang gnas te ra btud du 'gyur cig/ 
298a6(rgyud): hUM yi sprin med yid tu 'ong ba dag/ 'gro ba'i dug sel dri zhing ma bdug par byed// lha yo dbang po rab bsgyur rab dang ni// mkha' las lu 'khor khrag khrig dpag med dang // rim gro rabacas
298a7(rgyud): pas gos rnams 'thor bar byed// yid 'ongags brgya dag gis gtor bar gyur// 'dod par spyod pa'i lha yi bu mo dag/ rI rab sum bcu rtsa drug rdul phran gyi// grangs mnyam dag gis dgyes pa'i
298a8(rgyud): la mos mchod // gzugs la spyod pa'i lha yi bu mang po// ri rab sum ban rtsa drug dul mnyam pas// ku nas de bzhi gshegs pa la mchod de// ril mo brdung babre bzhag khrig ka ri/ 
298b1(rgyud): ba'adzin pa 'khor pong bag tu med// de snyed gas dpa 'dzin pa'i rjes 'brang ning // byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul bstan// e masma dbyangs yan lag kun 'byung ba// kun du bzang ba rnam
298b2(rgyud): 'phrul du mar sha// ning btsog gcig bdag shegs pachags mang ba// ning rnams du mar skra gzugs rab tu bstan// de nyi sangs rgyas stong phrag gcig da las// sangs rgyas bye phrag spyang dayong
298b3(rgyud): dubastan// gsung gcig gis ni rab tu gang bstan pa// bsam yas gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed du// tshul rnams mi zad chos sgra sgrogs par mdzad// de snyed gsang ba mchog 'di rgyas par bkar/ 
298b4(rgyud): gang du ye shes rdo rje mi 'byung ba'i// ting 'dzin gcig panges par 'dugs nas ni// chos kyi dbyings las 'byung bdu yi// ting 'dzin ni rnamamapar khyab par 'byung // sangs rgyas smrab ni
298b5(rgyud): dI ba gas r+b+ba kAk+ki ka ge/ ming 'das tshogs khyab pa'i ye shes na/ chos dbyings rgya chen yongs pa rgyas pa bkang // bsgra gcig las bang ldan 'das kyeg/ 'gre'i'i nyon mangs yid
298b6(rgyud): zhi bar smra// ring gi rdul phran zad par nus 'gyur ste// 'di dag 'grang byar shes par mi nus so// 'khor las bsgyur ba'i dam pa de la bas mdzad// le las sangs rgyas mchan rab mnga' bar mam
298b7(rgyud): la las ras drug thub paM sprul par maT // zhir rnams la lar smad pa mchog mdzad cing // dag cing nang gnyis ni bar dam pa mthong // dga' ldan gnas namagon po'i zhugs pa dang // rgyal
298b8(rgyud): bsgo mdzad nye bar 'pho ba bstan// gshegs dang gzigs pa de dag rab tu bstan// zhing rnams bye bar yum gyi sdums 'jug dang // zhing rnams kun du skye bston pa nyid// gzhon nu pol cing ska \u0f7f
299a1(rgyud): gnas pas mkhas// so brang brgyan mo'i mang na bzhugs par stod// 'gro ba 'don du mgan sangs 'byu zhing // dka grub stad cing de las ldang bar ston// migs ga'i bang du ni gnas
299a2(rgyud): byas shing // bsam gtan bskul ba mdzad dang rgyal 'thog/ rgyal ba'i dus las bslang ba 'di dag gis// gas ba mngon par byang chub de nyid bstan// byang chub snying po rdo rje gdan du gshegs
299a3(rgyud): de nyid bcom ldan mngon par sangs rgyas la// sa yi lha mo dgyes pas khyab byas shing // bdud sde bcom pas mi 'gyur mchog gi gnas// gsang ba 'og min 'di ni ye shes yul// gnyis med
299a4(rgyud): rdo rje'i gnas su rdzogs sangs rgyas// chos kyi 'khor lo ngas legs lam bstan pa// mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul drugs rab bstan// rgyud sde yan lag phyi rang gsang ba yi// rnam pa gsum du chos kyi
299a5(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas tshul 'di gsungs// stong pa zhi ba bdag med mtshan nyid bral// chos nyid rang byung mkha' dang mtshungs pa las// rgyal bas don dam rab tu mi gnas pa// chos
299a6(rgyud): nyid stong nyid de bzhin nyid du ni// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos rnams la// rgyu rkyen 'bras bus grub pa yang dag lam// kun rdzob spyod yul yin par rab tu bstan// zhing mang mtha' yas kun du de nyid
299a7(rgyud): ston// sgyu ma'i mkhan po mkhas pas gang du ni// 'gro ba'i gzugs brnyan du ma ston pa bzhin// de bzhin ston pa ye shes mchog mkhyen pa// kun du 'gro ba'i don du rab tu ston// thams cad ma lus chos nyid de 'dra
299a8(rgyud): sta/ mtshan dang mtshan gzhi mnyam pa nyid kyis 'dra// mtshan nyid med pa chos rnams kun gyi mchog/ bde bar gshegs pa'i lam 'ad thob 'dod pas// rtog dang rnam rtog ma lus spang med pas/ 
299b1(rgyud): gsang chen tshul 'di gang gis spyod pa ni// dngos dang dngos med mnyam nyid shes par gyis// gang du rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug du ma'i spyad yul gsang 'a chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin mtshungs pa
299b2(rgyud): med par spyod pa 'di la 'di lta ste/ gsang ba chen po bla na med pa'i tshul 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor tshad med
299b3(rgyud): pa rab tu spyod pa/ gsang ba chen po chos kyi tshul/ chos kyi dbyings lta ba po med pa/ chos thams cad shes pa po med par yang dag par ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid du yang dag par lta ste/ ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu
299b4(rgyud): thob pas chos thams cad la lus med par rab tu mthong ba/ chos nyid de bzhin nyid kyi rgya mtsho la mi gnas pa'i tshul bstan pa nyid do// srid pa dang zhi ba'i chos thams cad rab tu ni ba nyid nam mkha' lta bur gnas
299b5(rgyud): pa/ 'dus byas kyi khams 'dus ma byas su mngon par spags par mi byed la/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams 'dus byas su spro btags pa thams cad kyis rnam par mi rtog par gnas pa ste/ 'di nyid sangs rgyas
299b6(rgyud): rnams kyi byin pa rlab pa// bsod nams yongs su rgyas bdag pa'i shing // snang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i 'od zer na// skye dgu kun gyi blo la'i char byed pa// gang du gsung thugs kyi snang ba ni// rnam pa rag sa
299b7(rgyud): bsgriT pa med pa nyid// chos rnams kun la yang dag rab 'jug cing / chos kyi dbyings las ye shes 'bral med pa// lus ngag yid gan sa kun gyi rjes 'gro ba ro// skad cig nyid la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ 
299b8(rgyud): skad cig thog mtha' med par rab ston pa// 'di ni ye shes ma zad 'byung gnas kyi// tshul la gnas pa gsang ba'i spyod tshul lo// brtan pas kun du rtog par 'anig// 'di ni mi gnas gsang ba'i spyod yul
300a1(rgyud): 'jog/ sems can rkang na'ang ma spyod ma yin te// 'di 'dri ye shes dpapa khod du dzad// de la kun du rtog dang mi rtog med// blan chog de dang 'gro kun la la sbyar// rnam par srid
300a2(rgyud): k+Sha/ pas gos med nam mkha' bzhin/ 'dig rten thams cad na dang bcas pasan// chos rnams kun du rgyu med bstan pa man// 'di nyid ra ba dang 'bring dang tha ma yi// phyogs bcu ye shes bzhugs pa'i byang chub
300a3(rgyud): tshul// gsang ba'i dam pa'i spyod yul 'di bstan pa'o// chos thams cad kyi gnas ye shes kyi yul sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rab 'byam tshad med pa'i rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga las mngon par 'byung ba de bzhin
300a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgo dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor las/ yang dag pa'i thugs rje chen po'i ngang las ye shes kyi sprin rdo rjes kun du khyab par spro ba dang sdud pa'i tshul gyis gang du
300a5(rgyud): gnas shing rang 'byung chen po'i byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med par ngo bo nyid dmigs su mong pa nyid du ston to// de ches dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa
300a6(rgyud): dngas rgyas thams cad kyi 'gyur med pa'i ngo bo nyid rdo rje nas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems kyi gsang ba mi zad pa'i tshul 'di gsungs so// gsang ba sgrol med 'gyur ba med
300a7(rgyud): pa'i dang // kun du ma skyes skye med dga' ba'i dbyings// bde chen ro mnyam rgyal bkuran gyi gnas// chos kun rang bzhin yongs su mnyam pa nyid// mngon par chags med mi gnas ye shes las// rlom sems
300a8(rgyud): raba'i chos nyid skye ba med// ye shes chos kyi sgol ting nge 'dzin// nam mkha'i chos nyid 'byam klas thogs med pa// byang chub sems ldan pade gshegs spyod yul can// rdo rje lta bu'i gnas las bstan pa
300b1(rgyud): dang / sbyor mi ldog pas shes 'dra gnas spyod// thams ca mkhyen pa chad med 'bras bu // grangs ma ga la me pa nga 'byung ba'o// 'di dag tu
300b2(rgyud): du rud pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rjes sus pa ning rjes su chags pa med par spyod pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul la chos su rtogs pas gnas pa med pa sams bskyed pa shin du yangs pas rnam
300b3(rgyud): ba thar pa'i sgo dum rab tu thob pa/ ye shes gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i chud la mkhos pa/ dod gcig nas gcig tu bstan pa rab tu 'jug pa bla na med pa'i ye shes dam pa'i spyod yul yin par rig par bya'o// 
300b4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phya gron do de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsang bachen po'i rgyud 'dir gsang ba'i yi ge
300b5(rgyud): 'drang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi spyod pa'i rdo rje 'di la da cing bsgom par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / de nas de bzhin
300b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin pas de dag la 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gas pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldanan/ byang chub sems da
300b7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi gas rten gyi spyod rdo rje gang yin pa 'di la dad cing bsgom par 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ gas 'i
300b8(rgyud): yi ge gang zhig lags/ dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i gsang pa chen po 'ardo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi gsang ba chen po'i rdo rje pa
301a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi gsang ba chen po'i rdo rje ste/ de dag nyid do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa de
301a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dud nas cang me gsung bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog ye shes ston mdzad pa la// de bzhin gshegs pa kun
301a3(rgyud): gnas// gsang ba dam pa bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi gsungs shing // don chen 'bras bu lam gyur pa// de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i rgyud// rdo rje 'chang gis sbas pa nyid/ 
301a4(rgyud): u dum pa ra'i me tog bzhin// 'jig rten du ni rnyed dka' ba// kun gyi rtsa bar gyur pa'i mdo// gsang ba 'dus pa chen po yin/ byis gyur 'ams gsum gsang brtse// de nyid bde bar 'gyur bsam
301a5(rgyud): parje rdo rje gsung gyi gnas mtshan pas// ting 'dzin rdo rje kyu mchog dgyes// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa// 'di ni gang zhig gnas byed pa// byang chub sems dpa'i grags chen rnams/ 
301a6(rgyud): zhag bdun gyis ni phun tshogs pa'i// sku gsum dngos grub 'dir thob 'gyur// bcom ldan sku gsung thugs bsang ba// rdo rje bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor la// dri med ye shes 'byung ba yi// khyad
301a7(rgyud): mchog 'di phyung ba'o// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni// phyag rgya chen po'i 'don rtogs pa// chog bzhin du kun bsgoms na// skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'thob// gsang ba'i don 'od 'byung dka'
301a8(rgyud): bla med pade chen mi 'gyur ba// 'di ni snying po bsdus pa ste// gzhan du 'byung bar 'gyur ba min// 'od kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dus pa chen po 'di
301b1(rgyud): skad cag gang cig yud tsam gyis gnas na sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rdzogs par byed do// bskal bAg gA'i klung gi byem skyed thams cad du thAb chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'ab ci col kyang byang chub tho par
301b2(rgyud): 'gyur ba de dpal gsung ba 'dus pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpas tshe 'di nyi la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// de dag shin du dkon gyur pa// rnam grang
301b3(rgyud): de ni bstan pa'i tshe// de rje byang chu'i sems dpa' rnams// shin du gdung bas cher don te// gsang chen bskal pa ngan gyur ces// dus gcig bsten pa nyid gcil dang // skyon pa gcig las gzhan pa
301b4(rgyud): yin spyod yul mgur de yi dza// ji ltar thabs 'di ston byed 'gyur// med tsam du yang 'i jos ra// gzhan gyi smos lhag la dgos// de nyid kun du bsgrags gyur pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ 
301b5(rgyud): 'aka' stsal pa/ de skad ces ma zer cig/ yi ge 'di kun dang thun mong ste/ rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis ji ltar mi shes pa dang / mthob pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpang
301b6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yi ge 'di dag mthob cing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de ci'i phyir ner/ gsang ba'i yi ge ni rnam par dag pa'i phyir mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa/ 
301b7(rgyud): de dag thams cad cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi bdag pos gsang ba'i da'ang phyug rdo rje dzin pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po/ 
301b8(rgyud): nyam pa nyid la rnam par dgongs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ning ni dul phra ba dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rje
302a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos 'di ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
302a2(rgyud): skyes stsal so// TI bdug bde bzhin gshegs thams med dag sung da gyu kyi dag srid du sru ngagasung dang gro dzim pa'ad nga ma sas med ci she
302a3(rgyud): sa 'ang ba nyid med ci'i mina'i sa pa da pa ma gdu bar 'ag y-i// denas bcom ldan nas de shin gsheg sang sems cad kyi thud gsu na jug kyi nying ba dang bcun pa
302a4(rgyud): jugs so// dengs su mo gagis/ tshang da pe shes dag gis//  dag bsgras yang bas// de na ny-id lam zhengs par sus/ nga ga da 'i man / 
302a5(rgyud): chub sems gnas te// de kris pa yangs su spyod pa mdzad// de nas rdo rje u kyi'i// tsa yi yang stong thams cad bya// bde ba gshegs pamams ca kyi// skugasung thugs kyi rdo rjo nga// yon tan brim ma
302a6(rgyud): gyur pa ni// dper na bum pa chus yang ltar// shin du bde bas rgyas par gnas// de nyid ye shes
302b1(rgyud): 'gro ba'i phung po nyid kyag// phragasum dam tshig las byung // de la bdud rtsi'i 'od rer gyis// klog gi zer ma ltar 'phro ngas// shing du de ba yig rA sa ni// de nas rnams te sems can khams// ma lus lus
302b2(rgyud): med pa / 'o sa myer sa/  na chog byed gyu sa// de she gshegs smram /  /  rje / 
302b3(rgyud): bzang // kun du bzang po'i dpal zhes par// bla na med par dbang bskur to// de ltar dbang bskur tsam gyis ni// thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// dgra bcom yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// rdo rje gsu
302b4(rgyud): ye shes can// bde chen ngo ba nyid skar gyur// rdo rje 'dzin gyis bka' stsal pa// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes spyod pa mthong gyur pas// chos nyid mnyam pa nyid mthong ngam// slar gsol
302b5(rgyud): ni mthong lags so// ye shes spyod pa rdo/ bde bar gshegs pa mthong zhes gsol// de ltar yang dag gyur pa yi// de ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kun// rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga las// mngon par byung nas 'di
302b6(rgyud): skad gsol// gang du 'dod chags chen po yi// yi ge'i tshogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi// byang chub rjes su rtogs gyur gang // de nas bcom ldan ngo mtsharan to// 'de bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// den ma rigs kyi
302b7(rgyud): dag po yis// gsang ba mchog tu bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun// de skad ces ni mazer cig/ de nyid ci yi phyir zhe na// chol rnams nam mkha'i rdo rje'i gnas// de zhi ba mtshungs
302b8(rgyud): stong pa nyid// rab tu mi gnas bdag nyid las// chos rnams 'od gsal dbyings gyur pa// de nyid ye shes 'byung gnas gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams
303a1(rgyud): gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de ni na gshegs pathams cad kyi spang dag dung dkrugs dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i mnyam panyan
303a2(rgyud): spyod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs nas kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / rig pa dang lha mo dang / khro bo'i rgyal po du ma dang bcas pa'i dkyil
303a3(rgyud): 'a kyi' khar lal bzhugs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de ba'i na gshegs pa rdo rje 'dzin pas de bden gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
303a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ khyed rnams kyis phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i
303a5(rgyud): gsang ba 'di bgo bar gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyogs brtan gnas pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de rnams chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la skal ba yod pa'i phyir ro// 
303a6(rgyud): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig rdo rje 'di nyid tu shig/ khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
303a7(rgyud): rgyal po zhes bya bar dbang bskur ngo ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos de bzhin du bgyi'o// zhes gsol nas cang mi sgrub
303a8(rgyud): gyur to// gsang nga'i rgyal po'i sku gcig las// zhig khoms ma lus snang mdzad cing // khams gsum spyod dang sangs rgyas kyi// rnam 'du ma'i skur bstan mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu / 
303b1(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad 'ams gsung nyid kyi lus rdo rje la gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i ye shes mnapa pa nyid lnga dgongs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// gsang ba 'dzin pa gsung / 
303b2(rgyud): gcig gis// 'jig rten khams kun khyab gyur cing // chos kyi tshul ni mi zad las// rgyun mi 'chad pa'i 'khor lo bskor// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rdo rje 'di dpag tu med pa khams gsum pa
303b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi gardo rje la gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung mnyam pa nyid la gnas nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// rdo rje 'chang gi thugs kyi ni// ting 'dzin gcig tu ma bzhagra nas// ting 'dzin du
303b4(rgyud): mi myos kyi sgo/ chom gyi dbyings dang mnyam par 'gyur// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa do rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pa spangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems dardal gnas shing // de banan gshegs pa zas

309a1(rgyud): pa legs pa ldan pa yis// sman gsu mi sra du tshogs dang// 'di du yi mo 'dab brgyas// lcags kyi na rje khong bsed du// gsang bang sngags na badzad par bya// gan ma rna
