309a3(rgyud): dA ka he he// hu la~M hu la/ du lu du lu/ pu ru ta pu ru te swA hA/ oM mnya dzu shI ya man ta ka a kA pA ra hU~M phaT/ oM ma Ni pad me be sha pra bi sha/ mAm ru lu be sha/ brdzun b+h+yo/ oM prah+ma swasti/ puSh+Ti sum
309a4(rgyud): ko shi ka/ ru dza I shwa ra biSh+Ta/ I sha ni/ ku mA ra sha ka ra/ sma ra sha d+hi swA hA/ oM karko Ta ku li ka/ pad ma ma hA da ma/ a nan ta/ tAk+Sha ka/ bA su ke/ sha Sha pA la nA gIr dza sA hA/ oM Ad t+yai/ sna
309a5(rgyud): ma aM gA ra/ bud+ha pra ha swo taH/ shu kra sa nai shwa ra/ ka tu sA hA/ oM nak+Sha tra kAr ti ka/ ro hi Ni/ mr-ig shiraH/ adraHpu naH suHsu khaHa shwe Sha/ ma g+hA pu ya gu Ni uta ta ra pa la gu Ni hastA tsing
309a6(rgyud): / bi shA Sha a ru dad+ha/ droSh+Ta mAg+h+nAM pur+thaMShAT+Ta/ ut+paraSh+TaH/ bral Na a 'i dzi ta/ sha ta b+hai Sha/ r+d+ha niShAHpU ra wa tra ba dA/ ud+har b+ha tra pa da/ rab tI a shrI nI b+ha ra NI sA hA/ o in+ta ya/ 
309a7(rgyud): Na ku ber/ ag+ni nAk+Sha sa/ bA yog a~M shan sa / ts+tshal ka pA lA ya swAH/ ma pa~M thag mni rna daSh+Ta/ bai sh+tsak+ShA D+ha kA/ bi d+ha g+h+rak+Sha swAd+ha/ oMd bAnA ga rA dI pu gan rA 3/ ma
309a8(rgyud): A ma mthon// 9 thaH sa/ ha ga gsu/ mtha thag satan sasu byed byid / gzod sa/ rkyed byin rtog na / pa shAn+da nunag shi lu
309b1(rgyud): rA gad ya nA de dzaH/ nA ga bed nA ya buH/ rA go d+hA daR+sha ma rbaHswA hA/ yak+Sha ba da maN+Da ya hA paH/ yak+Sha kro d+ha sA da nA ma hA phaT/ yak+Sha nI la bas nA ya pha Ta swAH/ yak+Sha a pra ti ha tA ba lA ya phaT/ ya/ 
309b2(rgyud): par dra dz+wal la/ yak+Sha kr-i na thal baT/ A kr-it+panad+hA d+hA sa Ta/ yak+Sha re la N+Da la la/ de rnyed ces bka' stsam nas tha'o cad da bang du 'dus par gyur to// gsang pa'i rgyud kyi rnam par na/ 
309b3(rgyud): ba drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba las gsang ba'i sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas cho ga yang dag bshad// baN+Dal me tog bcas pa'i steng // mchod rten sku gdung ldan pa dang // bum pa sngon po
309b4(rgyud): mgul chings bcas// mchor pa rnam lnga dang ldan pas// bsgrub po dag ni bsrung ldan pas// rmi ltas rim pa gsal ba yis// nad pa dag pa lung bsngags so// bcom ldan mgon po zhal gsum dmar/ 
309b5(rgyud): byag drug rdo rje bsdigs pa g.yon// drag po'i la mos 'jigs par byed// tham skul gdug ri rab nan// 'khor du gnod sbyin chen po ste// shabar ba 'jigs ral pa can// gdong ser meng gdo
309b6(rgyud): gnod sbyin mo// khong bu na ban pa 'byang // ral la gyen 'greng la 'gri'o// gnod sbyin 'khor te lnga brgyar bcal// yak+Sha bi dI NA la hU phaT/ yak+Sha kro d+ha sA dA nA ya ng+ku phaT/ yak+Sha nI mAM ba ma nA ya hU~M phaT/ 
309b7(rgyud): ya.A pra te ha ta thA sA ya hU~M phaT/ yaSh+Ta pa nA kra mA ya paT/ Ak+Sha kr-i tAn+d+ha ya baT/ yak+Sha kr-i rten d+ha rA pA ya bas/ pa rdza 'o ga ma yaT zhes brjod tshul ba sngags shing gto na gnad sbyin gyi gdon las thar ro// mcho/ 
309b8(rgyud): sku gdung ldan pa'i drung // mtshan snga lnga dang ldan pa yis// mchid pa lnga dang ldan pas mtshad// bsgrub po dag ni bsrung ldan pas// mi ltas rim pa gsal ba yis// nad pa dag la mtshon sngal bcing // bco
310a1(rgyud): ldan bgon po zhal gsum ldan// phyag drug rdo rje bsdigs pa g.yod// drag po'i zil mos 'jigs par byed// tha ma sprul gdug ri rab man// mkha' la rdzu 'phrub dang ldan// 
310a2(rgyud): bdung // dga' rab dbang phyug zod phreng can// bum sna san dgu shi za bdud // btsun mo me tog 'dzas ma dang // 'od zer 'phrog dang ri dang 'phrog ma// gdon rigs stong phrag brgyad bcu'i 'khor// 2ru
310a3(rgyud): bcas pa'i sngags 'di ro// gnad la bor ba'i srog sngags so// pre ta pi shAH be d+hA ra NA ya hU~M phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa kro d+ha sA d+ha rA ya hU~M phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa nI laM wa sa nA ya hU~M phaT/ pr-i ta pi shAH a
310a4(rgyud): tad pa lA phaT/ pre ta pi shAtsa pa rA kra ma ya phaT/ pre ti pi shA tsakre tAnA ya phaT/ pre ta pi sha tsakr-itAn+ta rA pA ya phaT/ pre ta paM shI tsi ro Sha NA ya phaT/ nyi mAk+Sha bdag gi bar du rlung la bskyon te/ mtshon sa
310a5(rgyud): lngal bcings te bskrad par bya'o// mchod rten sku gdung ldan pa'i drung // maN+Dal me tog bcas pa'i steng // bsrung bas khyi yi sha la bsgrub // rmi ltas rim pa ldan pas brtag/ brgyad khri zhabs nu
310a6(rgyud): 'jigs pa raH// gad rgyangs pa nang mdzad zhal gsum pa// nag po zhabs gdu gdug pa 'dzin// stobs chen rab tu gnon pa po// klu chen marungs gdug pa can// nor rgyas dang ni dung skyong dang / 
310a7(rgyud): po dang ni 'jog po dang // pad ma pad ma rjen po'o// stobs kyi chu dang rigs ldan rnams// rgya mtsho dag la gnas pa yi// klu dang gtan dngas bdag gsum// sprul pa las las grub pa yi// 
310a8(rgyud): pa rdzu 'phrul bas// sprul pa 'bum kyi 'khor dang bcas// mi lus pa yi skrag pa 'di na// gan la thor ba'i rtsa sngags sa// har har nA ga phuH/ pra ha pra har d+ha ga suH du can pa
310b1(rgyud): rjid danag zun rba// dAm+banA ga sha/ muH/ swaT ya nA ga R+Sha yAn+dan duH/ nan dang N+Daya pu/ nAg krod+ha skad na ya phuHbal po se'u dag dang ni// smag shad dag gi phyag las byas// 
310b2(rgyud): bzlog par byed pa'i cho ga'o// nA gdun dus/ nA ga shon dus/ ha~M Sha ti li rA ga dus dus/ klu chen na ga'i srog sbyi ste// gnad la bor ba'i srog snying ngo // lto 'phye dag gi 'arnyas/ ma ldan mAni
310b3(rgyud): sal bas bzlas// de nas rdo rje 'dzin la bka' stsal pa// las rnams bzhi yis las rnams 'grub// sa gzhi dag ni so sor brtag/ zhi ba dkar zlum pad ma can// rgyas ser gru bzhi 'khor lo'o// dbang dmar
310b4(rgyud): dwags phyag cu ste// drag po mthing nag rtse gsum pa'o// zhi brgyas pa sor bzhi dang // khru gang khu do mnyam pa'o// dbang dang drag po sor gsum ste// drug pa zhud khru gsum khru// 'o ma can da drini
310b5(rgyud): shi'abras bu dang bcasa'i rgyas shing // tsher mdur khrod shing dag ni// kha dog dmar nag dbang drag la// ku sha dag kyang dgram bya ste// las kyi bum pas bsang bar bya'o// de bzhod nga mar dang de// 'o madri
310b6(rgyud): zhis me tog dkar// 'bral dang nas dang gro dang ni// rdo 'i chan dang bsres pa dbupa// rgyas pa'o lpags dkang gsum ste// dang gsas 'bras bu ga su ma dag ste// yam shing 'o ma lo 'dang bcas// ti ni
310b7(rgyud): dkar po shis pa'o// khwa dang 'ug babru rog brun// ske tshe rim pa yungs kar dang // khrag gis sngags pa'i rdzas kun te// yam shing tsher ma mar dag dang // sha dang tshil dang gzugs bcas pa// til ni nag/ 
310b8(rgyud): po shing ba'o// shar du bltas na nib ste// byang du bltas na rgyas pa'o// nub tu bltas na dbang du bsdud// lho ru bltas te gsad par bya'o// sbyin bsreg byas pas las kun 'grub// g.yas
311a1(rgyud): dbang ge 'dug pa ste// g.yon rgyang bas ni gsang pa'o// bum pa la ga sngon tho// rnam lpags mar ni bcu drug cang// spun bu 'bru lnga na pos// 'bras gsum 'brugasum tsam pa
311a2(rgyud): drin pa long ba bcas pa'i shing // 'ayenam lda byed// gru ba'i gragang rnam pa 'o// seng lde zin las byas pa'i// phung po ma tshan sna nga bcas pa// dgang gsum ngagasus da bcas pa'i// 
311a3(rgyud): ka canar la dbul bar bya'o// grub pa khrus bya ba srung bya'o// 'bras can bu ram rigs dang ri// 'bru yi chan dang dri zhim dang // dkar gsum mngar gsum chu ga dang // mdun du byas te phyogs rnabs su// sha
311a4(rgyud): dang khrug dang rus pa dang // nas dang 'bras dang grol sogs// 'jug sog pa 'phrul sogs// chang dang bcas pas mdun du 'phrul// oM prah+ma oM biSh+Ta oM rA t+pa la/ a~M kA ti/ mog Na pa ti oM in d+ha/ 
311a5(rgyud): ya/ oMs bskal/ e ma hA pras+thA la/ ba yin ta tu le/ ba yin tata le sAH/ rtswa ga gab sa len ta cadang // maN+Dal gru gsum steng du 'azhag/ nag pa'i thod pa bri gug can// bsrung dang ldan pas gas
311a6(rgyud): sngags bsgrub// ma hA kA la mai rU bA NA/ oM shrI gr-i ba be de dzaHha ha~M/ sa ma ya gags sol// lcags kyi snying phyung zhes pas lcags la bya'o// nad kyi bsrung bdag la ni// byang chub sems dpa'i
311a7(rgyud): // ga sa //  na mas 'breg pa na to// ma ma bar skye// 'phru lda ma nga/  /  du la
311a8(rgyud): sum dang // mang gsum bcas pa'i gtor ma dang // chu yi 'grama'am rgya mtshor dbul// be tog bdug pa bcas par dayul// na maHsa rba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki ti sa b+ha ra sa b+ha ra hU~M/ ga'ang / 
311b1(rgyud): kyirnam par 'byed pa/ drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba las/ las bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dab pu Ne ma ti dang / lo tsA pa dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bskur
311b2(rgyud): / @#// rgya gor skad du/ badz+ra pA Ni nI lAm pa ri bi d+hi badz+ra da N+Da tan dza/ bod skad du/ 2gan rdo gos sngon po can gyi cho ga rdo rje btson gyi rgyud / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
311b3(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ gnod sbyin thams cad yongs su rgyu ba/ shin du dben pa/ shin du yongs su dag pa ra/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lagan do rje
311b4(rgyud): gos sngon po can zhes bya ba/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi khro bor dbang bskur ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ yid khros pa lta bu/ migo ma mdag gi phung po 'dra ba/ dbugs
311b5(rgyud): pe lce ltar 'bar ba/ 'jigs pa'i nga rotsa na/ lag pa dang rkang pa ku nor rgyas kyi bus brgyan pa/ klu nag po ser la khar thogs pa/ klu dga'aphro dang nye dga' bos snyan brgyan pa/ sbrul 'bar ba rin po/ 
311b6(rgyud): cad par thogs pa/ sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba zab/ bzhin rgyas pa/ smin ma dpral bar bsdus pa/ ya so sa mas mu mnan pa/ gshin rje'i cha byang can/ lce glog lngar 'gyu ba/ sprul pa pa/ 
311b7(rgyud): gsus pa che ba/ lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa/ klu'i rgyal po 'da' 'azangs ska rags su bcings pa/ a la la zhes sgrog par byed pa/ rgya mtsho'i bras bu dpag tshad brgyad khri lon stong
311b8(rgyud): yod pas rkang pa'i pus mor phyin pa/ dbang po pa nyi ma phrag pa la rab tu khur ba/ klums cad rlag par byed pa'i yang rgyangs chen po dag pas kun du 'jug par byed pa/ klu thams cad 'ching bar byed// 
312a1(rgyud): ga 'byung po thams cad 'gugs shing 'ching bar mdzad pa/ sbyor ba thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/ sbyor ba thams cad bzlog par mdzad pa/ sbyor ba thams cad gnon par mdzad
312a2(rgyud): / yon tan thams cad ma lus pa'i bdag nyi da de/ gnod sbyin gyi sde pa can po ny-i shurtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin mo nub narnams cad de/ gnad sbyin drag po thams cad dang / 
312a3(rgyud): thams cad dang / klu thams cad dang / dri ba thams cad dang / lha ma yin thams cad dang / nam mkha' lding thams cad dang / mi 'am ci thams cad dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang / 'byung ba
312a4(rgyud): dang / yi dgas dang / brjed byed la sogs pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ 'di lta nyi ma dang / sle ba dang / ska pa'i tshogs lta bur bzhugs so// de'i chos ya cher g.yos so// brug
312a5(rgyud): sgra yang byeng / nyi ma dang skar ma yang mi snang bar gyur to// de nas 'phags pa lag ra rdo rje gos sngon po can la 'khor thams cad kyis gsol ba/ gos sngon po can khyod ci/ bde gshegs kun
312a6(rgyud): sprul pa'am// gal te bsdus pa'i sku yin nam// las kyi khro bor dbang bskur ram// bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// ci lta bu yi dus gsum bka' nyan te// las dang bya ba thams
312a7(rgyud): dbaka' stsal mdzod// drag pa'i ting 'dzin bstan du gsol zhes gsungs so// gleng bzhi 'i le'u skye dang pa'o// de nas lag na rdo rje drag pa zhes bya ba'i ting ngange 'dzin du zhugs te 'di skad ces gsung
312a8(rgyud): gtugs sngags mthu so las// phra za'i rgyal po bsam par bya// khrob rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis// byin pa rlabs ya mtshan sna tshogs ldan// ting 'dzin de la dbang thob ras// las rnams
312b1(rgyud): sbya thogs pa yang // rgyas dbang dang drug pa dang // gas thongs na phyogs nges par 'gyub// danyid grub par gdon mapa// rang gzhan 'dregs dang bla ma dang // shin du bla ma ngam pa yang // mtshad dus/ 
312b2(rgyud): // gal te gzhan la phan 'dogs na// sku de sna tshogs skur ru snang // snang ba sgyu ma'i sku yin yang // gdug pa 'dul phyir rigs par snang // sna tshogs de nyid bas bral ba'i// dngos/ 
312b3(rgyud): gzhi yang dgi tha ba gcig/ le 'u gnyis pa'o// gan du yang gsang sngags sbyor ba ni// dge bsreg sogs gsang sngags kyis// thigs med las rnams grub pa yin// gnyis kyi 'ogams
312b4(rgyud): gsum pa brgyad// ra yi mthar ni gsum pa'i mtha'// de la gnyis kyi gang ldan pa// khung dang rabazung ming dang ldan// yang man skal ldan pasam gta ri// lcags kyi'i spyor b.rabatu bya// mo badz+ra d+haH/ 
312b5(rgyud): thA la k+Sha nI sna par rdung Ta/ mngag rdzogs gong dang gsum pa'i mtha'// lan gnyim gang 'azhin brdegs lpags shes// gsum pa'i dang po gnyis pa dang // drug pa'i dang po yi ga ni// lan gnyis go
312b6(rgyud): bzhin gtogs byed sngags// gnyis kyi dang po lnga dang pos// drag po dga' ba'i sa bon ldan// lan gnyis ldan gyur las grub pa// gong ma bzhin du mchod byed do// le'u gsum pa'o// // de nas
312b7(rgyud): 'phags pa lag na rdo rjegos sngon po can sna tshogs mngon par 'grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// oM badz+ra pA Ni ma hA yak+Sha ni lAM ba rad ha ni badz+ra hUM phaT/ 
312b8(rgyud): gang zhig ta 'dzi rnal 'byor de// nyes sa kun las rab tu thar// legs pa'i yon tan thams cad 'thob// 'bras bu yang dag mngon par 'grug// sngags ni gang yin ming yin te// gdul bya'i mthar
313a1(rgyud): dang ldan pa la// mtha' ma las sngags mtha' dang ldan// le'u zhi pa'o// denas gos son po can 'tsham po mngon par 'grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad
313a2(rgyud): cel gsungs so// byed bzhi'i sangs rgyas rab bsgoms nas// sa so las kyis bsgom par// me bgyud drung gnyis ldan par bsam// chubargyad dngom pa nyid yin te// de ban nas brgyad hUM/ 
313a3(rgyud): 'bras ldan// rlung brgyad me gnyis ldan pa ste// 'bras bu rim gyis gnod sbyin gtso// sgrub pa sngags bzhin mngon par 'grub// e dang mo so'i mtha' dang ldan// me la gong mas mngon par 'grub/ 
313a4(rgyud): tan du rtsa ba'i gsong sngags bzlas// le'u lnga pa'o// / de nas 'phags pa gos sngon gyis// las bcu mngon par sgrub pa yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// las bcu'i sbyin bsreg 'di
313a5(rgyud): gsungs so// zhi la shAn ting ku ru ste// rgyas pa puSh+Ti ku ru'o// dbang la wa shang ku ru'o// drag po mar gsum par ldan// thab khung dbyings ni las bzhi ste// shing ni rigs dang sbyar bar bya/ 
313a6(rgyud): del dkar po'i shing rnams te// rgyas la gser shing la sogs pa'o// dbang la seng ldeng shing bsregs te// drag po tshor ma can gyi shing // gzhan ni tsan dan shing las bya// thabs khung 'dab
313a7(rgyud): brgyad dbyibs yin te/ bi d+h+wa na sa ya/ unr-i Ti ni/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ stam b+ha ya stam b+ha ya/ un ma na un man/ A kar Sha ya A kar Sha ya/ ba shing kar ba shing ka ra/ rak+Sha ya rak+Sha ya/ moH
313a8(rgyud): b+ha la/ sarbaka ma ku ru hU~M phaT/ le'u drug pa'o// de nas dpal sun da rje 'dzin// gdul dka' ba ni 'dul ba'i mchog/ gsang ba'i bdag po zhes sngon can// drag po chen po rab 'bar ba'i/ 
313b1(rgyud): tring nge 'jor la snyoms zhugs nas// 'khor gyi grwa tshogs dbang 'grus te// nyen rnams bzlog pa'i cho gar gsungs// gnas khang rim pa gsum dag la// phyi rol skyes pa sreg dpral bar bya// bAr du/ 
313b2(rgyud): phyi dang khrus byas te// mnyes pas las kyang ci dus phye// nang du 'am pa'i dbang bsku bas// sa rnams bzlog la the tsam med/ kye can rnams 'dul ba'i mchog/ sem gas chen drog po che/ 
313b3(rgyud): e ma ma rungs 'jigs pa can// e ma gsang sngags rnal 'byor che// phyag na do rje khyod phyag 'tshal// phyogs bral khrob khyod phyag kyil// le'u bdun pa'o// // de skad ces gsungs nas
313b4(rgyud): 'khor thams cad dga' ba'i rjes las/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// thams cad ldan pa'i gtor ma la/ raM gyis sbyangs nas yaM ges bus// khe gas bkrus te dag pa las// ba las bdud
313b5(rgyud): rtsi chu rgyur bskyed// yaM ri dbab pa'i sbyor ba bya// dzaHyis 'akug ste gtor ma bstim// bsam gtan lha mos mchod pa 'bul// de nas 'khor la 'di skad bsgos// ngade khro bo gos sngon can// sangs rgyas
313b6(rgyud): thams pa 'dus pa'i sgra// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin kyis brlas// dbang bskur mchog thob nga mi smra// ci steng yid pa 'das na// gtor mdug gis rang bzhin gyis// khyed rnams thal ba'i dus du rlogs/ 
313b7(rgyud): gal nyed pacig pa 'dasar// gtor ma ye shes bdud rtsa yis// khyed kyi sgo ga sum sgrib sbyangs nas// del bar legs pa'i yon tan noH// oM a kA ro su khris rtam NAMNA Ad+ya nud par dashAd mo
313b8(rgyud): spya/ le'u brgyad pa'o// de nas dpal ldan gos sngon car// gdul dka' 'dul ba'i bdag papo des// bsam gtan 'khor lo med pa la// sngags kyi nges par bshad par bya// d+ya T+Te/ b+h+yo rno 'di
314a1(rgyud): ka a b+hi pa ta ye/ i dan rnyi la ba dUr sha rIH/ badz+ra tshad yan/ bcas ma ti kram pa/ sa kul/ Ad sA d+han/ b+ha'i Sh+yati/ las rnams cad pa'i sngags so// nga rje chun na
314a2(rgyud): hUM phaT/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya hUM phaT/ nA ga uta sA dad+ha hUM phaT/ yi dwags thams cad bzlog pa'i// nA lAm pas na ya hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la ba rA
314a3(rgyud): ya sa/ k+tsi twA ra tA yA ya/ bi dz+nyAn tA d+hA ya bas/ radzAN+Da pA ye/ trAsanA ska na ya Ta/ gshin rje bzlog pa'o// pre ny-i shA tsi nA sha~M kA ra ya baT/ yi dgas thams
314a4(rgyud): bzlog pa'o// yak+Sha a pa sma ra ba nA sha~M kA rA ya phaT/ gnod sprin la sogs pa bzlog pa'o// ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba big+h+na bi rA sha ka rA ya phaT/ bgegs
314a5(rgyud): thams cad bzlog pa'o// sarba shud+d+ha sa g+ha bin sha ka rA ya raT/ dge 'dun gyi dgra'adu ba ba'o// ni rnam par d+ha ra badz+ra pA si rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swAH/ rdo rje ba con drag po'i// rdo rje 'dzigs pa sngags kyi
314a6(rgyud): bdag/ de rje khri'i bgegs kyi gshod// de dzam grupa 'jigs pa// ded rjems kun grus pa// dngolas rnams kun ma dzad pa// sngags kyi bdag po khyod phyag 'tshal// sngags kyi ngobo khyod pas
314a7(rgyud): 'tshal// le'u dgu pa'o// de nas klu' dgug pa'i lugs bstan te// de rje lcags kyu rlung gi sbyor ba la 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin me yis kyang ni 'dul bar nus pa yin// de ltar nus phyir
314b1(rgyud): 'bad bya// klu rigs du ma thams cad kun// 'gugs 'gyur 'di las gzhan
314b2(rgyud): // rdzogs par gyur pa'i rgyunarna mas sa// dang po gnod na du spyan drangs
314b3(rgyud): d+ha bas/ n+ya gar NA ka d+ha la/ gasbyin smin 5/  sdug ta 'do rdzogs pa 'i sa// dus ba'i snying nas ga pa par // 'og/ mi semamar ma khris pa/ sa ldan pa dzin kyi/ 
314b4(rgyud): /  ma do / 9 tsu gcis pa'o// denas nas sa ldan na na gyis nyis da la pa/ d+hU sa/ da sa
315a1(rgyud): rnga mar mamra// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gsal mdzad pa// badz+ra A lo ke pA dza me hUM// ji srid thams cad mchod pa'o// ji srid mchod pa bde rje// ji srid mchod pa bla na med// ji sred mchod
315a2(rgyud): pa lang dag che// e ma ho// le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// bcom ldan gsang bgos sngon can// bsdu ba zabs kyi ting 'dzin gyis// 'khor gyi klu rnams bsdad mdzad nas/ 
315a3(rgyud): me yi 'khor lo snyoms zhugs so// gsang ba me yi sngags bzlas pas// klu rnams ma lus tshig par mdzad// bral nas dpag ched gnas su bros// slar bsdus bdud rtsi sman gyis gsos// las
315a4(rgyud): / chol so so'i gnas su 'khod// de nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal// thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad gsol// me brgyad 'khor lo'i bdag nyid ni// rtag tu me yi ting 'dzin la// snyoms zhugs khyod ni
315a5(rgyud): rgyas gyur cig/ bde ba'i rol mo ma klong du// bsregs mdzad me brgyad khyod phyag 'tshal// rang bzhin rnam dag khyod phyag 'tshal// chu yi ngal gnas 'dod na// chu brgyad ting 'dzin la gnas te// 
315a6(rgyud): tshe 'khor gyis 'di skad bstod// chu brgyang 'khor lo'i bdag nyid che// rtag pa chu yi dkyil 'khor car// 'byung ba'i gtso bocu yi bdag/ chu brgyad mnga' bdag khyed phyag 'tshal// rlung brgyad ting
315a7(rgyud): 'dzid la gnas na// 'jor nang 'brang ba'i bdag nyid ce// rlung chen drag po rtsal shugs ldar// rlung lhag sa sngon khyod phyag 'tshal// sa ye ting 'don la gnas nas// mi g.yo ba rted pa'i las/ 
315a8(rgyud): badzad pa// gser ldan rol ma sna tshogs ldan// sa brgyad lal ro la khyod phyag 'tshal// le'uru bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas dpal ldan gos sngon can//  ro gyi tsho la garas nas// 'khor rgya

315b3(rgyud): gi skul mngon par bstod// kye tog sang bdag gos sngon car// bu mau rdzogs pa'i klong dkyil na// 'dod chags dag pa'i blo ldan pas// mngon par sangs rgyas khyod phyal// le'u bcu bzhi pa'o//

315b6(rgyud): mnga' zhing // rigs drug sde brgyad 'dul bar mdzad// skyon gyi mgos rang sangs rgyas// thog sde med kun 'dul phyag 'tshal bstod// ci ltar bsam pa'i dngos po kun// khyod las 'byung ba

320b3(rgyud): rgyangs chen po dgod pas kun tu 'khrug par byed pa/ khams gsum 'jigs shing skrag par byed pa/ klu rnams 'chi bar byed pa zhig byung ste/ rang gi gzungs sngags 'di ched du brjod do// tad+ya thA/ 
320b4(rgyud): nob+ho ba na nA ga a d+hi ba ta ya~M id ni ni lA ma bar d+hA ra sha rI ra ma/ badz+ra pA Ni hr-ing yaM/ yas mA~M ti k+Sha mArba/ mA ku la ud skad ne b+hUbi sh+tsi ti/ tad+yan+tu/ bud d+ha bud d+hA bi bud d+ha bi bud d+ha/ mA tikra ma
320b5(rgyud): ba/ ha ra ha ra rA gA nA~M pra har pra ha ra nA gA ne/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da nA ga hr-id yA ni/ b+hi nad b+hi na nA gA yar+sa NI/ bi kAR+Sha d+hA rAg sha rA / pi proT la nA ga ya nI ni/ tad+ya thA hU~M phaT/ nA ga She dA ra NA ya phaT/ rAgro/ 
320b6(rgyud): smad namal/ hU~M ldam pa sa ma / oM praHSh+T+r-i pa /  na / kr-id+d+har ta la// NA ma ya/ d+hAs nA la lawi/ ku s+phA tsata sAd ni ya
320b7(rgyud): pi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ yak+Sha A bstA ra bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ dA ra dAr/ mA rA ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha yA/ sar+b+ba big+h+na bin shad+ya ka rA yaM phaT/ sarba sha druM saM g+hA 'i
320b8(rgyud): nA shaM ka rA yi phaT nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni ra dz+nyI pA ya ti swAhA/ de skad ces bkra' stsal ma thag tu dregs pa can phal pa dag gi ri mo bzhin 'i g.yo ba med par gyur te/ brgyal rab tu brgyal
321a1(rgyud): b.las pa drad pa sangs napa 'di ga cesags pato// kye gas ba'i bdag po khyod da zugs rje ma yang dag ku kyi mgon dang skyabs su gyur pa lags na bdag cag / 
321a2(rgyud): sdug bsngal 'di las thar bar mdzad du gsol zhes gsol to// de das drag sa pa can de dgra mal btags te dbang bskur dang mo zhig po gnas byang chub tu sems bskyed do// dpal
321a3(rgyud): rje gtum po thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud las dregs pa can phal pa brtul ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas 'jig rten gyi dregs pa dag shin du yang dregs par gyur pa dag 'di sa
321a4(rgyud): klu rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po rgya mtsho zhes bya ba dang / rje'u rigs kyi rgyal po kun nas gdugs shes bya ba dang / bram ze'i rigs kyi rgyal po chu lha zhes bya ba dang / gdol pa'i rgyal po shul ru// 
321a5(rgyud): shes bya ba dang / bdud kyi rgyal po skos rje drang dkar dang / gza' rgod chen po dang / dkar po dung gi thor tshugs can dang / btson gyi rgyal po dmar po srog len dang / gshin rje'i rgyal po
321a6(rgyud): dmigs pa dang / maM mAM'i rgyal mo mkha' dbyings kyi yum dang / gshin rje'i sring mo phung byed re ma ti la sogs pa dang / shin du dregs pa can gyis 'jig rten bung bar byed pa dag ma thul ba
321a7(rgyud): la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sgo lngas kye gsang po'i bdag po dag dregs pa po mo dag thul bar mi gyur te/ thams cad kyi thabs kyis dregs pa nyon mongs pa gdul bar bya'o/ zhes bka' stsal
321a8(rgyud): to/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyang gsang ba'i bdag po la 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'jig rten gyi dregs pa 'di dag 'dod chags la gnas pas sems can la rnam par/ 
321b1(rgyud): 'i/ kun gyi lus dang srog ma drangs par byed pas khyad kyis thams cad khros pa'i tshul gyis thul shig ces bsgo'o// phyogs bcu'i ning khams rnam par dag pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / 
321b2(rgyud): nga chub sems dpa'adang / rigs so sor kun nas 'dus pa rnams kyang gsungs gcig gis ngos 'di skad ces gsungs so// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod shin du khros pa'i tshul ston lngam mchis/ 
321b3(rgyud): pa'i stobs kyis dregs bcan 'thul shig ces bka' bsgo'o// gzhan yang rigs sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs sngags kyi bdag po thams cad 'dus te/ rigs kyi bdag po
321b4(rgyud): rigs kyi yu pa dang / rigs kyi khro bo dang / rigs kyi sprul pa dang / rigs kyi po nya mo la sogs pa thams cad 'dus nas mgrin gcig tu bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po gdul bya'i ning
321b5(rgyud): de dag zhi ba'i cha byad kyis mi 'dul bas zhe sdang dang / gdug sems su bcas pa nyon mongs parang dga' ma spyod pa/ 'dod pa'i skom gyis gdungs pa 'di dag khyod kyi mthu'i stobs kyis
321b6(rgyud): shin du khros pa'i cha byad ston la ma 'phyi bar myur bar rab tu thul shig ces bka' bsgo'o// de nas klu mi snang ba ye shes chen po'i dingal bzhugs so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang
321b7(rgyud): rgyud las khro bor bka' bsgo ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas rigs lnga yab yum gnyis su med pa'i mkha' las thugs rjes khros po'i sa bon hUM mthing nag ha la nag po'i mdog lta bu/ 
321b8(rgyud): dper sa tshogs 'bar ba/ rab tu'abang ba/ kun tur btu'abar bdag nyung ste/ de'i byin gyis brlabs las thugs rje byin gyis brlabs las e mthing dog dang / yaM sngo skya dang / raM khaM dmar
322a1(rgyud): dmar nag dang / suM ser nagang/ ra dmar nag dang / kau dkar skya dang / sna tshogs pa'i b+hu 'phros par gyur to// de dag gi 'phro 'du las gru gsum mthing nag nam mkha' dang / sngo
322a2(rgyud): rlung thug sa dang / dmar nag rag ti'i rgya mtsho dang / ser nag zhing chen sa gzhi dang / dkar skye keng dus ri rab dang / sna tshogs rim po che'i gzhas yas khang thaMng nag rdo rje rgya gram las lhun gyis
322a3(rgyud): pa phrin las rnam pa banis lhun gyis grub pa'i rgya gram gyi rtse mo phyogs bcur 'phro ba/ bar
322a4(rgyud): 'tshams rin po che sna bani las lhur gyis grub pa/ gru chad rin po che ljang gur snang bsgo bani rin po che sna bani tshad med pa/ bzhi'i phrin las su snang ba sna tshogs kyi rgyan rang bzhin du snang
322a5(rgyud): ba 'byung bar gyur te// de nas hU~Ml thing nag khro zo'i sa bon de las sde tshogs rdo rje phra mo'i 'od tsha char 'phro ba/ rdo rje pra mo'i 'od zer las rdo rje phyogs kyi phra mo 'asam gyis mi khyam
322a6(rgyud): 'jig tI dregs pa can kun dang / srog la rngam pa'i srin po po mo sna tshogs pa bkug ste/ gzhal yas khang gi phyir ya shing rtsa nas bskyes pa bzhin du phywa ri mo bzhin g.yo ba med par gyur to/ 
322a7(rgyud): mthu'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'khor lo'i lte dbus su rdob bsgyur ba yinan du gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang ster ba zhes brjod pas srin po zom dran pa rnyed de bdun du
322a8(rgyud): gyur to// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las gzhal yas khab blun gyis grub pa'i le'u skye bani pa'o// // de nas thugs rje khros pa'i sgra mthing nag 'od 'bar ba las de ban
322b1(rgyud): gshegs pa kun gsung gcig gis a b+hi rau ShA Na hUM zhes gsungs pa las khro gnyer bsdus shing zhal bgrang bas dug gsum rtsad nas gcod pa'i mche bzur gsum gtsigs pa/ de ltar 'ab
322b2(rgyud): bzhes byad du snang ba zhig byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams chen po gsum g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to// dpal rdo rje gtum po thams cad gsang ba'i
322b3(rgyud): rgyud las 'bar ba'i khro ba khros pa'i tshul du bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de'i tshe de'i dus na/ dus gsum gyi theg pa'i bdag po thams cad 'dus te/ ye shes kyi mkha' gsang ba'i bum pa
322b4(rgyud): 'bar ba'i khro bo de'i lus kun bkrus te ye shes kyi bum pa'i/ chu rgun gyis dbang bskur
322b5(rgyud): ba dang / chos nyid kyi ci dang / ye shes kyi bcud mar la sogs pas 'bri ba rnams kyi tshul dang ldan pa'i phyir dbang bskur ro// ye shes kyi khro bo de lus si mo zhing rgyas te bde ba skyes par gyur to// 
322b6(rgyud): / denas rigs thams cad kyi bdag po// sangs rgyas lnga yum dang bcas pas bde ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ gnyis su med pa'i mkha' las ye shes kyi yig 'bru k+ShiM ma ning ka dang / k+ShiM dkar
322b7(rgyud): meng / ser po dang / k+Shidamar po dang / k+ShiM ljang ku dang / sna tshogs kyi mdog tu snang ba dga' thon te/ gsung gcig gis bskyed bskal gyi sngags bka' stsam pa/ oM nyi mas sbal na dag
322b8(rgyud): Na tsa le tse le hUM pa Te \u0f7fsa gsungs pa las ye shes las sprul pa khyang mthing ga dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / ma so nas sna tshogs pa 'dus pa'i khyang lus
323a1(rgyud): dkar ba/ gshog pa sngob/ rwa ye shes sprul 'bar ba/ gdug bcan 'dren cing zab/ 'bar ba'i khro ba'i zhugs rjel gnas par gyur to// lus kha dog lnga la/ mchun gzug
323a2(rgyud): kyi rdo rje las grub pa/ bshog sa dma'i'i mtha' ma/ khebs pa/ mgagaser tsun ma bzhin du sa / gdug pa'i spru'i rigs bzhi so sor zab dge spyi gtsug dang / dadrilang dang / rna lhag
323a3(rgyud): g.yas g.yon dang / dbu'i ltan khung la sogs par gnas so// rigs sos phyag mtshan so sos dbang bskur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bdag pos 'khor lo spyi gtsug tu spyan te/ 
323a4(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swab+hA ba Ata ma ko&haM zhes gsungs zhing 'khor lo byin no// gsung rigs kyi bdag pos kyang AHsarba ta thA ga ta thAg badz+ra swab+hA
323a5(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo mgrin par gzhig go// thugs kyi rigs kyi bdag pos/ hUM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&hUM zhes thugs kar rdo rje gzhag go// yon tan gyi rigs kyi bdag
323a6(rgyud): 'os kyang / sA sarba ta thA ka ta ra t+na gu h+ya a d+ha Shiny+tsan+da maM/ zhes rgya gram dang lte bar rin po che 'bab ba nag go// las kyi rigs kyi bdag pos kyang b+ha sarba ta thAg ta ka ma gu h+ya a Sh+T+riShiH
323a7(rgyud): zhes gas zhing gsang gnas mu n+ya ga ma ga na ga/ ye shes kyi dro chung sku rgyung la spyan che ba rdo rje dang bsdigs mdzub 'dzin pa/ dkar po dang / dmar po dang / yer po dang / ljang gu dang / thing gi
323a8(rgyud): gos te sa tshogs pa'i khro dang 'dzin to// lon par gyur to// de dag gi byin gyis brlabs kyis sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug phrag yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du g.yos/ kun
323b1(rgyud): rab tu g.yos par gyur to// bsgeg pa'i bskal pa'i sgra tsam yang grag par gyur to// de dag tshul 'dus shing nam mkha' la bab nas/ 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte dbus su gnas pa las de bzhin gshegs/ 
323b2(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi gsung gcig gis ro/ Sha Na yak+Sha kr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na phaT ces gsungs pa las ye shes kyi khro bo sgra dug ta la nag po'i mdog ltar 'tsher ba/ ye shes rngam pa'i spyad gsum bskam pa'i glog
323b3(rgyud): lta 'khrug cing gdug pa nyi ma'i 'od zer ba zhin gang la bltas pa brlag nus shing tsha ba/ smin ma jam pa'i glog drag po bzhin ser nag du 'bar bas gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa'i mun pa sel bar
323b4(rgyud): byed pa/ sma ra ser nag la ye shes kyi me 'bar ba/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags bsreg pa/ nyon mongs pa tig mug 'joms par byed pa dag papo che'i ko rlon gsol ba/ nyon mongs pa'i ne sdang 'dul
323b5(rgyud): nga'i rtags su/ gcan zan gyi rgyal po stag gi sham thabs bgos pa/ nyon mongs pa phrag dog 'dul bar byed pa'i gzig gi mgo zos brgyan pa/ nyon mongs pa'i 'khor ma spangs pas ning chen
323b6(rgyud): g.yang gzhi gsol/ sbrul dkar khras dbu brgyan gser khras mgur chu byas pa/ dmar khris phyag gdub byas pa/ ljang khras rked bcings byas pa/ nag khras zhabs gdub byas pa/ du
323b7(rgyud): gsum ngang gis mi spong bar nyon mongs pa'i sha khrag gsol pa/ sna dang / gsung dang / thugs dang ldan pa'i thod pa skam po dang / rlon pa dang / ne phreng gis skul brgyan pa/ chos nyid skye ba med pa'i don
323b8(rgyud): dang / ldan ning 'khor bakhrag zhag dang 'dra ba la thug sa rjes gtsigs pa'i phyir zhag gi so ris kyis skul brgyan pa/ theg pa chen po'i dba'agis thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir/ bram chen gyi 'cho ma bu
324a1(rgyud): skul brgyan pa/ chos nyid sgru ba med pa'i don dang ldan nang no 'u'abar bas cha byad du spa ste/ dbus sa nagal ma tshod pan gyis sam pa/ sa sag las 'am / 
324a2(rgyud): kyil bskum nas gnas pa/ zhabs g.yon pa drag po'i tshul gyis bgrad nas gnas pas srog la rngam pa'i srin po pha ma brjes pa/ phyag g.yas pan lnga pa brdeg pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa/ 
324a3(rgyud): g.yon pa ni bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo byar bdag tu snang ba zhes rgya bram dang / ral gri 'bar bas yan lag pa ni la las kyi byed yor dbang srur ngo // dam rdzas pad+ma rnam pa lngas dang bskur nam phrin la/ 
324a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi byed pa por dbang bskur te/ de yang gnyis su med pa'i rol pas so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs pa/ nga ba'i rgyad las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'bar ba'i khro bo la
324a5(rgyud): / dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste drugasa'o// // de nas dpal rdo rje gtum po lag na rdo rjes sdigs mdzub ni bsgreng/ rdo rje ni sbar nas 'bar pa'i khro bo 'i lta bas kun du bltas te/ spyan ni bzlog/ zhal
324a6(rgyud): ni bkrang nas nas nas rngam skad ni hata/ hUM hUM/ a la la/ oM aM/ d+hI d+hi/ hohaM/ zhes byin pa'i brlabs las phrag pa gnyis rab tu 'bar te/ rdo rje khro bo dkar po// rnam par dkar
324a7(rgyud): dag mtha' yas pa 'dzin to// dpral pa rnam par 'bar ba las khro bo mthing gas tshogs pa 'thon to// mgrin pa rab tu 'bar ba la mkhro bo dmar po rnam par dmar bdag 'thon to// thugs/ 
324a8(rgyud): rang tu 'bar ba pas nga khro nag po rab tu'abar ba sna sogs pa 'dzin to// spyi lte ba rab bya'abar ba las rdo rje khro bo ljang ku rabatu 'bar ba dag 'artson to// 'bar ba'i khro 'dang/ kyang la
324b1(rgyud): ga/ rab tu 'bar ga kun du gtu 'bar la me s+ye lta bu ste/ shin du rnams/ shin du 'jigs pa/ dgod pa'i mdog tu snang ba/ mog sred can dag la gshe ba'i mdog tu snang ba/ thams cad thugs rje chen thom/ 
324b2(rgyud): kun la kyang pa/ thugs ni pa dang / rgyas pa da / dang dag / dreg pa dang / phrin la mo ni ris spyi'i dang sa pogani tupaste te 'gro ba don mdzad do// nas nas dam pa'i sgo gas pa de dag kun b+ha khri'i
324b3(rgyud): skyabs dang / mchongs pa dang / 'bring ba dang / rtse ba dang / spyan 'grang ba dang / mche ba gtsigs pa dang / khrog ti rnam bcad pa gtsigs pa shin du mi bzad pa'i ma bar stsal te/ rtsi mchog gi rgyal pos
324b4(rgyud): ti'i dri ba ldan pas gdug pa can kun gyi snying bcu ru byed pa de lta bu'i 'bar ba'i khro ba 'di dag sprul rab tu stsal par gyur to// de nas rngam pa'i gsung gis drag pa'i sngag sa sakla byal pa/ oM
324b5(rgyud): dza tsa ta/ oM bi pu la~M/ oM badz+ra tsir+thapra bar nA k+Sha/ oM badz+ra tsa d+ha ma hA nA ga hrid la/ A ba te dz+wal dz+wa la/ sarbe wA ga hr-i da yAn/ a par she la/ sarba nA gadza da pan/ ka~M mo kau ma~M/ nA ga su \u0f7f
324b6(rgyud): nA~M/ ha gan/ sa nAg tu/ hrid yin/ dag ta/ sa duSh+TAn nAg btsu ni/ bcab tsa pAH ya bA tsam/ mAnadu ts+tshi n+natAn+tu/ ak+ShapaM yaHsa/ bu thams ka mam/ 
324b7(rgyud): kra mi/ ma hA na gte dza ba swA hA zhes pas de dag thams cad yur yu por gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug du g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du
324b8(rgyud): rab tu g.yos par gyur to// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las dbang du bsdus pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas dregs pa can de dag cil gyis gnon pa'i phyir rdo rje nam mkha
325a1(rgyud): la gsor bas dregs pa can de dag shing lo rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin no// de nas rngam pa'i gsung dang / brjid pang sku las 'di skad gsungs so// khro bo rgyal po nga nyid kyis/ 
325a2(rgyud): srid pa gsum na gnas pa yang // thams cad ma lus bral gyis gnan// rigs bzhi klu rgyal 'khor dang bcas// gzi byin drag pos gnon par bya// nga ni mthu stabs bdag pa ste/ 
325a3(rgyud): dam pa'i gsung dang brjod par sku// phyag rgya drag pos zil gyis gnon zhes ched du brjod pas brjod nas brjid gnon gyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba bcas te phyag mar mi bsnol te mthe bong gan
325a4(rgyud): dang mthe chung gnyis so sor rtse sprad nas brkyang ngo // phyag gi mthil 'khor lo can yang thur du bstan te shin du mi bzad pa'i
325a5(rgyud): ru Ta pak+She/ hUM hUM/ dze nI la bA ra~M tsi/ rtsi swi tsa hU~M phaT ces ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pas dregs pa can dang klu thams cad myos rab tu myos nas bka' bzhin bgyi'o zhes gsal to/ 
325a6(rgyud): de dag thams cad kyang myos pa'i chu drag po 'thungs pa lta bu 'am/ skyes bu gnyid kyis gdungs pa lta bu ste/ de dag thams cad kyi mgrir gcig tu gsol pa/ kye ma gsang ba'i bdag po
325a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das// rig sngags bdag po zhi pa'i rgyal// khyod kyi rig sngags smad pa yis// shin du mi bang rab tu myo'o// 'bangs su mchi zhing bka' ba zhid 'tshal// thugs rje ca
325a8(rgyud): bdag cag la// rab tu dgongs shing 'bangs su mchi// smad ma rnams la 'tshe mi 'gad ces dam bcas so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud lus drags pa can zil gyis gnon
325b1(rgyud): pa'i le ru ste brkyang pa'o// // de nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i sde dpon chen pabatu byan zhes bya ba gal ba dar 'das ta mtshad pa'i yi byad rnam pa sna tshogs pas mtshad nas rngang khro pa
325b2(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// kye khro bo'i bdag po chen po drags pa gdug pa can 'di dag ni shin tu ma rungs par gyur na/ 'di dag brid nas bstan pa gnas pa'i thabs kyi spro ba mdzad du gsol
325b3(rgyud): zhes gsol ba las lha'i dbang po nyon cig/ klu rnams kyi rdzas rnams rdzas sna chags pa sags la/ bdag nyid kyi lus dag cing gtsang bar byasal longs ma spyod pa'i ras dkar po bgos
325b4(rgyud): dri zhim po dang ldan pa'o thig les lus byugs pa bu rim dang / sha ka ra dang / sbrang rtsi mur bar byas la zhag bdun ram dgu'i gong nas kha zas ngar pa spang bar bya'o// 
325b5(rgyud): lus kyi rnam pa la rma bya'i sgo lnga btsugs te/ shes rab can gyi bya ba'o// klu'i sman sna tshogs pa dang 'jam pa'i 'bru bsres pa'i phyem yang raba'i chus smras te ri lu sha rtag gi 'bru tsam brgya rtsa brgyad
325b6(rgyud): bya'o// klu sman rnam pa tha dad pa yang blugs te dkar ba la sogs pa dang ldan par bya'o// de nas thugs rjes chen po gzigs twa/ klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas/ dga' dang gus pas sman
325b7(rgyud): 'dren gyis// rtse zhing gdung bas tshur shog sheg/ dga' zhig gus pas mngon mi sems// kun kyang brtse bas chur shog shig/ ces bka' stsal pas de dag kun gyi dbang po kun kyang shin du dang
325b8(rgyud): par gyur nas sha ring la spyong ma 'dus pa lta buste/ kun kyang dga' ba'i mdangs dang chas nas gang na ba der 'khod do// sngags bka' stsal pa/ rA ga rA dza sa ma ya sA hA zhes bka' stsal pa/ 
326a1(rgyud): kun kyang tshim par gyur to// de dag kun gyis kyang mgran gcig gas dam chag gi dam pabul ba/ dpa' tshacan pa khra ba' 'dag/ khyod kyi bka' las 'das gyur na// bdag ca
326a2(rgyud): rnams kyi mgo lus steng // dubaku rags nas dul par shog/ tad+ya thA/ a tsan+datsan+da/ 6T+Ta/ shA sa \u0f7f/ sarbate swA hA/ nes gsal // dpal rje ga tum pa thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las gdug pa/ 
326a3(rgyud): can bka' la gtags pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas yang dbang po chen pos gsol pa/ kye rdo rje khro bo dag dwags pa can 'di dag shin du ma rungs par gyur na/ la la ni rus pa chag cing grugs/ la
326a4(rgyud): la la dag ni nam mkha' lding dbu'i gtsug tor na gnas pas len pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir/ la la dag ni khrag bskams/ la la dag ni
326a5(rgyud): sen mo dang yan lag chag/ la la dag ni gti mug gi gnyid log pas byang chub kyi snying po mi shes/ la la dag ni rtsa dang rgyus pa chad de/ nad rnams pa sna tshogs kyis gdungs/ la la dag ni lus
326a6(rgyud): kun tsha ba'i nad kyis nyams thag/ la la dag ni rtse shing ming yang mi grag/ la la dag ni nyon mongs pa rgyas te sngor sems bskyed pa rjes su me dran/ la la dag ni sems bskyed pa rjes su
326a7(rgyud): dran yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal mi mthong / la la dag ni ya dwags kyi khams lta bu ste kha zas kyi sprul pa dang me ldan na 'di dag gso ba'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol nas gsol pa
326a8(rgyud): la lnga'i dbang po dag dbang po'i lag pas na lag pa chad pasas par 'gyur ro// chu srin sder mos ni sen mo chag pasas par 'gyur ro// rA ga ge sar gyis ni byang chub kyi sems bslang
